source: Allow not a single imp to escape!
target: Allow not a single imp to escape!

source: There are too many of them!
target: There are too many of them!

source: Hostile sylphs approach! Draw your weapons!
target: Hostile sylphs approach! Draw your weapons!

source: We must keep the roads safe!
target: We must keep the roads safe!

source: These knaves must be taught a lesson!
target: These knaves must be taught a lesson!

source: It is the beans they are after!
target: It is the beans they are after!

source: What are ziz doing this far east!?
target: What are ziz doing this far east!?

source: The bud! We must protect the bud!
target: The bud! We must protect the bud!

source: Take care. Something has the opo-opos in a frenzy.
target: Take care. Something has the opo-opos in a frenzy.

source: Seven hells! It's time for a change in plans.
target: Seven hells! It's time for a change in plans.

source: Would someone be so kind as to assist us?
target: Would someone be so kind as to assist us?

source: My wares! Those damned goblins have made off with my wares!
target: My wares! Those damned goblins have made off with my wares!

source: Would ye look at all them golems!
target: Would ye look at all them golems!

source: Not <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> imps! They'll have all our honey!
target: Not <var 1A 02 /var>more<var 1A 01 /var> imps! They'll have all our honey!

source: At this rate, there'll be no flowers left at all!
target: At this rate, there'll be no flowers left at all!

source: Get this man away from me!
target: Get this man away from me!

source: Seek you audience with the king?
target: Seek you audience with the king?

source: I want to hear you sing!
target: I want to hear you sing!

source: Ulp! I just wanted to drink my mead in peace!
target: Ulp! I just wanted to drink my mead in peace!

source: Come! The Wood Wailers seek volunteers!
target: Come! The Wood Wailers seek volunteers!

source: Ye may've made it this far, but ye ain't gettin' out alive.
target: Ye may've made it this far, but ye ain't gettin' out alive.

source: Hit me with all you have!
target: Hit me with all you have!

source: There are too many of them!
target: There are too many of them!

source: Tonight we shall poach the poachers!
target: Tonight we shall poach the poachers!

source: Are the resources of the city<var 1F /var>state so thinly stretched that they must send adventurers to do their dirty work?
target: Are the resources of the city<var 1F /var>state so thinly stretched that they must send adventurers to do their dirty work?

source: Damn you all! The forest is not yours to claim!
target: Damn you all! The forest is not yours to claim!

source: Lustyeye uplanders seek goodgobbies' gobbiepack goodies?
target: Lustyeye uplanders seek goodgobbies' gobbiepack goodies?

source: Backwalk with fastness, uplander! Or else...ba-boom!
target: Backwalk with fastness, uplander! Or else...ba-boom!

source: Narrowheart uplander seeks overtossing of good Gobbiekeep! Stikflix backpays with much fireboom!
target: Narrowheart uplander seeks overtossing of good Gobbiekeep! Stikflix backpays with much fireboom!

source: Oh! Such soreness of gut! Might we be making busydeal? No?
target: Oh! Such soreness of gut! Might we be making busydeal? No?

source: Fellow creatures! Come, follow this one!
target: Fellow creatures! Come, follow this one!

source: This one will suffer at the hands of the grounded ones no more!
target: This one will suffer at the hands of the grounded ones no more!

source: I could have taken him... Honest!
target: I could have taken him... Honest!

source: The Order has no need for milksops!
target: The Order has no need for milksops!

source: High time I should check the crops...
target: High time I should check the crops...

source: The ladybugs! They're attacking the bees!
target: The ladybugs! They're attacking the bees!

source: Someone help! The poor honeybees don't stand a chance!
target: Someone help! The poor honeybees don't stand a chance!

source: The harvest will be a good one this season. I can feel it! You have my thanks!
target: The harvest will be a good one this season. I can feel it! You have my thanks!

source: Why, you sneaky flying rat! I'll see you never eat another Lalafell!
target: Why, you sneaky flying rat! I'll see you never eat another Lalafell!

source: Sod off, ye sack o' squirrel shite!
target: Sod off, ye sack o' squirrel shite!

source: How's about I escort ye off the premises?
target: How's about I escort ye off the premises?

source: I spy a throat needs slittin'!
target: I spy a throat needs slittin'!

source: They are too quick for me... I am done for...
target: They are too quick for me... I am done for...

source: I don't believe they will follow any further.
target: I don't believe they will follow any further.

source: You have done a great service for Ul'dah.
target: You have done a great service for Ul'dah.

source: Slay the rabid beasts before they can force their way to the Zephyr Gate!
target: Slay the rabid beasts before they can force their way to the Zephyr Gate!

source: I fear my pursuers may have circled around, and await us ahead.
target: I fear my pursuers may have circled around, and await us ahead.

source: If the Amalj'aa have already made it this far, they will use this place to trap us.
target: If the Amalj'aa have already made it this far, they will use this place to trap us.

source: Little Ala Mhigo is close, but not close enough. Look alive, friend!
target: Little Ala Mhigo is close, but not close enough. Look alive, friend!

source: How did ye find this place!?
target: How did ye find this place!?

source: Come closer. I'll slit yer throat and toss yer corpse to the mad serpent.
target: Come closer. I'll slit yer throat and toss yer corpse to the mad serpent.

source: Wh-Where are me men!? Wh-Where are me maidens!?
target: Wh-Where are me men!? Wh-Where are me maidens!?

source: Try an' catch me, ye two-legged lubber!
target: Try an' catch me, ye two-legged lubber!

source: Back fer more, eh? I sharpened me blade, just fer this very occasion.
target: Back fer more, eh? I sharpened me blade, just fer this very occasion.

source: The boss ain't goin' to like this one bit...
target: The boss ain't goin' to like this one bit...

source: Kindly uplander! Gobbieflock needs quick hand-lending!
target: Kindly uplander! Gobbieflock needs quick hand-lending!

source: Pshkohhh... Overmany deepsores... Blood and bile! Blood and bile!
target: Pshkohhh... Overmany deepsores... Blood and bile! Blood and bile!

source: Uplander saves gobbieflock! Huzzah! Zah hah!
target: Uplander saves gobbieflock! Huzzah! Zah hah!

source: Kindly uplander now taking gobbie jinglyshine!
target: Kindly uplander now taking gobbie jinglyshine!

source: Shkoh! Shkoh! More fastness! More fastness!
target: Shkoh! Shkoh! More fastness! More fastness!

source: Shkoh! Brayflox shall see to thunderfoot!
target: Shkoh! Brayflox shall see to thunderfoot!

source: Shkoh! Shkoh! More backstrike! More forestrike!
target: Shkoh! Shkoh! More backstrike! More forestrike!

source: Psheew... Brayflox backwalks from foregate of deathpit!
target: Psheew... Brayflox backwalks from foregate of deathpit!

source: Shkoh! Shkoh! Gobfists of Brayflox are having no match!
target: Shkoh! Shkoh! Gobfists of Brayflox are having no match!

source: Shkoh! Shkoh! Present for kindly uplander!
target: Shkoh! Shkoh! Present for kindly uplander!

source: Shkoh! Shkoh! Victory for Brayflox! Longstop is not overturning!
target: Shkoh! Shkoh! Victory for Brayflox! Longstop is not overturning!

source: Brayflox is come to give goodly uplander gobbie hand-lending!
target: Brayflox is come to give goodly uplander gobbie hand-lending!

source: There! Thunderclaw is blood and bile!
target: There! Thunderclaw is blood and bile!

source: Yes, yes! More tongueflaps! More tongueflaps!
target: Yes, yes! More tongueflaps! More tongueflaps!

source: Help! Someone! I'm being chased by jackals!
target: Help! Someone! I'm being chased by jackals!

source: Please! I didn't mean any harm!
target: Please! I didn't mean any harm!

source: What in the seven hells is that thing!?
target: What in the seven hells is that thing!?

source: No man in his right mind would fish here!
target: No man in his right mind would fish here!

source: You haven't had enough, have you!?
target: You haven't had enough, have you!?

source: Suck it up, lad! You're a storm soldier now!
target: Suck it up, lad! You're a storm soldier now!

source: Something's wrong... I can feel it...
target: Something's wrong... I can feel it...

source: A disgrace! Each and every one of you!
target: A disgrace! Each and every one of you!

source: I suppose it's time I be makin' the rounds.
target: I suppose it's time I be makin' the rounds.

source: I have a bad feelin' 'bout this.
target: I have a bad feelin' 'bout this.

source: If I never see another cave bat, it'll be too soon.
target: If I never see another cave bat, it'll be too soon.

source: You stay the hells away from my stock, you filthy flyin' rat!
target: You stay the hells away from my stock, you filthy flyin' rat!

source: Me dodos! Someone save me poor dodos!
target: Me dodos! Someone save me poor dodos!

source: We cannot let these bats out to feed. Their bite'll drive both man and beast to madness!
target: We cannot let these bats out to feed. Their bite'll drive both man and beast to madness!

source: Today is the day! The miller's daughter will finally be mine!
target: Today is the day! The miller's daughter will finally be mine!

source: Many have visited the maiden's garden, yet her flower remains unplucked.
target: Many have visited the maiden's garden, yet her flower remains unplucked.

source: Ah, milady. Will you forgive me for my tardiness?
target: Ah, milady. Will you forgive me for my tardiness?

source: Out here, all alone... I was so frightened!
target: Out here, all alone... I was so frightened!

source: Why did you wish to see me so far from town?
target: Why did you wish to see me so far from town?

source: Ah yes, let me explain, my love...
target: Ah yes, let me explain, my love...

source: Your eyes are like sapphires, your lips, rubies. And your breasts... Those br─
target: Your eyes are like sapphires, your lips, rubies. And your breasts... Those br─

source: Save you!? Who's going to save me!?
target: Save you!? Who's going to save me!?

source: It's your fault we're out here in the first place!
target: It's your fault we're out here in the first place!

source: Don't ever call on me again, coward!
target: Don't ever call on me again, coward!

source: B-But I never got the chance to tell you about your br─
target: B-But I never got the chance to tell you about your br─

source: <sigh> I wonder if she has a sister...
target: <sigh> I wonder if she has a sister...

source: Hah hah! Right into me hands!
target: Hah hah! Right into me hands!

source: What does it look like I'm doing?
target: What does it look like I'm doing?

source: Have at 'em lads! Ye keep what ye kill!
target: Have at 'em lads! Ye keep what ye kill!

source: The damned gobdaw's at it again!
target: The damned gobdaw's at it again!

source: Quiet down before I shut you up myself!
target: Quiet down before I shut you up myself!

source: I'll show you what we here at the Quay think of stowaways.
target: I'll show you what we here at the Quay think of stowaways.

source: Step aside, honeybee. I's no quarrel wiv yer ilk.
target: Step aside, honeybee. I's no quarrel wiv yer ilk.

source: I paid fer me passage, proper. The damn captain's fillin' yer ears with gobshite.
target: I paid fer me passage, proper. The damn captain's fillin' yer ears with gobshite.

source: I could use a little help over here, sir!
target: I could use a little help over here, sir!

source: So it's a fight ye all want, eh?
target: So it's a fight ye all want, eh?

source: That quiet you down, did it?
target: That quiet you down, did it?

source: May the mighty serpent drag yer arses all the way down to the abyss!
target: May the mighty serpent drag yer arses all the way down to the abyss!

source: So, are you finally ready to talk?
target: So, are you finally ready to talk?

source: I's less 'an naught to say to you and yers.
target: I's less 'an naught to say to you and yers.

source: Then to the brig it is. Grab the shackles, men.
target: Then to the brig it is. Grab the shackles, men.

source: No... Not there again. Anywhere but there! Please! I'll tell you all you want to know! Honest!
target: No... Not there again. Anywhere but there! Please! I'll tell you all you want to know! Honest!

source: Godsdammit to the seventh hell and back!
target: Godsdammit to the seventh hell and back!

source: No man can rule Ahctstymm Shadowlurker!
target: No man can rule Ahctstymm Shadowlurker!

source: Get them gropers off me grog!
target: Get them gropers off me grog!

source: Sod off! I drink what I want.
target: Sod off! I drink what I want.

source: <var 1A 02 /var>I'll<var 1A 01 /var> cut ye a new gob so's that ye can drink all grog ye like!
target: <var 1A 02 /var>I'll<var 1A 01 /var> cut ye a new gob so's that ye can drink all grog ye like!

source: Not afore I cut ye a new piss'ole!
target: Not afore I cut ye a new piss'ole!

source: Get yer hands off me, honeybees!
target: Get yer hands off me, honeybees!

source: Kill every last one of them!
target: Kill every last one of them!

source: Don't let those ants take another child!
target: Don't let those ants take another child!

source: Those accursed goats will see this desert reduced to a...well, a desert!
target: Those accursed goats will see this desert reduced to a...well, a desert!

source: The lizards march west! We must intercept them!
target: The lizards march west! We must intercept them!

source: Amalj'aa raiders! Men! To your positions!
target: Amalj'aa raiders! Men! To your positions!

source: Those bothersome imps are up to no good!
target: Those bothersome imps are up to no good!

source: The Amalj'aa approach! Meet them in field!
target: The Amalj'aa approach! Meet them in field!

source: What are landtraps doing in the desert!?
target: What are landtraps doing in the desert!?

source: I told those damn Ala Mhigans to cover their piss!
target: I told those damn Ala Mhigans to cover their piss!

source: They say the dead rise from the abyss each night to claim the souls of the living.
target: They say the dead rise from the abyss each night to claim the souls of the living.

source: You sound as if you believe that bilge!
target: You sound as if you believe that bilge!

source: Hah! You're worse than my skin and blister!
target: Hah! You're worse than my skin and blister!

source: Didn't your ma ever tell you!? There's no such thing as ghosts!
target: Didn't your ma ever tell you!? There's no such thing as ghosts!

source: It l-l-l-looks awfully big to be a f-f-firefly...
target: It l-l-l-looks awfully big to be a f-f-firefly...

source: Then it's a ship...or a lighthouse...or a...uh...
target: Then it's a ship...or a lighthouse...or a...uh...

source: It's the rats... I can hear their squeaking!
target: It's the rats... I can hear their squeaking!

source: The exercise is open to all who wish to join!
target: The exercise is open to all who wish to join!

source: Why flour? Why not millioncorn or ogre pumpkins or grapes?
target: Why flour? Why not millioncorn or ogre pumpkins or grapes?

source: This place is simply crawling with yarzons!
target: This place is simply crawling with yarzons!

source: The goblins'll be here any moment, and then, not a single cog'll be safe!
target: The goblins'll be here any moment, and then, not a single cog'll be safe!

source: My appointment! Whatever shall I tell them!?
target: My appointment! Whatever shall I tell them!?

source: But how am I to get from <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var> to <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: But how am I to get from <var 1A 02 /var>here<var 1A 01 /var> to <var 1A 02 /var>there<var 1A 01 /var>?

source: A good beating─that's what these recruits need.
target: A good beating─that's what these recruits need.

source: One day, that wench'll be mine.
target: One day, that wench'll be mine.

source: One day, that wench'll be mine.
target: One day, that wench'll be mine.

source: And I say yer full of crab shite!
target: And I say yer full of crab shite!

source: And I say yer full of...of...more crab shite!
target: And I say yer full of...of...more crab shite!

source: Alright, you two. Clap the traps. She ain't neither of yours.
target: Alright, you two. Clap the traps. She ain't neither of yours.

source: This ain't none of your business.
target: This ain't none of your business.

source: Aye, this is between me and this here sod.
target: Aye, this is between me and this here sod.

source: Excellent work, men. The checkpoint is secure!
target: Excellent work, men. The checkpoint is secure!

source: Thal's balls! You think it will be any easier when the imperials come!?
target: Thal's balls! You think it will be any easier when the imperials come!?

source: We did it! The day is ours!
target: We did it! The day is ours!

source: This bodes ill for the checkpoint...
target: This bodes ill for the checkpoint...

source: Heh heh. That should teach the lads.
target: Heh heh. That should teach the lads.

source: It seems my recruits aren't the only ones who are soft...
target: It seems my recruits aren't the only ones who are soft...

source: I see the caravans now. The oranges will be safe!
target: I see the caravans now. The oranges will be safe!

source: These oranges are off to the pleasure boats, you say? Might be I should see the crates there myself.
target: These oranges are off to the pleasure boats, you say? Might be I should see the crates there myself.

source: The bridge is ours once again!
target: The bridge is ours once again!

source: Bleedin' honeybees... You'd best sleep with one eye open!
target: Bleedin' honeybees... You'd best sleep with one eye open!

source: The galagos! They're gone! I can finally deliver my flour to market!
target: The galagos! They're gone! I can finally deliver my flour to market!

source: Pickman! Pickman! Worthy, we are not!
target: Pickman! Pickman! Worthy, we are not!

source: In the name of Titan, Lord of Crags, crushed shall you be!
target: In the name of Titan, Lord of Crags, crushed shall you be!

source: Well, now that's settled, I can get back to work.
target: Well, now that's settled, I can get back to work.

source: Doesn't look like the goblins did too much damage.
target: Doesn't look like the goblins did too much damage.

source: Another shipment lost...and the new one will come out of my pay...
target: Another shipment lost...and the new one will come out of my pay...

source: Allow a single peiste to cross and I'll see to it you're docked a full moon's salary!
target: Allow a single peiste to cross and I'll see to it you're docked a full moon's salary!

source: Next season's catch is safe...for now.
target: Next season's catch is safe...for now.

source: The coblyns have withdrawn. Return to barracks!
target: The coblyns have withdrawn. Return to barracks!

source: Ye dinnae get et. <var 08 E905 ((Thank ye.)) ((Will ye be me new da?)) /var>
target: Ye dinnae get et. <var 08 E905 ((Thank ye.)) ((Will ye be me new da?)) /var>

source: The children are safe! Now let us fill that hole!
target: The children are safe! Now let us fill that hole!

source: I really should be off. I mustn't keep the noble ladies waiting!
target: I really should be off. I mustn't keep the noble ladies waiting!

source: Ah, let us marvel in the beauty of the desert! (Just disregard those goat corpses.)
target: Ah, let us marvel in the beauty of the desert! (Just disregard those goat corpses.)

source: Crawl back under your rocks, foul lizards!
target: Crawl back under your rocks, foul lizards!

source: Wine and glory to the victors!
target: Wine and glory to the victors!

source: One day this land will be ours again!
target: One day this land will be ours again!

source: <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> aren't an imp, are you? Hah hah! I jest!
target: <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> aren't an imp, are you? Hah hah! I jest!

source: The desert is no place for rose...ling.
target: The desert is no place for rose...ling.

source: You haven't seen the last of us!
target: You haven't seen the last of us!

source: Mayhap this will teach those degenerates to piss elsewhere.
target: Mayhap this will teach those degenerates to piss elsewhere.

source: I couldn't have made it on my own. You have our gratitude.
target: I couldn't have made it on my own. You have our gratitude.

source: Foolish are the sons of man. The past is to be left to slumber.
target: Foolish are the sons of man. The past is to be left to slumber.

source: Is that all? Might be you left your member at home with your blade.
target: Is that all? Might be you left your member at home with your blade.

source: If you think you can do any better, I invite you to try.
target: If you think you can do any better, I invite you to try.

source: Hah! I've felt bigger stings from a flea bite.
target: Hah! I've felt bigger stings from a flea bite.

source: Spineless cravens is what you all are!
target: Spineless cravens is what you all are!

source: But I will see you again! I swear it!
target: But I will see you again! I swear it!

source: Is there no one who can offer me a challenge?
target: Is there no one who can offer me a challenge?

source: Get out of there, you hellssent vermin!
target: Get out of there, you hellssent vermin!

source: Pay the toll! Pay the toll!
target: Pay the toll! Pay the toll!

source: Empty yer purse out on the bridge and we'll let ye live long enough to watch us gather up the gil.
target: Empty yer purse out on the bridge and we'll let ye live long enough to watch us gather up the gil.

source: The flour! Won't anyone think of the <var 1A 02 /var>flour<var 1A 01 /var>!?
target: The flour! Won't anyone think of the <var 1A 02 /var>flour<var 1A 01 /var>!?

source: Why won't these galagos leave the mill be!?
target: Why won't these galagos leave the mill be!?

source: Pain, you will suffer! Titan knows!
target: Pain, you will suffer! Titan knows!

source: Titan sees all! Our pain, He knows!
target: Titan sees all! Our pain, He knows!

source: Succumb, you will to the cold of the crag!
target: Succumb, you will to the cold of the crag!

source: Not the cogs! It took ages for those to arrive!
target: Not the cogs! It took ages for those to arrive!

source: I did naught to deserve this!
target: I did naught to deserve this!

source: Wretched swamp spawn! I'd club you myself if I had a big enough stick!
target: Wretched swamp spawn! I'd club you myself if I had a big enough stick!

source: You are a plague on the realm!
target: You are a plague on the realm!

source: Run! Cower behind your stone walls!
target: Run! Cower behind your stone walls!

source: We grow weary of your impudence!
target: We grow weary of your impudence!

source: Throw down your arms and you will be spared an eternity of damnation!
target: Throw down your arms and you will be spared an eternity of damnation!

source: Slip open yer purse, like. Or I'll cut it for ye.
target: Slip open yer purse, like. Or I'll cut it for ye.

source: No coin, ye say? What've ye hidin' in them smallclothes, then?
target: No coin, ye say? What've ye hidin' in them smallclothes, then?

source: We must hurry. It is unwise to pause on the shifting sands.
target: We must hurry. It is unwise to pause on the shifting sands.

source: The Amalj'aa watch from afar. If we are lucky, they will leave us be.
target: The Amalj'aa watch from afar. If we are lucky, they will leave us be.

source: Do not let the silence of the sand fool you!
target: Do not let the silence of the sand fool you!

source: These relics could reveal the secrets of eras past. They must be cataloged!
target: These relics could reveal the secrets of eras past. They must be cataloged!

source: I am fortunate to have you by my side.
target: I am fortunate to have you by my side.

source: Babaroon is hungry for some crunchies! Adventurer crunchy?
target: Babaroon is hungry for some crunchies! Adventurer crunchy?

source: Babaroon has a bubbly pot! Throws you in the bubbly pot!
target: Babaroon has a bubbly pot! Throws you in the bubbly pot!

source: They'll soon be at it again, I fear. The two are stubborn as logs.
target: They'll soon be at it again, I fear. The two are stubborn as logs.

source: Ignore the grunts! We seek out their leader!
target: Ignore the grunts! We seek out their leader!

source: There is no sight of the commander. He must be here somewhere!
target: There is no sight of the commander. He must be here somewhere!

source: No matter. We can still sabotage their supplies!
target: No matter. We can still sabotage their supplies!

source: He can't have withdrawn already. I <var 1A 02 /var>saw<var 1A 01 /var> him with mine own two eyes!
target: He can't have withdrawn already. I <var 1A 02 /var>saw<var 1A 01 /var> him with mine own two eyes!

source: For coin and country! We have stayed the lizards' hand!
target: For coin and country! We have stayed the lizards' hand!

source: We can only hope our efforts gave the reinforcements enough time...
target: We can only hope our efforts gave the reinforcements enough time...

source: Tally our losses and burn the bodies!
target: Tally our losses and burn the bodies!

source: You have my thanks and the thanks of Ul'dah!
target: You have my thanks and the thanks of Ul'dah!

source: Watch for their sting! The poison can cripple a grown aurochs!
target: Watch for their sting! The poison can cripple a grown aurochs!

source: What ever should I do, Mother? I can find only boot laces and tumbleweed...
target: What ever should I do, Mother? I can find only boot laces and tumbleweed...

source: I did it, Mother! Everything will be alright!
target: I did it, Mother! Everything will be alright!

source: Is there not a single adventurer who would assist me?
target: Is there not a single adventurer who would assist me?

source: With these stones I shall prove my disbelievers wrong!
target: With these stones I shall prove my disbelievers wrong!

source: Let us dispose of this rubbish!
target: Let us dispose of this rubbish!

source: The sultana's pigs've come to wallow!
target: The sultana's pigs've come to wallow!

source: Don't think an Ala Mhigan'll fall that easily, pigs!
target: Don't think an Ala Mhigan'll fall that easily, pigs!

source: Gah! You leave me no choice...
target: Gah! You leave me no choice...

source: Apologies, my captain. I've failed you...
target: Apologies, my captain. I've failed you...

source: Ah, and here's the dung heap.
target: Ah, and here's the dung heap.

source: The Corpse Brigade will never perish!
target: The Corpse Brigade will never perish!

source: Keep the rats off our bridge!
target: Keep the rats off our bridge!

source: Don't give those vermin an ilm!
target: Don't give those vermin an ilm!

source: Qiqirn bandits! Hide the little ones!
target: Qiqirn bandits! Hide the little ones!

source: See that the supplies are safe!
target: See that the supplies are safe!

source: The villagers! The rats look to capture them!
target: The villagers! The rats look to capture them!

source: Keep those damned paws off me!
target: Keep those damned paws off me!

source: Not the Bowl of Embers! Just kill me now!
target: Not the Bowl of Embers! Just kill me now!

source: Take me if you must, but spare my wife!
target: Take me if you must, but spare my wife!

source: And the machine roars to life!
target: And the machine roars to life!

source: Come, my ladies! Let us take the fight to them!
target: Come, my ladies! Let us take the fight to them!

source: No one dies under my watch. Captain's orders!
target: No one dies under my watch. Captain's orders!

source: There is nothing to fear, but a painful death at the hands of a beastman.
target: There is nothing to fear, but a painful death at the hands of a beastman.

source: Who shall man the lever tonight, ladies!?
target: Who shall man the lever tonight, ladies!?

source: Don't you dare lay a claw upon me!
target: Don't you dare lay a claw upon me!

source: Did you see that, ladies? Did you?
target: Did you see that, ladies? Did you?

source: Would you look how his chest heaves?
target: Would you look how his chest heaves?

source: See how the sweat glistens on his brow!
target: See how the sweat glistens on his brow!

source: I'd take an arrow in the thigh for you, Captain!
target: I'd take an arrow in the thigh for you, Captain!

source: Tonight it is I who shall man the lever!
target: Tonight it is I who shall man the lever!

source: As long as the captain stands, we cannot be struck down!
target: As long as the captain stands, we cannot be struck down!

source: I'll rip out your eyes and cast them into the chasm!
target: I'll rip out your eyes and cast them into the chasm!

source: You won't get far, northborn scum!
target: You won't get far, northborn scum!

source: The sun gives us light so that we may hunt in Her name!
target: The sun gives us light so that we may hunt in Her name!

source: The sun on our heads and blood on our hands! Life is good, my sisters!
target: The sun on our heads and blood on our hands! Life is good, my sisters!

source: Lower your bows! Today, we hunt no more.
target: Lower your bows! Today, we hunt no more.

source: Wherever did I place my lockbox?
target: Wherever did I place my lockbox?

source: I won't allow my hard-earned profits to fall into those rats' hands!
target: I won't allow my hard-earned profits to fall into those rats' hands!

source: I'll never leave you, my captain...in spirit!
target: I'll never leave you, my captain...in spirit!

source: Please forgive me! I know not what I do!
target: Please forgive me! I know not what I do!

source: Mayhap it's right time I thought about relocation...
target: Mayhap it's right time I thought about relocation...

source: I knew the captain would save us!
target: I knew the captain would save us!

source: Now, we strike at their heart! Follow me!
target: Now, we strike at their heart! Follow me!

source: To the seventh hell and back, my captain!
target: To the seventh hell and back, my captain!

source: How could I have let this happen...?
target: How could I have let this happen...?

source: Let me tend to your wounds.
target: Let me tend to your wounds.

source: No, let <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> tend to your wounds!
target: No, let <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var> tend to your wounds!

source: Oh, if there were only someone who loathed colibri as much as I...
target: Oh, if there were only someone who loathed colibri as much as I...

source: There! The true enemy shows himself!
target: There! The true enemy shows himself!

source: The day is ours! Now let us return to Highbridge.
target: The day is ours! Now let us return to Highbridge.

source: Hit them hard and watch them scatter!
target: Hit them hard and watch them scatter!

source: Look! They bend! And what bends will break!
target: Look! They bend! And what bends will break!

source: Rip the teeth from their maws!
target: Rip the teeth from their maws!

source: No one will remember your name after I'm through with you!
target: No one will remember your name after I'm through with you!

source: Zuzuroon cares not of names. Zuzuroon cares only of sparklies!
target: Zuzuroon cares not of names. Zuzuroon cares only of sparklies!

source: This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> bridge, and it is high time you left it!
target: This is <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> bridge, and it is high time you left it!

source: Zuzuroon soon be leaving...but with flesh for sparklies!
target: Zuzuroon soon be leaving...but with flesh for sparklies!

source: Fall back! We are outmatched and need time to regroup!
target: Fall back! We are outmatched and need time to regroup!

source: Well, then we have no time to lose. I charge by the bell, you know.
target: Well, then we have no time to lose. I charge by the bell, you know.

source: Oh, not <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var> again. You might want to draw your weapon.
target: Oh, not <var 1A 02 /var>them<var 1A 01 /var> again. You might want to draw your weapon.

source: Why won't they just let me be!?
target: Why won't they just let me be!?

source: Twelve forfend! They simply won't give in!
target: Twelve forfend! They simply won't give in!

source: Strong must away. Lizards seek puny stock.
target: Strong must away. Lizards seek puny stock.

source: Qiqirn no quarrel with sword swingers. Leave now, and Qiqirn see off!
target: Qiqirn no quarrel with sword swingers. Leave now, and Qiqirn see off!

source: To market! To market! To sparklies! To market!
target: To market! To market! To sparklies! To market!

source: His Effulgence would have these souls!
target: His Effulgence would have these souls!

source: My flame dies here, but my Lord's burns ever...bright...
target: My flame dies here, but my Lord's burns ever...bright...

source: Twelve forgive me, for I am weak.
target: Twelve forgive me, for I am weak.

source: Hurry, would you? We mustn't keep the monsignor waiting.
target: Hurry, would you? We mustn't keep the monsignor waiting.

source: What was that? And that? And that!?
target: What was that? And that? And that!?

source: If the monsignor is without his mead for even a single turn of the sun...
target: If the monsignor is without his mead for even a single turn of the sun...

source: Why can't the monsignor get his own mead!?
target: Why can't the monsignor get his own mead!?

source: The Sanctum lies just beyond those trees.
target: The Sanctum lies just beyond those trees.

source: We made it! Oh, praise the Twelve!
target: We made it! Oh, praise the Twelve!

source: I will repay you one day, my friend. Just...not with mead.
target: I will repay you one day, my friend. Just...not with mead.

source: When we're through, I want to be waist-deep in little white mandragora limbs!
target: When we're through, I want to be waist-deep in little white mandragora limbs!

source: The hells-spawned thing bit me leg!
target: The hells-spawned thing bit me leg!

source: Keep it away! Keep it away!
target: Keep it away! Keep it away!

source: I didn't hire you to just stand there!
target: I didn't hire you to just stand there!

source: The mead! You can have it! Just spare me!
target: The mead! You can have it! Just spare me!

source: Oh, kindly Matron, take me to Your ivory bosom and away from this hell!
target: Oh, kindly Matron, take me to Your ivory bosom and away from this hell!

source: Where is this <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var> Master Gegeruju promised?
target: Where is this <var 1A 02 /var>gift<var 1A 01 /var> Master Gegeruju promised?

source: I do not enjoy being made to wait.
target: I do not enjoy being made to wait.

source: Apologies, milord. I hope you did not wait overlong.
target: Apologies, milord. I hope you did not wait overlong.

source: Ah, Master Gegeruju. You know me well.
target: Ah, Master Gegeruju. You know me well.

source: There is no need to rush, milord. Thanks to the master, we have <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> night.
target: There is no need to rush, milord. Thanks to the master, we have <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> night.

source: I won't let none have her!
target: I won't let none have her!

source: Off our land, ye foul shite!
target: Off our land, ye foul shite!

source: How's about some steel fer supper!?
target: How's about some steel fer supper!?

source: A knife to the gut'll serve ye fine.
target: A knife to the gut'll serve ye fine.

source: This'll hurt you more than it does me!
target: This'll hurt you more than it does me!

source: I'll drag ye down to the abyss meself!
target: I'll drag ye down to the abyss meself!

source: Let me go! I'll pay double what the lizardmen are offering!
target: Let me go! I'll pay double what the lizardmen are offering!

source: I thought I'd never see Highbridge again.
target: I thought I'd never see Highbridge again.

source: What in the blary 'ells is that!?
target: What in the blary 'ells is that!?

source: Grab yer steel! The mill's under attack!
target: Grab yer steel! The mill's under attack!

source: Keep the damn things off the 'ampers!
target: Keep the damn things off the 'ampers!

source: Kobolds! Gut the mecky cave dogs!
target: Kobolds! Gut the mecky cave dogs!

source: First rats, then kobolds, now coeurls!? What's next? Aurochs!?
target: First rats, then kobolds, now coeurls!? What's next? Aurochs!?

source: No rest fer an honest pirate, eh?
target: No rest fer an honest pirate, eh?

source: Wivout that grain, we'll starve like...rats!
target: Wivout that grain, we'll starve like...rats!

source: There be too godsdamned many of 'em!
target: There be too godsdamned many of 'em!

source: Go piss on some other tree!
target: Go piss on some other tree!

source: I's killed me share o' rats o'er the years. What's a few more?
target: I's killed me share o' rats o'er the years. What's a few more?

source: The bigger they come, the more there be to kill!
target: The bigger they come, the more there be to kill!

source: This stench! It could only be...
target: This stench! It could only be...

source: Qiqirn! A whole pack heads this way as we speak!
target: Qiqirn! A whole pack heads this way as we speak!

source: To arms, men! We must defend the tower!
target: To arms, men! We must defend the tower!

source: That should keep them at bay for now.
target: That should keep them at bay for now.

source: But where there are ten rats, there are ten score. They'll be back.
target: But where there are ten rats, there are ten score. They'll be back.

source: There'll be more toads to gut tomorrow.
target: There'll be more toads to gut tomorrow.

source: Now, let us back to the Wench. The first round is on the Admiral!
target: Now, let us back to the Wench. The first round is on the Admiral!

source: I can see your hearts just aren't in it.
target: I can see your hearts just aren't in it.

source: Let us back to the Wench. A nice warm ale'll lift your spirits!
target: Let us back to the Wench. A nice warm ale'll lift your spirits!

source: Killin' ain't no different on land than it be on the sea.
target: Killin' ain't no different on land than it be on the sea.

source: Only pirate what'll give ye quarter's a dead pirate.
target: Only pirate what'll give ye quarter's a dead pirate.

source: Burn the bodies. We don't want 'em foulin' the water!
target: Burn the bodies. We don't want 'em foulin' the water!

source: Today we fought! Tonight, we drink!
target: Today we fought! Tonight, we drink!

source: Start skinnin' the dead! I need somethin' to wipe me arse!
target: Start skinnin' the dead! I need somethin' to wipe me arse!

source: I'll see each an' every one of ye in the seventh hell!
target: I'll see each an' every one of ye in the seventh hell!

source: If a pirate cannot gut a blary rat, she ain't worth 'er weight in salt.
target: If a pirate cannot gut a blary rat, she ain't worth 'er weight in salt.

source: Tell yer Titan I sends me regards!
target: Tell yer Titan I sends me regards!

source: Ye'll ne'er see naught as that on the seas, me lads!
target: Ye'll ne'er see naught as that on the seas, me lads!

source: I should've stayed on the sea.
target: I should've stayed on the sea.

source: Failures as pirates, failures as millers, failures as fighters...
target: Failures as pirates, failures as millers, failures as fighters...

source: They was jus' toyin' wiv us.
target: They was jus' toyin' wiv us.

source: I'll need to seal up this wound afore it festers.
target: I'll need to seal up this wound afore it festers.

source: Damn this place to the seventh hell!
target: Damn this place to the seventh hell!

source: I've 'ad enough. A pirate needs 'er a ship, not a mecky mill.
target: I've 'ad enough. A pirate needs 'er a ship, not a mecky mill.

source: A little rust on the sword arm...
target: A little rust on the sword arm...

source: 'Aven't yet rightened me land legs, I reckon.
target: 'Aven't yet rightened me land legs, I reckon.

source: Ye've a whole blary mountain to muck about on. Leave us be!
target: Ye've a whole blary mountain to muck about on. Leave us be!

source: O'Ghomoro is ours! All ours! Cast off, overdwellers! Cast off!
target: O'Ghomoro is ours! All ours! Cast off, overdwellers! Cast off!

source: Yer neck is hanging by a thread, lad.
target: Yer neck is hanging by a thread, lad.

source: Titan will not suffer you on His mountain! Cast off! Cast off!
target: Titan will not suffer you on His mountain! Cast off! Cast off!

source: The rocks will crush you! The mountain will shun you!
target: The rocks will crush you! The mountain will shun you!

source: Mills is fer millers. Do I look like a mecky miller!?
target: Mills is fer millers. Do I look like a mecky miller!?

source: The Eighth Umbral Era'll be upon us afore this mill's repaired...
target: The Eighth Umbral Era'll be upon us afore this mill's repaired...

source: I'm done. Done wiv it all!
target: I'm done. Done wiv it all!

source: What I wouldn't give for a breath o' sweet salt air...
target: What I wouldn't give for a breath o' sweet salt air...

source: Now that was a thing o' beauty!
target: Now that was a thing o' beauty!

source: Tell me, how did it feel to whack them beasties good?
target: Tell me, how did it feel to whack them beasties good?

source: Oh, if only I were still young.
target: Oh, if only I were still young.

source: Hells, I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> still young! Might be next time I join ye!
target: Hells, I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> still young! Might be next time I join ye!

source: 'Tis a shame we couldn't thwack 'em all.
target: 'Tis a shame we couldn't thwack 'em all.

source: But they'll be back, and I'll be waitin'.
target: But they'll be back, and I'll be waitin'.

source: Waitin' fer <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to help again, that is. Gah hah hah hah!
target: Waitin' fer <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to help again, that is. Gah hah hah hah!

source: Now it may be I can fish 'ere in peace, like.
target: Now it may be I can fish 'ere in peace, like.

source: Me leg? It'll be fine. I'll just dip 'er in the river a spell.
target: Me leg? It'll be fine. I'll just dip 'er in the river a spell.

source:
<pant> <pant>
Our tribe was tested today, yet our strength proven once again.
target:
<pant> <pant>
Our tribe was tested today, yet our strength proven once again.

source: You will have vengeance, my fallen sisters... I swear it!
target: You will have vengeance, my fallen sisters... I swear it!

source: Another hole lost to the bloody hells-spawn.
target: Another hole lost to the bloody hells-spawn.

source: The guildmaster won't like that one bit...
target: The guildmaster won't like that one bit...

source: Wild beasts have made these fields their home.
target: Wild beasts have made these fields their home.

source: Now we reclaim what is rightfully ours!
target: Now we reclaim what is rightfully ours!

source: But we must remain vigilant. The stubborn beasts will likely come crawling back.
target: But we must remain vigilant. The stubborn beasts will likely come crawling back.

source: I won't let that happen again.
target: I won't let that happen again.

source: Their eyes... Did you see their eyes?
target: Their eyes... Did you see their eyes?

source: Aye... Those men are dead, and they don't even know it.
target: Aye... Those men are dead, and they don't even know it.

source: I fear I cannot make it alone...
target: I fear I cannot make it alone...

source: I pray the local levy has seen to the Westroad.
target: I pray the local levy has seen to the Westroad.

source: I don't remember Tidegate being so far...
target: I don't remember Tidegate being so far...

source: I shall not disappoint the Admiral again!
target: I shall not disappoint the Admiral again!

source: Back to the hills with you!
target: Back to the hills with you!

source: The Maelstrom thanks you. Till sea swallows all!
target: The Maelstrom thanks you. Till sea swallows all!

source: Do not stray too far from me now. I fear this ankle won't hold much longer.
target: Do not stray too far from me now. I fear this ankle won't hold much longer.

source: You don't see any more creatures do you? And lemons. What of lemons?
target: You don't see any more creatures do you? And lemons. What of lemons?

source: Ack! This is it! The end! Thal, take me!
target: Ack! This is it! The end! Thal, take me!

source: Now to soak this ankle in a piping hot tub...
target: Now to soak this ankle in a piping hot tub...

source: A fine day for fishin', if I do say so meself.
target: A fine day for fishin', if I do say so meself.

source: I'll catch somethin' big today. I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it.
target: I'll catch somethin' big today. I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it.

source: What's that? Somethin's odd with the water...
target: What's that? Somethin's odd with the water...

source: When I said I might catch somethin' big, I never meant <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> big!
target: When I said I might catch somethin' big, I never meant <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> big!

source: How am I to fish with all these damned efts about!?
target: How am I to fish with all these damned efts about!?

source: I can't fish in that water, what with all them rotting eft corpses...
target: I can't fish in that water, what with all them rotting eft corpses...

source: Might be I need to find me another hole...
target: Might be I need to find me another hole...

source: What a bloody fine day for fishin'!
target: What a bloody fine day for fishin'!

source: We shall crush our enemies and revel in their fear as they tremble before us!
target: We shall crush our enemies and revel in their fear as they tremble before us!

source: Dare you defy me!? I said <var 1A 02 /var>forward<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Dare you defy me!? I said <var 1A 02 /var>forward<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Another lash will teach you to obey!
target: Another lash will teach you to obey!

source: The drakes, they would set us at naught!
target: The drakes, they would set us at naught!

source: Commander! The drake... It <var 1A 02 /var>relieves<var 1A 01 /var> itself on our supplies!
target: Commander! The drake... It <var 1A 02 /var>relieves<var 1A 01 /var> itself on our supplies!

source: Rise, I say! Rise and attack!
target: Rise, I say! Rise and attack!

source: Attack, or I'll kill you myself!
target: Attack, or I'll kill you myself!

source: Our Lord will not be pleased...
target: Our Lord will not be pleased...

source: There! Do you not see the enemy!?
target: There! Do you not see the enemy!?

source: Commander! These drakes! They fail us!
target: Commander! These drakes! They fail us!

source: These would serve better as meat for our men!
target: These would serve better as meat for our men!

source: This is futile. Fall back to Zanr'ak!
target: This is futile. Fall back to Zanr'ak!

source: The Westroad's not safe this far from Limsa.
target: The Westroad's not safe this far from Limsa.

source: With all this danger lurking in the shadows, how do people even survive out here?
target: With all this danger lurking in the shadows, how do people even survive out here?

source: Ah hah hah hah hah! Yellowjacket humor, no doubt.
target: Ah hah hah hah hah! Yellowjacket humor, no doubt.

source: How ever will I pass with those...those...<var 1A 02 /var>things<var 1A 01 /var> standing there!
target: How ever will I pass with those...those...<var 1A 02 /var>things<var 1A 01 /var> standing there!

source: Do I wait, or do I brave the hills...?
target: Do I wait, or do I brave the hills...?

source: Don't make me have to brave the hills!
target: Don't make me have to brave the hills!

source: Pshkoooh! Who is it that backstalks Wormwix!?
target: Pshkoooh! Who is it that backstalks Wormwix!?

source: Deathwords bring slimy beasties for bumlicking!
target: Deathwords bring slimy beasties for bumlicking!

source: Deathwords bring fiery beasties for bumburning!
target: Deathwords bring fiery beasties for bumburning!

source: Deathwords bring buzzing beasties for bumbiting!
target: Deathwords bring buzzing beasties for bumbiting!

source: Wormwix is thinking about maybe making busydeal with wideheart adventurer...
target: Wormwix is thinking about maybe making busydeal with wideheart adventurer...

source: Bastard of Light! Bow down to the one true god! Bow to Dalamud!
target: Bastard of Light! Bow down to the one true god! Bow to Dalamud!

source: The souls of the Lambs never sleep!
target: The souls of the Lambs never sleep!

source: The souls of the Lambs never forgive!
target: The souls of the Lambs never forgive!

source: The souls of the Lambs never forget!
target: The souls of the Lambs never forget!

source: Brothers! Sisters! Take me to your arms! Do not leave me here!
target: Brothers! Sisters! Take me to your arms! Do not leave me here!

source: I answer only to the Lord of the Inferno!
target: I answer only to the Lord of the Inferno!

source: Your soul is rotten! Let the flames purify the corruption!
target: Your soul is rotten! Let the flames purify the corruption!

source: Your souls cannot be saved until they have burned in the seventh hell!
target: Your souls cannot be saved until they have burned in the seventh hell!

source: Rise, my brother, and walk at my side once again!
target: Rise, my brother, and walk at my side once again!

source: Rise, my sister, and reclaim what was wrested from your grasp!
target: Rise, my sister, and reclaim what was wrested from your grasp!

source: Rise, my father, and strike down our enemies with rage!
target: Rise, my father, and strike down our enemies with rage!

source: My kin... Soon...we shall be reunited once...again...
target: My kin... Soon...we shall be reunited once...again...

source: This one's wings shall darken the moon and bring everlasting night!
target: This one's wings shall darken the moon and bring everlasting night!

source: This one tires of the game!
target: This one tires of the game!

source: Death to the spoken! Death to all!
target: Death to the spoken! Death to all!

source: You were foolish to come here alone!
target: You were foolish to come here alone!

source: Do not think you have won just yet!
target: Do not think you have won just yet!

source: You have not seen the last of me!
target: You have not seen the last of me!

source: Know, I do, the secrets of the Land!
target: Know, I do, the secrets of the Land!

source: Hewn, we are, from rock! To dust it is we crumble! So sayeth Titan!
target: Hewn, we are, from rock! To dust it is we crumble! So sayeth Titan!

source: O Lord of Crags! The pain! The pain...!
target: O Lord of Crags! The pain! The pain...!

source: Come! The one true god awaits your sacrifice!
target: Come! The one true god awaits your sacrifice!

source: O Dalamud! Baptize these wayward souls in thy crimson radiance!
target: O Dalamud! Baptize these wayward souls in thy crimson radiance!

source: Let the blood red flames burn away your sins!
target: Let the blood red flames burn away your sins!

source: Tonight, the blood price shall be paid in full!
target: Tonight, the blood price shall be paid in full!

source: My lord... Why hast thou forsaken...me...?
target: My lord... Why hast thou forsaken...me...?

source: None can stand the searing heat of my flames!
target: None can stand the searing heat of my flames!

source: Try and match my speed, pathetic smoothskin!
target: Try and match my speed, pathetic smoothskin!

source: You have not seen the limits of my power!
target: You have not seen the limits of my power!

source: The land will melt and the seas will boil!
target: The land will melt and the seas will boil!

source: Zezeroon's heart is filled with sadness. Supper is there, but Zezeroon's here!
target: Zezeroon's heart is filled with sadness. Supper is there, but Zezeroon's here!

source: Zezeroon's belly is filled with rumblings and grumblings!
target: Zezeroon's belly is filled with rumblings and grumblings!

source: Zezeroon's nose is filled with the sweet smells of meats and treats!
target: Zezeroon's nose is filled with the sweet smells of meats and treats!

source: Zezeroon's ears are filled with the cracklings and sizzlings of supper!
target: Zezeroon's ears are filled with the cracklings and sizzlings of supper!

source: Zezeroon's heart is filled with joy! Thank you, adventurer!
target: Zezeroon's heart is filled with joy! Thank you, adventurer!

source: This one is so lost and lonely...
target: This one is so lost and lonely...

source: Where, oh where is Little Solace?
target: Where, oh where is Little Solace?

source: This one should never have left the camp...
target: This one should never have left the camp...

source: This one shall never forget walking one's kindness.
target: This one shall never forget walking one's kindness.

source: Oh, what ever is a moogle to do?
target: Oh, what ever is a moogle to do?

source: I thought I said no autographs!
target: I thought I said no autographs!

source: Why don't I simply choose not to be seen? Pah! Then what sort of celebrity would that make me?
target: Why don't I simply choose not to be seen? Pah! Then what sort of celebrity would that make me?

source: You can all look, but absolutely no touching, kupo!
target: You can all look, but absolutely no touching, kupo!

source: I'm still in one piece, I'll give you that, kupo. Now, where is everyone?
target: I'm still in one piece, I'll give you that, kupo. Now, where is everyone?

source: Are you wideheart uplander who is giving Guttrix walkpath safety?
target: Are you wideheart uplander who is giving Guttrix walkpath safety?

source: How can treelanders stand all these squigglevines and stranglevines?
target: How can treelanders stand all these squigglevines and stranglevines?

source: With fastness, lazyleg uplander! With fastness!
target: With fastness, lazyleg uplander! With fastness!

source: Guttrix is goodliest good gobbie goodsbearer!
target: Guttrix is goodliest good gobbie goodsbearer!

source: Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!
target: Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!

source: I assume you're from the Adventurers' Guild. Shall we be off, then?
target: I assume you're from the Adventurers' Guild. Shall we be off, then?

source: Come now. I wouldn't want to see the crop sold to another buyer on account that I was late in arriving.
target: Come now. I wouldn't want to see the crop sold to another buyer on account that I was late in arriving.

source: This area is a tad more...rough than I imagined.
target: This area is a tad more...rough than I imagined.

source: How can anyone survive the night, let alone run an entire farm with all these terrible creatures about!?
target: How can anyone survive the night, let alone run an entire farm with all these terrible creatures about!?

source: That was...thrilling, to say the least. Here's to hoping they deliver.
target: That was...thrilling, to say the least. Here's to hoping they deliver.

source: Kind adventurer keeps Memeroon safe? Come, come, then! Keep Memeroon safe, then!
target: Kind adventurer keeps Memeroon safe? Come, come, then! Keep Memeroon safe, then!

source: Oh, please! Oh, please! Keep Memeroon's sparklies safe!
target: Oh, please! Oh, please! Keep Memeroon's sparklies safe!

source: Memeroon cannot be fighting! Must keep sparklies safe!
target: Memeroon cannot be fighting! Must keep sparklies safe!

source: Memeroon is safe! Sparklies are safe! Should Memeroon share sparklies...?
target: Memeroon is safe! Sparklies are safe! Should Memeroon share sparklies...?

source: Guttrix seeks kindly uplander to give walkpath safety!
target: Guttrix seeks kindly uplander to give walkpath safety!

source: Guttrix makes busydeal with rainlanders. Many, many understones for purse full of jinglyshine!
target: Guttrix makes busydeal with rainlanders. Many, many understones for purse full of jinglyshine!

source: We must be moving legs with much fastness! Busydeal waits in keep of candles!
target: We must be moving legs with much fastness! Busydeal waits in keep of candles!

source: Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!
target: Many, many thanks, uplander! Be not un-remembering your gobbiefriend Guttrix!

source: See me as far as upper La Noscea and I shall see <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> pockets lined with gil.
target: See me as far as upper La Noscea and I shall see <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> pockets lined with gil.

source: There are many an ailing soul up at the Warmwine Sanitorium who are in urgent need of this wine.
target: There are many an ailing soul up at the Warmwine Sanitorium who are in urgent need of this wine.

source: Used to be a woman could walk all the way from Bloodshore to Bronze Lake without suffering more than a blister.
target: Used to be a woman could walk all the way from Bloodshore to Bronze Lake without suffering more than a blister.

source: I sense danger all around us!
target: I sense danger all around us!

source: I believe I can complete the journey on my own. You have my thanks, adventurer.
target: I believe I can complete the journey on my own. You have my thanks, adventurer.

source: Pardon me there, adventurer. Might you know the road to Ul'dah? I seem to be...lost.
target: Pardon me there, adventurer. Might you know the road to Ul'dah? I seem to be...lost.

source: One would think a traveling merchant might have a better sense of direction.
target: One would think a traveling merchant might have a better sense of direction.

source: Oh, I do hope this whole affair does not put a hamper on our shipping agreement.
target: Oh, I do hope this whole affair does not put a hamper on our shipping agreement.

source: You didn't happen to see aught stirring behind that cactus, did you?
target: You didn't happen to see aught stirring behind that cactus, did you?

source: A thousand thousand thanks, adventurer. I shall give the Caravans your regards.
target: A thousand thousand thanks, adventurer. I shall give the Caravans your regards.

source: Guttrix makes no wrongdoing! Guttrix is no bad gobbie!
target: Guttrix makes no wrongdoing! Guttrix is no bad gobbie!

source: Guttrix wants only busydeal with scalytails for much jinglyshine!
target: Guttrix wants only busydeal with scalytails for much jinglyshine!

source: Lustyeye beasties seek munchings and crunchings!
target: Lustyeye beasties seek munchings and crunchings!

source: Many, many thanks, uplander! But Guttrix will be back for more busydeals!
target: Many, many thanks, uplander! But Guttrix will be back for more busydeals!

source: Did mah uncle send yah? He's always worrying.
target: Did mah uncle send yah? He's always worrying.

source: I jus' wanted to see mah ma an' da.
target: I jus' wanted to see mah ma an' da.

source: Ma an' Da are watching. That's what mah uncle says, but I never see 'em.
target: Ma an' Da are watching. That's what mah uncle says, but I never see 'em.

source: Mah uncle says one day, I'll be strong as mah da.
target: Mah uncle says one day, I'll be strong as mah da.

source: I'll make sure to whet me cutlass for next time.
target: I'll make sure to whet me cutlass for next time.

source: Now! We must move before they return.
target: Now! We must move before they return.

source: Yer coin...or yer life. Choose quickly, afore I takes me both!
target: Yer coin...or yer life. Choose quickly, afore I takes me both!

source: You'd best do as he says.
target: You'd best do as he says.

source: Our work here is complete. Now back to the custom house with these crates.
target: Our work here is complete. Now back to the custom house with these crates.

source: The conditions do not appear optimal for a raid. We shall take what we have and return for the rest another time.
target: The conditions do not appear optimal for a raid. We shall take what we have and return for the rest another time.

source: What in the seven hells got into them?
target: What in the seven hells got into them?

source: Retreating from sheep... Now I'll never make sergeant...
target: Retreating from sheep... Now I'll never make sergeant...

source: Cease with this nonsense at once or both yer arses'll be rottin' in the brig!
target: Cease with this nonsense at once or both yer arses'll be rottin' in the brig!

source: If ye put it that way...
target: If ye put it that way...

source: Ain't no woman worth pissin' in a bucket fer, I reckon.
target: Ain't no woman worth pissin' in a bucket fer, I reckon.

source: Would you two listen!? She loves neither of you!
target: Would you two listen!? She loves neither of you!

source: Well, then I'll jus' 'ave to make 'er!
target: Well, then I'll jus' 'ave to make 'er!

source: Tryptix wishes no busydeal! Tryptix takes uplander jinglyshine!
target: Tryptix wishes no busydeal! Tryptix takes uplander jinglyshine!

source: Uplander filling with heartthumps as beauteous fighty-tool swishes and swooshes!
target: Uplander filling with heartthumps as beauteous fighty-tool swishes and swooshes!

source: Cheers. Ever think of workin' as a heavy?
target: Cheers. Ever think of workin' as a heavy?

source: I told you to never come back!
target: I told you to never come back!

source: Sod off, shite-breath! The ale's sourin'.
target: Sod off, shite-breath! The ale's sourin'.

source: I have no qualms with killin' me a rat.
target: I have no qualms with killin' me a rat.

source: Ale and wine! Wine and ale!
target: Ale and wine! Wine and ale!

source: Qiqirn smells no like rat. Qiqirn smells like Qiqirn!
target: Qiqirn smells no like rat. Qiqirn smells like Qiqirn!

source: Qiqirn hates blood. Qiqirn loves wine!
target: Qiqirn hates blood. Qiqirn loves wine!

source: Those rats'll think twice afore showin' their ugly mugs 'round here again soon.
target: Those rats'll think twice afore showin' their ugly mugs 'round here again soon.

source: I'd offer you a drink on the house. But it ain't my house, so my thanks'll have to serve.
target: I'd offer you a drink on the house. But it ain't my house, so my thanks'll have to serve.

source: Now I think I'll have that bonny wench see to me hurts. Heh heh heh.
target: Now I think I'll have that bonny wench see to me hurts. Heh heh heh.

source: They don't pay me enough for this...
target: They don't pay me enough for this...

source: I needs me a stiff drink.
target: I needs me a stiff drink.

source: More sparklies for you, more ale for Qiqirn!
target: More sparklies for you, more ale for Qiqirn!

source: Qiqirn drinks whole cask and wears on head!
target: Qiqirn drinks whole cask and wears on head!

source: Ale for Guguroon! Ale for all!
target: Ale for Guguroon! Ale for all!

source: You're soft! Soft like a baby's arse!
target: You're soft! Soft like a baby's arse!

source: Going to let some adventurer shame you like that, eh!?
target: Going to let some adventurer shame you like that, eh!?

source: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!
target: My wounds! Someone see to my wounds!

source: Cap'n is strong! Cap'n is strong! Squawk!
target: Cap'n is strong! Cap'n is strong! Squawk!

source: Batten down the hatches! Batten down the hatches! Squawk!
target: Batten down the hatches! Batten down the hatches! Squawk!

source: Maybe now I can finally get some work done.
target: Maybe now I can finally get some work done.

source: What work is that, you ask?
target: What work is that, you ask?

source: Why, pullin' weeds, of course! Ones that don't bite back, mind you.
target: Why, pullin' weeds, of course! Ones that don't bite back, mind you.

source: The damned things are like weeds.
target: The damned things are like weeds.

source: I suppose there's no escapin' them.
target: I suppose there's no escapin' them.

source: Best I return to the fields and assess the damage.
target: Best I return to the fields and assess the damage.

source: I reckon I have a lot of replantin' to do.
target: I reckon I have a lot of replantin' to do.

source: Watch your footing, lest the sand drag you under.
target: Watch your footing, lest the sand drag you under.

source: I didn't want it to come to this!
target: I didn't want it to come to this!

source: Well, don't jus' stand there, ye dogs!
target: Well, don't jus' stand there, ye dogs!

source: Get yer heads out of yer arses and heal me wounds!
target: Get yer heads out of yer arses and heal me wounds!

source: Ye can have the ruddy turtle!
target: Ye can have the ruddy turtle!

source: Urth... One day, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find thee...
target: Urth... One day, I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find thee...

source: Who is it that would deny me passage?
target: Who is it that would deny me passage?

source: Here I stand─a god amongst men. Yet here I remain─a mere man amongst gods.
target: Here I stand─a god amongst men. Yet here I remain─a mere man amongst gods.

source: Mine obsidian blade shalt split atwain the threads of thy future...
target: Mine obsidian blade shalt split atwain the threads of thy future...

source: ...whilst its crimson fuller shalt channel the lifeblood of thy past!
target: ...whilst its crimson fuller shalt channel the lifeblood of thy past!

source: Thou knowest not thy folly. Forfeit is thy waking soul...
target: Thou knowest not thy folly. Forfeit is thy waking soul...

source: The sea'll wait. She always does.
target: The sea'll wait. She always does.

source: The mill needs mendin'. We need concern ourselves with naught more.
target: The mill needs mendin'. We need concern ourselves with naught more.

source: It may take these legs a few more summers to get used to the land.
target: It may take these legs a few more summers to get used to the land.

source: One day, I'll be back on the Blue. I swear it.
target: One day, I'll be back on the Blue. I swear it.

source: As much to be had on land, as there be on the sea, I reckon.
target: As much to be had on land, as there be on the sea, I reckon.

source: 'Tis time we learned to be lubbers.
target: 'Tis time we learned to be lubbers.

source: Danger in these woods. Lots of scaries scares the sparklies.
target: Danger in these woods. Lots of scaries scares the sparklies.

source: Open for trade! Trade for sparklies!
target: Open for trade! Trade for sparklies!

source: Conjurer, I cannot stand much longer!
target: Conjurer, I cannot stand much longer!

source: Not a single wolf shall pass on my watch!
target: Not a single wolf shall pass on my watch!

source: You will not have our camp!
target: You will not have our camp!

source: Sound the alarum! The enemy draws nigh!
target: Sound the alarum! The enemy draws nigh!

source: The knights of House Durendaire will never break!
target: The knights of House Durendaire will never break!

source: The feast is about to begin...and your minds are the main course!
target: The feast is about to begin...and your minds are the main course!

source: Dance for me, slave of stone!
target: Dance for me, slave of stone!

source: Another dance, my slave! The dance of death!
target: Another dance, my slave! The dance of death!

source: Now from the depths of the seven hells will terror rise!
target: Now from the depths of the seven hells will terror rise!

source: Open the gates, my lord, and send your minions through!
target: Open the gates, my lord, and send your minions through!

source: Heed me, servants of the Hound! Your place is in this realm!
target: Heed me, servants of the Hound! Your place is in this realm!

source: You cannot stop what has already begun!
target: You cannot stop what has already begun!

source: The children of the wood are no match for the denizens of the dark!
target: The children of the wood are no match for the denizens of the dark!

source: Dalamud will lap at your lifeblood and grow ever stronger!
target: Dalamud will lap at your lifeblood and grow ever stronger!

source: The corruption is worse than I expected...
target: The corruption is worse than I expected...

source: I have time to do naught but defend...
target: I have time to do naught but defend...

source: This corruption must be sluiced clean.
target: This corruption must be sluiced clean.

source: Ready your blades! We meet the gigas on the field!
target: Ready your blades! We meet the gigas on the field!

source: The site is ours! Back with you to your mountains of cold!
target: The site is ours! Back with you to your mountains of cold!

source: I never met a beast I couldn't eat! And tonight it looks like a feast!
target: I never met a beast I couldn't eat! And tonight it looks like a feast!

source: Gah hah! Start the fires! I'll ready the meat!
target: Gah hah! Start the fires! I'll ready the meat!

source: I can feel it! The strength of nature flows through me!
target: I can feel it! The strength of nature flows through me!

source: Are you here to guide me back to camp? Splendid!
target: Are you here to guide me back to camp? Splendid!

source: I apologize. I was examining that amazing formation.
target: I apologize. I was examining that amazing formation.

source: None of those pesky gigas up ahead, are there?
target: None of those pesky gigas up ahead, are there?

source: You are certain this route is safe?
target: You are certain this route is safe?

source: Ah, back at the camp. And just in time for treacle tart!
target: Ah, back at the camp. And just in time for treacle tart!

source: Rise from the void! I summon thee! Squaaaaaark!
target: Rise from the void! I summon thee! Squaaaaaark!

source: I AM MIMAS! MIMAS CRUSH YOU!
target: I AM MIMAS! MIMAS CRUSH YOU!

source: Tracking me to the ends of the realm... You truly are naught but the archbishop's hounds.
target: Tracking me to the ends of the realm... You truly are naught but the archbishop's hounds.

source: Descend on these pawns, my friends!
target: Descend on these pawns, my friends!

source: Come to me, O ye of ancient blood!
target: Come to me, O ye of ancient blood!

source: Beware... My death...will only serve to stir others...
target: Beware... My death...will only serve to stir others...

source: MY PEOPLE CLIMB TOWER AND RETURN TO HEAVENS!
target: MY PEOPLE CLIMB TOWER AND RETURN TO HEAVENS!

source: MY PET SUCKS MARROW FROM YOUR BONES!
target: MY PET SUCKS MARROW FROM YOUR BONES!

source: THEY ARE NOT ALL WHO HEED MY CALL!
target: THEY ARE NOT ALL WHO HEED MY CALL!

source: YOU ARE STRONG, BUT WE ARE STRONGER!
target: YOU ARE STRONG, BUT WE ARE STRONGER!

source: These things are as soft as yer mum's arse!
target: These things are as soft as yer mum's arse!

source: It's like slaughtering pigs in a pen! Ugly green pigs, mind ye.
target: It's like slaughtering pigs in a pen! Ugly green pigs, mind ye.

source: K-K-Keep away from me, you monster!
target: K-K-Keep away from me, you monster!

source: Hear the screams of my fallen brothers!
target: Hear the screams of my fallen brothers!

source: I will repay this debt, good adventurer!
target: I will repay this debt, good adventurer!

source: Now, we must make haste. The wolves are not but a few yalms back.
target: Now, we must make haste. The wolves are not but a few yalms back.

source: We must show them our strength, or the pack will continue their pursuit!
target: We must show them our strength, or the pack will continue their pursuit!

source: Back to the wood with you, kwaaark!
target: Back to the wood with you, kwaaark!

source: Can you bear the wind, smoothskin!?
target: Can you bear the wind, smoothskin!?

source: Squark! This is no place for you! Leave at once!
target: Squark! This is no place for you! Leave at once!

source: I shall teach you to fly! Straight into the chasm!
target: I shall teach you to fly! Straight into the chasm!

source: Something not of this world walks the sands. It must be stopped!
target: Something not of this world walks the sands. It must be stopped!

source: We can only pray there are no more...
target: We can only pray there are no more...

source: The flames of our Lord cleanse us of our sins.
target: The flames of our Lord cleanse us of our sins.

source: Tempered in fire, our hearts grow harder!
target: Tempered in fire, our hearts grow harder!

source: Let the holy flames engulf you!
target: Let the holy flames engulf you!

source: Halt! Do not think we won't strike you in the back!
target: Halt! Do not think we won't strike you in the back!

source: The punishment for your insolence will be swift!
target: The punishment for your insolence will be swift!

source: Witness the power of the undying flame!
target: Witness the power of the undying flame!

source: The taste of victory is always bitter when fouled by Ul'dahn blood.
target: The taste of victory is always bitter when fouled by Ul'dahn blood.

source: It's as if a mountain has come to life!
target: It's as if a mountain has come to life!

source: If I never see a living mountain again, it will be too soon!
target: If I never see a living mountain again, it will be too soon!

source: Know what we do is for your own good and the good of the realm!
target: Know what we do is for your own good and the good of the realm!

source: PUNY SONS OF MAN! RUN WHILE YOU CAN!
target: PUNY SONS OF MAN! RUN WHILE YOU CAN!

source: Hark! 'Tis the sound of their steps as they approach!
target: Hark! 'Tis the sound of their steps as they approach!

source: Gods... There must be hundreds of them...
target: Gods... There must be hundreds of them...

source: Silence! Are you a craven or are you a knight of House Haillenarte!?
target: Silence! Are you a craven or are you a knight of House Haillenarte!?

source: Better to be a live coward than a dead...anything!
target: Better to be a live coward than a dead...anything!

source: A fine display! If only those who ran could have witnessed your bravery!
target: A fine display! If only those who ran could have witnessed your bravery!

source: Damnation! Fall back to Camp Dragonhead!
target: Damnation! Fall back to Camp Dragonhead!

source: Lock your doors! Batten your windows!
target: Lock your doors! Batten your windows!

source:
The goobbues are coming!
The goobbues are coming!
target:
The goobbues are coming!
The goobbues are coming!

source: They are too much for us! To the Locks! We shall regroup there!
target: They are too much for us! To the Locks! We shall regroup there!

source: Your tempering will come soon enough, mortals!
target: Your tempering will come soon enough, mortals!

source: I say, are there none who would escort me?
target: I say, are there none who would escort me?

source: Stay alert, my friend. The gigas in these parts have no love for our kind.
target: Stay alert, my friend. The gigas in these parts have no love for our kind.

source: Would you look at this! A remarkable specimen!
target: Would you look at this! A remarkable specimen!

source: Can you see how the crystal resonates with the sound of our footsteps?
target: Can you see how the crystal resonates with the sound of our footsteps?

source: Simply marvelous! I must have a closer look!
target: Simply marvelous! I must have a closer look!

source: The Sons back at the camp will not believe this!
target: The Sons back at the camp will not believe this!

source: It was a miracle that we met with nary a single setback.
target: It was a miracle that we met with nary a single setback.

source: I suppose I have you to thank for that!
target: I suppose I have you to thank for that!

source: Nothing! The howling has finally subsided!
target: Nothing! The howling has finally subsided!

source: I will live to see another sunrise. My thanks to you, adventurer!
target: I will live to see another sunrise. My thanks to you, adventurer!

source: Any closer and we'll be eaten alive!
target: Any closer and we'll be eaten alive!

source: But these sacks must be delivered! What can I do?
target: But these sacks must be delivered! What can I do?

source: They're gone! I can complete my delivery!
target: They're gone! I can complete my delivery!

source: I don't know how to thank you! Oh, wait! Gil!
target: I don't know how to thank you! Oh, wait! Gil!

source: Another day lost. My employer will take this directly from my pay...
target: Another day lost. My employer will take this directly from my pay...

source: Giant's foot, my rosy red arse!
target: Giant's foot, my rosy red arse!

source: We did the best we could...
target: We did the best we could...

source: Might be I can reason with them. I studied giant at the scholasticate and am fluent in four dialects.
target: Might be I can reason with them. I studied giant at the scholasticate and am fluent in four dialects.

source: You won't mind if we stay back a few paces...just in case.
target: You won't mind if we stay back a few paces...just in case.

source: Holler if you need my help with the dialects!
target: Holler if you need my help with the dialects!

source: I must admit, those who say the pen is mightier than the sword...
target: I must admit, those who say the pen is mightier than the sword...

source: I still think we could have reasoned with them...
target: I still think we could have reasoned with them...

source: ...though, they did not appear to respond to any of the dialects...
target: ...though, they did not appear to respond to any of the dialects...

source: This is not over, you hear me!?
target: This is not over, you hear me!?

source: I knew we should have just gone back to the Front.
target: I knew we should have just gone back to the Front.

source: You see. You should have let me reason with them! Four dialects, I said! Four!
target: You see. You should have let me reason with them! Four dialects, I said! Four!

source: Enemy at the Gates! Secure the portcullis!
target: Enemy at the Gates! Secure the portcullis!

source: How many sailors are on this ship!?
target: How many sailors are on this ship!?

source: I have this front in hand!
target: I have this front in hand!

source: Stand clear, unless you fancy a trampling!
target: Stand clear, unless you fancy a trampling!

source: Do not let them gain the shore!
target: Do not let them gain the shore!

source: Gather the wounded. We make for the Observatorium immediately.
target: Gather the wounded. We make for the Observatorium immediately.

source: Gather the wounded and fall back to the Observatorium!
target: Gather the wounded and fall back to the Observatorium!

source: Look! The spirit of Saint Daniffen!
target: Look! The spirit of Saint Daniffen!

source: O Wrathful Fury in heavens on high! Pray give me strength to overcome the evils of this world.
target: O Wrathful Fury in heavens on high! Pray give me strength to overcome the evils of this world.

source: Figures to be a cold one, today. 'Twas a cold one yesterday, too.
target: Figures to be a cold one, today. 'Twas a cold one yesterday, too.

source: And I would guess them's the reason why!
target: And I would guess them's the reason why!

source: Ice sprites! Push them back from the Cloak!
target: Ice sprites! Push them back from the Cloak!

source: Mamool Ja bandits spotted out beyond the rise!
target: Mamool Ja bandits spotted out beyond the rise!

source: Drop weapons and gil, you live!
target: Drop weapons and gil, you live!

source: We'll find ye one day. And when we do, it's to the brig with ye!
