target: We'll find ye one day. And when we do, it's to the brig with ye!

source:
Mamool Ja no run.
Mamool Ja <var 1A 02 /var>plan<var 1A 01 /var>.
target:
Mamool Ja no run.
Mamool Ja <var 1A 02 /var>plan<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: Sound the bell! The Sahagin approach!
target: Sound the bell! The Sahagin approach!

source: Hah hah! Till sea swallows all!
target: Hah hah! Till sea swallows all!

source: We have what we came for. Back to the shhhea!
target: We have what we came for. Back to the shhhea!

source: You shhhall drown in your own blood!
target: You shhhall drown in your own blood!

source: This wall is ours! Remember that, fishbacks!
target: This wall is ours! Remember that, fishbacks!

source: The bell! The bell! Fishbacks march from the south!
target: The bell! The bell! Fishbacks march from the south!

source: The Puller will be pleased. Back to the shhhea!
target: The Puller will be pleased. Back to the shhhea!

source: Fear not the breathers of air!
target: Fear not the breathers of air!

source: To the bottom of the abyshhh with you all!
target: To the bottom of the abyshhh with you all!

source: This wall has stood for five summers unbreached, and it shall stand another five hundred!
target: This wall has stood for five summers unbreached, and it shall stand another five hundred!

source: They have shhhilenced the Puller! Back to the shhhea!
target: They have shhhilenced the Puller! Back to the shhhea!

source: Throw off yer armor and I might just let ye live...long enough to see me don it.
target: Throw off yer armor and I might just let ye live...long enough to see me don it.

source: Me blade will cut yer flesh like the sea.
target: Me blade will cut yer flesh like the sea.

source: Ye should 'ave run while ye 'ad the chance!
target: Ye should 'ave run while ye 'ad the chance!

source: Who do ye think ye is, comin' in <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> lair, lookin' to quarrel?
target: Who do ye think ye is, comin' in <var 1A 02 /var>our<var 1A 01 /var> lair, lookin' to quarrel?

source: Skippers! A whole damned plague of 'em, to boot!
target: Skippers! A whole damned plague of 'em, to boot!

source: Let the scavengers clean up the mess.
target: Let the scavengers clean up the mess.

source: Protect the pickman! Protect the mines!
target: Protect the pickman! Protect the mines!

source: The ores are ours! Ours are the ores!
target: The ores are ours! Ours are the ores!

source: The ores are mine! Mine are the ores!
target: The ores are mine! Mine are the ores!

source: Send the greedy overdwellers over the cliff! Over the cliff!
target: Send the greedy overdwellers over the cliff! Over the cliff!

source: Bury the greedy overdwellers under the rocks! Under the rocks!
target: Bury the greedy overdwellers under the rocks! Under the rocks!

source: Grenades on the planks! Hide the firesand! Ready the pikes!
target: Grenades on the planks! Hide the firesand! Ready the pikes!

source: That should do us for now, but I want a man on the planks day and night.
target: That should do us for now, but I want a man on the planks day and night.

source: Somethin' ain't right with them raptors...
target: Somethin' ain't right with them raptors...

source: What ever it was put them raptors in a frenzy's still up there...
target: What ever it was put them raptors in a frenzy's still up there...

source: Why must you just sit there like some...some...toad!?
target: Why must you just sit there like some...some...toad!?

source: Then it is settled! Slay away!
target: Then it is settled! Slay away!

source: Did you hear that, you slimy beast!? You're through!
target: Did you hear that, you slimy beast!? You're through!

source: We are unlike our brethren. You will not be shown the mercy of tempering!
target: We are unlike our brethren. You will not be shown the mercy of tempering!

source: The Gore Horde! The Amalj'aa elite!
target: The Gore Horde! The Amalj'aa elite!

source: They will torture and kill any they find, whether he be man or child!
target: They will torture and kill any they find, whether he be man or child!

source: The heads of your fallen will be presented as a gift to our Lord!
target: The heads of your fallen will be presented as a gift to our Lord!

source: Let the flames of the present～♪
target: Let the flames of the present～♪

source: Fear not the frigid hands of death...
target: Fear not the frigid hands of death...

source: ...for the flames have foretold our victory!
target: ...for the flames have foretold our victory!

source: We did it! Here's the forty-eight percent, as promised.
target: We did it! Here's the forty-eight percent, as promised.

source: Fifty-one, you say? Are you certain?
target: Fifty-one, you say? Are you certain?

source: Alright, alright. Let's make it forty-nine and a half and call the deal square! Ta-ta!
target: Alright, alright. Let's make it forty-nine and a half and call the deal square! Ta-ta!

source: Not only couldn't you do away with the toads, but you managed to trample up the entire camp!
target: Not only couldn't you do away with the toads, but you managed to trample up the entire camp!

source: There's naught left to claim, could I claim it! Another abandoned leve, I'm afraid...
target: There's naught left to claim, could I claim it! Another abandoned leve, I'm afraid...

source: Gah hah hah! I'm the best!
target: Gah hah hah! I'm the best!

source: Say my name, brothers! Say. My. Name!
target: Say my name, brothers! Say. My. Name!

source: Ah, an adventurer! Lend an engineer a hand, would you?
target: Ah, an adventurer! Lend an engineer a hand, would you?

source: I could have used a few more round pegs, but such is life!
target: I could have used a few more round pegs, but such is life!

source: I'm not staying here any longer. Who knows when the imperials will be back for their machine?
target: I'm not staying here any longer. Who knows when the imperials will be back for their machine?

source: Look behind you! A three-headed goobbue!
target: Look behind you! A three-headed goobbue!

source: Fall in behind the pilus prior!
target: Fall in behind the pilus prior!

source: Eorzea will not be yours for long!
target: Eorzea will not be yours for long!

source: I'll show you why the 3rd Cohort is most feared in the legion!
target: I'll show you why the 3rd Cohort is most feared in the legion!

source: The young ones must not fall into dark hands!
target: The young ones must not fall into dark hands!

source: This one's heart is filled with wrath!
target: This one's heart is filled with wrath!

source: Spoken ones must leave at once!
target: Spoken ones must leave at once!

source: Good adventurer! A great dragon approaches!
target: Good adventurer! A great dragon approaches!

source: Svara will not wait for us. Come!
target: Svara will not wait for us. Come!

source: Have your weapon ready. It is not a question of if the Horde finds us, but when.
target: Have your weapon ready. It is not a question of if the Horde finds us, but when.

source: If only Bertha were here. She'd rip a hole right through 'em!
target: If only Bertha were here. She'd rip a hole right through 'em!

source: Hurry. The Steel Vigil is not far.
target: Hurry. The Steel Vigil is not far.

source: Thank you! But my work today has only just begun.
target: Thank you! But my work today has only just begun.

source: It appears we have made it with all our limbs still attached.
target: It appears we have made it with all our limbs still attached.

source: The gigas are naught but cowards.
target: The gigas are naught but cowards.

source: They wouldn't hesitate to attack an unguarded caravan, but place a few blades at the van and─
target: They wouldn't hesitate to attack an unguarded caravan, but place a few blades at the van and─

source: You might want to wait before completing that thought.
target: You might want to wait before completing that thought.

source: Th-Th-They don't look all that cowardly from here!
target: Th-Th-They don't look all that cowardly from here!

source: Shields together! Form a wall around the findings!
target: Shields together! Form a wall around the findings!

source: Not even time for a piss, eh?
target: Not even time for a piss, eh?

source: In most circumstances, I would commend you on your bravery and send you on your way.
target: In most circumstances, I would commend you on your bravery and send you on your way.

source: ...but these documents aren't going to carry themselves to the camp.
target: ...but these documents aren't going to carry themselves to the camp.

source: Seems the gigas had a bit more fight in them than I thought.
target: Seems the gigas had a bit more fight in them than I thought.

source: Not <var 1A 02 /var>enough<var 1A 01 /var> fight is how I see it. Hah!
target: Not <var 1A 02 /var>enough<var 1A 01 /var> fight is how I see it. Hah!

source: When you boys are done patting yourselves on the back, we've still got work to do.
target: When you boys are done patting yourselves on the back, we've still got work to do.

source: They were...irreplaceable! A lifetime of knowledge...gone!
target: They were...irreplaceable! A lifetime of knowledge...gone!

source: What am I to tell the Sons!?
target: What am I to tell the Sons!?

source: We're lucky to have made it out with our hearts still beating.
target: We're lucky to have made it out with our hearts still beating.

source: That doesn't make the taste any less bitter.
target: That doesn't make the taste any less bitter.

source: That will teach you to underestimate your enemy, fools.
target: That will teach you to underestimate your enemy, fools.

source: This hammer will not hold them back for long!
target: This hammer will not hold them back for long!

source: Try and keep the dragons from nippin' our arses.
target: Try and keep the dragons from nippin' our arses.

source: Once Bertha here is hale and hearty, we'll show them dragons what for!
target: Once Bertha here is hale and hearty, we'll show them dragons what for!

source: Keep one eye on the sky, and the other on the ground. Not all the Horde have wings!
target: Keep one eye on the sky, and the other on the ground. Not all the Horde have wings!

source: I need more time. Bertha's a fickle lass.
target: I need more time. Bertha's a fickle lass.

source: No more of this for me! I'm back to the Locks!
target: No more of this for me! I'm back to the Locks!

source: Ol' Bertha's standing once again! Now where's that dragon!?
target: Ol' Bertha's standing once again! Now where's that dragon!?

source: Isn't there anyone who can help me?
target: Isn't there anyone who can help me?

source: We must move these logs to the library for proper cataloging.
target: We must move these logs to the library for proper cataloging.

source: Oh, dear. Not here... Not now!
target: Oh, dear. Not here... Not now!

source: I'll slice your throat and kick you from Witchdrop!
target: I'll slice your throat and kick you from Witchdrop!

source: Water sprites! How in the Fury's name will I fill my phials!?
target: Water sprites! How in the Fury's name will I fill my phials!?

source: Enough of this place. A warm hearth awaits me back beyond the Gates of Judgement.
target: Enough of this place. A warm hearth awaits me back beyond the Gates of Judgement.

source: My client will be...disappointed, to say the least.
target: My client will be...disappointed, to say the least.

source: I pray Haldrath's March is clear.
target: I pray Haldrath's March is clear.

source: We must hurry. The archbishop is not one to be made to wait.
target: We must hurry. The archbishop is not one to be made to wait.

source: These astroscope readings could change the outcome of the war. They cannot be lost!
target: These astroscope readings could change the outcome of the war. They cannot be lost!

source: I can see the aetheryte's glow. We are almost arrived!
target: I can see the aetheryte's glow. We are almost arrived!

source: My thanks, adventurer. You were more than a capable escort.
target: My thanks, adventurer. You were more than a capable escort.

source: Now I must be off to find that courier. Good day!
target: Now I must be off to find that courier. Good day!

source: What in the world is that thing!?
target: What in the world is that thing!?

source: Good gracious! Look at the size of that maw!
target: Good gracious! Look at the size of that maw!

source: The findings! I must protect them!
target: The findings! I must protect them!

source: Where did these things come from!? They weren't here a bell ago!
target: Where did these things come from!? They weren't here a bell ago!

source: They're making for the camp! Someone <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> something!
target: They're making for the camp! Someone <var 1A 02 /var>do<var 1A 01 /var> something!

source: Hapalits!? You look as if you could use some help!
target: Hapalits!? You look as if you could use some help!

source: At least we were able to force them back...
target: At least we were able to force them back...

source: Those Mamool Ja wear the sign of the Crag! Their loyalty has been bought by the kobolds!
target: Those Mamool Ja wear the sign of the Crag! Their loyalty has been bought by the kobolds!

source: This road cannot fall into beastman hands!
target: This road cannot fall into beastman hands!

source: Drive the sellswords to the seventh hell!
target: Drive the sellswords to the seventh hell!

source: As long as their pockets are lined, they'll be back.
target: As long as their pockets are lined, they'll be back.

source: Fall back and inform the camp that the road is compromised!
target: Fall back and inform the camp that the road is compromised!

source: This road now kobold road. Pay in gil or pay in blood!
target: This road now kobold road. Pay in gil or pay in blood!

source: Too many blades. Not enough coin promised.
target: Too many blades. Not enough coin promised.

source: The Climb is safe...for the moment.
target: The Climb is safe...for the moment.

source: These puppets cannot be contained! We must fall back and regroup!
target: These puppets cannot be contained! We must fall back and regroup!

source: The area ahead is under kobold control.
target: The area ahead is under kobold control.

source: The beastmen <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> make an attempt at our supplies.
target: The beastmen <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> make an attempt at our supplies.

source: And we will see that they fail, sir!
target: And we will see that they fail, sir!

source: It's not what I see...but what I smell...
target: It's not what I see...but what I smell...

source: We're out of the fire, but not clear of the kitchen. Push ahead!
target: We're out of the fire, but not clear of the kitchen. Push ahead!

source: We are still quite far from our destination. Stay close.
target: We are still quite far from our destination. Stay close.

source: If I were any closer, you could smell the squirrel I ate this morning.
target: If I were any closer, you could smell the squirrel I ate this morning.

source: We cannot leave without that bird. He's carrying half our charge!
target: We cannot leave without that bird. He's carrying half our charge!

source: How's this─you two wait here with the good 'bo, and I'll look for the other?
target: How's this─you two wait here with the good 'bo, and I'll look for the other?

source: Are you sure that's a good idea? The jungle is rife with danger.
target: Are you sure that's a good idea? The jungle is rife with danger.

source: What in the seven hells is wrong with you? You've been kwarking since we left!
target: What in the seven hells is wrong with you? You've been kwarking since we left!

source: That was closer than I would have liked.
target: That was closer than I would have liked.

source: That was quite the piss. Are you sufficiently relieved, then?
target: That was quite the piss. Are you sufficiently relieved, then?

source: Bah, I'd tell you, but you wouldn't believe me anyway.
target: Bah, I'd tell you, but you wouldn't believe me anyway.

source: And that we can agree on.
target: And that we can agree on.

source: I suppose there are worse ways to die...
target: I suppose there are worse ways to die...

source: You are truly a hero! If only I could find a man like you!
target: You are truly a hero! If only I could find a man like you!

source: Not me! That one! Eat that one!
target: Not me! That one! Eat that one!

source: Many sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon overjoyed!
target: Many sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon overjoyed!

source: Little sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon drowns sorrows in pelican eggs.
target: Little sparklies for Jijiroon. Jijiroon drowns sorrows in pelican eggs.

source: La la la la la la la la la LA LA LA LA LA LA la LA la LA LA!
target: La la la la la la la la la LA LA LA LA LA LA la LA la LA LA!

source:
Bad spoken one!
Bad spoken one!
target:
Bad spoken one!
Bad spoken one!

source: Root! This one needs more root!
target: Root! This one needs more root!

source: This one's head is spinning and spinning and spinning and...
target: This one's head is spinning and spinning and spinning and...

source: Why can I not bathe in springs!?
target: Why can I not bathe in springs!?

source: I've already told you. It is forbidden.
target: I've already told you. It is forbidden.

source: My coin, same coin as smoothskins'!
target: My coin, same coin as smoothskins'!

source: This is not about your <var 1A 02 /var>coin<var 1A 01 /var>. It is about your <var 1A 02 /var>behavior<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: This is not about your <var 1A 02 /var>coin<var 1A 01 /var>. It is about your <var 1A 02 /var>behavior<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: Mamool Ja have eyes. Eyes must see something!
target: Mamool Ja have eyes. Eyes must see something!

source: And the...unsightly grinding and gyrating of your pelvic region.
target: And the...unsightly grinding and gyrating of your pelvic region.

source: Ah! Traditional Mamool Ja bathing dance!
target: Ah! Traditional Mamool Ja bathing dance!

source: I care not what you call it! It will not be tolerated!
target: I care not what you call it! It will not be tolerated!

source: I pay my coin! I dance my dance!
target: I pay my coin! I dance my dance!

source: Leave this place and never return!
target: Leave this place and never return!

source: Memories only fade if there is no one to remember them...
target: Memories only fade if there is no one to remember them...

source: As long as this one has life, the memory of the fallen ones will endure.
target: As long as this one has life, the memory of the fallen ones will endure.

source: I'm afraid I cannot allow that!
target: I'm afraid I cannot allow that!

source: Today we march on the encampment!
target: Today we march on the encampment!

source: Whatever happens, do not break! Understood!?
target: Whatever happens, do not break! Understood!?

source: Do you want to live forever!?
target: Do you want to live forever!?

source: The Amalj'aa... They knew we were coming!
target: The Amalj'aa... They knew we were coming!

source: Reform the line! The encampment is ours!
target: Reform the line! The encampment is ours!

source: Grab the wounded and fall back!
target: Grab the wounded and fall back!

source: Bertha'll keep you warm, foul dragon!
target: Bertha'll keep you warm, foul dragon!

source: Pay the lady no mind! She'll see you're well taken care of!
target: Pay the lady no mind! She'll see you're well taken care of!

source: Die, dragons! Each and every one of you!
target: Die, dragons! Each and every one of you!

source: Did they spot us and circle around?
target: Did they spot us and circle around?

source: Hold the pass! Don't let a single one through!
target: Hold the pass! Don't let a single one through!

source: Then we regroup and make pursuit!
target: Then we regroup and make pursuit!

source: This one's poisons consume minds! Corrupt souls!
target: This one's poisons consume minds! Corrupt souls!

source: If I am not at the plant in a bell, I will be ruined!
target: If I am not at the plant in a bell, I will be ruined!

source: Splendid! Now let us hurry. There is no time to lose!
target: Splendid! Now let us hurry. There is no time to lose!

source: What was that!? I think I saw something move!
target: What was that!? I think I saw something move!

source: One cannot be too careful, you know.
target: One cannot be too careful, you know.

source: Shhh! Did you hear that? No?
target: Shhh! Did you hear that? No?

source: Wait! Now, you may think I am being overly cautious, but...
target: Wait! Now, you may think I am being overly cautious, but...

source: You know how the proverb goes...
target: You know how the proverb goes...

source: It's better to be safe than strung up and gralloched by a bloodthirsty maniac!
target: It's better to be safe than strung up and gralloched by a bloodthirsty maniac!

source: There is something ahead... I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it!
target: There is something ahead... I can <var 1A 02 /var>feel<var 1A 01 /var> it!

source: We are not but a quarter malm from the plant but...
target: We are not but a quarter malm from the plant but...

source: I... I made it in one piece! Thank the Twelve!
target: I... I made it in one piece! Thank the Twelve!

source: If only you could have gotten me here sooner!
target: If only you could have gotten me here sooner!

source: Caution can ofttimes be a man's best friend!
target: Caution can ofttimes be a man's best friend!

source:
You see! You see!
I felt it! I <var 1A 02 /var>felt<var 1A 01 /var> it!
target:
You see! You see!
I felt it! I <var 1A 02 /var>felt<var 1A 01 /var> it!

source: I have no coin! I promised it all to the adventurer! That's the one you want!
target: I have no coin! I promised it all to the adventurer! That's the one you want!

source: Mamool Ja is man, like all men...
target: Mamool Ja is man, like all men...

source: Now, back to...er...seeing that these women are...uh...safe. Yes.
target: Now, back to...er...seeing that these women are...uh...safe. Yes.

source: No man talks ill of Mamool Ja custom and lives!
target: No man talks ill of Mamool Ja custom and lives!

source: You, lucky today. I come back tomorrow. I come back and dance!
target: You, lucky today. I come back tomorrow. I come back and dance!

source: I'm not paying you another man's coin to let them manhandle me!
target: I'm not paying you another man's coin to let them manhandle me!

source: Not the tunic! This cost me a fortune!
target: Not the tunic! This cost me a fortune!

source: Stop playing around, adventurer, and get this thing off of me!
target: Stop playing around, adventurer, and get this thing off of me!

source: A fine spring that was! The view was simply spectacular!
target: A fine spring that was! The view was simply spectacular!

source: How am I to get back to camp?
target: How am I to get back to camp?

source: Oh, I cannot begin to express my gratitude!
target: Oh, I cannot begin to express my gratitude!

source: I was in a cold sweat for the duration.
target: I was in a cold sweat for the duration.

source: Perhaps I should go back to the spring and warm up...
target: Perhaps I should go back to the spring and warm up...

source: What ever is a Lalafell to do?
target: What ever is a Lalafell to do?

source: I suppose I'll just have to return to the spring and wait.
target: I suppose I'll just have to return to the spring and wait.

source: Though, now that I think about it, another dip would be quite refreshing!
target: Though, now that I think about it, another dip would be quite refreshing!

source: Why must you overdwellers always disturb my research!? Why!? Why!?
target: Why must you overdwellers always disturb my research!? Why!? Why!?

source: My next experiment will use your blood! Your blood!
target: My next experiment will use your blood! Your blood!

source: The Gyve will not fall to the sons of man!
target: The Gyve will not fall to the sons of man!

source: No manner of spell or steel can penetrate our wall!
target: No manner of spell or steel can penetrate our wall!

source: You will drown in a storm of arrows!
target: You will drown in a storm of arrows!

source: Run! Your back will make an easy target!
target: Run! Your back will make an easy target!

source: The Amalj'aa are attempting a summoning! We must silence them before it's too late!
target: The Amalj'aa are attempting a summoning! We must silence them before it's too late!

source: We've a hero in our midst.
target: We've a hero in our midst.

source: This should keep the lizards quiet for a spell.
target: This should keep the lizards quiet for a spell.

source: But don't think they won't be back. They always are.
target: But don't think they won't be back. They always are.

source: If a few sand lizards cannot be stopped, then we are doomed!
target: If a few sand lizards cannot be stopped, then we are doomed!

source: You have my thanks, adventurer. Do not let our failure here discourage you.
target: You have my thanks, adventurer. Do not let our failure here discourage you.

source: I must be returning soon, so if you happen to have a core or five in your pocket...
target: I must be returning soon, so if you happen to have a core or five in your pocket...

source: The ceruleum is safe for another day! From stray vibrations, that is. A single bomb and...boom!
target: The ceruleum is safe for another day! From stray vibrations, that is. A single bomb and...boom!

source: Not as many cores as I had hoped...
target: Not as many cores as I had hoped...

source: I'll just have to cross both fingers tonight, then.
target: I'll just have to cross both fingers tonight, then.

source: It'll take me the better part of the day to move all these crates back up into Wineport...
target: It'll take me the better part of the day to move all these crates back up into Wineport...

source: The buccaneers! Keep them back from me wine!
target: The buccaneers! Keep them back from me wine!

source: It's still strewn about the ground... <sigh> But at least it's safe!
target: It's still strewn about the ground... <sigh> But at least it's safe!

source: I think I needs me a drink...
target: I think I needs me a drink...

source: Me wine... I can't bear to look!
target: Me wine... I can't bear to look!

source: The vintner'll have me head...if the pirates don't get it first!
target: The vintner'll have me head...if the pirates don't get it first!

source: What was that shattering? Was it a bottle!?
target: What was that shattering? Was it a bottle!?

source: Back to the jungle with you, you dirty thieves!
target: Back to the jungle with you, you dirty thieves!

source: Your head will look good on a pike above the hamlet gates!
target: Your head will look good on a pike above the hamlet gates!

source: And don't think of coming back!
target: And don't think of coming back!

source: We've failed you... Please accept our apologies.
target: We've failed you... Please accept our apologies.

source: A few more blades and we would have had them!
target: A few more blades and we would have had them!

source: Looks like yer 'avin' a spot o' trouble wiv the wain!
target: Looks like yer 'avin' a spot o' trouble wiv the wain!

source: Who says the Twelve don't smile on pirates!?
target: Who says the Twelve don't smile on pirates!?

source: Ever 'eard o' the law o' possession!?
target: Ever 'eard o' the law o' possession!?

source: Why buy what ye can take!?
target: Why buy what ye can take!?

source: We'll be seein' ye again, peddler!
target: We'll be seein' ye again, peddler!

source: Leave the dead. They will only weigh us down.
target: Leave the dead. They will only weigh us down.

source: To die at the hands of a beastman...
target: To die at the hands of a beastman...

source: Imperial ones foul the wood with smoke and soot!
target: Imperial ones foul the wood with smoke and soot!

source: Revenge for fallen ones shall be swift!
target: Revenge for fallen ones shall be swift!

source: Now that the imperial unit is no more, the remaining sylphs have drawn back into the wood.
target: Now that the imperial unit is no more, the remaining sylphs have drawn back into the wood.

source: My thanks. Without your help, I would be lying there cold with the other imperial corpses.
target: My thanks. Without your help, I would be lying there cold with the other imperial corpses.

source: Your treachery will not be allowed in the Twelveswood!
target: Your treachery will not be allowed in the Twelveswood!

source: I'll skin ye and throw yer bones to dogs!
target: I'll skin ye and throw yer bones to dogs!

source: Make ready, then. The buccaneers could be here at any m─
target: Make ready, then. The buccaneers could be here at any m─

source: The place'll be swarmin' wiv honeybees and the Admiral's 'ounds.
target: The place'll be swarmin' wiv honeybees and the Admiral's 'ounds.

source: I ain't never met an 'oneybee I couldn't swat, nor an 'ound I couldn't kick.
target: I ain't never met an 'oneybee I couldn't swat, nor an 'ound I couldn't kick.

source: I'm goin' to drink meself a river, that's what I'm goin' to do!
target: I'm goin' to drink meself a river, that's what I'm goin' to do!

source: Been a long while since I drunk me some real red. I've 'ad enough o' that shite Shorty makes in 'is boot.
target: Been a long while since I drunk me some real red. I've 'ad enough o' that shite Shorty makes in 'is boot.

source: How's this fer a plan─I'll do the cuttin', ye'll do the guttin'.
target: How's this fer a plan─I'll do the cuttin', ye'll do the guttin'.

source: Workin' up a right thirst, what wiv all this fightin'.
target: Workin' up a right thirst, what wiv all this fightin'.

source: Ye 'ave no right to be here!
target: Ye 'ave no right to be here!

source: We was just mindin' our own!
target: We was just mindin' our own!

source: Damn the Admiral's 'ounds to the seventh 'ell!
target: Damn the Admiral's 'ounds to the seventh 'ell!

source: Ye'll pay fer this! A pirate never forgets!
target: Ye'll pay fer this! A pirate never forgets!

source: Damn the Admiral's hounds to the seventh hell!
target: Damn the Admiral's hounds to the seventh hell!

source: There'll be no raidin' till these bloody 'urts mend.
target: There'll be no raidin' till these bloody 'urts mend.

source: Alright, you filthy scrags! Your plan is up!
target: Alright, you filthy scrags! Your plan is up!

source: Throw down your weapons or feel the brunt of the storm!
target: Throw down your weapons or feel the brunt of the storm!

source: This is easier than jointing a pig!
target: This is easier than jointing a pig!

source: When has a band of landlocked pirates ever been a match for the Maelstrom?
target: When has a band of landlocked pirates ever been a match for the Maelstrom?

source: The louder they are, the quieter it is when they fall.
target: The louder they are, the quieter it is when they fall.

source: Fall back! We'll regroup at Wineport!
target: Fall back! We'll regroup at Wineport!

source: You haven't seen the last of us, scrags!
target: You haven't seen the last of us, scrags!

source: Just try and take the hamlet!
target: Just try and take the hamlet!

source: There's no turning back now! Go!
target: There's no turning back now! Go!

source: That's strange... Shouldn't one of their leaders be overseeing the dig?
target: That's strange... Shouldn't one of their leaders be overseeing the dig?

source: What if this is not the main dig site?
target: What if this is not the main dig site?

source: I wonder how the other units are faring.
target: I wonder how the other units are faring.

source: Pipe it down, ladies. There is still equipment to destroy!
target: Pipe it down, ladies. There is still equipment to destroy!

source: If we can slay her, the others will fall back!
target: If we can slay her, the others will fall back!

source: I can't believe it! We actually did it!
target: I can't believe it! We actually did it!

source: Who would have thought that three storm privates could defeat a kobold matriarch!?
target: Who would have thought that three storm privates could defeat a kobold matriarch!?

source: I told you we should have waited until the main unit arrived...
target: I told you we should have waited until the main unit arrived...

source: I take full responsibility. Your lashes are mine.
target: I take full responsibility. Your lashes are mine.

source: What are you doing!? What! Are! You! Doing!?
target: What are you doing!? What! Are! You! Doing!?

source: O Lord of Crags, forgive Your lowly servant! I am not worthy! I am not worthy!
target: O Lord of Crags, forgive Your lowly servant! I am not worthy! I am not worthy!

source: Our shiny tools! Who will mend our shiny tools!?
target: Our shiny tools! Who will mend our shiny tools!?

source: An eternity of pain and agony to those who harm our tools!
target: An eternity of pain and agony to those who harm our tools!

source: Do not let the overdwellers escape! We take them before Titan!
target: Do not let the overdwellers escape! We take them before Titan!

source: Stop the overdwellers! Stop them! Stop them! Stop them!
target: Stop the overdwellers! Stop them! Stop them! Stop them!

source: I do not like this one bit...
target: I do not like this one bit...

source: If our numbers were only greater...
target: If our numbers were only greater...

source: If we are to attack, we must do it before reinforcements arrive.
target: If we are to attack, we must do it before reinforcements arrive.

source: We have the element of surprise, but...
target: We have the element of surprise, but...

source: Here, let me hand you the rei─
target: Here, let me hand you the rei─

source: Shhh... Calm down, now. What do you see?
target: Shhh... Calm down, now. What do you see?

source: Wait! I thought your leg was─! Damned bird! Get back here or I'll roast you and eat you rare!
target: Wait! I thought your leg was─! Damned bird! Get back here or I'll roast you and eat you rare!

source: Now, when I get my hands on that 'bo...
target: Now, when I get my hands on that 'bo...

source: I carry nothing! The 'bo has it all!
target: I carry nothing! The 'bo has it all!

source: It's not me you want, it's the 'bo!
target: It's not me you want, it's the 'bo!

source: Look at me! Does it look like I have any crates of sun lemons under this tunic!?
target: Look at me! Does it look like I have any crates of sun lemons under this tunic!?

source: Not the face! Not the face!
target: Not the face! Not the face!

source: I'll see you in the seventh hell, you bloody coward!
target: I'll see you in the seventh hell, you bloody coward!

source: Who said a 'bo was a man's best friend!?
target: Who said a 'bo was a man's best friend!?

source: Your tools, throw them down! Your weapons, throw them down!
target: Your tools, throw them down! Your weapons, throw them down!

source: Do not hide them from us, overdweller! We can smell them!
target: Do not hide them from us, overdweller! We can smell them!

source: Does the overdweller wish to die like his friends?
target: Does the overdweller wish to die like his friends?

source: The rite of sacrifice is about to begin. Mwahahahahaha!
target: The rite of sacrifice is about to begin. Mwahahahahaha!

source: I always find it amusing how trusting you adventurers are.
target: I always find it amusing how trusting you adventurers are.

source: That is right. It is not I who am to be the sacrifice. It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: That is right. It is not I who am to be the sacrifice. It is <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Are there none who would take up their blade and join us?
target: Are there none who would take up their blade and join us?

source: Hah hah hah! Then show us the stuff you're made of, adventurer!
target: Hah hah hah! Then show us the stuff you're made of, adventurer!

source: As stubborn as a rock, and as hard as a diamond. A formidable foe, that one.
target: As stubborn as a rock, and as hard as a diamond. A formidable foe, that one.

source: He could've had a place in my unit...if he weren't dead! Hah hah hah!
target: He could've had a place in my unit...if he weren't dead! Hah hah hah!

source: Well, now we know where the scaled bastard got his name.
target: Well, now we know where the scaled bastard got his name.

source: But we'll be ready for him next time.
target: But we'll be ready for him next time.

source: O great one! An offering of blood and bone I bring thee!
target: O great one! An offering of blood and bone I bring thee!

source: We have failed our lord again!
target: We have failed our lord again!

source: The day is far from over...
target: The day is far from over...

source: Dalamud will yet drink of this one's lifeblood.
target: Dalamud will yet drink of this one's lifeblood.

source: For we shall see to it personally!
target: For we shall see to it personally!

source: Hold that bank with your lives!
target: Hold that bank with your lives!

source: Where did that damn 'bo get off to?
target: Where did that damn 'bo get off to?

source: There you are. What were you thinking, galloping off like that?
target: There you are. What were you thinking, galloping off like that?

source: Now, to rid me of this wine...wherever this may be.
target: Now, to rid me of this wine...wherever this may be.

source: I fear the worst for our friend. Watch the bird. I will be back.
target: I fear the worst for our friend. Watch the bird. I will be back.

source: This place is unsafe. Come on.
target: This place is unsafe. Come on.

source: We will wait here for our third.
target: We will wait here for our third.

source: Jijiroon's had enough peckings and pawings for one day!
target: Jijiroon's had enough peckings and pawings for one day!

source: It appears quiet, but only a fool puts his trust in silence.
target: It appears quiet, but only a fool puts his trust in silence.

source: Overdwellers come with food and steel! We take your steel we eat your food!
target: Overdwellers come with food and steel! We take your steel we eat your food!

source: Serve the Wailers, earn some coin!
target: Serve the Wailers, earn some coin!

source: I sometimes marvel at the resourcefulness of you adventurers!
target: I sometimes marvel at the resourcefulness of you adventurers!

source: This won't nearly be enough... I'd best just toss it into the river.
target: This won't nearly be enough... I'd best just toss it into the river.

source: Tell the lot to move their arses.
target: Tell the lot to move their arses.

source: No one keeps the Lord of the Inferno waiting and lives!
target: No one keeps the Lord of the Inferno waiting and lives!

source: You will soon be one of us, free from all worry!
target: You will soon be one of us, free from all worry!

source: If it is money you want, you can have it. Gems? I have more than you can carry! They're all yours!
target: If it is money you want, you can have it. Gems? I have more than you can carry! They're all yours!

source: I'll do anything you ask! Just free us!
target: I'll do anything you ask! Just free us!

source: I let my guard down for but a moment...but 'twas a moment too long.
target: I let my guard down for but a moment...but 'twas a moment too long.

source: Now, I must find some way to escape these bonds.
target: Now, I must find some way to escape these bonds.

source: Don't tell my unit you saw me here. They'd give me no end of it!
target: Don't tell my unit you saw me here. They'd give me no end of it!

source: Halt and lay down your weapons!
target: Halt and lay down your weapons!

source: Let the captives free and your punishment will be lightened!
target: Let the captives free and your punishment will be lightened!

source: I've seen that captive before somewhere...
target: I've seen that captive before somewhere...

source: Not yet we aren't... Something tells me those tempered won't give up without a fight.
target: Not yet we aren't... Something tells me those tempered won't give up without a fight.

source: (My unit! Out of all the units in all the realm, why did it have to be <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> unit?)
target: (My unit! Out of all the units in all the realm, why did it have to be <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> unit?)

source: So you can come over here and slay us like dogs?
target: So you can come over here and slay us like dogs?

source: There is no truth in the words of the untempered!
target: There is no truth in the words of the untempered!

source: Fellow Flames! Give them no quarter!
target: Fellow Flames! Give them no quarter!

source: Focus on the tempered! We'll free the rest once the dirty work is done!
target: Focus on the tempered! We'll free the rest once the dirty work is done!

source: Unless we kill them all first!
target: Unless we kill them all first!

source: Calm yourselves! Keep your heads down if you want to live!
target: Calm yourselves! Keep your heads down if you want to live!

source: Good... My unit is none the wiser!
target: Good... My unit is none the wiser!

source: There may be more tempered headed this way. You'd all best make for Little Ala Mhigo.
target: There may be more tempered headed this way. You'd all best make for Little Ala Mhigo.

source: You... I'd know those ears anywhere...
target: You... I'd know those ears anywhere...

source: Might be I join the Flames myself!
target: Might be I join the Flames myself!

source: We will rise again from the ashes!
target: We will rise again from the ashes!

source: Hah hah! Where are your Twelve now!?
target: Hah hah! Where are your Twelve now!?

source: Move, scum! There's no one left to save you now!
target: Move, scum! There's no one left to save you now!

source: Don't forget the wounded. They are still of some use.
target: Don't forget the wounded. They are still of some use.

source: I will take my own life before becoming one of...one of them!
target: I will take my own life before becoming one of...one of them!

source: I knew there was a reason I never joined the Flames.
target: I knew there was a reason I never joined the Flames.

source: And my unit is none th─ Wait! Who's going to rescue me now!?
target: And my unit is none th─ Wait! Who's going to rescue me now!?

source: We cannot give up now! Where is my linkpearl!?
target: We cannot give up now! Where is my linkpearl!?

source: Captain, my wounds... I cannot march no further today...
target: Captain, my wounds... I cannot march no further today...

source: That Lalafell... It was <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>, wasn't it!? That fool could have helped us!
target: That Lalafell... It was <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>, wasn't it!? That fool could have helped us!

source: I shall rip apart your body as Dalamud gnaws upon your soul!
target: I shall rip apart your body as Dalamud gnaws upon your soul!

source: Bleed! Bleed for the one true lord!
target: Bleed! Bleed for the one true lord!

source: The Hound stirs with each drop spilled!
target: The Hound stirs with each drop spilled!

source: Your defense is full of holes...as soon you will be!
target: Your defense is full of holes...as soon you will be!

source: Did you see that? Of course you didn't!
target: Did you see that? Of course you didn't!

source: I've got him! I've got him!
target: I've got him! I've got him!

source: And here I thought it was the rabbits who was swift.
target: And here I thought it was the rabbits who was swift.

source: Seven hells to purgatory! Another one lost.
target: Seven hells to purgatory! Another one lost.

source: Calm yourself! We'll just find ourselves another one. Come on!
target: Calm yourself! We'll just find ourselves another one. Come on!

source: Keep your ears open and your eyes peeled.
target: Keep your ears open and your eyes peeled.

source: Somethin' that large cannot hide for long.
target: Somethin' that large cannot hide for long.

source: The swarmpoint won't be pleased if we come home with empty hands.
target: The swarmpoint won't be pleased if we come home with empty hands.

source: I can't see a godsdamned thing!
target: I can't see a godsdamned thing!

source: I'll see you cut from ear to ear!
target: I'll see you cut from ear to ear!

source: You just wait until we get us a turtle!
target: You just wait until we get us a turtle!

source: You'd best hope our paths don't cross again!
target: You'd best hope our paths don't cross again!

source: Luck was on your side today, outsider, but we'll see about the morrow!
target: Luck was on your side today, outsider, but we'll see about the morrow!

source: Sleep with one eye open tonight, 'venturer. I'll be comin' for you!
target: Sleep with one eye open tonight, 'venturer. I'll be comin' for you!

source: Damned outsider went and frightened off all the damned turtles!
target: Damned outsider went and frightened off all the damned turtles!

source: I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?
target: I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?

source: I can't even remember what we was lookin' for...
target: I can't even remember what we was lookin' for...

source: I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?
target: I ain't tellin' the swarmpoint. You tellin' the swarmpoint?

source: I know a place deeper in the wood. Might be we find us a big one there.
target: I know a place deeper in the wood. Might be we find us a big one there.

source: What we need is more Redbellies. Let's go back to the Hive.
target: What we need is more Redbellies. Let's go back to the Hive.

source: My blood and soul, I give unto thee!
target: My blood and soul, I give unto thee!

source: Ah hah hah! Foolish mortal! I know not of this Dalamud, but if he will not partake in this offering, I claim it as my own!
target: Ah hah hah! Foolish mortal! I know not of this Dalamud, but if he will not partake in this offering, I claim it as my own!

source: Then we shall return on the morrow.
target: Then we shall return on the morrow.

source: It is! The bane of the elder one lives!
target: It is! The bane of the elder one lives!

source: The tusked one must answer for crimes against the elder one!
target: The tusked one must answer for crimes against the elder one!

source: This one cannot forgive! This one cannot forget!
target: This one cannot forgive! This one cannot forget!

source: O elder one! Give this one the strength to exact vengeance!
target: O elder one! Give this one the strength to exact vengeance!

source: Yet, why does the heart of this one still feel so empty...?
target: Yet, why does the heart of this one still feel so empty...?

source: Vengeance still burns in this one's heart!
target: Vengeance still burns in this one's heart!

source: Me poor back cannot take another lashin'.
target: Me poor back cannot take another lashin'.

source: I'm but a porter. My talents are limited to porting...and little else.
target: I'm but a porter. My talents are limited to porting...and little else.

source: I thank you...and my wife thanks you. Or at least she will after tonight! <wink>
target: I thank you...and my wife thanks you. Or at least she will after tonight! <wink>

source: Perhaps I can make it back to an inn...
target: Perhaps I can make it back to an inn...

source: You wait. The wine'll be sweet this season!
target: You wait. The wine'll be sweet this season!

source: <sigh> Mayhap the morrow'll bring better luck.
target: <sigh> Mayhap the morrow'll bring better luck.

source: The golems have the road. We must take it back!
target: The golems have the road. We must take it back!

source: The stone man wakes! The stone man walks!
target: The stone man wakes! The stone man walks!

source: Save us! Save us from the stone man! Save us!
target: Save us! Save us from the stone man! Save us!

source: Back to the mines! Back to the dig!
target: Back to the mines! Back to the dig!

source: No more digging! Much more running!
target: No more digging! Much more running!

source: Titan, save us! Adventurer, save us!
target: Titan, save us! Adventurer, save us!

source: Pshhh! Shhhend the finleshhh ones below!
target: Pshhh! Shhhend the finleshhh ones below!

source: O Leviathan! Lend us Your strength!
target: O Leviathan! Lend us Your strength!

source: Leviathan is the one true god!
target: Leviathan is the one true god!

source: Gods! There are so many of them!
target: Gods! There are so many of them!

source: Grenades! They're too close to the plant!
target: Grenades! They're too close to the plant!

source: Close the blast doors! Turn off the pumps!
target: Close the blast doors! Turn off the pumps!

source: There's just no end to these damned things.
target: There's just no end to these damned things.

source: I will not be defeated. Not here! Not by the likes of you!
target: I will not be defeated. Not here! Not by the likes of you!

source: We have made it this far...
target: We have made it this far...

source: ...but our work has only just begun!
target: ...but our work has only just begun!

source: And what work is that, sir!?
target: And what work is that, sir!?

source: The work we came here for!
target: The work we came here for!

source: Gah! To the hells with it! You know what to do!
target: Gah! To the hells with it! You know what to do!

source: I would not believe it if I had not seen it with mine own eyes.
target: I would not believe it if I had not seen it with mine own eyes.

source: Hah hah! I was made for this!
target: Hah hah! I was made for this!

source: One-eyed demons to the north! To arms!
target: One-eyed demons to the north! To arms!

source: Don't forget to strip the eyes of the lenses. The Alchemists' Guild'll pay good coin for 'em!
target: Don't forget to strip the eyes of the lenses. The Alchemists' Guild'll pay good coin for 'em!

source: Is there no end to these doblyns!?
target: Is there no end to these doblyns!?

source: If I had a gil for every doblyn I'd slain...I wouldn't be here slaying cursed doblyns!
target: If I had a gil for every doblyn I'd slain...I wouldn't be here slaying cursed doblyns!

source: I will fight the sylphs in a location of mine own choosing!
target: I will fight the sylphs in a location of mine own choosing!

source: There is no recourse. We must fight!
target: There is no recourse. We must fight!

source: I'll show you what it means to wail!
target: I'll show you what it means to wail!

source: The rancor! It feeds me, yet consumes me!
target: The rancor! It feeds me, yet consumes me!

source: Sylphs approaching quickly! Where are my reinforcements!?
target: Sylphs approaching quickly! Where are my reinforcements!?

source: Imperials in the Twelveswood! I must report back to the Adders' Nest at once!
target: Imperials in the Twelveswood! I must report back to the Adders' Nest at once!

source: Is this my fate? To fight an endless war?
target: Is this my fate? To fight an endless war?

source: So be it. It won't be the first time I've spit in destiny's eye.
target: So be it. It won't be the first time I've spit in destiny's eye.

source: I'll cut you down to size!
target: I'll cut you down to size!

source: Hm? Why can't I─ Well, this is just great...
target: Hm? Why can't I─ Well, this is just great...

source: You okay? That was some fight, huh? The name's Lightning. I'm not...from around here.
target: You okay? That was some fight, huh? The name's Lightning. I'm not...from around here.

source: I'm not even sure where “here” is. The last thing I remember, I was sleeping.
target: I'm not even sure where “here” is. The last thing I remember, I was sleeping.

source: I don't know if I'm stuck in this world, or if I'll be sent somewhere else...
target: I don't know if I'm stuck in this world, or if I'll be sent somewhere else...

source: What manner of fiend is that!?
target: What manner of fiend is that!?

source: We'll try to hold it here!
target: We'll try to hold it here!

source: Don't let it come near the city!
target: Don't let it come near the city!

source: Disengage! You're no match for that thing!
target: Disengage! You're no match for that thing!

source: You can't fight an armored unit without artillery!
target: You can't fight an armored unit without artillery!

source: ...Well, you get full points for bravery.
target: ...Well, you get full points for bravery.

source: Let's see if I can't help turn the tables.
target: Let's see if I can't help turn the tables.

source: You Eorzeans don't give up, do you?
target: You Eorzeans don't give up, do you?

source: What's a militarized behemoth even doing here? Did it stumble through some portal?
target: What's a militarized behemoth even doing here? Did it stumble through some portal?

source: Or was it sent after me?
target: Or was it sent after me?

source: No! I'm not done with you yet! Dammit...
target: No! I'm not done with you yet! Dammit...

source: Strange... I didn't expect to be here after the battle was done.
target: Strange... I didn't expect to be here after the battle was done.

source: Might as well take a look around, then.
target: Might as well take a look around, then.

source: She can't defeat that abomination alone!
target: She can't defeat that abomination alone!

source: I have to stop meeting people like this. I'm afraid my company's going to get someone killed.
target: I have to stop meeting people like this. I'm afraid my company's going to get someone killed.

source: I'm beginning to understand the reason I was sent to this place: I'm being tested.
target: I'm beginning to understand the reason I was sent to this place: I'm being tested.

source: Someone woke me up to see how much fight I had left...
target: Someone woke me up to see how much fight I had left...

source: They want to drag me back to an ancient, dying world and chain me to a god's will.
target: They want to drag me back to an ancient, dying world and chain me to a god's will.

source: Come on! Take me if you can! I will not be a slave!
target: Come on! Take me if you can! I will not be a slave!

source: Where is this chaos energy coming from? I thought we cut off the source, but it seems to be getting stronger...
target: Where is this chaos energy coming from? I thought we cut off the source, but it seems to be getting stronger...

source: If this keeps up, it will overflow into Eorzea.
target: If this keeps up, it will overflow into Eorzea.

source: This deity will stop at nothing to bring me back.
target: This deity will stop at nothing to bring me back.

source: Even if it means corrupting your world with chaos.
target: Even if it means corrupting your world with chaos.

source: Well, I've seen enough innocents die at the hands of indifferent gods!
target: Well, I've seen enough innocents die at the hands of indifferent gods!

source: With any luck, that'll be the last of them.
target: With any luck, that'll be the last of them.

source: I don't think we won. Feels more like we were judged...unworthy.
target: I don't think we won. Feels more like we were judged...unworthy.

source: Don't let them hurt me, kupo!
target: Не дай им добраться до меня, купо!

source: I'm not finished with you yet, kupo!
target: Мы ещё с тобой не закончили, купо!

source: Yer gonna get it! Right in the bum, kupo!
target: Сейчас получишь! Прям в помпон, купо!

source: Ack! Right in me bum, kupo...

target: Ой! Меня к такому не готовили...

source: Ye can run, but ye can't kupo!
target: Можете бежать... а нет, не можете.

source: You're in big trouble now, kupo!
I think I need to lie down, kupo...
Bear witness to the glory of kupo!
What to do, what to do...
Ever dance with a moogle in the pale moonlight?
target: Ever dance with a moogle in the pale moonlight?

source: Hmph! Next time won't be so easy!
target: Hmph! Next time won't be so easy!

source: Next next time won't be so easy!
target: Next next time won't be so easy!

source: You're in for a treat, kupo!
target: You're in for a treat, kupo!

source: Wait, we're doing this now, kupo?
target: Wait, we're doing this now, kupo?

source: It'll all be over soon, kupo...
target: It'll all be over soon, kupo...

source: Hail to the kupo─I mean, king!
target: Hail to the kupo─I mean, king!

source: You are neither a gentleman nor a zombie!
target: Вы не джентльмен, и даже не зомби!

source: Begone, villain! Leave the Gentle Dead Men in peace!
target: Прочь, злодей! Оставьте благородных мертвецов в покое!

source: The pistol is mightier than the sword!
target: The pistol is mightier than the sword!

source: Rend the enemy to shreds, we shall!
target: Rend the enemy to shreds, we shall!

source:
Bad men come! Bad men steal!
Bad men die, die, diiiiiiiiie!
target:
Bad men come! Bad men steal!
Bad men die, die, diiiiiiiiie!

source:
All come! All kill!
Kill, kill, kiiiiiiiiill!
target:
All come! All kill!
Kill, kill, kiiiiiiiiill!

source: Byregot's beard! Come to help us fight the giants, have ye?
target: Byregot's beard! Come to help us fight the giants, have ye?

source: Now let's show these buggers that size don't mean shite!
target: Now let's show these buggers that size don't mean shite!

source: Momodi! I won't die until I see yer face once more!
target: Momodi! I won't die until I see yer face once more!

source: All in a day's work, eh? Now back to the Quicksand, and the first round's on me!
target: All in a day's work, eh? Now back to the Quicksand, and the first round's on me!

source: We live to mine another day!
target: We live to mine another day!

source: I can't take much more of this...
target: I can't take much more of this...

source: Nobody told me there would be giants...
target: Nobody told me there would be giants...

source: A giant golem! Run for your lives!
target: A giant golem! Run for your lives!

source:
Much to your chagrin, the experiment shall now begin!
O～hohohohoho!
target:
Much to your chagrin, the experiment shall now begin!
O～hohohohoho!

source:
My minion has fallen? Consider me floored.
Oh well, back to the drawing board.
target:
My minion has fallen? Consider me floored.
Oh well, back to the drawing board.

source:
I've collected valuable data from all this fighting.
Armed with this knowledge, I shall begin my smiting!
target:
I've collected valuable data from all this fighting.
Armed with this knowledge, I shall begin my smiting!

source:
Well, what have we here?
You're not half as helpless as you appear.
target:
Well, what have we here?
You're not half as helpless as you appear.

source:
While I'd like nothing more than to stick around and play,
I fear I've more important matters to attend to today.
target:
While I'd like nothing more than to stick around and play,
I fear I've more important matters to attend to today.

source:
After all, I've experiments to conduct, and golems to build.
But we'll meet again...if you can avoid getting yourself killed.
target:
After all, I've experiments to conduct, and golems to build.
But we'll meet again...if you can avoid getting yourself killed.

source:
Oh dear, is it already this time of day?
I really must be on my way.
target:
Oh dear, is it already this time of day?
I really must be on my way.

source:
Next time we find ourselves warring,
do try to be a little less...boring.
target:
Next time we find ourselves warring,
do try to be a little less...boring.

source:
Death by stomping, or death by curse?
You decide which one is worse!
target:
Death by stomping, or death by curse?
You decide which one is worse!

source:
You can run,
I won't make fun!
target:
You can run,
I won't make fun!

source:
<yawn> Could you put up more of a fight?
I'm about to call it a night...
target:
<yawn> Could you put up more of a fight?
I'm about to call it a night...

source:
That wasn't wise...
Prepare for a quick demise!
target:
That wasn't wise...
Prepare for a quick demise!

source: I... I thought I was surely dead.
target: I... I thought I was surely dead.

source: I owe you my life, adventurer.
target: I owe you my life, adventurer.

source: Thank the Twelve that you arrived when you did.
target: Thank the Twelve that you arrived when you did.

source: I can fight no further. Forgive me...
target: I can fight no further. Forgive me...

source: I am blessed by the almighty Ifrit!
target: I am blessed by the almighty Ifrit!

source: I hear the feeble sputtering of your spirit's flames!
target: I hear the feeble sputtering of your spirit's flames!

source: Ah, she purrs like a cat!
target: Ah, she purrs like a cat!

source: Hmph, just a bunch of floating cabbages!
target: Hmph, just a bunch of floating cabbages!

source: Thou shalt pay dearly for thine intrusion!
target: Thou shalt pay dearly for thine intrusion!

source: Thy kind are not welcome here!
target: Thy kind are not welcome here!

source: Hope to prevail, featherless ones cannot!
target: Hope to prevail, featherless ones cannot!

source: Garuda's leal servant, you shall become!
target: Garuda's leal servant, you shall become!

source: No one interrupts the coming of the Lord of Crags!
target: No one interrupts the coming of the Lord of Crags!

source: Your bones will adorn Titan's earthen domain!
target: Your bones will adorn Titan's earthen domain!

source: Pshhh... Finleshhh ones will not leave this place alive!
target: Pshhh... Finleshhh ones will not leave this place alive!

source: Begone as foam upon the waves!
target: Begone as foam upon the waves!

source: Your shhhouls shall be given to the abyshhh!
target: Your shhhouls shall be given to the abyshhh!

source: My sisters will be sick with worry.
target: My sisters will be sick with worry.

source: The Springs are not far now...
target: The Springs are not far now...

source: Voco, prince of chocobos, at your service!
target: Voco, prince of chocobos, at your service!

source: We have a Chosen One to save!
target: We have a Chosen One to save!

source: Not so fast, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Voco's legs tire!
target: Not so fast, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var>! Voco's legs tire!

source: Voco is a brave bird, oh yes!
target: Voco is a brave bird, oh yes!

source: Your Grace, we beseech you! Save us in our hour of need, kupo!
target: Your Grace, we beseech you! Save us in our hour of need, kupo!

source: This'll put some spring into your step!
target: This'll put some spring into your step!

source: Your Grace, your Mogglesguard is nearly undone! Save us, kupo! Save us!
target: Your Grace, your Mogglesguard is nearly undone! Save us, kupo! Save us!

source: You brought this on yourself, kupo!
target: You brought this on yourself, kupo!

source: You should never have come here, kupo!
target: You should never have come here, kupo!

source: Do you bite, little desert fly?
target: Do you bite, little desert fly?

source: My fists are blessed by flame!
target: My fists are blessed by flame!

source: We are the masters of Thanalan!
target: We are the masters of Thanalan!

source: The podling belongs to these ones!
target: The podling belongs to these ones!

source: Enemy of boss one is enemy of these ones.
target: Enemy of boss one is enemy of these ones.

source: Meddling ones' bones will litter the forest!
target: Meddling ones' bones will litter the forest!

source: Tee hee! So much fun to kill walking ones!
target: Tee hee! So much fun to kill walking ones!

source: Boss one! This one sees dead ones!
target: Boss one! This one sees dead ones!

source: Look upon this one, and fear!
target: Look upon this one, and fear!

source: Chosen One belongs with this one!
target: Chosen One belongs with this one!

source: Meddling ones will not leave this place alive!
target: Meddling ones will not leave this place alive!

source: Tee hee! Tee hee hee hee hee...hic!
target: Tee hee! Tee hee hee hee hee...hic!

source: Ooh, a walky one. Got milkroot, walky one?
target: Ooh, a walky one. Got milkroot, walky one?

source: Pshhh! Cower before the raging sea!
target: Pshhh! Cower before the raging sea!

source: You brought this on yourself, kupo!
target: You brought this on yourself, kupo!

source: You're not getting away this time, kupo!
target: You're not getting away this time, kupo!

source:
Ey? What's the fuss─
the trouble, the matter, the fuss?
target:
Ey? What's the fuss─
the trouble, the matter, the fuss?

source: Zo Ga wants these tunnels clean, and what Zo Ga says, goes.
target: Zo Ga wants these tunnels clean, and what Zo Ga says, goes.

source: Ye'll not leave these tunnels alive.
target: Ye'll not leave these tunnels alive.

source: The enemy of Zo Ga is my enemy.
target: The enemy of Zo Ga is my enemy.

source: I'll bore a hole in yer bloody chest.
target: I'll bore a hole in yer bloody chest.

source: Muahaha! How do you like that!?
target: Muahaha! How do you like that!?

source: Shkoh! Shkoh! Brayflox needs lenthand of uplander!
target: Shkoh! Shkoh! Brayflox needs lenthand of uplander!

source: Stop Illuminati from dirty-taking stinkysweet cheese!
target: Stop Illuminati from dirty-taking stinkysweet cheese!

source: Shkoh! Brayflox is forgetting busydeal! Uplander must go alone!
target: Shkoh! Brayflox is forgetting busydeal! Uplander must go alone!

source: Shkoh! Two more of gobbieflock needing lenthand!
target: Shkoh! Two more of gobbieflock needing lenthand!

source: Shkoh... Illuminati strike with fastness, destroy muchly!
target: Shkoh... Illuminati strike with fastness, destroy muchly!

source: Shkoh! No more nice gobbie! Brayflox backpays Illuminati muchly!
target: Shkoh! No more nice gobbie! Brayflox backpays Illuminati muchly!

source: Cheese is gobbie birthright! Knowings of cheesemake bring much jinglyshine!
target: Cheese is gobbie birthright! Knowings of cheesemake bring much jinglyshine!

source: Shkohhh! Illuminati will not have cheese!
target: Shkohhh! Illuminati will not have cheese!

source:
Your faith means nothing─
mine, everything!
target:
Your faith means nothing─
mine, everything!

source:
You have been blind─
but now you shall see!
target:
You have been blind─
but now you shall see!

source:
Blood and thunder?
Blood and fire!
target:
Blood and thunder?
Blood and fire!

source:
Kurhhhr! A slave of
the wroth one!
target:
Kurhhhr! A slave of
the wroth one!

source:
A worm! A worm to pluck
from an apple!
target:
A worm! A worm to pluck
from an apple!

source:
Rrrgggl! To fear me
is to love me!
target:
Rrrgggl! To fear me
is to love me!

source:
An army of slaves
and fanatics!
target:
An army of slaves
and fanatics!

source:
Wavekin sighted! 
To me, to me!
target:
Wavekin sighted! 
To me, to me!

source:
In fighting is honor,
and in death, glory!
target:
In fighting is honor,
and in death, glory!

source:
If this is my death,
I like the cut of it!
target:
If this is my death,
I like the cut of it!

source:
Blessed be Halone, Her
wrath my mother's milk...
target:
Blessed be Halone, Her
wrath my mother's milk...

source:
None shall stand against
the knights of Ishgard!
target:
None shall stand against
the knights of Ishgard!

source:
They fall, they fall,
but we─we are forever!
target:
They fall, they fall,
but we─we are forever!

source:
Hold!
I say hold this posi...
target:
Hold!
I say hold this posi...

source: May their love last for all time!
target: May their love last for all time!

source:
Move, you laggards!
Move, I said!
target:
Move, you laggards!
Move, I said!

source:
Rest when you've earned it,
here or in the heavens!
target:
Rest when you've earned it,
here or in the heavens!

source:
Get that cannon sponged!
You, ready on the vent!
target:
Get that cannon sponged!
You, ready on the vent!

source: Ice of darkness, freeze mine enemies!
target: Ice of darkness, freeze mine enemies!

source: Blaze of darkness, scorch mine enemies!
target: Blaze of darkness, scorch mine enemies!

source: Lightning of darkness, smite mine enemies!
target: Lightning of darkness, smite mine enemies!

source: Come thee forth, staff of eld!
target: Come thee forth, staff of eld!

source: Behold the marvels of Allagan science!
target: Behold the marvels of Allagan science!

source: Is it just me, or is it a mite chilly in here?
target: Is it just me, or is it a mite chilly in here?

source: You are as insects to be crushed underfoot!
target: You are as insects to be crushed underfoot!

source: Intruders! To arms, to arms! Squawk!
target: Intruders! To arms, to arms! Squawk!

source: Sic 'em, you lot! Sic 'em, you lot! Squawk!
target: Sic 'em, you lot! Sic 'em, you lot! Squawk!

source: Get the cap'n! Get the cap'n! Squawk!
target: Get the cap'n! Get the cap'n! Squawk!

source:
Work, slaves, work!
No rest for you!
target:
Work, slaves, work!
No rest for you!

source: We'll be a few steps ahead of you!
target: We'll be a few steps ahead of you!

source:
“Run away, run away!”
Ahahaha, green ones funny!
target:
“Run away, run away!”
Ahahaha, green ones funny!

source: Magicks of standard give us strength!
target: Magicks of standard give us strength!

source: This great source of Mamool Ja's might!
target: This great source of Mamool Ja's might!

source: Here, this way will be faster!
target: Here, this way will be faster!

source: Kick the Silverscales out of our home!
target: Kick the Silverscales out of our home!

source: <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> must not harm the Lady!
target: <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> must not harm the Lady!

source: Rend asunder with fang and claw...
target: Rend asunder with fang and claw...

source: One of us! One of us!
target: One of us! One of us!

source:
Don't look at me!
Don't look at meee!
target:
Don't look at me!
Don't look at meee!

source: What? Why you stop Mamool Ja fun!?
target: What? Why you stop Mamool Ja fun!?

source: Mamool Ja kill you, and dance on bones!
target: Mamool Ja kill you, and dance on bones!

source: Arrows of frost to keep my enemies at bay!
target: Arrows of frost to keep my enemies at bay!

source: A blade of ice to defend my brothers!
target: A blade of ice to defend my brothers!

source: The cycle ends here and now!
target: The cycle ends here and now!

source: A shower of ice to rend flesh and bone!
target: A shower of ice to rend flesh and bone!

source: The parade will soon commence. Are you suitably frightening and festive in form?
target: The parade will soon commence. Are you suitably frightening and festive in form?

source: If not, ask the unusual illusionist yonder for assistance.
target: If not, ask the unusual illusionist yonder for assistance.

source: Cast the Festal Cant charm upon the citizens, but avoid the thaumaturges who are in the crowd.
target: Cast the Festal Cant charm upon the citizens, but avoid the thaumaturges who are in the crowd.

source: The people are waiting. Let us march.
target: The people are waiting. Let us march.

source: Shower the citizens with the Festal Cant charm.
target: Shower the citizens with the Festal Cant charm.

source: Here the parade ends. Well done.
target: Here the parade ends. Well done.

source: For good measure, let me see you cast the charm one last time.
target: For good measure, let me see you cast the charm one last time.

source: Heh heh heh... That was fun, was it not?
target: Heh heh heh... That was fun, was it not?

source: A charm for happiness and fortune? I gotta get me some of that!
target: A charm for happiness and fortune? I gotta get me some of that!

source: Ooh, I love me a good costume parade!
target: Ooh, I love me a good costume parade!

source: I want that charm all over me! Give it to <var 1A 02 /var>meee<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: I want that charm all over me! Give it to <var 1A 02 /var>meee<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: I haven't had this much fun in ages!
target: I haven't had this much fun in ages!

source: What you cannot see <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> hurt you!
target: What you cannot see <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> hurt you!

source:
A fight, is it?
Glad to oblige!
target:
A fight, is it?
Glad to oblige!

source: Come one, come all, and join the Spectral Parade.
target: Come one, come all, and join the Spectral Parade.

source: March along the avenue, we shall, in forms frightening and festive.
target: March along the avenue, we shall, in forms frightening and festive.

source: A magical time is guaranteed to be had by all.
target: A magical time is guaranteed to be had by all.

source: Speak with the unusual illusionist yonder, and he will weave for you a new form.
target: Speak with the unusual illusionist yonder, and he will weave for you a new form.

source: Thaumaturges will try to ruin our fun. Be wary of them.
target: Thaumaturges will try to ruin our fun. Be wary of them.

source: It's the choppin' block for you!
target: It's the choppin' block for you!

source: Yer code don't mean shite to me!
target: Yer code don't mean shite to me!

source: Now, show me what you have learned.
target: Now, show me what you have learned.

source: This is the Katon of a true master!
target: This is the Katon of a true master!

source: You show promise. A shame you will not live to fulfill it...
target: You show promise. A shame you will not live to fulfill it...

source: Gahaha! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the lesson I should have taught you long ago!
target: Gahaha! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the lesson I should have taught you long ago!

source: The weak shall feed the strong...
target: The weak shall feed the strong...

source: I am afraid the parade has come to an end.
target: I am afraid the parade has come to an end.

source: Thank you for helping to spread the joy. Heh heh heh...
target: Thank you for helping to spread the joy. Heh heh heh...

source: Take a look at this jewel, boys! It's the size of me fist!
target: Take a look at this jewel, boys! It's the size of me fist!

source: That's amazin', boss! We're gonna be rollin' in it!
target: That's amazin', boss! We're gonna be rollin' in it!

source: Alright, we got what we came for. Let's get out of here!
target: Alright, we got what we came for. Let's get out of here!

source: No, really! This is our last battle! Honest!
target: No, really! This is our last battle! Honest!

source: Mr. Typhon and I are friends forever!
target: Mr. Typhon and I are friends forever!

source: I know what you're thinking... “Man, that was cheap!” Sorry, so sorry!
target: I know what you're thinking... “Man, that was cheap!” Sorry, so sorry!

source: Mr. Typhon's not so great with words, but his strength'll blow you away!
target: Mr. Typhon's not so great with words, but his strength'll blow you away!

source:
Thought you had me?
I've got more lives than I do arms!
target:
Thought you had me?
I've got more lives than I do arms!

source:
Too clingy for ya?
Whaddaya expect!? I'm an octopus!
target:
Too clingy for ya?
Whaddaya expect!? I'm an octopus!

source:
I gots a little surprise for y'all.
It'll be TONS of fun!
target:
I gots a little surprise for y'all.
It'll be TONS of fun!

source: Is this the end for Uncle Ulty!?
target: Is this the end for Uncle Ulty!?

source: Now kids, I hate to ink and run, but─urk...
target: Now kids, I hate to ink and run, but─urk...

source: Oi! You ain't meant to be 'ere!
target: Oi! You ain't meant to be 'ere!

source: Yer in for it now, mate!
target: Yer in for it now, mate!

source:
No, Mr. Typhon!
Say it ain't so!
target:
No, Mr. Typhon!
Say it ain't so!

source:
Alright, Mr. Typhon! Time to make 'em fly!
Hands off Mr. Typhon, kids! Don't touch Mr. Typhon!
target:
Alright, Mr. Typhon! Time to make 'em fly!
Hands off Mr. Typhon, kids! Don't touch Mr. Typhon!

source: To accelerate, press and hold the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Forward<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> key.
target: To accelerate, press and hold the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Forward<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> key.

source: Note that your chocobo's stamina will decrease more quickly when accelerating.
target: Note that your chocobo's stamina will decrease more quickly when accelerating.

source: Be warned─chocobos pushed too hard will become <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>lathered<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and lose stamina even more quickly!
target: Be warned─chocobos pushed too hard will become <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>lathered<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and lose stamina even more quickly!

source: Scattered throughout the course are <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>magicked panels<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which bestow various effects when triggered.
target: Scattered throughout the course are <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>magicked panels<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> which bestow various effects when triggered.

source: Your chocobo gained a temporary burst of speed! However, be warned: not all panels bestow beneficial effects!
target: Your chocobo gained a temporary burst of speed! However, be warned: not all panels bestow beneficial effects!

source: In addition to magicked panels, you may come across treasure coffers containing <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>race items<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
target: In addition to magicked panels, you may come across treasure coffers containing <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>race items<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.

source: Race items will be added to your hotbar automatically, and can be used to help yourself or hinder your opponents.
target: Race items will be added to your hotbar automatically, and can be used to help yourself or hinder your opponents.

source: Watch carefully and make the routine your own!
target: Watch carefully and make the routine your own!

source: If you are uncertain as to how to perform, might I suggest pairing with another <var 09 E948 ((Hyuran)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var>?
target: If you are uncertain as to how to perform, might I suggest pairing with another <var 09 E948 ((Hyuran)) ((Elezen)) ((Lalafell)) ((Miqo'te)) ((Roegadyn)) ((Au Ra)) ((Hrothgar)) ((Viera)) /var>?

source: Allow the motions to flow from your very heart and soul.
target: Allow the motions to flow from your very heart and soul.

source: Empty your mind of all thoughts and embrace the routine.
target: Empty your mind of all thoughts and embrace the routine.

source: This is it, my friend. Your big chance! There is no right or wrong. Only dance or dance not!
target: This is it, my friend. Your big chance! There is no right or wrong. Only dance or dance not!

source: The next verse calls us! Is your heart ready to answer?
target: The next verse calls us! Is your heart ready to answer?

source: We are halfway to our goal! There is no turning back now!
target: We are halfway to our goal! There is no turning back now!

source: We approach the climax. Do not let your limbs fall limp just yet!
target: We approach the climax. Do not let your limbs fall limp just yet!

source: Let us take a measure of your soul!
target: Let us take a measure of your soul!

source: How much are you worth, I wonder?
target: How much are you worth, I wonder?

source: <var 60 0234 /var>Welcome, ladies and gentlemen! Thank you for joining us for this drawing of the Jumbo Cactpot.
target: <var 60 0234 /var>Welcome, ladies and gentlemen! Thank you for joining us for this drawing of the Jumbo Cactpot.

source: Now, without further ado, let us set the wheels in motion!
target: Now, without further ado, let us set the wheels in motion!

source:
And the winning number for draw <var 20 E802 /var> is...
<var 50 E80305 /var>!
target:
And the winning number for draw <var 20 E802 /var> is...
<var 50 E80305 /var>!

source: Whether or not you hit the Cactpot today, just remember: there's always drawing number <var 20 E802 /var> to look forward to!
