target: Whether or not you hit the Cactpot today, just remember: there's always drawing number <var 20 E802 /var> to look forward to!

source: Here you can practice the basics of chocobo racing.
target: Here you can practice the basics of chocobo racing.

source: Continue to accelerate and observe the effects. Once your chocobo's stamina is completely depleted, your speed will drop, and you will no longer be able to accelerate.
target: Continue to accelerate and observe the effects. Once your chocobo's stamina is completely depleted, your speed will drop, and you will no longer be able to accelerate.

source: To alleviate this condition, press the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Back<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> key to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.
target: To alleviate this condition, press the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Back<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> key to decelerate and allow your chocobo to rest.

source: Press the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Left<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Right<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> keys to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.
target: Press the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Left<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> and <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Move Right<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> keys to steer your chocobo from one side of the course to the other.

source: To trigger a magicked panel, steer your chocobo towards it.
target: To trigger a magicked panel, steer your chocobo towards it.

Triple Triad is played by placing cards on a three-by-three grid.
The player to act first is decided at random.

Now it's your turn!

See how my card changed color?
This means you have “captured” the card.
target:
See how my card changed color?
This means you have “captured” the card.

Lord Vedrfolnir!

target: You have suffered, and suffered well. Gahahaha!

Our foe's true target is Zenith...

I pray I am not

<var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var> of the Land.

<var 08 E905 ((daughter)) ((son)) /var> of the Land.
My thanks to you.

target: It gladdens me to see you safe.

target: But know this: I am ever the hunter, and you the hunted.

source: Flutter all you like, little one...
target: Flutter all you like, little one...

target: It will only make killing you all the sweeter!

target: No! I'm too cute to die, kupo!

target: You will be my next plaything...

source: But there is more fun to be had, yes?

source: Ahhh, the thrill of the hunt!

source: A savage battle to the death!
target: A savage battle to the death!

source: The pain! The blood! The pleasure!
target: The pain! The blood! The pleasure!

source: Is that all you have? Come! Come, I say!

target: It's as if the sight of blood urges him on, kupo!

source:
Who are you calling “prey”!?
I'm no one's dinner, kupo!
target:
Who are you calling “prey”!?
I'm no one's dinner, kupo!

target: This one's not right in the head, kupo!

Yoyoroon love loots!

My thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

target:

source: You are a worthy foe...for a traitor.
target: You are a worthy foe...for a traitor.

source: Face the truth, Darkscale! You are beaten!
target: Face the truth, Darkscale! You are beaten!

source: O, Nidhogg! Give unto me your strength!
target: O, Nidhogg! Give unto me your strength!

source: The crystals...! He drinks of their power!
target: The crystals...! He drinks of their power!

source: The fire! It wells from within!
target: The fire! It wells from within!

source: Now I shall smite you like the worm you are!
target: Now I shall smite you like the worm you are!

source: I cannot fall to this traitor...!
target: I cannot fall to this traitor...!

source:
You know not what you do, Darkscale!
The power you seek will destroy you!
target:
You know not what you do, Darkscale!
The power you seek will destroy you!

source: Gladly would I give my life in service to my lord!
target: Gladly would I give my life in service to my lord!

source: I must have more power! MORE!!!
target: I must have more power! MORE!!!

source: No words will reach him now...
target: No words will reach him now...

source: Steel yourself. We face a desperate foe.
target: Steel yourself. We face a desperate foe.

source: COME, AND I SHALL SMITE YOU!
target: COME, AND I SHALL SMITE YOU!

source: Such power is mine, and still the traitor does not fall!
target: Such power is mine, and still the traitor does not fall!

source: Give unto me all there is to give!
target: Give unto me all there is to give!

source: You only hasten your own demise, Darkscale!
target: You only hasten your own demise, Darkscale!

source: GRAHAHAHA... I HAVE DRUNK MY FILL.
target: GRAHAHAHA... I HAVE DRUNK MY FILL.

source: He has exceeded his physical limits.
target: He has exceeded his physical limits.

source: What drives him to such madness...?
target: What drives him to such madness...?

source:
COME, TRAITOR!!!
I SHALL TEAR THE WINGS FROM YOUR BACK!!!
target:
COME, TRAITOR!!!
I SHALL TEAR THE WINGS FROM YOUR BACK!!!

source: MY CLAWS SHALL RIP THE SCALES FROM YOUR FLESH AS MY FIRE CHARS YOUR CORPSE TO A SHRIVELED HUSK!!!
target: MY CLAWS SHALL RIP THE SCALES FROM YOUR FLESH AS MY FIRE CHARS YOUR CORPSE TO A SHRIVELED HUSK!!!

source: Alas, the proud dragon who once lived is now gone...
target: Alas, the proud dragon who once lived is now gone...

source: Consumed by power and hate, he is but a machine of destruction now.
target: Consumed by power and hate, he is but a machine of destruction now.

source: Join me, mortal, and let us put Darkscale out of his misery!
target: Join me, mortal, and let us put Darkscale out of his misery!

source:
I AM DARKSCALE, GENERAL OF NIDHOGG!
I WILL NOT FALL TO THIS TRAITOR!
target:
I AM DARKSCALE, GENERAL OF NIDHOGG!
I WILL NOT FALL TO THIS TRAITOR!

source: I MUST HAVE MORE POWER...! More...power...
target: I MUST HAVE MORE POWER...! More...power...

source: I take no joy in Darkscale's end, but at last, these halls will know peace again.
target: I take no joy in Darkscale's end, but at last, these halls will know peace again.

source: Till we meet again, O hero among mortals.
target: Till we meet again, O hero among mortals.

source:
My claws! My precious adamantite claws!
Look what you've done to them!
target:
My claws! My precious adamantite claws!
Look what you've done to them!

source:
Oh, you'll pay! Don't think
that you won't pay!
target:
Oh, you'll pay! Don't think
that you won't pay!

source:
For your wanton destruction,
I sentence you to death!
target:
For your wanton destruction,
I sentence you to death!

source: ...and his power grows with each passing moment.
target: ...and his power grows with each passing moment.

source: But if not I, who shall defend the spire!?
target: But if not I, who shall defend the spire!?

source: I will not abandon those who suffer at Darkscale's ravaging claws!
target: I will not abandon those who suffer at Darkscale's ravaging claws!

source: It does not even scathe him...? Inconceivable!
target: It does not even scathe him...? Inconceivable!

source: No! I will not fall to this fiend who casts away his pride!
target: No! I will not fall to this fiend who casts away his pride!

source: Even if I must give my life in the trying!
target: Even if I must give my life in the trying!

source: His power... It was too great...
target: His power... It was too great...

source: YOU DIE AS YOU LIVED─A TRAITOR!
target: YOU DIE AS YOU LIVED─A TRAITOR!

source: NOW YOUR FOUL BROOD WILL FEEL MY FLAMES!
target: NOW YOUR FOUL BROOD WILL FEEL MY FLAMES!

source: KNOW YOUR TRUE LORD, DRAGONLINGS! AND FEAR HIM!
target: KNOW YOUR TRUE LORD, DRAGONLINGS! AND FEAR HIM!

source:
This looks as good
a place as any, I reckon.
target:
This looks as good
a place as any, I reckon.

source:
Please, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>! I beg ye!
Drive the beasts afield!
target:
Please, <var 08 E905 ((milady)) ((milord)) /var>! I beg ye!
Drive the beasts afield!

source:
Now if I can just catch
something...anything.
target:
Now if I can just catch
something...anything.

source:
The wife'll have me
head if I come home
without a catch.
target:
The wife'll have me
head if I come home
without a catch.

source:
All this thrashin' about...
There won't be a fish
left in the entire river!
target:
All this thrashin' about...
There won't be a fish
left in the entire river!

source: The day is yours, but you have not seen the last of me.
target: The day is yours, but you have not seen the last of me.

source: You are a craven and a traitor both!
target: You are a craven and a traitor both!

source: When next we meet, you will not leave with your life.
target: When next we meet, you will not leave with your life.

source: You'll not best me so easily!
target: You'll not best me so easily!

source: I will kill you if it is the last thing I do!
target: I will kill you if it is the last thing I do!

source:
Vileki─ No... Those aren't
vilekin... They're...
target:
Vileki─ No... Those aren't
vilekin... They're...

source:
Twelve help us! They've
come for the bloody mint!
target:
Twelve help us! They've
come for the bloody mint!

source:
Keep that mint safe,
or we'll be elbow-deep
in vilekin as well!
target:
Keep that mint safe,
or we'll be elbow-deep
in vilekin as well!

source:
The mint has sent the
things into a right frenzy!
target:
The mint has sent the
things into a right frenzy!

source:
Might serve us better if
we tossed the mint back
down to Ishgard...
target:
Might serve us better if
we tossed the mint back
down to Ishgard...

source:
At least they won't
be coming back?
target:
At least they won't
be coming back?

source:
Thanks for the help,
mysterious stranger!
target:
Thanks for the help,
mysterious stranger!

source:
Oi! Gundu! The whole bloody
lot of you are cravens!
target:
Oi! Gundu! The whole bloody
lot of you are cravens!

source:
Bowing and scraping for your
Vundu masters! How pathetic!
target:
Bowing and scraping for your
Vundu masters! How pathetic!

source:
Like furious summer squall I
piss on the Gundu! Hear me!?
I piss on you!
target:
Like furious summer squall I
piss on the Gundu! Hear me!?
I piss on you!

source:
Piss on Gundu!?
Gundu piss on your corpse!
target:
Piss on Gundu!?
Gundu piss on your corpse!

source:
As surely as sun rises and sets,
Gundu find and punish netherling!
target:
As surely as sun rises and sets,
Gundu find and punish netherling!

source:
Begone, dark ones!
These lands belong to Vundu!
target:
Begone, dark ones!
These lands belong to Vundu!

source:
Meddlesome as gaelicats!
Kill them all! Kill them all!
target:
Meddlesome as gaelicats!
Kill them all! Kill them all!

source:
Netherling is strong, like a
dragon without wings.
target:
Netherling is strong, like a
dragon without wings.

source:
The skies grow dark...
Kena Vanu will fight
another day.
target:
The skies grow dark...
Kena Vanu will fight
another day.

source:
As sure as the night swallows
the sun, your time will come...
target:
As sure as the night swallows
the sun, your time will come...

source:
For Kena Vanu, Vundu
would cast himself into
the swirling winds!
target:
For Kena Vanu, Vundu
would cast himself into
the swirling winds!

source:
Netherling will pay for
sullying the white of the
clouds─in blood!
target:
Netherling will pay for
sullying the white of the
clouds─in blood!

source:
Infidels! You will suffer
the divine judgment of
the White!
target:
Infidels! You will suffer
the divine judgment of
the White!

source:
To stand against Kena Vanu
is as a minnow baring its
teeth against the White.
target:
To stand against Kena Vanu
is as a minnow baring its
teeth against the White.

source:
Come, Skvader! Crush
these netherlings like
gastornis eggs!
target:
Come, Skvader! Crush
these netherlings like
gastornis eggs!

source:
The sun shall soon
set on you, netherling!
target:
The sun shall soon
set on you, netherling!

source:
This island will fall from
the sky before a netherling
defeats Kena Vanu!
target:
This island will fall from
the sky before a netherling
defeats Kena Vanu!

source:
Foolish netherling!
Drink from the rains
of despair!
target:
Foolish netherling!
Drink from the rains
of despair!

source: No, it will not end like this!
target: No, it will not end like this!

source: You shall join me in the abyss!
target: You shall join me in the abyss!

source: You lust for blood? I shall give it to you!
target: You lust for blood? I shall give it to you!

source: There is no greater thrill than the hunt!
target: There is no greater thrill than the hunt!

source: Yesss, this is what I live for!
target: Yesss, this is what I live for!

source: Nothing stirs the blood like struggling prey!
target: Nothing stirs the blood like struggling prey!

source: That I should be pressed so by their ilk...
target: That I should be pressed so by their ilk...

source: I had not reckoned upon this...
target: I had not reckoned upon this...

source: Fly like the craven you are!
target: Fly like the craven you are!

source: They were persistent if naught else.
target: They were persistent if naught else.

source: We have wasted enough time here.
target: We have wasted enough time here.

source: Darkscale is headed for Tharl Oom Khash.
target: Darkscale is headed for Tharl Oom Khash.

source: Let us go and settle this once and for all!
target: Let us go and settle this once and for all!

source:
Come, my young ones.
I will tend to your wounds.
target:
Come, my young ones.
I will tend to your wounds.

source: To think that one of your kind could boast the strength to fell Nidhogg's trusted general...
target: To think that one of your kind could boast the strength to fell Nidhogg's trusted general...

source: Yet you have not tapped the depths of your potential!
target: Yet you have not tapped the depths of your potential!

source: Show me the strength by which you did slay the mighty Darkscale!
target: Show me the strength by which you did slay the mighty Darkscale!

source: Yes! I knew that it was so...
target: Yes! I knew that it was so...

source: The power ensconced within you is great indeed, mortal...
target: The power ensconced within you is great indeed, mortal...

source: Yes, the power to make even a mighty dragon tremble...
target: Yes, the power to make even a mighty dragon tremble...

source: I would see you harness your power to its limits, and beyond!
target: I would see you harness your power to its limits, and beyond!

source: There is more power in you yet, mortal!
target: There is more power in you yet, mortal!

source:
That's it. I'm movin'
to Falcon's Nest!
target:
That's it. I'm movin'
to Falcon's Nest!

source:
The damned things'll
suck me dry!
target:
The damned things'll
suck me dry!

source:
I've been cursed,
I tell ye!
target:
I've been cursed,
I tell ye!

source:
Find a bloody chocobo's
arse to suckle!
target:
Find a bloody chocobo's
arse to suckle!

source:
I don't know how to
thank ye! Here's the
coin I promised.
target:
I don't know how to
thank ye! Here's the
coin I promised.

source:
The vile fiends are
befouling the river!
target:
The vile fiends are
befouling the river!

source:
<click> <click>
You. Fleshling. Help me kill them.
target:
<click> <click>
You. Fleshling. Help me kill them.

source:
<click> <click>
You win this day, miacids.
But the war is not over...
target:
<click> <click>
You win this day, miacids.
But the war is not over...

source: They are many, but we are strong!
target: They are many, but we are strong!

source:
<click> <click>
I grow weak. I go to inform the others.
target:
<click> <click>
I grow weak. I go to inform the others.

source: Carry on in my stead if you can...
target: Carry on in my stead if you can...

source: For the nourishment of our bodies...
target: For the nourishment of our bodies...

source:
Netherling fells my Skvader!
Rage swirls within me like a storm!
target:
Netherling fells my Skvader!
Rage swirls within me like a storm!

source:
Gwahahaha!
Bow before the White, netherling.
target:
Gwahahaha!
Bow before the White, netherling.

source: I am power both ancient and unrivaled...
target: I am power both ancient and unrivaled...

source: I do not bleed, for I am but strength given form...
target: I do not bleed, for I am but strength given form...

source: Feeble creatures of flesh... Your time is nigh!
target: Feeble creatures of flesh... Your time is nigh!

source:
Wh-What in the seven
hells is that thing!?
target:
Wh-What in the seven
hells is that thing!?

source:
Rain of shame floods
gobbie goggles...
target:
Rain of shame floods
gobbie goggles...

source:
We'll be back! You can't
watch the whole forest!
target:
We'll be back! You can't
watch the whole forest!

source:
This one'll fetch
a fine price, I reckon!
target:
This one'll fetch
a fine price, I reckon!

source:
I'll slice you up and
feed you to the bears!
target:
I'll slice you up and
feed you to the bears!

source:
I've seen baby chocobos
put up more fight!
target:
I've seen baby chocobos
put up more fight!

source:
Hah hah! If I don't eat
her first! Hah hah hah!
target:
Hah hah! If I don't eat
her first! Hah hah hah!

source:
If ye see her,
grab her!
target:
If ye see her,
grab her!

source: By the power of the Eye!
target: By the power of the Eye!

source:
Drop your weapons and
you'll receive a swift death!
target:
Drop your weapons and
you'll receive a swift death!

source:
The Eorzeans
will pay for this!
target:
The Eorzeans
will pay for this!

source:
Stay alert! The enemy
may still lurk nearby.
target:
Stay alert! The enemy
may still lurk nearby.

source:
Do not forget
why we are here.
target:
Do not forget
why we are here.

source:
I think I may have found
something! Or not...
target:
I think I may have found
something! Or not...

source: To think a mortal could wield such might!
target: To think a mortal could wield such might!

source: Truly, there is no limit to your powers.
target: Truly, there is no limit to your powers.

source:
This battle is not over yet.
No, I have only scratched the surface of my strength...
target:
This battle is not over yet.
No, I have only scratched the surface of my strength...

source: You are possessed of great power─and the strength of will to control it.
target: You are possessed of great power─and the strength of will to control it.

source: It was an honor and a pleasure to meet you on the battlefield.
target: It was an honor and a pleasure to meet you on the battlefield.

source: Farewell, hero among mortals. I will remember you.
target: Farewell, hero among mortals. I will remember you.

source: I saw great promise, great strength in you.
target: I saw great promise, great strength in you.

source: Alas, it seems that I was mistaken...
target: Alas, it seems that I was mistaken...

source: Who dares disturb─? Oho, it is you.
target: Who dares disturb─? Oho, it is you.

source: I daresay this encounter is no mere chance.
target: I daresay this encounter is no mere chance.

source: If you would test your strength against me, I would be honored to meet your challenge!
target: If you would test your strength against me, I would be honored to meet your challenge!

source:
There will be more. Do
not let down your guard!
target:
There will be more. Do
not let down your guard!

source:
We lay claim to this land
in the name of the Emperor!
target:
We lay claim to this land
in the name of the Emperor!

source:
You stand in the
way of progress!
target:
You stand in the
way of progress!

source:
Alive or dead,
the legatus cares not.
target:
Alive or dead,
the legatus cares not.

source:
We will have to
report this to the legatus!
target:
We will have to
report this to the legatus!

source:
Illuminati brainfruit
is frontmost! Brings much
blastydoom to enemy!
target:
Illuminati brainfruit
is frontmost! Brings much
blastydoom to enemy!

source:
None can withstand
ironfist of Illuminati!
target:
None can withstand
ironfist of Illuminati!

source:
Backwalk away or
meet oversoon doom!
target:
Backwalk away or
meet oversoon doom!

source:
Backgive whizzlepops
or feel oversharp pain!
target:
Backgive whizzlepops
or feel oversharp pain!

source:
Sound battlebells!
To arms, to arms!
target:
Sound battlebells!
To arms, to arms!

source: I shall show you something special!
target: I shall show you something special!

source: For the honor of House Fortemps!
target: For the honor of House Fortemps!

source:
Zundu must flee this place
on the wings of the wind!
target:
Zundu must flee this place
on the wings of the wind!

source:
Zundu legs are as
heavy as tree trunks!
target:
Zundu legs are as
heavy as tree trunks!

source:
Be wary! Cruel Vundu
trail us like a shadow.
target:
Be wary! Cruel Vundu
trail us like a shadow.

source:
Vundu surround us
like a choking fog!
target:
Vundu surround us
like a choking fog!

source:
Zundu feels hope, like a ray
of sun to chase the night!
target:
Zundu feels hope, like a ray
of sun to chase the night!

source:
My homeland greets my eyes
like a rainbow on the horizon!
target:
My homeland greets my eyes
like a rainbow on the horizon!

source:
Such treachery! Like a dark
 cloud on a summer's day!
target:
Such treachery! Like a dark
 cloud on a summer's day!

source:
At last, the storm is over
and blue skies return!
target:
At last, the storm is over
and blue skies return!

source:
Here Zundu is safe as a
bird in its mother's breast.
target:
Here Zundu is safe as a
bird in its mother's breast.

source:
Netherling is strong as wind,
and gentle as the kiss of
the morning dew.
target:
Netherling is strong as wind,
and gentle as the kiss of
the morning dew.

source:
Zundu remember your
kindness for many
summers to come.
target:
Zundu remember your
kindness for many
summers to come.

source:
Zundu feels a presence
behind like storm clouds
on the horizon.
target:
Zundu feels a presence
behind like storm clouds
on the horizon.

source:
Zundu hears voices, like
the whispers of the rain.
target:
Zundu hears voices, like
the whispers of the rain.

source:
Zundu tires of being Vundu
footrest. Zundu just wants
to go home.
target:
Zundu tires of being Vundu
footrest. Zundu just wants
to go home.

source:
The beasts come,
roaring in like a tempest!
target:
The beasts come,
roaring in like a tempest!

source:
Vundu come, on angry
wings of thunder!
target:
Vundu come, on angry
wings of thunder!

source: What is this? Am I saved?
target: What is this? Am I saved?

source:
My brother, you look as if
battered by raging winds.
target:
My brother, you look as if
battered by raging winds.

source:
Oh, what fortune! Like a ray
of sun breaking through the
clouds, you are!
target:
Oh, what fortune! Like a ray
of sun breaking through the
clouds, you are!

source:
My brother, your heart
seems as restless as
the stormy seas.
target:
My brother, your heart
seems as restless as
the stormy seas.

source:
Were you perhaps chased
here by the cruel Vundu?
target:
Were you perhaps chased
here by the cruel Vundu?

source:
Worry not, for I shall guide you
home on a gentle breeze...
target:
Worry not, for I shall guide you
home on a gentle breeze...

source:
Come, and take shelter
under my wing...
target:
Come, and take shelter
under my wing...

source:
Thank you, brother!
My heart shines like the sun!
target:
Thank you, brother!
My heart shines like the sun!

source:
Your breathing grows heavy,
brother. Let us rest here.
target:
Your breathing grows heavy,
brother. Let us rest here.

source:
...Ahhh. The rest refreshes
me like a mountain spring.
target:
...Ahhh. The rest refreshes
me like a mountain spring.

source:
Thank you, brother. Now let us
be off before the storms come.
target:
Thank you, brother. Now let us
be off before the storms come.

source:
Why rush? I see no
clouds on the horizon.
target:
Why rush? I see no
clouds on the horizon.

source:
N-No! It was just the
rustling of the wind.
target:
N-No! It was just the
rustling of the wind.

source:
Finally! I thought spring might
come before you arrived!
target:
Finally! I thought spring might
come before you arrived!

source:
Foolish Zundu. Time to
return and fulfill your fate
as a footstool.
target:
Foolish Zundu. Time to
return and fulfill your fate
as a footstool.

source:
You have escaped Vundu
clutches for the last time.
target:
You have escaped Vundu
clutches for the last time.

source:
Proud, peaceful Zundu is
not a piece of furniture!
target:
Proud, peaceful Zundu is
not a piece of furniture!

source:
Netherling is a ray of light
in Zundu's darkest hour.
target:
Netherling is a ray of light
in Zundu's darkest hour.

source:
I must hurry back to
Ok' Zundu like the wind...
target:
I must hurry back to
Ok' Zundu like the wind...

source:
...and tell my brothers
of this Vundu treachery.
target:
...and tell my brothers
of this Vundu treachery.

source:
Oh, woe! Is there no
end to my dark days?
target:
Oh, woe! Is there no
end to my dark days?

source:
There are tracks
leading this direction!
target:
There are tracks
leading this direction!

source:
Your orders are to
take no survivors!
target:
Your orders are to
take no survivors!

source:
You won't leave
this place alive!
target:
You won't leave
this place alive!

source:
Toss the bodies
over the edge.
target:
Toss the bodies
over the edge.

source:
The retreat is sounded!
Fall back! Fall back!
target:
The retreat is sounded!
Fall back! Fall back!

source:
All for Tarasque!
All for Tarasque!
target:
All for Tarasque!
All for Tarasque!

source:
This one shall make
a fine offering!
target:
This one shall make
a fine offering!

source:
Uplander must make
swiftheels with Slicktrix!
target:
Uplander must make
swiftheels with Slicktrix!

source:
New vangob is complete!
Idyllshire is in danger!
target:
New vangob is complete!
Idyllshire is in danger!

source:
Shkohhh... Slicktrix must
be telling shirefriends!
target:
Shkohhh... Slicktrix must
be telling shirefriends!

source:
With a spear as stiff
as ice, I thrust!
target:
With a spear as stiff
as ice, I thrust!

source:
Like the majestic
Coerthan puffer, I swell!
target:
Like the majestic
Coerthan puffer, I swell!

source:
Like the surging waters
of the mighty Coerthas, I come!
target:
Like the surging waters
of the mighty Coerthas, I come!

source: Unauthorized temporal signature detected. Initiating elimination protocol.
target: Unauthorized temporal signature detected. Initiating elimination protocol.

source:
This one shall make
an excellent offering.
target:
This one shall make
an excellent offering.

source:
My blood, my body,
my soul─as one!
target:
My blood, my body,
my soul─as one!

source:
Die, abomination!
The Fury wills it!
target:
Die, abomination!
The Fury wills it!

source:
Here they come!
Protect the mint!
target:
Here they come!
Protect the mint!

source:
Zundu wants for water as
pure as the morning dew!

Zundu wants for water as
pure as the morning dew!

Zundu wants for aid!

Like the clouds weep rain,

There must be more
around here somewhere...

There must be more
around here somewhere...

What I wouldn't give
for a helping hand!

for a helping hand!

That was too close!

Mayhap another time...

target: I knew the beast wasn't ready!

source: You'll be the envy of your friends!
target: You'll be the envy of your friends!

The infernal contraptions are come!
Let us eradicate this threat to Thanalan!
target:
The infernal contraptions are come!
Let us eradicate this threat to Thanalan!

source:
Hearken to my words!
Glory in the song of rebirth!

Glory in the song of rebirth!

source: We cannot allow these fiends to mar the celebrations!
target: We cannot allow these fiends to mar the celebrations!

source:
This is an infestation...
Mayhap I should have brought more arrows!
target:
This is an infestation...
Mayhap I should have brought more arrows!

source: We must stem this cold, metal tide!
target: We must stem this cold, metal tide!

source:
They swarm in such numbers...
'Tis time for the stirring climax.
target:
They swarm in such numbers...
'Tis time for the stirring climax.

source: Do not let them...overrun the land...
target: Do not let them...overrun the land...

source:
Victory!
The bugs will not soon recover from this slaughter.
target:
Victory!
The bugs will not soon recover from this slaughter.

source:
Thank you, adventurer.
The field is ours this day!
target:
Thank you, adventurer.
The field is ours this day!

Their numbers are too great...
Let us fall back and regroup!
target:
Their numbers are too great...
Let us fall back and regroup!

source: The faire is here at last!
target: The faire is here at last!

source: Move aside! Let the lady pass!
target: Move aside! Let the lady pass!

source: You won't lay a finger on m'lady!
target: You won't lay a finger on m'lady!

source: Let us grovel at your feet!
target: Let us grovel at your feet!

source: I just want to go to the faire...
target: I just want to go to the faire...

source: Finally, I can enjoy the fireworks.
target: Finally, I can enjoy the fireworks.

source: Please, at least pat my head.
target: Please, at least pat my head.

source: Don't let her come to harm...
target: Don't let her come to harm...

source: Why can Bugaal Ja not bathe at beach!?
target: Why can Bugaal Ja not bathe at beach!?

source: You've been banned from the beach!
target: You've been banned from the beach!

source: You jealous of bathing dance? I teach you!
target: You jealous of bathing dance? I teach you!

source: Stop that! I've never seen such...undulations.
target: Stop that! I've never seen such...undulations.

source: Smoothskins just jealous they cannot dance so!
target: Smoothskins just jealous they cannot dance so!

source: Forbidden from hot springs, forbidden from beach...
target: Forbidden from hot springs, forbidden from beach...

source: But you cannot stop dance! Never!
target: But you cannot stop dance! Never!

source: Then dance out of my sight!
target: Then dance out of my sight!

source: Heavens forfend anyone gets any ideas...
target: Heavens forfend anyone gets any ideas...

source: We'll be havin' our own faire!
target: We'll be havin' our own faire!

source: You thought the Bombards were fierce!?
target: You thought the Bombards were fierce!?

source: Thank you! Our guests should be safe now.
target: Thank you! Our guests should be safe now.

source: Don't let us see you near here again!
target: Don't let us see you near here again!

source: I will bathe, and I will dance!
target: I will bathe, and I will dance!

source: Why...why do you despise me so...?
target: Why...why do you despise me so...?

source: But I can't unsee his gyrations...
target: But I can't unsee his gyrations...

source: Now you see the power of my dance!
target: Now you see the power of my dance!

source: You are undeserving of my tradition!
target: You are undeserving of my tradition!

source: If he returns, I may call on you again.
target: If he returns, I may call on you again.

source: I can't pick these up alone.
target: I can't pick these up alone.

source: Godsdamn, we'll have to try something else...
target: Godsdamn, we'll have to try something else...

source: One sip'll perk you right up.
target: One sip'll perk you right up.

source: We can drink it right here.
target: We can drink it right here.

source: Nothin' beats grog on the beach.
target: Nothin' beats grog on the beach.

source: Come on, lass, I'll carry you.
target: Come on, lass, I'll carry you.

source: Been itchin' for a little fun an' games!
target: Been itchin' for a little fun an' games!

source: Get your hands away from me!
target: Get your hands away from me!

source: Not the “fun” you had in mind, eh!?
target: Not the “fun” you had in mind, eh!?

source: Bend over and kiss your arse good-bye!
target: Bend over and kiss your arse good-bye!

source: How do you like ribs? Broken!?
target: How do you like ribs? Broken!?

source: Gods be good, get the others!
target: Gods be good, get the others!

source: We slaved away on those fireworks...
target: We slaved away on those fireworks...

source: Intruders are too late! Too late!
target: Intruders are too late! Too late!

source:
Scamper all you will.
My lance will find you...
target:
Scamper all you will.
My lance will find you...

source: I shall pierce your very soul!
target: I shall pierce your very soul!

source: You defy the only rightful god!
target: You defy the only rightful god!

source: You shall fall, as did your ally!
target: You shall fall, as did your ally!

target: Our moment is come, Ser Janlenoux!

Now, Brothers!
Unleash the full power of the Heavens' Ward!
target:
Now, Brothers!

Lances at the ready...
Now fly!
target:

Now fly!

target: No shield will defend you from the spear of my conviction!

<var 60 0234 /var>Have you tested your tactics with Lord of Verminion?
Assemble your loyal minions, and come to Minion Square!
target:

<var 60 0234 /var>A Lord of Verminion tournament is about to begin.
Prospective entrants are encouraged to register at Minion Square!
target:
<var 60 0234 /var>A Lord of Verminion tournament is about to begin.

<var 60 0234 /var>A Lord of Verminion tournament is currently underway!

target:
<var 60 0234 /var>A Lord of Verminion tournament is currently underway!

target:
<var 60 0234 /var>Lord of Verminion tournament registration will close momentarily.

<var 60 0234 /var>Another thrilling Lord of Verminion tournament has drawn to a close!
The winners will be announced in Minion Square.
We hope to see everyone back for the next competition!
target:
<var 60 0234 /var>Another thrilling Lord of Verminion tournament has drawn to a close!

source: By what unholy strength have we been bested...?
target: Что это за нечестивая сила нас одолела?..

source: But there is no time for talk. The crabs come!
target: Но времени на разговоры больше нет. Крабы наступают!

source: I am reminded of a tale from long ago...
...Of fledgling adventurers who would fight crabs like these to better themselves.
target: ...о начинающих искателях приключений, которые сражаются с подобными крабами, дабы повысить своё мастерство.

source: I pray our training is as successful as theirs was.
target: Я молюсь, чтобы наши тренировки прошли так же успешно, как и у них.

source: I believe that will suffice for now.
Fighting alongside such a seasoned warrior has been educational.
target: Сражаться рядом с таким опытным воином было весьма поучительно.

source: I am grateful that you chose to accompany me.
target: Я благодарна, что вы решили сопровождать меня.
Возможно... <Тяжелый вздох...> Возможно, я была слишком самоуверенна...

source: If only I had taken a proper meal beforehand...
target: Если бы я заранее как следует поела...

source: 'Tis as if the very air is tainted by darkness...
Minions of the Shadow Lord!? From whence did they come?
target: Приспешники Повелителя теней?! Откуда они взялись?

source: These demons... They call to mind another old story.
target: Эти демоны... Они навевают мысли о другой старой истории.

source: To surpass his limits, a great samurai once fought such fiends...
target: Для преодоления своих возможностей, великий самурай однажды сразился с такими чудовищами...

source: Perhaps by defeating these demons I can do the same.
target: Возможно, одолев этих демонов, и я смогу добиться того же.

source: It would seem we have driven them back.
target: Похоже, что мы отбросили их назад.

source: Alas, I could scarcely match your pace. This will not do.
target: Увы, едва ли я смогу соответствовать вашему темпу. Так дело не пойдет.

source: There must be a way for me to improve more quickly...
target: Должен же быть способ, чтобы я могла совершенствоваться ещё быстрее...

source: It would seem we have underestimated our enemy...
But I cannot fail─not with so much at stake...
target: Но я не могу потерпеть неудачу, когда на карту поставлено так много...

source: Look! Over there! Could it be...?
I know that fiend. Those jagged pincers, dripping with venom...
target: Я знаю этого монстра. Эти зазубренные клешни, сочащиеся ядом...

source: It is Serket, an infamous beast and slayer of countless men.
target: Это Серкет, печально известный зверь и убийца бесчисленных людей.

source: Come! Let us bring an end to its legend and see ours grow in its wake!
target: Идем! Давай положим конец его легенде и увидим, как на её месте взрастёт наша!

source: To think that we managed to defeat such a foe...
target: Подумать только, что нам удалось победить такого врага...

source: And yet...I find that there is something within me still wanting.
target: И все же... я чувствую, что внутри меня все еще что-то жаждет.

source: <sigh> I must find a way to overcome this. I must find my way home.
target: <вздох> Я должна найти способ преодолеть это. И обязана найти дорогу домой.

source: To think...my strength would fail me at a time like this!
target: Подумать только... моя сила может подвести меня в такой момент!

source: I will not be denied. I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> find my way back home!
target: Я не отступлюсь. Я <var 1A 02 /var>найду<var 1A 01 /var> путь домой!

source: On your guard! I sense a dark presence...
target: Будьте начеку! Я чувствую присутствие тьмы...

source: There! And it is not alone...
But I am not alone either.
target: Но я так же не одна.

source: I will deal with the dragon. Pray attend to the eye.
target: Я разберусь с драконом. Займитесь глазастиком.

source: I-I struck true, and yet...it is unharmed!?
target: Я н-нанесла разящий удар, н-но... он остался невредим?!

source: I fear I am nearing my limit...
No! I did not come this far to fail now! I <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> return to my world!
target: Нет! Я зашла так далеко не для того, чтобы потерпеть неудачу! Я <var 1A 02 /var>вернусь<var 1A 01 /var> в свой мир!

source: At last, my training is complete. And it is all thanks to you.
target: Наконец-то мое обучение завершено. И все это благодаря вам.

source: You were always there to keep me on the path.
target: Вы всегда были рядом, чтобы поддержать меня в моем путешествии.

source: I would speak with you more, but not here. Let us make for Limsa Lominsa.
target: Я бы поговорила с вами еще, но не здесь. Давайте отправимся в Лимса Ломинсу.

source: A million souls sing to me!
Will you help us retrieve our rice cakes?
target: Will you help us retrieve our rice cakes?

target: Observe how the cyclops swings his mallet before making your approach!

A fine display!
You've saved our mochi─and the festival!
target:

You've saved our mochi─and the festival!

target: It's Ser Aymeric! He's come to kill us!

target:
