threaten a mere child!?

source:
An honorable man would
allow you to tend to your
wounds, but I am no man, and
I care little for honor. Attack!
target:
An honorable man would
allow you to tend to your
wounds, but I am no man, and
I care little for honor. Attack!

source:
My thanks. You have shown
me honor is no stranger
to your people.
target:
My thanks. You have shown
me honor is no stranger
to your people.

source:
I shall remember this always.
Farewell. The mountains of
my homeland await.
target:
I shall remember this always.
Farewell. The mountains of
my homeland await.

source:
I made no such promise!
But...I may have some time
before my ship sails.
target:
I made no such promise!
But...I may have some time
before my ship sails.

source:
Hey! You said we'd look
for shells when you finished!
target:
Hey! You said we'd look
for shells when you finished!

source:
I will return, Oneblade!
I. Will. Return!
target:
I will return, Oneblade!
I. Will. Return!

source:
Victory is mine!
Inform the bards that Senban
is now the <var 1A 02 /var>None<var 1A 01 /var>blade!
target:
Victory is mine!
Inform the bards that Senban
is now the <var 1A 02 /var>None<var 1A 01 /var>blade!

source:
Once again, you have
my thanks for seeing
my sister safe.
target:
Once again, you have
my thanks for seeing
my sister safe.

source:
You are well versed in
the art of war, it appears.
target:
You are well versed in
the art of war, it appears.

source:
As it happens, my tribe
seeks a warrior of your
prowess to rid the land
of a terrible blight.
target:
As it happens, my tribe
seeks a warrior of your
prowess to rid the land
of a terrible blight.

source:
Its name is Humbaba, and
even the mighty J'moldva
could not stand against it.
target:
Its name is Humbaba, and
even the mighty J'moldva
could not stand against it.

source:
If you are willing, I shall lead
you to its lair...and to glory
everlasting!
target:
If you are willing, I shall lead
you to its lair...and to glory
everlasting!

source:
Today the blight shall end!
Today my sisters will be free!
target:
Today the blight shall end!
Today my sisters will be free!

source:
The tribe will ever sing of
your deeds Your name will
echo in our hearts.
target:
The tribe will ever sing of
your deeds Your name will
echo in our hearts.

source:
Come! There is no dishonor
in fleeing to fight again
another day.
target:
Come! There is no dishonor
in fleeing to fight again
another day.

source: Time for a song, I reckon!
target: Time for a song, I reckon!

source:
STAB HIM IN THE
SOFT OF THE BELLY!
target:
STAB HIM IN THE
SOFT OF THE BELLY!

source:
Heheh. You're not such a
tough guy after all.
target:
Heheh. You're not such a
tough guy after all.

source:
I have done you a great
dishonor in underestimating
your ability, stranger. I shall
do so no longer!
target:
I have done you a great
dishonor in underestimating
your ability, stranger. I shall
do so no longer!

source:
Perhaps that mouth needs a
proper washing...with blood!
target:
Perhaps that mouth needs a
proper washing...with blood!

source:
First koja, now
my own brothers!?
target:
First koja, now
my own brothers!?

source:
You will rue the day that
you raised your blade to
an innocent maid.
target:
You will rue the day that
you raised your blade to
an innocent maid.

source:
I've slain bigger creatures
than you, but none as foul!
target:
I've slain bigger creatures
than you, but none as foul!

source:
Why does this always...always...
always always always
ALWAYS HAPPEN TO ME!!!?
target:
Why does this always...always...
always always always
ALWAYS HAPPEN TO ME!!!?

source:
YOU WANT SOME FISH!?
I'LL GIVE YOU SOME FISH!
target:
YOU WANT SOME FISH!?
I'LL GIVE YOU SOME FISH!

source:
I'LL RAM THIS FISH SO FAR
UP YOURGRSBRGYRGAAAH!
target:
I'LL RAM THIS FISH SO FAR
UP YOURGRSBRGYRGAAAH!

source:
Feed the bull
his bleedin' bollocks!
target:
Feed the bull
his bleedin' bollocks!

source:
Piss on the Twelve
and their bloody blessings!
target:
Piss on the Twelve
and their bloody blessings!

source:
Heh heh! The plunder's
right as rain!
target:
Heh heh! The plunder's
right as rain!

source:
Good! Then you can give
back to me and we'll all
stay friends!
target:
Good! Then you can give
back to me and we'll all
stay friends!

source:
Find you? It was your stink.
It carries across the entire
Ruby Sea.
target:
Find you? It was your stink.
It carries across the entire
Ruby Sea.

source:
And here I just had dip in
the springs last new moon!
target:
And here I just had dip in
the springs last new moon!

source:
Enough of this. Stand aside,
and we'll take back what's
rightfully ours. Or...
target:
Enough of this. Stand aside,
and we'll take back what's
rightfully ours. Or...

source:
...we can kill you and take
it anyway. Forward, march!
target:
...we can kill you and take
it anyway. Forward, march!

source:
Well, bollocks. Looks like me
charm wore off. Ye wouldn't
be mindin' another brawl now,
would ye?
target:
Well, bollocks. Looks like me
charm wore off. Ye wouldn't
be mindin' another brawl now,
would ye?

source:
Wh-What happened?
Where are we? Who are you?
target:
Wh-What happened?
Where are we? Who are you?

source:
My fish... My beautiful
fish... They're all...all...
all burnt to a crisp!
target:
My fish... My beautiful
fish... They're all...all...
all burnt to a crisp!

source:
I guess I'll just have to
head back down to the
river and catch some more!
target:
I guess I'll just have to
head back down to the
river and catch some more!

source:
May the Matron show
us favor this day...
target:
May the Matron show
us favor this day...

source: It's going to be a long day...
target: It's going to be a long day...

source: Scorpion 'round the bend! Remember to attack while it's tail's up!
target: Scorpion 'round the bend! Remember to attack while it's tail's up!

source: We are the spear of the Fury and the shield of our brothers! Who are we!?
target: We are the spear of the Fury and the shield of our brothers! Who are we!?

source: We have to hold them here!
target: We have to hold them here!

source: Allow me to clear the way!
target: Allow me to clear the way!

source:
Courage and strength!
We will prevail!
target:
Courage and strength!
We will prevail!

source:
I don't ever want to have
to do that again...
target:
I don't ever want to have
to do that again...

source: O Halone, see us to victory! Grant me the strength to strike down this foul creature!
target: O Halone, see us to victory! Grant me the strength to strike down this foul creature!

source: A sad, sad day, this is. Sad!
target: A sad, sad day, this is. Sad!

source:
Don't think you can get
away with this!
target:
Don't think you can get
away with this!

source: I saw that! I saw that!
target: I saw that! I saw that!

source:
I'm going to tell
your mothers!
target:
I'm going to tell
your mothers!

source:
The filthy duck ate
my favorite dzo!
target:
The filthy duck ate
my favorite dzo!

source:
Bested...by a giant...duck...
I shall never live this down...
target:
Bested...by a giant...duck...
I shall never live this down...

source:
The skies will never be
safe as long as that duck
lives...
target:
The skies will never be
safe as long as that duck
lives...

source:
Something's emerged from
Bardam's Mettle...and it looks
hungry!
target:
Something's emerged from
Bardam's Mettle...and it looks
hungry!

source:
There's no time to move the
herd. We'll need to slow the
beast somehow!
target:
There's no time to move the
herd. We'll need to slow the
beast somehow!

source:
If you haven't the will to
fight, you'd best run now!
target:
If you haven't the will to
fight, you'd best run now!

source:
There was no
way to stop it...
target:
There was no
way to stop it...

source:
Ah! And now it's
heading for the pens!
target:
Ah! And now it's
heading for the pens!

source:
You've saved us, traveler.
May the sun bless you.
target:
You've saved us, traveler.
May the sun bless you.

source:
How dare they...attack...
one of theirs... <pant> <pant>
target:
How dare they...attack...
one of theirs... <pant> <pant>

source:
Very well then. If I must spill
the blood of mine own kin...
target:
Very well then. If I must spill
the blood of mine own kin...

source:
We can be civil
about this, Gaei!
target:
We can be civil
about this, Gaei!

source:
Just give us back the
coin we stole...plus, say,
another sack and we'll
call things even!
target:
Just give us back the
coin we stole...plus, say,
another sack and we'll
call things even!

source:
Keep your eyes peeled.
They may come at any moment.
target:
Keep your eyes peeled.
They may come at any moment.

source: Turned tail and ran like the dogs they are, I wager.
target: Turned tail and ran like the dogs they are, I wager.

source: Thanks! Ye didn't bring a bite to yaffle on, did ye?
target: Thanks! Ye didn't bring a bite to yaffle on, did ye?

source: Y-You! Where did you come from!?
target: Y-You! Where did you come from!?

source: Ahaha! Oboro the Dim strikes again!
target: Ahaha! Oboro the Dim strikes again!

source:
You're a dead man, Gaei!
A dead man hiding!
target:
You're a dead man, Gaei!
A dead man hiding!

source:
Do not think this is the end,
Confederate! The Red will see
our treasures back in our halls
and your heads on the walls!
target:
Do not think this is the end,
Confederate! The Red will see
our treasures back in our halls
and your heads on the walls!

source:
I am in your debt, traveler!
Now pray keep me alive
so I can pay it!
target:
I am in your debt, traveler!
Now pray keep me alive
so I can pay it!

source:
Aye, I am here, my brothers!
And no, there will be no
compromise!
target:
Aye, I am here, my brothers!
And no, there will be no
compromise!

source:
You will pay for what you
have done...with your lives!
target:
You will pay for what you
have done...with your lives!

source: I was hoping you'd say that.
target: I was hoping you'd say that.

source:
Now's our chance! Follow
me if ye be keen on livin'!
target:
Now's our chance! Follow
me if ye be keen on livin'!

source:
Ye see, I've meself
a bonny of a plan!
target:
Ye see, I've meself
a bonny of a plan!

source:
It appears you've run
yourselves aground!
target:
It appears you've run
yourselves aground!

source:
I expect as much from a
rum-soaked Confederate
but I'd heard you Westerners
were of a more clever stock.
target:
I expect as much from a
rum-soaked Confederate
but I'd heard you Westerners
were of a more clever stock.

source:
Who ye calling rum-soaked?
I haven't had a drop in six
bells, no thanks to you!
target:
Who ye calling rum-soaked?
I haven't had a drop in six
bells, no thanks to you!

source:
We'll be sippin' grog out this
Red bastard's skull come
supper, like!
target:
We'll be sippin' grog out this
Red bastard's skull come
supper, like!

source:
No matter. We will have what
is ours, and paint our shells
in your blood!
target:
No matter. We will have what
is ours, and paint our shells
in your blood!

source:
There be too godsdamned
many of them!
target:
There be too godsdamned
many of them!

source:
Break their spirits
and their backs!
target:
Break their spirits
and their backs!

source:
Hah hah hah! Naught better
than a turtle on his back!
target:
Hah hah hah! Naught better
than a turtle on his back!

source:
Me thanks, matey. Ye'd make
a fine Confederate, ye would!
target:
Me thanks, matey. Ye'd make
a fine Confederate, ye would!

source:
Just wait! You will soon wish
you had died here today!
target:
Just wait! You will soon wish
you had died here today!

source:
What have you gotten
yourself into this time!?
target:
What have you gotten
yourself into this time!?

source:
The thieves found me, and
would have killed me, had it
not been for this stranger.
target:
The thieves found me, and
would have killed me, had it
not been for this stranger.

source: I'd like to see them try!
target: I'd like to see them try!

source: So that's how it is, eh!?
target: So that's how it is, eh!?

source:
I'll tear each and every one
of you from crotch to chin!
target:
I'll tear each and every one
of you from crotch to chin!

source:
Go back to your own lands,
Eorzean. This is not your fight!
target:
Go back to your own lands,
Eorzean. This is not your fight!

source:
I will not quit until
justice is had!
target:
I will not quit until
justice is had!

source:
How ever will we
survive the winter now...?
target:
How ever will we
survive the winter now...?

source:
I'd tear their shells off...
...iffin' I had a leg to stand on.
target:
I'd tear their shells off...
...iffin' I had a leg to stand on.

source:
More Redbacks comin'
o'er the ridge!
target:
More Redbacks comin'
o'er the ridge!

source:
And I was lookin' forward
to drinkin' from that one's skull.
target:
And I was lookin' forward
to drinkin' from that one's skull.

source:
The sounds of battle have
faded. Have I come too late?
target:
The sounds of battle have
faded. Have I come too late?

source: That was the last of them.
target: That was the last of them.

source:
At least without my sword
I'm lighter on my feet...
target:
At least without my sword
I'm lighter on my feet...

source:
What is important
is that you came.
target:
What is important
is that you came.

source:
I thought you said
that was the last of them!
target:
I thought you said
that was the last of them!

source:
Our fallen brothers will
bother us no longer.
target:
Our fallen brothers will
bother us no longer.

source:
Let them think
they have won...
target:
Let them think
they have won...

source: Is this the one needs killing?
target: Is this the one needs killing?

source: Go on! I'll not be long!
target: Go on! I'll not be long!

source:
You've got something
to say to me, say it!
target:
You've got something
to say to me, say it!

source:
That's what I thought!
Now out of my way!
target:
That's what I thought!
Now out of my way!

source:
I've no quarrel with you,
outlander. But interfere
and I will take you down, too.
target:
I've no quarrel with you,
outlander. But interfere
and I will take you down, too.

source:
You should stick
to the gambling tents.
target:
You should stick
to the gambling tents.

source:
Are there none here who
might serve to right a wrong?
target:
Are there none here who
might serve to right a wrong?

source:
You have done the Blues a
great service. May you be
blessed.
target:
You have done the Blues a
great service. May you be
blessed.

source:
Our altars will remain empty...
But not as empty as our hearts.
target:
Our altars will remain empty...
But not as empty as our hearts.

source:
I believe I saw one over
near those rocks!
target:
I believe I saw one over
near those rocks!

source:
I must return home soon
to prepare the altars.
target:
I must return home soon
to prepare the altars.

source:
Still nothing to say, eh?
Let our fists do the
talking then!
target:
Still nothing to say, eh?
Let our fists do the
talking then!

source:
That supposed to
be a thank you?
target:
That supposed to
be a thank you?

source: Right. I'll take that as a yes.
target: Right. I'll take that as a yes.

source:
That'll learn me to
help a damn mute.
target:
That'll learn me to
help a damn mute.

source:
I don't want
to be a Budugan!
target:
I don't want
to be a Budugan!

source:
I wasn't born to fight!
I was born to herd!
target:
I wasn't born to fight!
I was born to herd!

source:
You! Take your hands
off our new brother or
we'll cut them off!
target:
You! Take your hands
off our new brother or
we'll cut them off!

source:
Find her or it's your blood
I use in the next ritual!
target:
Find her or it's your blood
I use in the next ritual!

source:
She's a fox, not an eagle!
She could not have gone far!
target:
She's a fox, not an eagle!
She could not have gone far!

source:
You know not what
you do, stranger!
target:
You know not what
you do, stranger!

source: You will not stand in our way!
target: You will not stand in our way!

source:
I must away...
Tamamo Gozen awaits...
target:
I must away...
Tamamo Gozen awaits...

source: No... Why must they do this!?
target: No... Why must they do this!?

source:
This kindness will
not be forgotten.
target:
This kindness will
not be forgotten.

source:
I must go now to my mistress.
Farewell, kind traveler.
target:
I must go now to my mistress.
Farewell, kind traveler.

source:
The people... I must...
protect...the people...
target:
The people... I must...
protect...the people...

source: What is this place? What binds me here?
target: What is this place? What binds me here?

source: Aaah! It feels as if my head were about to burst!
target: Aaah! It feels as if my head were about to burst!

source: What is it that ails you, milady? Perhaps my associates and I can offer you succor.
target: What is it that ails you, milady? Perhaps my associates and I can offer you succor.

source: So much dark... So much pain...
target: So much dark... So much pain...

source: Did you feel that!? It was <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>! She is in there!
target: Did you feel that!? It was <var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>! She is in there!

source: Kyubi of the Nine Tails! If you will not come out willingly, the girl's life is forfeit. Do you want that!?
target: Девятихвостая Кюби! Если ты не выйдешь добровольно, жизнь девушки будет оборвана. Ты ведь не хочешь этого?!

source: Away! All of you. Only death awaits you here...
target: Away! All of you. Only death awaits you here...

source: Your death, yes. And then your power will be ours!
target: Your death, yes. And then your power will be ours!

source: Forget the ropes. We complete the ritual here!
target: Forget the ropes. We complete the ritual here!

source: Rise, my pet! It is time to feed!
target: Rise, my pet! It is time to feed!

source: Please... Run now... While I am still...myself...
target: Please... Run now... While I am still...myself...

source: I cannot hold on much lon─AAAAAAHHHHHH!!!
target: I cannot hold on much lon─AAAAAAHHHHHH!!!

source: <growl> Who!? Who dares defile the land with their impure magicks!?
target: <growl> Who!? Who dares defile the land with their impure magicks!?

source: Brothers, behold! Protectress of Doma, Kyubi of the Nine Tails!
target: Братья, смотрите! Покровительница Дома, Девятихвостая Кюби!

source:
There! My mistress!
She is still here with us!
target:
There! My mistress!
She is still here with us!

source:
We must find her
before it is too late!
target:
We must find her
before it is too late!

source: She is beyond my power. I must summon <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: She is beyond my power. I must summon <var 1A 02 /var>him<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: Run, wicked defilers! I have eyes <var 1A 02 /var>everywhere<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Run, wicked defilers! I have eyes <var 1A 02 /var>everywhere<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: But my past... It remains veiled in shadow...
target: But my past... It remains veiled in shadow...

source: Kyubi of the Nine Tails! For twenty and five long summers have you wandered the land─
target: Девятихвостая Кюби! Двадцать и пять долгих лет ты бродила по земле...

source: The wounds suffered in defense of your mortal charges deep as the abyss!
target: The wounds suffered in defense of your mortal charges deep as the abyss!

source: But today, that journey ends! By mine hand, I shall free you!
target: But today, that journey ends! By mine hand, I shall free you!

source: I shall free all of you!
target: I shall free all of you!

source: Son of man! You are nothing!
target: Son of man! You are nothing!

source: No man may command me... No man but─
target: No man may command me... No man but─

source: The spell of binding... Hurry! We must kill her! Now!
target: The spell of binding... Hurry! We must kill her! Now!

source: She is lost in her own mind!
target: She is lost in her own mind!

source:
We must lure her back,
or she'll be lost forever!
target:
We must lure her back,
or she'll be lost forever!

source:
She must be saved, or
the land will be ever cursed!
target:
She must be saved, or
the land will be ever cursed!

source: FREE ME! FREE ME FROM THIS PAIN!
target: FREE ME! FREE ME FROM THIS PAIN!

source: No. Her heart. It still beats!
target: No. Her heart. It still beats!

source:
Come then! We must
see her back to health!
target:
Come then! We must
see her back to health!

source:
Move your feet. You are
a Budugan now, boy!
target:
Move your feet. You are
a Budugan now, boy!

source: They must have gone to ground, but where...
target: They must have gone to ground, but where...

source:
There has to be a clue
somewhere around here...
target:
There has to be a clue
somewhere around here...

source:
“Giant” my arse...
That thing is enormous!
target:
“Giant” my arse...
That thing is enormous!

source: Our spears will only anger it!
target: Our spears will only anger it!

source: Men! We have something special for you today!
target: Men! We have something special for you today!

source: And some of you might just come out of it alive!
target: And some of you might just come out of it alive!

source: I'm not finished with you yet!
target: I'm not finished with you yet!

source:
Azim! Why have
you forsaken us!
target:
Azim! Why have
you forsaken us!

source:
This wound will have to
be cleaned and dressed...
target:
This wound will have to
be cleaned and dressed...

source: The wind is calm. The air clear.
target: The wind is calm. The air clear.

source:
Aye, the sun sends
us his blessing.
target:
Aye, the sun sends
us his blessing.

source:
North. Past the Dawn Throne
and across Tao Khaal.
target:
North. Past the Dawn Throne
and across Tao Khaal.

source: I shall ride at the van.
target: I shall ride at the van.

source:
Anarba! That is not
for you to decide! Anarba!
target:
Anarba! That is not
for you to decide! Anarba!

source:
They've our scent.
There'll be no outrunning
them now. Blades out!
target:
They've our scent.
There'll be no outrunning
them now. Blades out!

source:
Let us hope
that is all of them.
target:
Let us hope
that is all of them.

source:
Our fortunes will turn...
We must will them so.
target:
Our fortunes will turn...
We must will them so.

source:
Rise, my people!
Our journey continues!
target:
Rise, my people!
Our journey continues!

source: It is here we shall make camp!
target: It is here we shall make camp!

source:
The losses do not
seem too great... Still...
target:
The losses do not
seem too great... Still...

source:
Gather, little ones!
It is time for milking!
target:
Gather, little ones!
It is time for milking!

source:
Would the traveler
like to join me?
target:
Would the traveler
like to join me?

source:
Rarely do we collect enough
to make cheese, but today...
target:
Rarely do we collect enough
to make cheese, but today...

source:
So many jugs!
This calls for celebration!
target:
So many jugs!
This calls for celebration!

source:
Barely enough to boil a goat's
head. But it will have to do.
target:
Barely enough to boil a goat's
head. But it will have to do.

source:
There! You can see the
dust rise from the steppe!
target:
There! You can see the
dust rise from the steppe!

source:
Even a few of their number
will fill our tribe's bellies
and see our tents warm.
target:
Even a few of their number
will fill our tribe's bellies
and see our tents warm.

source:
A bowl of hot khorkhog
is reward enough for
the day's hunt!
target:
A bowl of hot khorkhog
is reward enough for
the day's hunt!

source:
The khorkhog will be thin
tonight, I'm afraid...
target:
The khorkhog will be thin
tonight, I'm afraid...

source:
Quick, Altani!
See to the sheep!
target:
Quick, Altani!
See to the sheep!

source:
It is the same pack that
hounded us earlier. They
will follow until they are
sated...or dead.
target:
It is the same pack that
hounded us earlier. They
will follow until they are
sated...or dead.

source: They will disturb us no longer.
target: They will disturb us no longer.

source:
Their noses are bloodied,
but if we do not leave now,
they will soon grow bold again.
target:
Their noses are bloodied,
but if we do not leave now,
they will soon grow bold again.

source:
It is time.
To the north and east!
target:
It is time.
To the north and east!

source:
Halt! It is too quiet...
Even the crickets do not sing...
target:
Halt! It is too quiet...
Even the crickets do not sing...

source:
Drop your weapons and we'll
let your women live...with us!
target:
Drop your weapons and we'll
let your women live...with us!

source:
'Tis fortunate they were
drunk. Alcohol will gift a man
bravery...but always for a price.
target:
'Tis fortunate they were
drunk. Alcohol will gift a man
bravery...but always for a price.

source:
We'll be taking these...
and these...and also these.
target:
We'll be taking these...
and these...and also these.

source:
Hahaha! Tonight we dine
as champions of the steppe!
target:
Hahaha! Tonight we dine
as champions of the steppe!

source:
The steppe is no
place for the weak!
target:
The steppe is no
place for the weak!

source:
The bandits will tell others
of this battle, and they will
be drawn to the promise of
blood and plunder. We move!
target:
The bandits will tell others
of this battle, and they will
be drawn to the promise of
blood and plunder. We move!

source:
There! A lone warrior...and
a mammoth!
target:
There! A lone warrior...and
a mammoth!

source:
Then she will not survive.
That is the way of the steppe.
target:
Then she will not survive.
That is the way of the steppe.

source: No! We cannot just leave her!
target: No! We cannot just leave her!

source:
The steppe is full of enemies.
This is why we must embrace
newfound friends.
target:
The steppe is full of enemies.
This is why we must embrace
newfound friends.

source: There is little life left in her.
target: There is little life left in her.

source:
She was a fool to
walk the steppe alone.
target:
She was a fool to
walk the steppe alone.

source:
That's no reason to leave
her to die, Anarba!
target:
That's no reason to leave
her to die, Anarba!

source:
We shall make camp here
and decide as a tribe how
we are to proceed.
target:
We shall make camp here
and decide as a tribe how
we are to proceed.

source:
I will see to the
stranger's wounds.
target:
I will see to the
stranger's wounds.

source:
Won't eat, you say?
That <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> odd...
target:
Won't eat, you say?
That <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> odd...

source:
It might be they
sense something amiss.
target:
It might be they
sense something amiss.

source:
You stay here while I see
if I cannot discover the
reason for their disquiet.
target:
You stay here while I see
if I cannot discover the
reason for their disquiet.

source:
That horse... It doesn't
appear to be one of ours.
target:
That horse... It doesn't
appear to be one of ours.

source:
You look hungry. Come with
me. Altani will see you fed
and watered.
target:
You look hungry. Come with
me. Altani will see you fed
and watered.

source:
I have you and your tribe
to thank for that.
target:
I have you and your tribe
to thank for that.

source:
My apologies. I was just so─
I am Gurbesu of the Goro.
target:
My apologies. I was just so─
I am Gurbesu of the Goro.

source:
My tribe's food tents were
destroyed in a Matanga raid.
target:
My tribe's food tents were
destroyed in a Matanga raid.

source:
I went hunting to replenish
our supplies and in my
desperation─
target:
I went hunting to replenish
our supplies and in my
desperation─

source:
If you had not intervened...
My life, I owe to your
people.
target:
If you had not intervened...
My life, I owe to your
people.

source:
What of the rest
of your tribe?
target:
What of the rest
of your tribe?

source:
I do not know. We lost many
in the raid, and if the Matanga
attacked again while I was
hunting...
target:
I do not know. We lost many
in the raid, and if the Matanga
attacked again while I was
hunting...

source:
Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!
target:
Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!

source:
They were no match
for our courage.
target:
They were no match
for our courage.

source:
The Matanga...
They were here for me.
target:
The Matanga...
They were here for me.

source:
I am the cause
of this destruction.
target:
I am the cause
of this destruction.

source:
Nonsense! You shared our
water, our fire. You stood
at our side in battle.
target:
Nonsense! You shared our
water, our fire. You stood
at our side in battle.

source:
What will you do now,
Gurbesu of the Goro?
target:
What will you do now,
Gurbesu of the Goro?

source: The only thing I can─search for my tribe.
target: The only thing I can─search for my tribe.

source: Then we will search with you.
target: Then we will search with you.

source:
You are one of us now, and
we would not allow a sister
to walk the steppe alone.
target:
You are one of us now, and
we would not allow a sister
to walk the steppe alone.

source: I... I don't know what to say...
target: I... I don't know what to say...

source:
Then say nothing.
It is already decided.
target:
Then say nothing.
It is already decided.

source:
We ride, my people!
But keep your weapons
at the ready! All eyes ahead!
target:
We ride, my people!
But keep your weapons
at the ready! All eyes ahead!

source:
The Matanga have returned...
and this time in numbers.
target:
The Matanga have returned...
and this time in numbers.

source:
Something is wrong. That was
too organized for a retreat...
target:
Something is wrong. That was
too organized for a retreat...

source:
Then let us rest
while we can.
target:
Then let us rest
while we can.

source:
Gurbesu. You say that
beyond lies the location
of your tribe's last camp?
target:
Gurbesu. You say that
beyond lies the location
of your tribe's last camp?

source:
Yes, Khan. While I expect it
to be abandoned, perhaps
we will find some clue as
to which direction they fled.
target:
Yes, Khan. While I expect it
to be abandoned, perhaps
we will find some clue as
to which direction they fled.

source: We should be nearing it now.
target: We should be nearing it now.

source:
It appears your tribe did not
leave...nor did the Matanga!
target:
It appears your tribe did not
leave...nor did the Matanga!

source:
Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!
target:
Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!

source:
Death come, Au Ra!
Death come!
target:
Death come, Au Ra!
Death come!

source:
My brothers! My sisters!
You are safe!
target:
My brothers! My sisters!
You are safe!

source:
As are you and Bayan.
This is good.
target:
As are you and Bayan.
This is good.

source: But you do not come alone.
target: But you do not come alone.

source:
Why would the Dataq lift
their spears for the Goro?
target:
Why would the Dataq lift
their spears for the Goro?

source:
We would lift them for
Gurbesu, so we would
lift them for you.
target:
We would lift them for
Gurbesu, so we would
lift them for you.

source:
Death to Au Ra!
Death to trunkless!
target:
Death to Au Ra!
Death to trunkless!

source:
Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!
target:
Blood to earth!
Blood to earth!

source:
There is no Dataq and no
Goro. Only sisters and
brothers of the steppe!
target:
There is no Dataq and no
Goro. Only sisters and
brothers of the steppe!

source:
Anjana come!
Give blood to earth!
target:
Anjana come!
Give blood to earth!

source:
They break! Now the
slaughter begins!
target:
They break! Now the
slaughter begins!

source:
Anarba! Is it not enough
that the day is ours?
target:
Anarba! Is it not enough
that the day is ours?

source:
Khan is right, Anarba. No
more blood need be spilled
this day.
target:
Khan is right, Anarba. No
more blood need be spilled
this day.

source:
Let us see to the wounded
then leave this cursed place.
target:
Let us see to the wounded
then leave this cursed place.

source:
Brothers and sisters of the
Dataq, we are forever in
your debt.
target:
Brothers and sisters of the
Dataq, we are forever in
your debt.

source:
The song of your tribe's
bravery will be sung at
our fires for generations
to come.
target:
The song of your tribe's
bravery will be sung at
our fires for generations
to come.

source:
As they will at ours,
brave Goro. Until we
meet again.
target:
As they will at ours,
brave Goro. Until we
meet again.

source:
Dataq! To your mounts.
We ride!
target:
Dataq! To your mounts.
We ride!

source:
The more mercy you show, the less you'll receive from me!
Now, BEGIN!
target:
The more mercy you show, the less you'll receive from me!
Now, BEGIN!

source:
Guerrilla tactics, shield
walls─neither'll save my
men from the cannons of
an imperial reaper.
target:
Guerrilla tactics, shield
walls─neither'll save my
men from the cannons of
an imperial reaper.

source:
No... What they need is
something unpredictable.
Something volatile...
target:
No... What they need is
something unpredictable.
Something volatile...

source:
There is only one rule on
the front lines: don't break.
Break and you're dea─
target:
There is only one rule on
the front lines: don't break.
Break and you're dea─

source:
A parry that slow
will be your last!
target:
A parry that slow
will be your last!

source: How long do we have to wait?
target: How long do we have to wait?

source:
They promise us a mock
battle, but give us lectures.
target:
They promise us a mock
battle, but give us lectures.

source:
Hahaha! I haven't been so
frightened for my life since
<var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> was a recruit!
target:
Hahaha! I haven't been so
frightened for my life since
<var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> was a recruit!

source:
Do you think they've
had enough?
target:
Do you think they've
had enough?

source:
Enough? When I was their
age I broke my fast on
heroes of the realm!
target:
Enough? When I was their
age I broke my fast on
heroes of the realm!

source:
But that doesn't mean I'm
letting them off easy!
target:
But that doesn't mean I'm
letting them off easy!

source:
Fools! Beaten by your
own meaten!
target:
Fools! Beaten by your
own meaten!

source:
That is why always you
are hungering!
target:
That is why always you
are hungering!

source:
How did they
get behind us!?
target:
How did they
get behind us!?

source:
The village is
not much further!
target:
The village is
not much further!

source:
Thank you, traveler. My
tribe will see me safe now.
target:
Thank you, traveler. My
tribe will see me safe now.

source: There is nowhere to run, boy!
target: There is nowhere to run, boy!

source:
Your tribe will not have
you back now!
target:
Your tribe will not have
you back now!

source: One of us! One of us!
target: One of us! One of us!

source:
Were you going to call
in reinforcements?
target:
Were you going to call
in reinforcements?

source:
<sigh> Another night in
the stables, I reckon.
target:
<sigh> Another night in
the stables, I reckon.

source:
Neutralize the enemy's capacity to heal its wounded.
Standard battle tactics.
target:
Neutralize the enemy's capacity to heal its wounded.
Standard battle tactics.

source: And then there was one─one with the strength of ten!
target: And then there was one─one with the strength of ten!

source: I wasn't in best form today...
target: I wasn't in best form today...

source: You needn't have pulled your punches...but this act of <var 1A 02 /var>clemence<var 1A 01 /var> is certain to cheer the men's spirits. <wink>
target: You needn't have pulled your punches...but this act of <var 1A 02 /var>clemence<var 1A 01 /var> is certain to cheer the men's spirits. <wink>

source:
Not all our men are as green
as the recruits!
target:
Not all our men are as green
as the recruits!

source:
If <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> underestimated us,
perhaps the Empire will, too!
target:
If <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> underestimated us,
perhaps the Empire will, too!

source: Much was to be had from the day's exercises.
target: Much was to be had from the day's exercises.

source: May they see us─may they see <var 1A 02 /var>Eorzea<var 1A 01 /var> to victory!
target: May they see us─may they see <var 1A 02 /var>Eorzea<var 1A 01 /var> to victory!

source: My instruments are picking something up!
target: My instruments are picking something up!

source:
It was an honor to exchange
blows with you this day.
target:
It was an honor to exchange
blows with you this day.

source:
Of course, emerging victorious
didn't hurt, either. Gah hah hah!
target:
Of course, emerging victorious
didn't hurt, either. Gah hah hah!

source:
Time to check the nets
I laid last night.
target:
Time to check the nets
I laid last night.

source:
Flying sharks!? This far
from the Tide!?
target:
Flying sharks!? This far
from the Tide!?

source:
My nets torn and my catch
devoured! What am I to do!?
target:
My nets torn and my catch
devoured! What am I to do!?

source:
Now I'll have to find a new
place farther up river!
target:
Now I'll have to find a new
place farther up river!

source:
The waters no longer boil.
The sharks have returned
to the Tide.
target:
The waters no longer boil.
The sharks have returned
to the Tide.

source:
Now to see if there is aught
remaining of my ne─
target:
Now to see if there is aught
remaining of my ne─

source:
Hells take me! It's a...a...
giant <var 1A 02 /var>weasel<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
Hells take me! It's a...a...
giant <var 1A 02 /var>weasel<var 1A 01 /var>!

source:
What have I done
to deserve this!?
target:
What have I done
to deserve this!?

source: It is! The weasel is dead!
target: It is! The weasel is dead!

source:
Wait... Flying sharks and giant
weasels? My wife is never
going to believe me!
target:
Wait... Flying sharks and giant
weasels? My wife is never
going to believe me!

source: I need to catch some fish...now!
target: I need to catch some fish...now!

source:
How am I going to explain
this to my wife? I'm doomed...
target:
How am I going to explain
this to my wife? I'm doomed...

source:
What are we going to do?
What are we going to do!?
target:
What are we going to do?
What are we going to do!?

source:
Is this enough? I suppose it's
enough... But what if it's not
enough? What if old nan dies
because we didn't have that
<var 1A 02 /var>one last seedling<var 1A 01 /var>!
target:
Is this enough? I suppose it's
enough... But what if it's not
enough? What if old nan dies
because we didn't have that
<var 1A 02 /var>one last seedling<var 1A 01 /var>!

source:
Thank the stars
we will not starve!
target:
Thank the stars
we will not starve!

source:
We're doomed... The Empire
will take what little we have
and leave us to starve!
target:
We're doomed... The Empire
will take what little we have
and leave us to starve!

source:
Four here... Six there...
They're everywhere!
target:
Four here... Six there...
They're everywhere!

source:
If all these eggs
were to hatch...
target:
If all these eggs
were to hatch...

source:
You have already brought
me so many, I couldn't think
of asking you to bring more...
unless you wanted to, that is.
target:
You have already brought
me so many, I couldn't think
of asking you to bring more...
unless you wanted to, that is.

source:
The village thanks you...
as does my belly!
target:
The village thanks you...
as does my belly!

source:
I must warn
the other villagers...
target:
I must warn
the other villagers...

source:
It can't be...!
It was just a story!
target:
It can't be...!
It was just a story!

source:
This is the place
the villagers spoke of.
target:
This is the place
the villagers spoke of.

source:
From here emerges the evil
spirit that haunts their fields.
target:
From here emerges the evil
spirit that haunts their fields.

source: It is here I will find my quarry!
target: It is here I will find my quarry!

source:
Shall I wait,
or shall I attack?
target:
Shall I wait,
or shall I attack?

source:
Can you feel it?
The creature approaches!
target:
Can you feel it?
The creature approaches!

source:
What foul plot requires
this many servants!?
target:
What foul plot requires
this many servants!?

source:
I will not be
defeated so easily!
target:
I will not be
defeated so easily!

source: Come! I do not fear death!
target: Come! I do not fear death!

source:
I may have
failed the village...
target:
I may have
failed the village...

source:
But this land has not seen
the last of Senban Oneblade!
target:
But this land has not seen
the last of Senban Oneblade!

source:
The onmyoji's henchmen will
trouble the villagers no longer.
target:
The onmyoji's henchmen will
trouble the villagers no longer.

source:
Yet I fear his work
is far from complete.
target:
Yet I fear his work
is far from complete.

source:
He plots something most
treacherous, and I will not
rest until he has been silenced!
target:
He plots something most
treacherous, and I will not
rest until he has been silenced!

source:
A plump pack you have
there traveler! Oh, so plump!
target:
A plump pack you have
there traveler! Oh, so plump!

source:
Don't eat me! I'm fugu!
Aaaaaack!
target:
Don't eat me! I'm fugu!
Aaaaaack!

source:
Gouge <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> eyes!
Cut out <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tongue!
target:
Gouge <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> eyes!
Cut out <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> tongue!

source:
None who bear witness
shall be suffered to live!
target:
None who bear witness
shall be suffered to live!

source:
You have not seen
the last of us, meddler!
target:
You have not seen
the last of us, meddler!

source:
What funny hats...
Maybe they'll let me have one.
target:
What funny hats...
Maybe they'll let me have one.

source:
Gaei out battling
injustice again, eh?
target:
Gaei out battling
injustice again, eh?

source:
Looks as if both
sides are Lupin.
target:
Looks as if both
sides are Lupin.

source:
You know how Gaei gets
about trading blows with
his brothers.
target:
You know how Gaei gets
about trading blows with
his brothers.

source:
You're free to do what you
please, my friend. I'll stay here.
target:
You're free to do what you
please, my friend. I'll stay here.

source: Argh! That smarts...! What are these... Arrows?
target: Argh! That smarts...! What are these... Arrows?

source:
Uh... We can still discuss
this like civil wolves!
target:
Uh... We can still discuss
this like civil wolves!

source:
We've enough to worry about
here without those shellbacks.
target:
We've enough to worry about
here without those shellbacks.

source:
Let this one live, and another
hundred will be on the shores
by new moon.
target:
Let this one live, and another
hundred will be on the shores
by new moon.

source:
Victory is sweetest when
won with a straight heart!
target:
Victory is sweetest when
won with a straight heart!

source:
None can withstand the
might of Yojimbo! Hahahah!
target:
None can withstand the
might of Yojimbo! Hahahah!

source: You have a feel for the blade.
target: You have a feel for the blade.

source:
They won't make
me one of them!
target:
They won't make
me one of them!

source: We came for the treasure! Yes, yes! Where is it?
target: We came for the treasure! Yes, yes! Where is it?

source: It is mine! Everything here─it is all mine!
target: It is mine! Everything here─it is all mine!

source: To go left or to go right? That is the question...
target: To go left or to go right? That is the question...

source: Show no mercy to any who stand in our way!
target: Show no mercy to any who stand in our way!

source: You want to fight? Yes, yes! Well, it is a fight you will get!
target: You want to fight? Yes, yes! Well, it is a fight you will get!

source: Aaargh! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> got me─right in the gut!
target: Aaargh! <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> got me─right in the gut!

source: The best fighters know when to stay and when to flee! Ghahaha! You shan't catch me!
target: The best fighters know when to stay and when to flee! Ghahaha! You shan't catch me!

source:
I'm never leaving
my bed again!
target:
I'm never leaving
my bed again!

source:
Was it truly Tsurubebi...
or something else...?
target:
Was it truly Tsurubebi...
or something else...?

source:
No. Don't tell me.
I don't want to know.
target:
No. Don't tell me.
I don't want to know.

source:
I'm never leaving
my bed again!
target:
I'm never leaving
my bed again!

source:
Those are mine!
Mine! Mine! Mine!
target:
Those are mine!
Mine! Mine! Mine!

source: Hit him in the head! The head!
target: Hit him in the head! The head!

source:
Those are mine!
Mine! Mine! Mine!
target:
Those are mine!
Mine! Mine! Mine!

source:
Right to the whiskers!
The whiskers!
target:
Right to the whiskers!
The whiskers!

source: Pick the pack! Pick the pack!
target: Pick the pack! Pick the pack!

source:
Keep your plump pack!
Keep it! Keep it!
target:
Keep your plump pack!
Keep it! Keep it!

source:
Might I suggest a strategic,
yet not at all shameful retreat?
target:
Might I suggest a strategic,
yet not at all shameful retreat?

source:
They'll think twice before
coming back...won't they?
target:
They'll think twice before
coming back...won't they?

source:
Kindest of kindly strangers!
Mimiroon is most grateful
for such kind kindness!
target:
Kindest of kindly strangers!
Mimiroon is most grateful
for such kind kindness!

source:
You will protect me, then?
Twelve be praised!
target:
You will protect me, then?
Twelve be praised!

source:
Rats as those deserve
no mercy! Not a damn whit!
target:
Rats as those deserve
no mercy! Not a damn whit!

source:
Spoken like a
true fellow warrior!
target:
Spoken like a
true fellow warrior!

source: My life is in your hands!
target: My life is in your hands!

source: I have <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>! I have <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!
target: I have <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>! I have <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>!

source: My legs are about to give out.
target: My legs are about to give out.

source: Maybe I should have brought my sword...
target: Maybe I should have brought my sword...

source: I cannot carry on much longer...
target: I cannot carry on much longer...

source: So this is the Isle of Endless Summer. Beautiful.
target: So this is the Isle of Endless Summer. Beautiful.

source: Oh me, oh my, look at all these lovely little things out today. And they're all just my type.
target: Oh me, oh my, look at all these lovely little things out today. And they're all just my type.

source: What was that? I could have sworn I heard something.
target: What was that? I could have sworn I heard something.

source: Hey, ladies! Care to come have a romp with me?
target: Hey, ladies! Care to come have a romp with me?

source: Don't be shy, now. There's no use running away!
target: Don't be shy, now. There's no use running away!

source: A talking octopus!? Is this some new voidsent!?
target: A talking octopus!? Is this some new voidsent!?

source: Ugh, all those muscles. You're not my type!
target: Ugh, all those muscles. You're not my type!

source: I may be just an octopus, but I'll not lose to the likes of you!
target: I may be just an octopus, but I'll not lose to the likes of you!

source: This is not looking good... Oh no, I forgot to call Master Typhon.
target: This is not looking good... Oh no, I forgot to call Master Typhon.

source: I yield, I yield! I just wanted...to enjoy the faire...like everyone else.
target: I yield, I yield! I just wanted...to enjoy the faire...like everyone else.

source: I find that hard to believe.
target: I find that hard to believe.

source: I promise I'll be good. I swear!
target: I promise I'll be good. I swear!

source: Do you? Step out of line again, and you won't get off so easy.
target: Do you? Step out of line again, and you won't get off so easy.

source: Gwee-hee-hee. I promise, I promise. An octopus always keeps his word.
target: Gwee-hee-hee. I promise, I promise. An octopus always keeps his word.

source: Mwa ha ha! Just my type!
target: Mwa ha ha! Just my type!

source: I can't be bothered with this anymore!
target: I can't be bothered with this anymore!

source: Gwee-hee-hee! Where are all the laaadies!?
target: Gwee-hee-hee! Where are all the laaadies!?

source: The big ones are biting! Need any bait?
target: The big ones are biting! Need any bait?

source: Could you stand to part with one of those?
target: Could you stand to part with one of those?

source: Trying to make off without paying? Get back here, you bastard!
target: Trying to make off without paying? Get back here, you bastard!

source: You looking to get yourself hurt?
target: You looking to get yourself hurt?

source: Bah, damned faire chaperones. Come on!
target: Bah, damned faire chaperones. Come on!

source: I'm leaving this fight to you!
target: I'm leaving this fight to you!

source: Go back to your damn faire!
target: Go back to your damn faire!

source: These bastards are strong... Retreat! Retreat!
target: These bastards are strong... Retreat! Retreat!

source: Serves you right for not minding your business. Come on, after that fisherman!
target: Serves you right for not minding your business. Come on, after that fisherman!

source: Ugh... It's no use. We have to fall back.
target: Ugh... It's no use. We have to fall back.

source: All that's left is to deliver these fish.
target: All that's left is to deliver these fish.

source: Snippers! Why did it have to be snippers!?
target: Snippers! Why did it have to be snippers!?

source: Thanks. You saved me, and my fish.
target: Thanks. You saved me, and my fish.

source: No! My fish... My beautiful fish...
target: No! My fish... My beautiful fish...

source: Gods be good... Look at all this rubbish!
target: Gods be good... Look at all this rubbish!

source: Thank you! You've made the beach beautiful again!
target: Thank you! You've made the beach beautiful again!

source: It's no good. There's still too much rubbish. We may need more hands.
target: It's no good. There's still too much rubbish. We may need more hands.

source: Bring me your rubbish! Every last bit you can find!
target: Bring me your rubbish! Every last bit you can find!

source: Gather your rubbish! I'll collect it!
target: Gather your rubbish! I'll collect it!

source: Thanks for the help. I think our work here is done.
target: Thanks for the help. I think our work here is done.

source: If you still have rubbish, I'll take it off your hands!
target: If you still have rubbish, I'll take it off your hands!

source: A <var 08 E4E80202 ((promising)) ((plain)) /var> <var 28 ((Treasure)) E80401 /var> is discovered upon defeating <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>!
target: A <var 08 E4E80202 ((promising)) ((plain)) /var> <var 28 ((Treasure)) E80401 /var> is discovered upon defeating <var 31 ((BNpcName)) 03E8030202 /var>!

source: You still wish to fight? My sword is only too happy to oblige!
target: You still wish to fight? My sword is only too happy to oblige!

source: The world has no place for such wretches.
target: The world has no place for such wretches.

source: Your claim to life is forfeit!
target: Your claim to life is forfeit!

source: Death is too light a punishment for your ilk!
target: Death is too light a punishment for your ilk!

source:
O hallowed moon,
shine you the iron path!
target:
O hallowed moon,
shine you the iron path!

source:
O hallowed moon,
take fire and scorch my foes!
target:
O hallowed moon,
take fire and scorch my foes!

source:
Blazing path,
lead me to iron rule!
target:
Blazing path,
lead me to iron rule!

source:
From on high I descend,
the iron path to walk!
target:
From on high I descend,
the iron path to walk!

source:
From on high I descend,
the hallowed moon to call!
target:
From on high I descend,
the hallowed moon to call!

source:
Fleeting light!
Amid a rain of stars,
exalt you the red moon!
target:
Fleeting light!
Amid a rain of stars,
exalt you the red moon!

source:
Fleeting light!
'Neath the red moon,
scorch you the earth!
target:
Fleeting light!
'Neath the red moon,
scorch you the earth!

source:
From on high I descend,
the moon and stars to bring!
target:
From on high I descend,
the moon and stars to bring!

source:
From hallowed moon I descend,
a rain of stars to bring!
target:
From hallowed moon I descend,
a rain of stars to bring!

source:
Unbending iron,
take fire and descend!
target:
Unbending iron,
take fire and descend!

source:
Unbending iron,
descend with fiery edge!
target:
Unbending iron,
descend with fiery edge!

source:
From hallowed moon I descend,
upon burning earth to tread!
target:
From hallowed moon I descend,
upon burning earth to tread!

source:
From hallowed moon I bare iron,
in my descent to wield!
target:
From hallowed moon I bare iron,
in my descent to wield!

source: I smell woodsmoke. There was a battle here.
target: I smell woodsmoke. There was a battle here.

source: No wonder there's a desert above. All the water's down here!
target: No wonder there's a desert above. All the water's down here!

source: That's not Dalmascan he's speaking. Could it be High Ivalician?
target: That's not Dalmascan he's speaking. Could it be High Ivalician?

source: You understood him...? Right! The Echo!
target: You understood him...? Right! The Echo!

source: You ain't supposed to be here!
target: You ain't supposed to be here!

source: Grab all you can carry, brothers!
target: Grab all you can carry, brothers!

source: We got no choice but to kill 'em!
target: We got no choice but to kill 'em!

source:
Mother. Father.
I come to you now...
target:
Mother. Father.
I come to you now...

source:
Theodoric...
The Hells burn for you...
target:
Theodoric...
The Hells burn for you...

source:
Now! While Fordola's
taking the brunt of it...
target:
Now! While Fordola's
taking the brunt of it...

source: I'll not lose to the likes of this...
target: I'll not lose to the likes of this...

source:
Walked into a trap,
have we?
target:
Walked into a trap,
have we?

source: It's like a gold mine...without the mine!
target: It's like a gold mine...without the mine!

source: I's never before seen so much riches.
target: I's never before seen so much riches.

source: Three ways, brothers. Just as we agreed upon.
target: Three ways, brothers. Just as we agreed upon.

source: The pounding takes place just over yonder.
target: The pounding takes place just over yonder.

source: Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we must have that mochi!
target: Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, we must have that mochi!

source: Take care to avoid the cyclops's mallet.
target: Take care to avoid the cyclops's mallet.

source: There can be no celebration without that mochi.
target: There can be no celebration without that mochi.

source: Yes, that should more than suffice. Well done, my friend!
target: Yes, that should more than suffice. Well done, my friend!

source: Our mochi... What will become of the festival now?
target: Our mochi... What will become of the festival now?

source: What say ye just let us be, eh?
target: What say ye just let us be, eh?

source: Only death will you find here! Only death!
target: Only death will you find here! Only death!

source: The Red will rue this day!
target: The Red will rue this day!

source: May the blessings of the kami grant you strength.
target: May the blessings of the kami grant you strength.

source: I will rend you limb from limb!
target: I will rend you limb from limb!

source:
Where did she─?
Stay on your guard!
target:
Where did she─?
Stay on your guard!

source: May the kami keep you safe.
target: May the kami keep you safe.

source:
The Red will think twice
before challenging us again.
target:
The Red will think twice
before challenging us again.

source: The kami's blessing will protect you.
target: The kami's blessing will protect you.

source:
Waters to strip
flesh from bone!
target:
Waters to strip
flesh from bone!

source:
Waters to burst
and drag below!
target:
Waters to burst
and drag below!

source:
Don't worry Azami.
I won't let them hurt you.
target:
Don't worry Azami.
I won't let them hurt you.

source:
You refuse?
Then slake the land's thirst with a storm of blood!
target:
You refuse?
Then slake the land's thirst with a storm of blood!

source: Yes, hold your heads high... My gales will sever them before long.
target: Yes, hold your heads high... My gales will sever them before long.

source: Defy me not, for I am your lord! I am your god! I am Pazuzu!
target: Defy me not, for I am your lord! I am your god! I am Pazuzu!

source: I witness this windswept land, and claim it my own.
target: I witness this windswept land, and claim it my own.

source: This land, and the rabble who walk upon it!
target: This land, and the rabble who walk upon it!

source: Lay down your arms and rejoice before your lord!
target: Lay down your arms and rejoice before your lord!

source: Get away from her, you bitch!
target: Get away from her, you bitch!

source: Now, now. Be a good meal and lie still.
target: Now, now. Be a good meal and lie still.

source:
Is this...<var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> blood? Why is it not <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> blood!
Your blood, your bloodyourbloodyourBLOOOOOOD!
target:
Is this...<var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> blood? Why is it not <var 1A 02 /var>your<var 1A 01 /var> blood!
Your blood, your bloodyourbloodyourBLOOOOOOD!

source: My, what a tantalizingly pure soul you have!
target: My, what a tantalizingly pure soul you have!

source: And you've come all this way to offer it to me.
target: And you've come all this way to offer it to me.

source: I can hardly wait...so I shan't. Let the feast begin!
target: I can hardly wait...so I shan't. Let the feast begin!

source: Your bravery will not be forgotten.
target: Your bravery will not be forgotten.

source:
I hate fighting so I
better let you pass!
target:
I hate fighting so I
better let you pass!

source:
I have more lives
than I do arms!
target:
I have more lives
than I do arms!

source: Have no fear! The power of love is on our side!
target: Have no fear! The power of love is on our side!

source: Ignore me, these creatures do. But why...?
target: Ignore me, these creatures do. But why...?

source:
Squawk! Squawk! How is this possible!?
Strongly resembles the Ixal, this feathered one does.
target:
Squawk! Squawk! How is this possible!?
Strongly resembles the Ixal, this feathered one does.

source: Those creatures... Mistake me for this, I fear.
target: Those creatures... Mistake me for this, I fear.

source:
You go on ahead, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
I'll, uh...wait here.
target:
You go on ahead, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
I'll, uh...wait here.

source:
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank the Twelve you're okay.
What say we get out of here, eh?
target:
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Thank the Twelve you're okay.
What say we get out of here, eh?

source: Why mussst you be ssso blind?
target: Why mussst you be ssso blind?

source: Time for me to prove myssself!
target: Time for me to prove myssself!

source: It'll all be for nothing if you get yourself killed!
target: It'll all be for nothing if you get yourself killed!

source: Don't blame me if you wind up dead!
target: Don't blame me if you wind up dead!

source: You've bitten off more than you can chew!
target: You've bitten off more than you can chew!

source:
Behold the strength of a nunh!
Future nunh, anyway...
target:
Behold the strength of a nunh!
Future nunh, anyway...

source: It'll take more than that to stop me!
target: It'll take more than that to stop me!

source: I'd rather be reading a book...
target: I'd rather be reading a book...

source: Does anyone fancy taking a break?
target: Does anyone fancy taking a break?

source:
Look upon me!
Behold the divine!
target:
Look upon me!
Behold the divine!

source: You turn your back on terror?
target: You turn your back on terror?

source: You dare lock eyes with fear?
target: You dare lock eyes with fear?

source:
A portrayal of fire!
Your world in flames!
target:
A portrayal of fire!
Your world in flames!

source:
A portrayal of wind!
A shrieking gale!
target:
A portrayal of wind!
A shrieking gale!

source:
A portrayal of water!
All is drowned!
target:
A portrayal of water!
All is drowned!

source:
A portrayal of earth!
The ground shall shudder!
target:
A portrayal of earth!
The ground shall shudder!

source:
Whither goes the wind,
Her dance unseen by thee?♪
target:
Whither goes the wind,
Her dance unseen by thee?♪

source:
Bearing seeds afar,
Breeze knows no boundary.♪
target:
Bearing seeds afar,
Breeze knows no boundary.♪

source:
To those blessed with life,
Her boon is but to be.♪
target:
To those blessed with life,
Her boon is but to be.♪

source:
I am Siegfried, the greatest
swordsman in all the world!
target:
I am Siegfried, the greatest
swordsman in all the world!

source:
You should have fled!
Now feel my wrath!
target:
You should have fled!
Now feel my wrath!

source: Alright, everyone. Are you ready for some fun?
target: Alright, everyone. Are you ready for some fun?

source: I hope you have your red lights ready. Tee hee hee.
target: I hope you have your red lights ready. Tee hee hee.

source: Thank you all so much for coming.
target: Thank you all so much for coming.

source: Let's make this a Little Ladies' Day to remember, with plenty of <var 1A 02 /var>yellow<var 1A 01 /var> lights, if you please.
target: Let's make this a Little Ladies' Day to remember, with plenty of <var 1A 02 /var>yellow<var 1A 01 /var> lights, if you please.

source: Quite a large crowd today, isn't it girls?
target: Quite a large crowd today, isn't it girls?

source: Should make for quite the sight with all of their blue lights, am I right?
target: Should make for quite the sight with all of their blue lights, am I right?

source:
That's all for now.
But we'll be back!
target:
That's all for now.
But we'll be back!

source: You were all fantastic. Thank you!
target: You were all fantastic. Thank you!

source: I can hardly wait for the next show.
target: I can hardly wait for the next show.

source:
Ugh, all those muscles.
You're not my type!
target:
Ugh, all those muscles.
You're not my type!

source:
One last test...
This should help
wrap things up.
target:
One last test...
This should help
wrap things up.

source: I will cassst your ashes to the wind!
target: I will cassst your ashes to the wind!

source: Good day, fine sirs, how may I be of service?
target: Good day, fine sirs, how may I be of service?

source:
The beach is clear.
Just the ones here now!
target:
The beach is clear.
Just the ones here now!

source:
Just a puff or two
before we go on!
target:
Just a puff or two
before we go on!

source: I'll grind you under my heel!
target: I'll grind you under my heel!

source:
Widow of Sashihai...
Witch of Doma!
target:
Widow of Sashihai...
Witch of Doma!

source:
Your fall from grace is
long overdue, savage!
target:
Your fall from grace is
long overdue, savage!

source:
Artful wiles won't
save you now!
target:
Artful wiles won't
save you now!

source:
Worthless, I say.
Might as well be dead!
target:
Worthless, I say.
Might as well be dead!

source:
Just the sight of
your face sickens me!
target:
Just the sight of
your face sickens me!

source: I should have been the one!
target: I should have been the one!

source:
Asahi...
You, more than any other...
target:
Asahi...
You, more than any other...

source: How did it come to this?
target: How did it come to this?

source: Keep as still as you can!
target: Keep as still as you can!

source:
Desertion is punishable
by death! <var 1A 02 /var>My<var 1A 01 /var> death!
target:
Desertion is punishable
by death! <var 1A 02 /var>My<var 1A 01 /var> death!

source: I hope I live to regret this...
target: Надеюсь, я буду жить и жалеть об этом...

source: Why did <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> have to run!?
target: Why did <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> have to run!?

source: I see you, and the darkness that awaits...
target: I see you, and the darkness that awaits...

source: Very well. Enough of this guise. I shall suffer thee no longer!
target: Very well. Enough of this guise. I shall suffer thee no longer!

source: Thou shalt repent, and kneel before me!
target: Thou shalt repent, and kneel before me!

source: A blizzard of aether? What a peculiar land.
target: A blizzard of aether? What a peculiar land.

source: Or should I say battlefield? For that I am here can only mean...
target: Or should I say battlefield? For that I am here can only mean...

source: ...you are a foe worthy of testing!
target: ...you are a foe worthy of testing!

source: No going b-b-back now, I suppose?
target: No going b-b-back now, I suppose?

source: You think we're high enough yet?
target: You think we're high enough yet?

source: Well, aren't those simply appalling, kupo!
target: Well, aren't those simply appalling, kupo!

source: The brave do not fear the grave.
target: The brave do not fear the grave.

source: You're looking a bit worse for wear!
target: You're looking a bit worse for wear!

source: Hm. You have some measure of strength, at least.
target: Hm. You have some measure of strength, at least.

source: A pity you will soon be but rime on my blades!
target: A pity you will soon be but rime on my blades!

source:
This should cut you
down to size!
target:
This should cut you
down to size!

source:
Uh-oh! Someone just
woke the dragon...
target:
Uh-oh! Someone just
woke the dragon...

source:
Not the <var 1A 02 /var>strongest<var 1A 01 /var> of swords,
but it should suffice.
target:
Not the <var 1A 02 /var>strongest<var 1A 01 /var> of swords,
but it should suffice.

source:
Behold, the sword art
of legend─Zanmato!
target:
Behold, the sword art
of legend─Zanmato!

source:
The seas part for
Gilgamesh alone!
target:
The seas part for
Gilgamesh alone!

source:
Reevaluating combat efficacy.
Initiating self-destruct mechanism...
target:
Reevaluating combat efficacy.
Initiating self-destruct mechanism...

source: The training will soon commence. Stand by until all participants are present.
target: The training will soon commence. Stand by until all participants are present.

source: Steel yourselves! The Calamity is upon us!
target: Steel yourselves! The Calamity is upon us!

source: First, make haste for the Gate of Nald! The Garleans have broken through!
target: First, make haste for the Gate of Nald! The Garleans have broken through!

source: Join your strength and meet the enemy as one!
target: Join your strength and meet the enemy as one!

source: What's the matter? Is that the best you can do?
target: What's the matter? Is that the best you can do?

source: Remember what it is you are fighting to protect!
target: Remember what it is you are fighting to protect!

source: Hurry to the aetheryte plaza, and keep your wits about you! A colossal fiend has appeared!
target: Hurry to the aetheryte plaza, and keep your wits about you! A colossal fiend has appeared!

source: That concludes the training! Well fought, one and all!
target: That concludes the training! Well fought, one and all!

source: The final foe comes! Vanquish the enormous voidsent and see Ul'dah saved!
target: The final foe comes! Vanquish the enormous voidsent and see Ul'dah saved!

source: This is for your own good!
target: This is for your own good!

source: Let me help, kupo! A little moogle magic for one!
target: Let me help, kupo! A little moogle magic for one!

source: Whoever the lucky person is─make it count, kupo!
target: Whoever the lucky person is─make it count, kupo!

source:
<var 60 0234 /var>Entries for the special limited-time event are now closed.
We look forward to your participation in events to come!
target:
<var 60 0234 /var>Entries for the special limited-time event are now closed.
We look forward to your participation in events to come!

source: You've come for treasure, yes? Then treasure you shall have!
target: You've come for treasure, yes? Then treasure you shall have!

source: To the Gate of the Sultana! Dread fiends and voidsent have appeared!
target: To the Gate of the Sultana! Dread fiends and voidsent have appeared!

source: Make for the aetheryte plaza! A massive morbol is on a rampage!
target: Make for the aetheryte plaza! A massive morbol is on a rampage!

source: Those who wish to continue fighting, gather to me. The next session will soon commence.
target: Those who wish to continue fighting, gather to me. The next session will soon commence.

source: Are there no heroes here to bare their blades against me?
target: Are there no heroes here to bare their blades against me?

source: Do you all cling to your little lives so?
target: Do you all cling to your little lives so?

source: I will help you find freedom in a fight to the death!
target: I will help you find freedom in a fight to the death!

source: You are not yet ash? Impressive.
target: You are not yet ash? Impressive.

source: Worthy warriors all, I see. No doubt you have dealt many a glorious death.
target: Worthy warriors all, I see. No doubt you have dealt many a glorious death.

source: I honor you with this battlefield─here shall our souls burn bright!
target: I honor you with this battlefield─here shall our souls burn bright!

source: Our land lives, its laughter a fiery red.♪
target: Our land lives, its laughter a fiery red.♪

source: A burning being, a blaze at its heart.♪
target: A burning being, a blaze at its heart.♪

source: Fan its flames to find us there alight.♪
target: Fan its flames to find us there alight.♪

source:
Irrational behavior observed.
Inefficient energy expenditure.
target:
Irrational behavior observed.
Inefficient energy expenditure.

source: I'm coming, coming, coming for you...
target: I'm coming, coming, coming for you...

source: Why, why, why won't you play with me!?
target: Why, why, why won't you play with me!?

source:
We shall retrieve
our rightful mochi yet!
target:
We shall retrieve
our rightful mochi yet!

source:
Excellent. These pieces
may be safely delivered.
target:
Excellent. These pieces
may be safely delivered.
