target: What slavering mortals dare profane my lands?

source: By the authority of the abyssal court I command thee, darkness, rise!
target: By the authority of the abyssal court I command thee, darkness, rise!

source: You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> learn your place, even as you breathe your last...
target: You <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> learn your place, even as you breathe your last...

source: Pshhh... Shkohhh... Interfering uplanders come even to farlands?
target: Pshhh... Shkohhh... Interfering uplanders come even to farlands?

source: Pshhh... Shkohhh... Lamebrix crush uplanders this time for sure!
target: Pshhh... Shkohhh... Lamebrix crush uplanders this time for sure!

source: Pssshkoh... Lamebrix has new toys for funplaying! Spent much jinglyshine!
target: Pssshkoh... Lamebrix has new toys for funplaying! Spent much jinglyshine!

source: This oughta be the right place.
target: This oughta be the right place.

source: They brought the big guns too!? Gimme a break...
target: They brought the big guns too!? Gimme a break...

source: Hmmm, no clues here... Guess I'll keep looking.
target: Hmmm, no clues here... Guess I'll keep looking.

source:
Gobbie knows when
gobbie is outwhacked...
All gob, backfall!
target:
Gobbie knows when
gobbie is outwhacked...
All gob, backfall!

source:
Time of wordbond is over.
All gob, backfall!
target:
Time of wordbond is over.
All gob, backfall!

source: By the will of the elementals!
target: By the will of the elementals!

source:
And so it begins.
Are you ready?
target:
And so it begins.
Are you ready?

source: They've grown bold to push this far.
target: They've grown bold to push this far.

source: Spread out, and be wary of artillery fire.
target: Spread out, and be wary of artillery fire.

source: Keep to the north. We will head off their troops to the south.
target: Keep to the north. We will head off their troops to the south.

source: Brace yourself. They've called for reinforcements!
target: Brace yourself. They've called for reinforcements!

source: Thanks, but we're not done yet.
target: Thanks, but we're not done yet.

source: Keep moving. We will hold them here!
target: Keep moving. We will hold them here!

source:
Pshhh... Gobbies whack
for Falcons muchly!
target:
Pshhh... Gobbies whack
for Falcons muchly!

source:
Pshhh... Gobbies whack
for Ravens muchly!
target:
Pshhh... Gobbies whack
for Ravens muchly!

source: To boom or not to boom?
target: To boom or not to boom?

source: You seem troubled, friends. Not getting tired, are you?
target: Выглядите уставшими, друзья. Не устали ещё, надеюсь?

source: By the Fury! What is that?
Fear not! Help is on the way!
This is for you, old friend.
Behold the art of the shinobi!
Go on, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Leave these soldiers to us.
Sellgob whack-ready! Whack and thwack for uplander!
target: Sellgob whack-ready! Whack and thwack for uplander!

source: For jinglyshine, gobbies frontcharge! Gobbies smashstrike!
target: For jinglyshine, gobbies frontcharge! Gobbies smashstrike!

source: It looks ready to explode. Stand back!
target: It looks ready to explode. Stand back!

source: An explosive!? It must be stopped.
target: An explosive!? It must be stopped.

source: Such sweet blood, so very fresh. But...oh! Yours is fresher still...
target: Such sweet blood, so very fresh. But...oh! Yours is fresher still...

source: I shall sup gently on your veins. So very gently...
target: I shall sup gently on your veins. So very gently...

source: Now see what you've done! Mine own blood is spilled! Mine...mine...MINE...
target: Now see what you've done! Mine own blood is spilled! Mine...mine...MINE...

source: Friends! Partners! Come closer... See my wares! I bring only the finest.
target: Friends! Partners! Come closer... See my wares! I bring only the finest.

source: Friends! Partners! A humble invitation─learn how this blade cuts!
target: Friends! Partners! A humble invitation─learn how this blade cuts!

source: Now, my partners! What do you offer in trade? One life, or more?
target: Now, my partners! What do you offer in trade? One life, or more?

source: Miserly mortals! I ask for so little─only your lifeblood!
target: Miserly mortals! I ask for so little─only your lifeblood!

source: We probably shouldn't go barging in there alone, kupo!
target: We probably shouldn't go barging in there alone, kupo!

source: This all feels familiar...like back in Ridorana...
target: This all feels familiar...like back in Ridorana...

source: I imagine this is what it is like to be swallowed by a morbol, kupo!
target: I imagine this is what it is like to be swallowed by a morbol, kupo!

source: There are traces of aetherial residue here. Most likely from auracite, kupo.
target: There are traces of aetherial residue here. Most likely from auracite, kupo.

source: The aether here is different. Is this...joy I feel, kupo?
target: The aether here is different. Is this...joy I feel, kupo?

source: This wine looks good enough to drink! Do you think we should─? No? Alright, kupo...
target: This wine looks good enough to drink! Do you think we should─? No? Alright, kupo...

source: There is much pain in the aether here. A great loss, kupo...
target: There is much pain in the aether here. A great loss, kupo...

source: Let me guess, someone from the Durai Papers, kupo?
target: Let me guess, someone from the Durai Papers, kupo?

source: I'm going to go out on a limb and guess this place is fairly old, kupo.
target: I'm going to go out on a limb and guess this place is fairly old, kupo.

source: Might you recall earlier when I said the aether felt corrupted? Well, it's <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> corrupted now, kupo!
target: Might you recall earlier when I said the aether felt corrupted? Well, it's <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> corrupted now, kupo!

source: Mullonde? Now where have I heard that name before, kupo?
target: Mullonde? Now where have I heard that name before, kupo?

source: Wait... What is Cid doing down here, kupo?
target: Wait... What is Cid doing down here, kupo?

source: Something is wrong... I sense both anguish and rapture, kupo!
target: Something is wrong... I sense both anguish and rapture, kupo!

source: You mustn't fear her! Leave that to me, kupo!
target: You mustn't fear her! Leave that to me, kupo!

source: The time for games has passed.
target: The time for games has passed.

source: Take it! This power of mine...
target: Take it! This power of mine...

source: Now turn your gaze upon them! See the fools become as stone!
target: Now turn your gaze upon them! See the fools become as stone!

source: I know what you're thinking... “Man, that was cheap!” Sorry, so sorry!
target: I know what you're thinking... “Man, that was cheap!” Sorry, so sorry!

source: The sands are thirsty for your blood!
target: The sands are thirsty for your blood!

source: Your corpse will feed my flames!
target: Your corpse will feed my flames!

source: You fight bravely, but your time has come!
target: You fight bravely, but your time has come!

source: This is as far as you go!
target: This is as far as you go!

source: The sky weeps burning tears to lament your passing!
target: The sky weeps burning tears to lament your passing!

source: That arcane circle is somehow connected to the auracite! I can feel it, kupo!
target: That arcane circle is somehow connected to the auracite! I can feel it, kupo!

source:
Fly my dearest daughter,
Flow my precious stream.♪
target:
Fly my dearest daughter,
Flow my precious stream.♪

source:
Rest but never wallow,
Lose not your purity.♪
target:
Rest but never wallow,
Lose not your purity.♪

source:
Change always and forever,
And let your joy run deep.♪
target:
Change always and forever,
And let your joy run deep.♪

source:
Neneroon's claws made
for eating, not clawing...
target:
Neneroon's claws made
for eating, not clawing...

source:
Curses, it's still moving!
Keep cutting!
target:
Curses, it's still moving!
Keep cutting!

source: Time to demonstrate the fruits of my training!
target: Time to demonstrate the fruits of my training!

source: Hm hm hm... I've had quite enough of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Hm hm hm... I've had quite enough of <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: More! We want to see more!
target: More! We want to see more!

source: What's that smell? Is something burning?
target: What's that smell? Is something burning?

source:
Seems we've driven
them off, though.
target:
Seems we've driven
them off, though.

source: Keep them away from the carriage!
target: Keep them away from the carriage!

source: Shards of ice, pierce and slice!
target: Shards of ice, pierce and slice!

source: Brilliant bolts, give them a jolt!
target: Brilliant bolts, give them a jolt!

source: Again! Again and again and again!
target: Again! Again and again and again!

source: That this should all be an illusion...
target: That this should all be an illusion...

source: Watering the plants? Nay, strengthening them.
target: Watering the plants? Nay, strengthening them.

source: What magick is this that could create such a convincing illusion?
target: What magick is this that could create such a convincing illusion?

source: Another landscape... How much further to the crown, I wonder.
target: Another landscape... How much further to the crown, I wonder.

source: Never have I seen such mastery over glamours.
target: Never have I seen such mastery over glamours.

source: A Fuath! And it's...watering the plants?
target: A Fuath! And it's...watering the plants?

source: More illusions? You have to hand it to them...
target: More illusions? You have to hand it to them...

source: Real or no, it's beautiful beyond words...
target: Real or no, it's beautiful beyond words...

source: The crown already? Forgive me if I'm suspicious.
target: The crown already? Forgive me if I'm suspicious.

source: So this is the realm of the water spirits...
target: So this is the realm of the water spirits...

source: Seems they don't mean to make this easy for us.
target: Seems they don't mean to make this easy for us.

source: Ah, yes, the good old stop-them-with-wasps trick.
target: Ah, yes, the good old stop-them-with-wasps trick.

source: Naught here is what it seemeth. Tread warily.
target: Naught here is what it seemeth. Tread warily.

source: The crown... With its protectors conspicuous in their absence...
target: The crown... With its protectors conspicuous in their absence...

source: Oh, my! Did you see the flowers?
target: Oh, my! Did you see the flowers?

source: A palace of water... It's like something out of a faerie tale...
target: A palace of water... It's like something out of a faerie tale...

source: It's like being in a dream...
target: It's like being in a dream...

source: Yet the dangers of this dream are very real. Be not distracted by its beauty.
target: Yet the dangers of this dream are very real. Be not distracted by its beauty.

source: Is that a Fuath? What is it doing?
target: Is that a Fuath? What is it doing?

source: Making their minions stronger, by the looks of it.
target: Making their minions stronger, by the looks of it.

source: It seems they haven't quite had enough games.
target: It seems they haven't quite had enough games.

source: They certainly have no shortage of ideas.
target: They certainly have no shortage of ideas.

source: Except we're the ones in the tale. Stay on your guard.
target: Except we're the ones in the tale. Stay on your guard.

source: No, stop! I smell a trap!
target: No, stop! I smell a trap!

source: If it stands in our way, it falls like the rest.
target: If it stands in our way, it falls like the rest.

source: No. It was just toying with us.
target: No. It was just toying with us.

source: They recreated a legend, is that it?
target: They recreated a legend, is that it?

source: Imitation will only take you so far.
target: Imitation will only take you so far.

source: This time we'll really have the crown!
target: This time we'll really have the crown!

source: Focus on the fight, Minfilia─not the prize.
target: Focus on the fight, Minfilia─not the prize.

source: It seems the statues aren't only for show.
target: It seems the statues aren't only for show.

source: Have care. I sense aether emanating from the statues...
target: Have care. I sense aether emanating from the statues...

source: Surely they wouldn't try the same trick twice?
target: Surely they wouldn't try the same trick twice?

source: Another array of statues. No doubt these too serve to guard our path.
target: Another array of statues. No doubt these too serve to guard our path.

source: More statues. Another trap, I should think.
target: More statues. Another trap, I should think.

source: Their leader, if I'm not mistaken. Ware its glamours.
target: Their leader, if I'm not mistaken. Ware its glamours.

source: Aye, but I doubt they would lay the same trap twice.
target: Aye, but I doubt they would lay the same trap twice.

source: No beating about the bush with this one.
target: No beating about the bush with this one.

source: There's no getting around this one...
target: There's no getting around this one...

source: Its design calls to mind the Ronkan legends of giants. Fascinating...
target: Its design calls to mind the Ronkan legends of giants. Fascinating...

source: The Ronkans guard their secrets well.
target: The Ronkans guard their secrets well.

source: Finally. The way forward is open.
target: Finally. The way forward is open.

source: Though thankfully nowhere near the fabled might of Lozatl.
target: Though thankfully nowhere near the fabled might of Lozatl.

source: Truly a fascinating specimen of Ronkan ingenuity.
target: Truly a fascinating specimen of Ronkan ingenuity.

source: An earthquake? Nay. Something stirreth deep within...
target: An earthquake? Nay. Something stirreth deep within...

source: I care not to see the source of these tremors.
target: I care not to see the source of these tremors.

source: On thy guard. Carelessness shall find no clemency here.
target: On thy guard. Carelessness shall find no clemency here.

source: Stay on your guard. We near the tremors' source.
target: Stay on your guard. We near the tremors' source.

source: If you desire sport, we're happy to oblige!
target: If you desire sport, we're happy to oblige!

source: That's a nice illusion, but you can't fool us!
target: That's a nice illusion, but you can't fool us!

source: So <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> the one making all that racket?
target: So <var 1A 02 /var>you're<var 1A 01 /var> the one making all that racket?

source: The source of the ghastly wails and tremors both, 'twould seem.
target: The source of the ghastly wails and tremors both, 'twould seem.

source: That such a beast could survive down here all this time...
target: That such a beast could survive down here all this time...

source: Any longer and I thought this cave might've collapsed.
target: Any longer and I thought this cave might've collapsed.

source: Whence did the bat enter here, I wonder.
target: Whence did the bat enter here, I wonder.

source: I fear my ears will be ringing for quite some time.
target: I fear my ears will be ringing for quite some time.

source: Would that we could stop and rest, but we must press on.
target: Would that we could stop and rest, but we must press on.

source: Sin eaters... Then our suspicions were correct.
target: Sin eaters... Then our suspicions were correct.

source: Let's cut this overgrown scrub down to size.
target: Let's cut this overgrown scrub down to size.

source: Ah, the final form. Or should I say <var 1A 02 /var>false<var 1A 01 /var> form?
target: Ah, the final form. Or should I say <var 1A 02 /var>false<var 1A 01 /var> form?

source: The sooner we get this over with, the better.
target: The sooner we get this over with, the better.

source: A rather nasty-looking thing, isn't it?
target: A rather nasty-looking thing, isn't it?

source: 'Tis more terrible than the Viis described.
target: 'Tis more terrible than the Viis described.

source: I can sense the Warden somewhere below us.
target: I can sense the Warden somewhere below us.

source: The ancients were well beyond their time.
target: The ancients were well beyond their time.

source: Can you sense the Warden, Ryne?
target: Can you sense the Warden, Ryne?

source: Yes, but I think it's further underground.
target: Yes, but I think it's further underground.

source: This tunnel seems to stretch on forever...
target: This tunnel seems to stretch on forever...

source: It looks like we can descend from here.
target: It looks like we can descend from here.

source: What do you suppose we'll find down here?
target: What do you suppose we'll find down here?

source: Isn't that a little big for an armadillo?
target: Isn't that a little big for an armadillo?

source: That their chieftain should personally stand in our way...
target: That their chieftain should personally stand in our way...

source: Curious... Yonder creature doth resemble Griaule, a beast of Voeburtite legend.
target: Curious... Yonder creature doth resemble Griaule, a beast of Voeburtite legend.

source: 'Twould seem we are come to the grand finale.
target: 'Twould seem we are come to the grand finale.

source: Shall we get this over and done with?
target: Shall we get this over and done with?

source: I would rather not slay the beast, but if it means to bar our way...
target: I would rather not slay the beast, but if it means to bar our way...

source: It's in the way is what it is.
target: It's in the way is what it is.

source: If I never see an armadillo again...
target: If I never see an armadillo again...

source: Let us press onward. The Warden awaits.
target: Let us press onward. The Warden awaits.

source: A shame the miners haven't the means to keep building.
target: A shame the miners haven't the means to keep building.

source: We need to climb down somehow.
target: We need to climb down somehow.

source: Well there has to be a path somewhere...
target: Well there has to be a path somewhere...

source: With any luck this tunnel will lead down.
target: With any luck this tunnel will lead down.

source: And into the heart of the Warden's lair.
target: And into the heart of the Warden's lair.

source: Is this some sort of joke?
target: Is this some sort of joke?

source: This certainly isn't what I was expecting.
target: This certainly isn't what I was expecting.

source: Why, yes... Yes I believe they are...
target: Why, yes... Yes I believe they are...

source: I think I now understand Alphinaud's aversion to water.
target: I think I now understand Alphinaud's aversion to water.

source: I never knew buckets could be so dangerous.
target: I never knew buckets could be so dangerous.

source: Gods, I'm soaked to the bone.
target: Gods, I'm soaked to the bone.

source: These crystals are devoid of aether...
target: These crystals are devoid of aether...

source: Terrible is the beast that doth wreak such corruption.
target: Terrible is the beast that doth wreak such corruption.

source: We're nearly there. I can feel it!
target: We're nearly there. I can feel it!

source: I have a bad feeling about these boulders...
target: I have a bad feeling about these boulders...

source: Oh gods, the boulders. They're filling with light!
target: Oh gods, the boulders. They're filling with light!

source: Careful. I sense something queer within these rocks.
target: Careful. I sense something queer within these rocks.

source: Gods, is nothing safe from the sin eaters' corruption?
target: Gods, is nothing safe from the sin eaters' corruption?

source: Let us be brief. The others are waiting.
target: Let us be brief. The others are waiting.

source: Well done, Ryne. Now to end this.
target: Well done, Ryne. Now to end this.

source: You call this a paradise? Don't make me laugh!
target: You call this a paradise? Don't make me laugh!

source: Vauthry! I won't let you hurt anyone anymore!
target: Vauthry! I won't let you hurt anyone anymore!

source: This time he will not escape.
target: This time he will not escape.

source: Oh dear, you made her mad. You're in for it now.
target: Oh dear, you made her mad. You're in for it now.

source: Well, that made short work of them!
target: Well, that made short work of them!

source: Now that's what I call a helping hand!
target: Now that's what I call a helping hand!

source: Let us take care of the rest!
target: Let us take care of the rest!

source: That affords us some room to breathe.
target: That affords us some room to breathe.

source: Hah, as if they were flies!
target: Hah, as if they were flies!

source: A blow struck for all who suffered under you!
target: A blow struck for all who suffered under you!

source: Aye, let's make the most of it!
target: Aye, let's make the most of it!

source: Like one of the guardians of Amdapor...
target: Like one of the guardians of Amdapor...

source: Ah, this fellow again. Just like old times.
target: Ah, this fellow again. Just like old times.

source: I'm not afraid... I'm not afraid...
target: I'm not afraid... I'm not afraid...

source: Oh, come now. We know this is an illusion.
target: Oh, come now. We know this is an illusion.

source: Good thing I'm light on my feet.
target: Good thing I'm light on my feet.

source: Makes me feel dirty just to look at it...
target: Makes me feel dirty just to look at it...

source: A voidsent? Or yet another illusion?
target: A voidsent? Or yet another illusion?

source: I grow weary of these tricks!
target: I grow weary of these tricks!

source: This isn't like before. This time I'll fight too.
target: This isn't like before. This time I'll fight too.

source: But this time I'll fight too!
target: But this time I'll fight too!

source: I should like to study their link to the statues on the Source.
target: I should like to study their link to the statues on the Source.

source: Nice to finally settle that old score.
target: Nice to finally settle that old score.

source: Vauthry will need more than that to stop us.
target: Vauthry will need more than that to stop us.

source: Aye, nice to finally settle that old score.
target: Aye, nice to finally settle that old score.

source: A palace? Did Vauthry build this?
target: A palace? Did Vauthry build this?

source: A gaudy palace... How like Vauthry.
target: A gaudy palace... How like Vauthry.

source: All this via aetherial manipulation? Impressive...
target: All this via aetherial manipulation? Impressive...

source: Hmph, the man's vanity knows no bounds.
target: Hmph, the man's vanity knows no bounds.

source: A cube-shaped eater. Perfect for blocking the way.
target: A cube-shaped eater. Perfect for blocking the way.

source: I'm just going to assume that cube is an eater.
target: I'm just going to assume that cube is an eater.

source: Its form notwithstanding, I believe that is a sin eater.
target: Its form notwithstanding, I believe that is a sin eater.

source: Have care. It harbors a prodigious amount of aether.
target: Have care. It harbors a prodigious amount of aether.

source: There is much we do not know about sin eaters.
target: There is much we do not know about sin eaters.

source: Phew, that was tougher than it looked...
target: Phew, that was tougher than it looked...

source: I leave the cartridges to you!
target: I leave the cartridges to you!

source: And there I thought I'd seen them all.
target: And there I thought I'd seen them all.

source: By my reckoning, it was an elemental made eater.
target: By my reckoning, it was an elemental made eater.

source: No amount of splendor will make you king!
target: No amount of splendor will make you king!

source: Oh, I look forward to shutting him up!
target: Oh, I look forward to shutting him up!

source: This place really isn't to my taste.
target: This place really isn't to my taste.

source: If you're righteous, why did you run?
target: If you're righteous, why did you run?

source: A good thing we are here to tear it down.
target: A good thing we are here to tear it down.

source: This Light... Vauthry channels it into his minions!
target: This Light... Vauthry channels it into his minions!

source: He made them stronger, the bastard!
target: He made them stronger, the bastard!

source: The sin eaters partake of their master's power...
target: The sin eaters partake of their master's power...

source: This surging aether... Vauthry empowers his minions!
target: This surging aether... Vauthry empowers his minions!

source: So much Light! Be careful, everyone!
target: So much Light! Be careful, everyone!

source: Vauthry deigns to send us his favorite.
target: Vauthry deigns to send us his favorite.

source: I'll take that to mean that we're close!
target: I'll take that to mean that we're close!

source: Such aether... It could be a Warden in its own right!
target: Such aether... It could be a Warden in its own right!

source: So it's a bigger candle than most. We'll snuff it out.
target: So it's a bigger candle than most. We'll snuff it out.

source: Off it goes... It seems we must do more to earn the crown.
target: Off it goes... It seems we must do more to earn the crown.

source:
I see storms of emotion...
The aether here is seething with it.
target:
I see storms of emotion...
The aether here is seething with it.

source:
Steady, Ryne!
Remember: this is only a recreation!
target:
Steady, Ryne!
Remember: this is only a recreation!

source:
Watch where you step!
Ware the falling flames!
target:
Watch where you step!
Ware the falling flames!

source: I know the beasts are eye-catching, but keep watch for those meteors!
target: I know the beasts are eye-catching, but keep watch for those meteors!

source: A city burneth 'neath fiery skies, and calamitous beasts hold sway...
target: A city burneth 'neath fiery skies, and calamitous beasts hold sway...

source: It's like seeing the stars fall from the sky...
target: It's like seeing the stars fall from the sky...

source: ...Like the pages of a myth come to life.
target: ...Like the pages of a myth come to life.

source: This first doom seemed deadly enough not to warrant a second...
target: This first doom seemed deadly enough not to warrant a second...

source: Even knowing it's all illusion makes it no less terrifying...
target: Even knowing it's all illusion makes it no less terrifying...

source: Time for another type of ammunition.
target: Time for another type of ammunition.

source: ...And that was but the first doom they faced?
target: ...And that was but the first doom they faced?

source: A horror to beget an even greater abomination...
target: A horror to beget an even greater abomination...

source: There goes a tower! We'll run out of walkway at this rate...
target: There goes a tower! We'll run out of walkway at this rate...

source:
Creation magicks run rampant...
'Tis the stuff of nightmares.
target:
Creation magicks run rampant...
'Tis the stuff of nightmares.

source:
Watch out!
We'll be lucky not to get crushed...
target:
Watch out!
We'll be lucky not to get crushed...

source: Nay, he will make certain we see it all. He wants us to see...
target: Nay, he will make certain we see it all. He wants us to see...

source: This is almost too much to witness...but witness it we must.
target: This is almost too much to witness...but witness it we must.

source: Seven hells! These beasts lurk behind every stone!
target: Seven hells! These beasts lurk behind every stone!

source: To die by fire, or by fang...
target: To die by fire, or by fang...

source: This beast falleth short of the legend.
target: This beast falleth short of the legend.

source: Aye, and we'd best keep moving if we're to avoid a similar fate.
target: Aye, and we'd best keep moving if we're to avoid a similar fate.

source: A terror of a different hue...
target: A terror of a different hue...

source: Is this another of these dooms, then?
target: Is this another of these dooms, then?

source:
A man's face on a bird's body...
How unsettling.
target:
A man's face on a bird's body...
How unsettling.

source: The form fear taketh is unlike to be pleasing.
target: The form fear taketh is unlike to be pleasing.

source: The beasts are links in a chain of fear...yet we seem to have broken it.
target: The beasts are links in a chain of fear...yet we seem to have broken it.

source: These battles test the boundaries of our stamina...
target: These battles test the boundaries of our stamina...

source: This time, mayhap. I worry we might not outlast the next.
target: This time, mayhap. I worry we might not outlast the next.

source: Have we ascended into the heavens themselves!?
target: Have we ascended into the heavens themselves!?

source:
I-Is that the star!?
The whole world is ablaze...
target:
I-Is that the star!?
The whole world is ablaze...

source:
Ah, Master Matoya...
If only you could see this...
target:
Ah, Master Matoya...

to have you here...

source:
Much more entertaining
than we expected.
target:
Much more entertaining
than we expected.

source:
If only I could say
the same for you.
target:
If only I could say
the same for you.

source:
You haven't seen
the half of us yet!
target:
You haven't seen
the half of us yet!

source: Ha! Fuath tricks don't scare me!
target: Ha! Fuath tricks don't scare me!

source:
Now I teach you
a thing or two!
target:
Now I teach you
a thing or two!

source: But wouldn't the Bookman's Shelves be a more appropriate venue?
target: But wouldn't the Bookman's Shelves be a more appropriate venue?

source:
I thought you
might say that!
target:
I thought you
might say that!

source: ...and it turns out we're not <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> done...
target: ...and it turns out we're not <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> done...

source: Now, if you'll just come this way...
target: Now, if you'll just come this way...

source: At this point, it seems only fair to mention...
target: At this point, it seems only fair to mention...

source: <var 1A 02 /var>We'll<var 1A 01 /var> have great fun either way, of course.
target: <var 1A 02 /var>We'll<var 1A 01 /var> have great fun either way, of course.

source:
I don't doubt that.
You have terrible taste.
target:
I don't doubt that.
You have terrible taste.

source: While there's still fun to be had?
target: While there's still fun to be had?

source: But what a loss it was!
target: But what a loss it was!

source:
We really must do
this again sometime!
target:
We really must do
this again sometime!

source: It seems we are the victors!
target: It seems we are the victors!

source: We thank you for the diversion...
target: We thank you for the diversion...

source:
You could at least
<var 1A 02 /var>try<var 1A 01 /var> to fight back.
target:
You could at least
<var 1A 02 /var>try<var 1A 01 /var> to fight back.

source:
A bit more savagery,
if you please.
target:
A bit more savagery,
if you please.

source:
Those horrid bandits won't
spoil my day!
target:
Эти жуткие бандиты
не испортят мне настроение!

source: And come to think of it, where are we going?
target: And come to think of it, where are we going?

source: There are shinies waiting for us near Twitch!
target: There are shinies waiting for us near Twitch!

source: Bloody hells! Why there of all the places?
target: Bloody hells! Why there of all the places?

source: Creatures burrow into the sand there!
target: Creatures burrow into the sand there!

source: Which would unearth buried treasure... Not a bad idea, I'll admit.
target: Which would unearth buried treasure... Not a bad idea, I'll admit.

source: You mentioned burrowing creatures, but I don't see any...
target: You mentioned burrowing creatures, but I don't see any...

source: Hold on, do you think they're still under the sand?
target: Hold on, do you think they're still under the sand?

source: Get back, Rhal Ral! You'll only get in my way!
target: Get back, Rhal Ral! You'll only get in my way!

source: We've walked right into their trap!
target: We've walked right into their trap!

source: This is all your fault! Grrr... No choice but to run!
target: This is all your fault! Grrr... No choice but to run!

source: Had enough, eh? You sand-swallowing bastards!
target: Had enough, eh? You sand-swallowing bastards!

source: We are alive! But more importantly, where is that treasure?
target: We are alive! But more importantly, where is that treasure?

source: Hmm? A map! It looks like the Fields of Amber.
target: Hmm? A map! It looks like the Fields of Amber.

source: There is a picture of a gigantender to the south...
target: There is a picture of a gigantender to the south...

source: ...And what looks like a necklace nearby.
target: ...And what looks like a necklace nearby.

source: Then what are we waiting for?
target: Then what are we waiting for?

source: The treasure must be where gigantenders roam!
target: The treasure must be where gigantenders roam!

source: What I wouldn't give for a moment's peace...
target: What I wouldn't give for a moment's peace...

source: Lizards. That's all we bloody need.
target: Lizards. That's all we bloody need.

source: We'd do well to steer clear of that lot.
target: We'd do well to steer clear of that lot.

source: Of course! You know I am not one to take risks!
target: Of course! You know I am not one to take risks!

source: No, but I usually end up taking them in your place.
target: No, but I usually end up taking them in your place.

source: Oh, this is not good... But we must not give up!
target: Oh, this is not good... But we must not give up!

source: Rhal Ral! Fancy lending a hand?
target: Rhal Ral! Fancy lending a hand?

source: Bugger the treasure! I'd rather be poor than dead!
target: Bugger the treasure! I'd rather be poor than dead!

source: Thanks, mate. We'd be lizard food if it weren't for you.
target: Thanks, mate. We'd be lizard food if it weren't for you.

source: Yes, yes! There will be time for that later! On with the treasure hunt!
target: Yes, yes! There will be time for that later! On with the treasure hunt!

source: Maybe not the shinies, but look over there!
target: Maybe not the shinies, but look over there!

source: Footprints... Judging by the shape and stride length...
target: Footprints... Judging by the shape and stride length...

source: It must be over two hundred years old!
target: It must be over two hundred years old!

source: If it was dormant when this map was made, they could have used it as a landmark!
target: If it was dormant when this map was made, they could have used it as a landmark!

source: They normally don't wander far from their territory...
target: They normally don't wander far from their territory...

source: ...So these tracks will probably lead to that necklace.
target: ...So these tracks will probably lead to that necklace.

source: Ah. I think we've found our gigantender.
target: Ah. I think we've found our gigantender.

source: We'll have to cut that thing down to size before we can start the search.
target: We'll have to cut that thing down to size before we can start the search.

source: Show it what you are made of, Darmal!
target: Show it what you are made of, Darmal!

source: Argh! I can't give up, not when we're so close!
target: Argh! I can't give up, not when we're so close!

source: Better to run and scavenge another day!
target: Better to run and scavenge another day!

source: How do you like that, you overgrown cactus!
target: How do you like that, you overgrown cactus!

source: We have found it! The treasure!
target: We have found it! The treasure!

source: The necklace! Snatched away from us!
target: The necklace! Snatched away from us!

source: That was Offscoursman! The sparkling must've caught its eye!
target: That was Offscoursman! The sparkling must've caught its eye!

source: For once, we're of the same mind, Rhal Ral!
target: For once, we're of the same mind, Rhal Ral!

source: It flew in this direction, yes?
target: It flew in this direction, yes?

source: Now all we have to do is kill it... Easier said than done.
target: Now all we have to do is kill it... Easier said than done.

source: Ha ha! The necklace is ours!
target: Ha ha! The necklace is ours!

source: Now, let us take a closer look...
target: Now, let us take a closer look...

source: Ah, yes. The mark of five coins. This was made for the Nabaath royal family!
target: Ah, yes. The mark of five coins. This was made for the Nabaath royal family!

source: So it must be worth a fair bit, then?
target: So it must be worth a fair bit, then?

source: Yes! I cannot wait to have it properly appraised!
target: Yes! I cannot wait to have it properly appraised!

source: Let us make our way to Mord Souq!
target: Let us make our way to Mord Souq!

source: Our venture was a great success. Now to head to the hills!
target: Our venture was a great success. Now to head to the hills!

source: What!? I thought we were going home!
target: What!? I thought we were going home!

source: And we will, after a quick detour!
target: And we will, after a quick detour!

source: Here we are! The Hills of Amber!
target: Here we are! The Hills of Amber!

source: Erm... And what are we doing here?
target: Erm... And what are we doing here?

source: I'd rather you just told me...
target: I'd rather you just told me...

source: Ha ha ha! Good luck with that!
target: Ha ha ha! Good luck with that!

source: In the desert, no one can hear you die!
target: In the desert, no one can hear you die!

source: You're in the wrong place, at the wrong time.
target: You're in the wrong place, at the wrong time.

source: Blame your own bad luck, mate.
target: Blame your own bad luck, mate.

source: Help, I say! These men are bandits!
target: Help, I say! These men are bandits!

source: All right, don't get your breeches in a twist. You stay back, Rhal Ral.
target: All right, don't get your breeches in a twist. You stay back, Rhal Ral.

source: Think you're a hero, do you?
target: Think you're a hero, do you?

source: Keep out of this, old man!
target: Keep out of this, old man!

source: Job's done. Time to scarper, lads!
target: Job's done. Time to scarper, lads!

source: On second thought, let us forget the detour! Back to Mord Souq it is!
target: On second thought, let us forget the detour! Back to Mord Souq it is!

source: You haven't seen the last of us!
target: You haven't seen the last of us!

source: Got some fight in you, eh?
target: Got some fight in you, eh?

source: Let's see how you like this!
target: Let's see how you like this!

source: Thank you, strangers. My name is Ingi, and I came here to find gemstones.
target: Thank you, strangers. My name is Ingi, and I came here to find gemstones.

source: I am Rhal Ral, and this is my associate, Darmal.
target: I am Rhal Ral, and this is my associate, Darmal.

source: We are in search of treasure!
target: We are in search of treasure!

source: Yes! I bought an old Ronso scroll...
target: Yes! I bought an old Ronso scroll...

source: ...which revealed the location of the Elderblade!
target: ...which revealed the location of the Elderblade!

source: It's in the Hills of Amber, the traditional home of the Ronso. Do you know anything about it?
target: It's in the Hills of Amber, the traditional home of the Ronso. Do you know anything about it?

source: I can't say I recognize the name, but the “Elder” part is familiar...
target: I can't say I recognize the name, but the “Elder” part is familiar...

source: Please, if you know something, you must tell us!
target: Please, if you know something, you must tell us!

source: Well, I am not sure it will be sufficient payment for saving my life, but I will do what I can.
target: Well, I am not sure it will be sufficient payment for saving my life, but I will do what I can.

source: But do you mind if I stop by my house first?
target: But do you mind if I stop by my house first?

source: I shan't keep you waiting long.
target: I shan't keep you waiting long.

source: By all means, lead the way!
target: By all means, lead the way!

source: It is good to be home, safe and sound.
target: It is good to be home, safe and sound.

source: I will be with you in a few moments.
target: I will be with you in a few moments.

source: Take your time. We're in no rush.
target: Take your time. We're in no rush.

source: But sooner is better than later!
target: But sooner is better than later!

source: This time, we won't go so easy on you!
target: This time, we won't go so easy on you!

source: Back for a second helping, eh?
target: Back for a second helping, eh?

source: Next time we see you, you're dead!
target: Next time we see you, you're dead!

source: Rhal Ral! Are you all right!?
target: Rhal Ral! Are you all right!?

source: Gods be good! Did those bandits come back!?
target: Gods be good! Did those bandits come back!?

source: Go on, run, you bunch of milksops! Rhal Ral, are you hurt?
target: Go on, run, you bunch of milksops! Rhal Ral, are you hurt?

source: Thank you for waiting. Is everything all right?
target: Thank you for waiting. Is everything all right?

source: I am glad to hear it. Shall we go and find this blade, then?
target: I am glad to hear it. Shall we go and find this blade, then?

source: It was named after one of the greatest elders in the history of my people.
target: It was named after one of the greatest elders in the history of my people.

source: He was known for his prowess in battle...
target: He was known for his prowess in battle...

source: ...but I expect this Elderblade of which you speak also carried symbolic significance.
target: ...but I expect this Elderblade of which you speak also carried symbolic significance.

source: So it's not just a fancy name?
target: So it's not just a fancy name?

source: The blade of the elder! It all makes sense now!
target: The blade of the elder! It all makes sense now!

source: This is Kelk, or what is left of it.
target: This is Kelk, or what is left of it.

source: Armadillos! And so many of them!
target: Armadillos! And so many of them!

source: Traveler, will you help us get rid of them?
target: Traveler, will you help us get rid of them?

source: Do not let them corner you!
target: Do not let them corner you!

source: Oh? Are you not going to fight as well, Rhal Ral?
target: Oh? Are you not going to fight as well, Rhal Ral?

source: He's more the “sit back and watch” sort.
target: He's more the “sit back and watch” sort.

source: I believe the correct term is “offer moral support”!
target: I believe the correct term is “offer moral support”!

source: Once I am properly dressed, I am unstoppable!
target: Once I am properly dressed, I am unstoppable!

source: This is not going well! You must withdraw!
target: This is not going well! You must withdraw!

source: Outdone by armadillos! I'll never live this down!
target: Outdone by armadillos! I'll never live this down!

source: That was the last of them.
target: That was the last of them.

source: Then let us uncover the Elderblade before any more turn up!
target: Then let us uncover the Elderblade before any more turn up!

source: Hello, hello. This coffer looks promising.
target: Hello, hello. This coffer looks promising.

source: And not a pleasant one, either.
target: And not a pleasant one, either.

source: I had a feeling it was too good to be true.
target: I had a feeling it was too good to be true.

source: Not yet! There is one more thing I would like to try!
target: Not yet! There is one more thing I would like to try!

source: Nabaath mages enchanted swords to do their bidding...
target: Nabaath mages enchanted swords to do their bidding...

source: ...and the Elderblade was probably full of...errr...magic!
target: ...and the Elderblade was probably full of...errr...magic!

source: So if they used it to create an evil weapon...
target: So if they used it to create an evil weapon...

source: Oh no... I'm not going to like this, am I?
target: Oh no... I'm not going to like this, am I?

source: ...there have been sightings of an exceedingly large evil weapon not far from here.
target: ...there have been sightings of an exceedingly large evil weapon not far from here.

source: Can you show us where it was last seen?
target: Can you show us where it was last seen?

source: Looks like it's not here. Oh well, never mind.
target: Looks like it's not here. Oh well, never mind.

source: It's even worse than I thought...
target: It's even worse than I thought...

source: Umm... Are you sure about this?
target: Umm... Are you sure about this?

source: Yes... Yes! Get me that blade!
target: Yes... Yes! Get me that blade!

source: Th-This was never meant to happen...
target: Th-This was never meant to happen...

source: Flee the way you came! Even worse lies ahead...
target: Flee the way you came! Even worse lies ahead...

source: I was scared! I thought it would kill you, then me!
target: I was scared! I thought it would kill you, then me!

source: Phew! I thought the damned thing would never give up!
target: Phew! I thought the damned thing would never give up!

source: The Elderblade is mine! I mean, ours!
target: The Elderblade is mine! I mean, ours!

source: I can scarcely believe we survived...
target: I can scarcely believe we survived...

source: I never doubted you for a moment! You all fought very well!
target: I never doubted you for a moment! You all fought very well!

source: The sword of the great Kelk, enchanted by Nabaath magicks...
target: The sword of the great Kelk, enchanted by Nabaath magicks...

source: Even now that the spell has been broken, the power within is undeniable.
target: Even now that the spell has been broken, the power within is undeniable.

source: Which should see that it fetches a high price!
target: Which should see that it fetches a high price!

source: Rhal Ral, this blade must never fall into the wrong hands. We must ensure that it finds a worthy owner.
target: Rhal Ral, this blade must never fall into the wrong hands. We must ensure that it finds a worthy owner.

source: Preferably one who does not mind parting with a few jinglies!
target: Preferably one who does not mind parting with a few jinglies!

source:
Are you quite
all right, brother?
target:
Are you quite
all right, brother?

source:
You know, you're quite fun!
As mortals go.
target:
You know, you're quite fun!
As mortals go.

source:
Not the least bit
contrite, are you?
target:
Not the least bit
contrite, are you?

source:
Why be contrite when
you're so keen to fight?
target:
Why be contrite when
you're so keen to fight?

source: It's all starting to come back to me now.
target: It's all starting to come back to me now.

source: Let us see what we can find.
target: Let us see what we can find.

source: My magicks are unending, my loyalty undying!
target: My magicks are unending, my loyalty undying!

source: I shall turn the very ground against you!
target: I shall turn the very ground against you!

source: My flames shall raze your very soul!
target: My flames shall raze your very soul!

source: My ice shall chill the very essence of your being!
target: My ice shall chill the very essence of your being!

source: The future is ours, and ours alone!
target: The future is ours, and ours alone!

source: We will relinquish it to no one. No one!
target: We will relinquish it to no one. No one!

source: The most renowned swordsman of the Far East is about to descend upon the Gold Saucer!
target: The most renowned swordsman of the Far East is about to descend upon the Gold Saucer!

source: His skills with a blade must be seen to be believed, but blink and you'll miss them, so keep those eyes peeled!
target: His skills with a blade must be seen to be believed, but blink and you'll miss them, so keep those eyes peeled!

source: This is the moment I've been waiting for!
target: This is the moment I've been waiting for!

source: I heard his blade is so sharp, he can split infinitives, whatever that means...
target: I heard his blade is so sharp, he can split infinitives, whatever that means...

source: I blinked! Did I miss anything?
target: I blinked! Did I miss anything?

source: Behold, the sword art of legend─Zanmato!
target: Behold, the sword art of legend─Zanmato!

source: Thank your lucky stars Zanmato thirsts not for your blood!
target: Thank your lucky stars Zanmato thirsts not for your blood!

source: Go, Daigoro! Bring me those koban!
target: Go, Daigoro! Bring me those koban!

source: My eyes can barely keep up!
target: My eyes can barely keep up!

source: I've never seen anything like it!
target: I've never seen anything like it!

source: Fortune favors the bold, and if you are truly worthy, your luck will hold!
target: Fortune favors the bold, and if you are truly worthy, your luck will hold!

source: Three cups I present! One contains riches, another my faithful hound! And the last...well, nothing at all!
target: Three cups I present! One contains riches, another my faithful hound! And the last...well, nothing at all!

source: Uncover the coin, and it is yours. Chance upon Daigoro, and you will be sent running with your tail between your legs!
target: Uncover the coin, and it is yours. Chance upon Daigoro, and you will be sent running with your tail between your legs!

source: Before I count to three, make your choice!
target: Before I count to three, make your choice!

source: Well, well! The kami smile upon you, brave one!
target: Well, well! The kami smile upon you, brave one!

source: If you are still game, so am I!
target: If you are still game, so am I!

source: This is as far as you go!
target: This is as far as you go!

source: The cup is quicker than the eye!
target: The cup is quicker than the eye!

source: We believe mochi mixed with waters from the Daitenzan's soulspring has stolen its way into our stores!
target: We believe mochi mixed with waters from the Daitenzan's soulspring has stolen its way into our stores!

source: From the soulspring...? Do you mean to tell me this mochi is alive!?
target: From the soulspring...? Do you mean to tell me this mochi is alive!?

source: Damn it, Gozu has been spooked. Quickly, we must dispense with the mochi!
target: Damn it, Gozu has been spooked. Quickly, we must dispense with the mochi!

source: The living mochi must have come from last year's celebration. But how...?
target: The living mochi must have come from last year's celebration. But how...?

source: I fear our little game must soon come to an end. One last chance for Zanmato to shine!
target: I fear our little game must soon come to an end. One last chance for Zanmato to shine!

source: Fleet of foot, and fortunate to boot! A well deserved victory!
target: Fleet of foot, and fortunate to boot! A well deserved victory!

source: Alas, it was not your lucky day, my friend. Though I must say, you certainly made me work hard for my coin!
target: Alas, it was not your lucky day, my friend. Though I must say, you certainly made me work hard for my coin!

source:
Krow ot emit ti si?
Swish-swish-aroo.
target:
Krow ot emit ti si?
Swish-swish-aroo.

source: Yojimbo is currently discussing his fee, though I'm sure it won't take much longer.
target: Yojimbo is currently discussing his fee, though I'm sure it won't take much longer.

source: It seems that we have reached an agreement with Yojimbo, who is due to appear any moment now.
target: It seems that we have reached an agreement with Yojimbo, who is due to appear any moment now.

source: Sear the flesh from their bones!
target: Sear the flesh from their bones!

source: None can withstand the flames of Lugus!
target: None can withstand the flames of Lugus!

source: It's like it goes on forever...
target: It's like it goes on forever...

source:
I don't like the
looks of that.
target:
I don't like the
looks of that.

source: Don't kill me... Don't kill me...
target: Don't kill me... Don't kill me...

source:
Does that count
as a machine lifeform?
target:
Does that count
as a machine lifeform?

source: Was...was that the mage we seek?
target: Was...was that the mage we seek?

source: I have a bad feeling about this.
target: I have a bad feeling about this.

source: Well, I'd say we're off to a fine start.
target: Well, I'd say we're off to a fine start.

source: Do those brooms not remind you of Master Matoya?
target: Do those brooms not remind you of Master Matoya?

source: Magicked brooms? Now where have I seen these before?
target: Magicked brooms? Now where have I seen these before?

source: It has to be a trap... It's always a trap.
target: It has to be a trap... It's always a trap.

source: I sense a malign magic in the air.
target: I sense a malign magic in the air.

source: Her Grace's gardens. As beautiful as ever.
target: Her Grace's gardens. As beautiful as ever.

source:
I almost feel bad interrupting their meal.
Even if they are only illusions.
target:
I almost feel bad interrupting their meal.
Even if they are only illusions.

source: I can but wonder how lonely they must be.
target: I can but wonder how lonely they must be.

source: Their mastery of illusions is impressive.
target: Their mastery of illusions is impressive.

source: Keep it together, Alphinaud. They're only illusions...
target: Keep it together, Alphinaud. They're only illusions...

source: Wonderful, more illusions. And now they're dancing this time.
target: Wonderful, more illusions. And now they're dancing this time.

source: An eerie yet beautiful sight, is it not?
target: An eerie yet beautiful sight, is it not?

source: It's as if we're glimpsing into the past.
target: It's as if we're glimpsing into the past.

source: Please! We did not come to fight!
target: Please! We did not come to fight!

source: Well, so much for the diplomatic approach.
target: Well, so much for the diplomatic approach.

source: Oh dear. They don't yet seem inclined to talk.
target: Oh dear. They don't yet seem inclined to talk.

source: Wait! We only wish to talk!
target: Wait! We only wish to talk!

source: I knew this was a bad idea.
target: I knew this was a bad idea.

source: Not exactly a good first impression, but it will have to suffice.
target: Not exactly a good first impression, but it will have to suffice.

source: I doubt they will be quite so affable when next we meet.
target: I doubt they will be quite so affable when next we meet.

source: Is there no end to these creatures?
target: Is there no end to these creatures?

source: Another chance to garner their interest.
target: Another chance to garner their interest.

source: They certainly have a gift for creating familiars. If only there were not so many...
target: They certainly have a gift for creating familiars. If only there were not so many...

source: I had hoped it was only a topiary. Alas...
target: I had hoped it was only a topiary. Alas...

source: Mayhap now we have sown the seeds of interest.
target: Mayhap now we have sown the seeds of interest.

source: Well, I'd rather not have to do that again...
target: Well, I'd rather not have to do that again...

source: I've had my fill of this garden. Let us move on.
target: I've had my fill of this garden. Let us move on.

source: Perhaps now they see us as more than mere intruders.
target: Perhaps now they see us as more than mere intruders.

source: By the gods, they've given life to flame!
target: By the gods, they've given life to flame!

source: Looks like they're finally taking us seriously.
target: Looks like they're finally taking us seriously.

source: Have care. There's something peculiar about those flames.
target: Have care. There's something peculiar about those flames.

source: I do believe we now have not only their curiosity, but their attention as well.
target: I do believe we now have not only their curiosity, but their attention as well.

source: <sob> Please... I don't want to use this power anymore...
target: <sob> Please... I don't want to use this power anymore...

source: <sob> I have no place in the world...
target: <sob> I have no place in the world...

source: There, there. Everything is fine, now.
target: There, there. Everything is fine, now.

source: I see no further signs of wayward mochi about. Let us return to Limsa Lominsa for now.
target: I see no further signs of wayward mochi about. Let us return to Limsa Lominsa for now.

source: I fear this is too much for us. Fall back!
target: I fear this is too much for us. Fall back!

source: Is there no end to this blasted mochi?
target: Is there no end to this blasted mochi?

source: Careful! No harm must come to Gozu!
target: Careful! No harm must come to Gozu!

source: Be sure to stand clear of Gozu!
target: Be sure to stand clear of Gozu!

source: Foolish bamboo! You dare to face my blade!?
target: Foolish bamboo! You dare to face my blade!?

source: Let the bamboo fall where it may!
target: Let the bamboo fall where it may!

source: Well, I'd say we're off to a fine start.
target: Well, I'd say we're off to a fine start.

source: Perhaps. But how long our good fortune holds remains to be seen.
target: Perhaps. But how long our good fortune holds remains to be seen.

source: How quaint. They remind me of Master Matoya's brooms.
target: How quaint. They remind me of Master Matoya's brooms.

source: You and I remember those brooms─and their owner─quite differently.
target: You and I remember those brooms─and their owner─quite differently.

source: Oh dear. They don't yet seem inclined to talk.
target: Oh dear. They don't yet seem inclined to talk.

source: Well, it was your idea to brandish blades at the door.
target: Well, it was your idea to brandish blades at the door.

source: I doubt they will be quite so affable when next we meet.
target: I doubt they will be quite so affable when next we meet.

source: Another chance to pique their curiosity, then.
target: Another chance to pique their curiosity, then.

source: Her Grace's gardens. As beautiful as ever.
target: Her Grace's gardens. As beautiful as ever.

source: The path makes a curious pattern. Not unlike a magicked circle.
target: The path makes a curious pattern. Not unlike a magicked circle.

source: Is there no end to these creatures?
target: Is there no end to these creatures?

source: If they think a few plants can slow us down, they're sorely mistaken.
target: If they think a few plants can slow us down, they're sorely mistaken.

source: If we dried these leaves... Perhaps we could use them for tea!
target: If we dried these leaves... Perhaps we could use them for tea!

source: Oh come now, Alphinaud. Don't be silly.
target: Oh come now, Alphinaud. Don't be silly.

source:
Haha, very funny. I know they're not ghosts.
...At least I hope they're not.
target:
Haha, very funny. I know they're not ghosts.
...At least I hope they're not.

source: I do believe we now have not only their curiosity, but their attention as well.
target: I do believe we now have not only their curiosity, but their attention as well.

source: Then we had best not waste it.
target: Then we had best not waste it.

source:
The chivalric spirit
shall prevail this day!
target:
The chivalric spirit
shall prevail this day!

source: Excellent, the work's just about done! You've all earned a good rest!
target: Excellent, the work's just about done! You've all earned a good rest!

source: Save for these weapons there's naught to be found here.
target: Save for these weapons there's naught to be found here.

source: Perhaps these will serve to refresh his memory.
target: Perhaps these will serve to refresh his memory.

source: Right, we've got enough supplies! It's time to put 'em to use!
target: Right, we've got enough supplies! It's time to put 'em to use!

source: To start with, we're buildin' facilities on the east side. Grab yourselves some material and hop to!
target: To start with, we're buildin' facilities on the east side. Grab yourselves some material and hop to!

source: Here's where we lay the foundation for the new Firmament! Show me what you can do!
target: Here's where we lay the foundation for the new Firmament! Show me what you can do!

source: We're stocked up on supplies again. Let's get back to it!
target: We're stocked up on supplies again. Let's get back to it!

source: We're pickin' up where we left off on the east side. Take what material you need and set to work!
target: We're pickin' up where we left off on the east side. Take what material you need and set to work!

source: If we keep our heads down, we'll finish it today. Neat and tidy does it!
target: If we keep our heads down, we'll finish it today. Neat and tidy does it!

source: Aye, that's enough supplies, I reckon. Right, everyone, let's get to work!
target: Aye, that's enough supplies, I reckon. Right, everyone, let's get to work!

source: This time we're buildin' facilities on the west side. Grab some material and put your backs into it!
target: This time we're buildin' facilities on the west side. Grab some material and put your backs into it!

source: Show me what it means to have pride in your work!
target: Show me what it means to have pride in your work!

source: Right, we've replenished the supplies we used up last time.
target: Right, we've replenished the supplies we used up last time.

source: We're continuin' our work on the west side. You know what to do!
target: We're continuin' our work on the west side. You know what to do!

source: We're almost through with this task. Let's stay focused to the last!
target: We're almost through with this task. Let's stay focused to the last!

source: Look alive, everyone! Today, we're lightin' up the court!
target: Look alive, everyone! Today, we're lightin' up the court!

source: Use the material to make firewood, then feed it to the braziers─it's simple as that.
target: Use the material to make firewood, then feed it to the braziers─it's simple as that.

source: Let's stoke a roarin' fire to match our builders' spirit!
target: Let's stoke a roarin' fire to match our builders' spirit!

source: Right, our stores are lookin' good. It's time to add the finishin' touches!
target: Right, our stores are lookin' good. It's time to add the finishin' touches!

source: Grab some material─we're refurbishin' the skybuilders' board and makin' a kitchen to boot!
target: Grab some material─we're refurbishin' the skybuilders' board and makin' a kitchen to boot!

source: Keep your hearts in it, everyone! We're just about done with the court!
target: Keep your hearts in it, everyone! We're just about done with the court!

source: What in the Fury's name? After all this time, this is all we've managed? <sigh> We're going to have to start over...
target: What in the Fury's name? After all this time, this is all we've managed? <sigh> We're going to have to start over...

source: Stay away from me! Stay away!
target: Stay away from me! Stay away!

source: Get out... Get out of my head...
target: Get out... Get out of my head...

source: Yeowch! I-I don't want to become porxelain!
target: Yeowch! I-I don't want to become porxelain!

source: Nooo! The water will warp my winsome curves!
target: Nooo! The water will warp my winsome curves!

source: Ack! Burst this bubble, will you!
target: Ack! Burst this bubble, will you!

source: Just so! Empower me with your hatred, your despair!
target: Just so! Empower me with your hatred, your despair!

source: Curse you, Father! You sent him to his death!
target: Curse you, Father! You sent him to his death!

source: Savages! You stole him from me!
target: Savages! You stole him from me!

source: Brother, do not leave me, I beg you!
target: Brother, do not leave me, I beg you!

source: What surprise is in store for us next, I wonder.
target: What surprise is in store for us next, I wonder.

source: I trust you'll make the right choice this time.
target: I trust you'll make the right choice this time.

source: I will defer to your judgment.
target: I will defer to your judgment.

source: Whatever comes out, we can handle it.
target: Whatever comes out, we can handle it.

source: Soon we can quit this place.
target: Soon we can quit this place.

source: Quickly, before they can overwhelm us!
target: Quickly, before they can overwhelm us!

source: That should be the last of the chamber's defenses.
target: That should be the last of the chamber's defenses.

source: I am glad that is over...
target: I am glad that is over...

source: The site of the Bozja incident...
target: The site of the Bozja incident...

source: (Did it appear because he mentioned the Principia, I wonder?)
target: (Did it appear because he mentioned the Principia, I wonder?)

source: I say we strike before they can regroup.
target: I say we strike before they can regroup.

source: Why bother? They're but ants beneath our boot.
target: Why bother? They're but ants beneath our boot.

source: You know the price for insurrection!
target: You know the price for insurrection!

source: Father was so angry that day...
target: Father was so angry that day...

source: What is the meaning of thisss?
target: What is the meaning of thisss?

source: Come unto flesh, O forgotten form...
target: Come unto flesh, O forgotten form...

source: Every last one of you will die!
target: Every last one of you will die!

source: Die, and lie beneath the silt!
target: Die, and lie beneath the silt!

source: I regret to disappoint, but I'm more than comfortable with heights!
target: I regret to disappoint, but I'm more than comfortable with heights!

source: If you have any complaints about the schedule, feel free to take them up with Master Wawalago.
target: If you have any complaints about the schedule, feel free to take them up with Master Wawalago.

source:
Would that I had brought my own rod... Perhaps if I...
Ah, what am I thinkin'? I've captainly duties to attend to!
target:
Would that I had brought my own rod... Perhaps if I...
Ah, what am I thinkin'? I've captainly duties to attend to!

source: The stronger the bite, the bigger the fish!
target: The stronger the bite, the bigger the fish!

source: Fish might look simple, but some can be mighty particular when it comes to their bait.
target: Fish might look simple, but some can be mighty particular when it comes to their bait.

source: Fish! Fish with every scantling of your being!
target: Fish! Fish with every scantling of your being!

source: Fish twice as hard, for my sake!
target: Fish twice as hard, for my sake!

source: Hah hah, the feast is here!
target: Hah hah, the feast is here!

source: If you can't land a catch now, I'll have to ask you to turn in your rod!
target: If you can't land a catch now, I'll have to ask you to turn in your rod!

source: Distraction's a fisher's worst enemy! Focus on your rod! Focus!
target: Distraction's a fisher's worst enemy! Focus on your rod! Focus!

source: When the sun sets, the sea comes alive.
target: When the sun sets, the sea comes alive.

source: Once, one of my crew dropped a lantern overboard. The waters started glittering as if to thank us!
target: Once, one of my crew dropped a lantern overboard. The waters started glittering as if to thank us!

source: Rumor has it that during rough weather is when the spectral megalodon sets out on its hunt.
target: Rumor has it that during rough weather is when the spectral megalodon sets out on its hunt.

source: Pray you don't disturb the spectral megalodon. I've heard stories of it swallowin' whole crews in one gulp.
target: Pray you don't disturb the spectral megalodon. I've heard stories of it swallowin' whole crews in one gulp.

source: In the dead of night, I swear I've seen the coral itself movin' about like some kind of worm.
target: In the dead of night, I swear I've seen the coral itself movin' about like some kind of worm.

source: There ain't a shrimp to be found in these waters. What's eatin' them, you think?
target: There ain't a shrimp to be found in these waters. What's eatin' them, you think?

source: The spectral discus is a sight to see, but it'll startle at the smallest sound.
target: The spectral discus is a sight to see, but it'll startle at the smallest sound.

source: Watch out for the spectral discus─it ain't tiny, so I reckon it'll be hard to miss!
target: Watch out for the spectral discus─it ain't tiny, so I reckon it'll be hard to miss!

source: What? Are those...mouse bones? What in the seven hells happened here?
target: What? Are those...mouse bones? What in the seven hells happened here?

source: If you're in the mood for a fright, try fishin' here in the dark. You won't regret it─or maybe you will!
target: If you're in the mood for a fright, try fishin' here in the dark. You won't regret it─or maybe you will!

source: This heat's rough, but if you can bear the sun beatin' down on you, you'll have your pick of the fish.
target: This heat's rough, but if you can bear the sun beatin' down on you, you'll have your pick of the fish.

source: The fish here are huge, and slow as they come! Shouldn't be hard to land a catch.
target: The fish here are huge, and slow as they come! Shouldn't be hard to land a catch.

source: Last time we made land someone told me of a fish that swims with the risin' sun.
target: Last time we made land someone told me of a fish that swims with the risin' sun.

source: I've seen some fishers have luck with a longer cast.
target: I've seen some fishers have luck with a longer cast.

source: The fish here might be small, but they're as fierce as any in the sea!
target: The fish here might be small, but they're as fierce as any in the sea!

source: When the wind howls and the thunder claps, the prize catches come out to swim.
target: When the wind howls and the thunder claps, the prize catches come out to swim.

source: They say when thunder rolls across the sky, it whips certain fish into a frenzy. So they say, anyway.
target: They say when thunder rolls across the sky, it whips certain fish into a frenzy. So they say, anyway.

source: If you're lookin' to bait the spectral current, you'll want to cast for the little fish, I reckon.
target: If you're lookin' to bait the spectral current, you'll want to cast for the little fish, I reckon.

source: Local legend has it that when night falls, a horror rises from the depths to drag down unwary vessels...
target: Local legend has it that when night falls, a horror rises from the depths to drag down unwary vessels...

source: What's been eatin' the squid, then? This spot used to be swarmin' with 'em.
target: What's been eatin' the squid, then? This spot used to be swarmin' with 'em.

source: Bloody hells, it's comin' down in buckets. This'll rile up the schools...
target: Bloody hells, it's comin' down in buckets. This'll rile up the schools...

source: Bait your hook for fish of middling size. You'll thank me later.
target: Bait your hook for fish of middling size. You'll thank me later.

source: Saw an unlikely creature in the water earlier this morning─thought I might still be dreamin'.
target: Saw an unlikely creature in the water earlier this morning─thought I might still be dreamin'.

source: Little insects are the ticket to some extraordinary catches. Trust me.
target: Little insects are the ticket to some extraordinary catches. Trust me.

source: Ugh, it's like sailin' through a damn waterfall. Just the kind of weather <var 1A 02 /var>they<var 1A 01 /var> like to hunt in...
target: Ugh, it's like sailin' through a damn waterfall. Just the kind of weather <var 1A 02 /var>they<var 1A 01 /var> like to hunt in...

source: Careful, now. There's some big, mean buggers that swim in these parts, and they ain't shy about comin' up for a bite!
target: Careful, now. There's some big, mean buggers that swim in these parts, and they ain't shy about comin' up for a bite!

source: Sometimes after dusk, you hear it echo across the water...a grindin', crackin', crunchin' kind of sound.
target: Sometimes after dusk, you hear it echo across the water...a grindin', crackin', crunchin' kind of sound.

source: I hear the beaches hereabouts are strewn with bits of shattered shells.
target: I hear the beaches hereabouts are strewn with bits of shattered shells.

source: Some fish love swimmin' about in a thunderstorm. It's like they're just darin' a bolt to strike!
target: Some fish love swimmin' about in a thunderstorm. It's like they're just darin' a bolt to strike!

source: No one knows why, but big catches and spectral currents often go hand in hand. What's the ocean tellin' us, I wonder?
target: No one knows why, but big catches and spectral currents often go hand in hand. What's the ocean tellin' us, I wonder?

source: Around here the risin' sun brings big fish, lookin' for a meal. Wouldn't want to miss breakfast.
target: Around here the risin' sun brings big fish, lookin' for a meal. Wouldn't want to miss breakfast.

source: A master fisher once told me that he owed his success to the sack of fresh mackerel he always kept close at hand.
target: A master fisher once told me that he owed his success to the sack of fresh mackerel he always kept close at hand.

source: I can barely tell the sea from the rain! Those little buggers love swimmin' in a downpour, though...
target: I can barely tell the sea from the rain! Those little buggers love swimmin' in a downpour, though...

source: Stands to reason that to catch a small fish, you need even smaller bait!
target: Stands to reason that to catch a small fish, you need even smaller bait!

source: I've heard whispers that a pair of Ruby Dragons prowl these waters at night. Always wanted to see 'em with my own eyes.
target: I've heard whispers that a pair of Ruby Dragons prowl these waters at night. Always wanted to see 'em with my own eyes.

source: Glass dragons aren't known to suffer competition. If you want to draw one out, make it think a rival's encroachin' on their territory.
target: Glass dragons aren't known to suffer competition. If you want to draw one out, make it think a rival's encroachin' on their territory.

source: Storm like this, I'd bet a sack o' gil that a certain fish is on the prowl...
target: Storm like this, I'd bet a sack o' gil that a certain fish is on the prowl...

source: Keep your wits about you in these waters. The fish might not look it, but they can pull that rod right out of your hands!
target: Keep your wits about you in these waters. The fish might not look it, but they can pull that rod right out of your hands!

source: Sailors say that when night falls, you can see a volcano come to life on the ocean floor, like a single red eye openin' in the darkness.
target: Sailors say that when night falls, you can see a volcano come to life on the ocean floor, like a single red eye openin' in the darkness.

source: Squid are a common sight around here, as are the things that come to hunt 'em.
target: Squid are a common sight around here, as are the things that come to hunt 'em.

source: Sometimes you have to get soakin' wet to have a chance at catchin' the best fish.
target: Sometimes you have to get soakin' wet to have a chance at catchin' the best fish.

source: Brace yourselves against something sturdy. The big bastards in these waters like to give passin' boats a love tap from time to time.
target: Brace yourselves against something sturdy. The big bastards in these waters like to give passin' boats a love tap from time to time.

source: Sailors passin' through these parts have told stories of an undersea flower bed in full bloom.
target: Sailors passin' through these parts have told stories of an undersea flower bed in full bloom.

source: The plum trees are a sight to behold─if you can ignore the bugs swarmin' around them, that is.
target: The plum trees are a sight to behold─if you can ignore the bugs swarmin' around them, that is.

source: Chase down those birds and nab them in your nets!
target: Chase down those birds and nab them in your nets!

source: Use birdlime to slow them down!
target: Use birdlime to slow them down!

source: Be gentle with the birds, okay!?
target: Be gentle with the birds, okay!?

source: Thank you, friend! You're a lifesaver!
target: Thank you, friend! You're a lifesaver!

source: Please lend us your aid again!
target: Please lend us your aid again!

source: How many more are still out there!?
target: How many more are still out there!?

source: Get back here already, will you!?
target: Get back here already, will you!?

source: Am I in the right place for the procession?
target: Am I in the right place for the procession?

source: The eggs are ready. Let the festivities begin!
target: The eggs are ready. Let the festivities begin!

source: Heh. Today's smilin' children are tomorrow's loyal customers.
target: Heh. Today's smilin' children are tomorrow's loyal customers.

source: Can I take this godsdamned rabbit's pate off? It's godsdamned swelterin' in here!
target: Can I take this godsdamned rabbit's pate off? It's godsdamned swelterin' in here!

source: It seems the gang's all here!
target: It seems the gang's all here!

source: Are you ready, my friends? The parade is about to begin!
target: Are you ready, my friends? The parade is about to begin!

source: We make for the Lancers' Guild! Come one, come all!
target: We make for the Lancers' Guild! Come one, come all!

source: Spriggans!? Why does it always have to be spriggans...
target: Spriggans!? Why does it always have to be spriggans...

source: Show some spirit! It's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, after all!
target: Show some spirit! It's Hatching<var 1F /var>tide, after all!

source: What does a bloke have to do to get a bleedin' drink around here!?
target: What does a bloke have to do to get a bleedin' drink around here!?

source: Don't forget the children! Share the gift of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide with one and all!
target: Don't forget the children! Share the gift of Hatching<var 1F /var>tide with one and all!

source: Over here! No child must go home empty-handed!
target: Over here! No child must go home empty-handed!

source: Our work here is done! Time to move on!
target: Our work here is done! Time to move on!

source: Prepare the presents! The children await!
target: Prepare the presents! The children await!

source: I'm a weaponsmith, not a bleedin' wet nurse!
target: I'm a weaponsmith, not a bleedin' wet nurse!

source: Spriggy say less talky, more givy!
target: Spriggy say less talky, more givy!

source: Alright, already! Just get your bloody paws off me!
target: Alright, already! Just get your bloody paws off me!

source: I could swear I've heard that voice somewhere...
target: I could swear I've heard that voice somewhere...

source: Mister Rabbit! Missus Rabbit! Do you have an egg for me!?
target: Mister Rabbit! Missus Rabbit! Do you have an egg for me!?

source: And me! I want an egg, too!
target: And me! I want an egg, too!

source: No dilly-dallying! We must move on!
target: No dilly-dallying! We must move on!

source: The Lancers' Guild is up ahead. Just a bit further now!
target: The Lancers' Guild is up ahead. Just a bit further now!

source: The procession is almost at an end. How many children smiled because of you today?
target: The procession is almost at an end. How many children smiled because of you today?

source: There's only one thing these savages are good for...
target: There's only one thing these savages are good for...

source: This marks the end of the procession!
target: This marks the end of the procession!

source: Be proud, my friends, for you have made many a child happy this day!
target: Be proud, my friends, for you have made many a child happy this day!

source: Should you be willing to join us again, we welcome your participation.
target: Should you be willing to join us again, we welcome your participation.
