source: Till next time, a happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to one and all!
target: Till next time, a happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to one and all!

source: All right, people, it's time for our first concerted works in a while!
target: All right, people, it's time for our first concerted works in a while!

source: We're buildin' the Mattock, and to begin with, we need to clear away the debris!
target: We're buildin' the Mattock, and to begin with, we need to clear away the debris!

source: It's the first of many steps to come, so let's see this off to a good start!
target: It's the first of many steps to come, so let's see this off to a good start!

source: We've got the supplies we need. Now it's time to get to work!
target: We've got the supplies we need. Now it's time to get to work!

source: It's the same task as before─clearing away debris in preparation for the road!
target: It's the same task as before─clearing away debris in preparation for the road!

source: Let's see to it nothin' lies in the way of the reconstruction effort!
target: Let's see to it nothin' lies in the way of the reconstruction effort!

source: To your places, everyone. It's time to get to work!
target: To your places, everyone. It's time to get to work!

source: Today, we're clearing away the last little bits of debris on the Mattock.
target: Today, we're clearing away the last little bits of debris on the Mattock.

source: How good a job we do will tell on the next works, so let's make it squeaky clean!
target: How good a job we do will tell on the next works, so let's make it squeaky clean!

source: Our stores are in good order, which means it's time for more concerted works!
target: Our stores are in good order, which means it's time for more concerted works!

source: Grab the supplies you need, and let's pave the way─literally and figuratively!
target: Grab the supplies you need, and let's pave the way─literally and figuratively!

source: The end's in sight, so give it everything you've got!
target: The end's in sight, so give it everything you've got!

source: All right! It's time for the next round of concerted works!
target: All right! It's time for the next round of concerted works!

source: We're gettin' started on the fountain. Grab the supplies you need and put 'em to use!
target: We're gettin' started on the fountain. Grab the supplies you need and put 'em to use!

source: This will be a place of rest and relaxation for residents, so let's not spare any effort!
target: This will be a place of rest and relaxation for residents, so let's not spare any effort!

source: I hope you're all ready to work, because today we're makin' that fountain flow!
target: I hope you're all ready to work, because today we're makin' that fountain flow!

source: Everything you need, you can get from the supply pile!
target: Everything you need, you can get from the supply pile!

source: Let's make it into a beautiful place the residents can be proud of!
target: Let's make it into a beautiful place the residents can be proud of!

source: All right, everyone. From today, we're commencin' works on Saint Roelle's Dais!
target: All right, everyone. From today, we're commencin' works on Saint Roelle's Dais!

source: First things first: we need scaffolds. Grab yourselves some supplies and get to it!
target: First things first: we need scaffolds. Grab yourselves some supplies and get to it!

source: We're layin' the groundwork for what's to come, so let's make it as sturdy as can be!
target: We're layin' the groundwork for what's to come, so let's make it as sturdy as can be!

source: Right then, it's time to get busy on Saint Roelle's Dais!
target: Right then, it's time to get busy on Saint Roelle's Dais!

source: The area's a mess of debris, so that's what we're gonna work on today.
target: The area's a mess of debris, so that's what we're gonna work on today.

source: Let's put our backs into it and clear ourselves a path!
target: Let's put our backs into it and clear ourselves a path!

source: Get ready, everyone! It's time for another round of concerted works!
target: Get ready, everyone! It's time for another round of concerted works!

source: We're clearin' away the last bits of debris scattered across Saint Roelle's Dais.
target: We're clearin' away the last bits of debris scattered across Saint Roelle's Dais.

source: Might be as it's a humble task, but let's do a tidy job of it!
target: Might be as it's a humble task, but let's do a tidy job of it!

source: We've reached our target for supplies. Time to get to work again!
target: We've reached our target for supplies. Time to get to work again!

source: Grab what you need from the supply pile, and we'll start fixin' up Saint Roelle's Dais!
target: Grab what you need from the supply pile, and we'll start fixin' up Saint Roelle's Dais!

source: Speed's of the essence for this task, so let's keep those hands movin'!
target: Speed's of the essence for this task, so let's keep those hands movin'!

source: Right, it's time to make Saint Roelle's Dais true to its name!
target: Right, it's time to make Saint Roelle's Dais true to its name!

source: Help yourselves to the supplies, and let's see the stage finished!
target: Help yourselves to the supplies, and let's see the stage finished!

source: Show me the best of your workmanship, now!
target: Show me the best of your workmanship, now!

source: All right, everyone, we're finally gettin' started on the New Nest proper!
target: All right, everyone, we're finally gettin' started on the New Nest proper!

source: First order of business is clearin' the debris in the area by the Mendicant's Court!
target: First order of business is clearin' the debris in the area by the Mendicant's Court!

source: The more hands we have, the quicker we'll be done!
target: The more hands we have, the quicker we'll be done!

source: Roll up your sleeves, 'cause concerted works are startin'!
target: Roll up your sleeves, 'cause concerted works are startin'!

source: Today, we're clearin' away more debris ahead of construction on the New Nest!
target: Today, we're clearin' away more debris ahead of construction on the New Nest!

source: Let's stay focused and get it done with the least fuss!
target: Let's stay focused and get it done with the least fuss!

source: Right, the appointed hour's here. Let's get to work!
target: Right, the appointed hour's here. Let's get to work!

source: There's still debris in the New Nest that wants for clearin', so that's our task for today.
target: There's still debris in the New Nest that wants for clearin', so that's our task for today.

source: Once we're done, that'll be it for the large chunks!
target: Once we're done, that'll be it for the large chunks!

source: Right, let's get these works underway!
target: Right, let's get these works underway!

source: This time we're clearin' away the fine debris still scattered about the New Nest.
target: This time we're clearin' away the fine debris still scattered about the New Nest.

source: There's a lot of ground to cover, so we'll want to split into smaller crews!
target: There's a lot of ground to cover, so we'll want to split into smaller crews!

source: All right, everyone, it's time for more concerted works!
target: All right, everyone, it's time for more concerted works!

source: After all that clearin' we did for the New Nest, we're finally startin' on the actual buildin'.
target: After all that clearin' we did for the New Nest, we're finally startin' on the actual buildin'.

source: Grab the supplies you need, and we'll fix up all the streets and steps!
target: Grab the supplies you need, and we'll fix up all the streets and steps!

source: Startin' from today, we're gonna be buildin' houses!
target: Startin' from today, we're gonna be buildin' houses!

source: This hardly needs sayin', but this is what we've been workin' towards!
target: This hardly needs sayin', but this is what we've been workin' towards!

source: So go and grab some supplies, and let's show our builders' spirit!
target: So go and grab some supplies, and let's show our builders' spirit!

source: To your places, everyone! We're commencin' concerted works!
target: To your places, everyone! We're commencin' concerted works!

source: Today, we're completin' the first set of houses! You know where the supplies are!
target: Today, we're completin' the first set of houses! You know where the supplies are!

source: The work we do here will set the tone for the rest, so let your skills shine!
target: The work we do here will set the tone for the rest, so let your skills shine!

source: Our stores are in good shape. It's time to get back to it!
target: Our stores are in good shape. It's time to get back to it!

source: We're startin' on more houses today, and we'll keep buildin' them till we've filled up the New Nest.
target: We're startin' on more houses today, and we'll keep buildin' them till we've filled up the New Nest.

source: Take what supplies you need and put 'em to good use!
target: Take what supplies you need and put 'em to good use!

source: We've replenished our supplies, so it's time for more works!
target: We've replenished our supplies, so it's time for more works!

source: The goal today's to complete another set of houses.
target: The goal today's to complete another set of houses.

source: Let's build 'em as if you're buildin' your own home!
target: Let's build 'em as if you're buildin' your own home!

source: Right, everyone, it's time to commence the next works!
target: Right, everyone, it's time to commence the next works!

source: This time it's the final site for the New Nest, and the last set of houses!
target: This time it's the final site for the New Nest, and the last set of houses!

source: By now it goes without sayin', but the job calls for precision, so let's keep it nice and tidy!
target: By now it goes without sayin', but the job calls for precision, so let's keep it nice and tidy!

source: This is it, everyone! The very last works for the New Nest!
target: This is it, everyone! The very last works for the New Nest!

source: Today, we're completin' not only the last of the houses, but the entire area as well!
target: Today, we're completin' not only the last of the houses, but the entire area as well!

source: Let's give it absolutely everything we've got and finish on a high note!
target: Let's give it absolutely everything we've got and finish on a high note!

source: Deft of paw, with kin do I vie.
target: Я мягколап, друзей своих люблю изрядно.

source: Betterment of the whole do our efforts descry.
target: И средь подобных мне провозглашу закон ветвей.

source: With fearsome fang, I travel with pack.
target: Я жуткий клык и коготь, я стаи часть.

source: For peace our land shall never lack.
target: В гармонии прокладываю путь своей страны.

source: On my belly do I crawl.
target: Хожу на животе, мой взгляд недвижен.

source: By my strength, prosperity reigns in our hall.
target: Я процветание несу в свою обитель.

source: Perhaps a hint is carved in the stone...
Would that I could read these talismans.
target: Если бы я могла понять эти талисманы...

source: <sigh> I can make no sense of this riddle.
Is there perhaps some meaning to their arrangement?
target: Может, подсказка в том, как они расположены?

source: Strange... All of these talismans appear blank to my eye.
What is this meant to be?
We have to get them back... We have to!
target: Мы должны вернуть их... Мы должны!

source: Almet will be fine... She has to be...
target: С Алмет всё будет в порядке... Всё будет в порядке...

source: Heh... Not as easy as hammerin' dents in kettles, ain't it?
target: Heh... Not as easy as hammerin' dents in kettles, ain't it?

source: R-Rowena!? What in the seventh hell─!?
target: R-Rowena!? What in the seventh hell─!?

source: Shush now. I've got a reputation to uphold.
target: Shush now. I've got a reputation to uphold.

source: Heh... Wouldn't have figured you the type for dressin' up like a rabbit.
target: Heh... Wouldn't have figured you the type for dressin' up like a rabbit.

source: Shut yer gob, Rowena! Ye look as bleedin' ridiculous as I do!
target: Shut yer gob, Rowena! Ye look as bleedin' ridiculous as I do!

source: After all, today's children are tomorrow's customers, I always say...
target: After all, today's children are tomorrow's customers, I always say...

source: A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to you, my young friend!
target: A happy Hatching<var 1F /var>tide to you, my young friend!

source: <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> get an egg! And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> get an egg!
target: <var 1A 02 /var>You<var 1A 01 /var> get an egg! And <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> get an egg!

source: Remember to shop at the House o' Splendors!
target: Remember to shop at the House o' Splendors!

source: We're always lookin' for good help!
target: We're always lookin' for good help!

source: Here's yer bleedin' egg, ye whiny brat!
target: Here's yer bleedin' egg, ye whiny brat!

source: Take yer present an' stop yer bloody cryin' already!
target: Take yer present an' stop yer bloody cryin' already!

source: Do you have an egg for me, <var 08 E905 ((Missus)) ((Mister)) /var> Rabbit!?
target: Do you have an egg for me, <var 08 E905 ((Missus)) ((Mister)) /var> Rabbit!?

source: I see we're not to have a peaceful journey.
target: I see we're not to have a peaceful journey.

source: Mayhaps 'twas Bismarck with whom I ought have bargained...
target: Mayhaps 'twas Bismarck with whom I ought have bargained...

source: Mayhaps 'twas Bismarck with whom I ought have bargained...
target: Mayhaps 'twas Bismarck with whom I ought have bargained...

source: This lot are nothing compared to the barnacles.
target: This lot are nothing compared to the barnacles.

source: Such ease of motion despite his size─it's truly a wonder.
target: Such ease of motion despite his size─it's truly a wonder.

source: Such ease of motion despite his size─it's truly a wonder.
target: Such ease of motion despite his size─it's truly a wonder.

source: I'm certainly glad for Bismarck's preparation now.
target: I'm certainly glad for Bismarck's preparation now.

source: The force of it...'twas nigh overwhelming.
target: The force of it...'twas nigh overwhelming.

source: The force of it...'twas nigh overwhelming.
target: The force of it...'twas nigh overwhelming.

source: Just...stay on your feet this time, please.
target: Just...stay on your feet this time, please.

source: Come along. Disturbing secrets await, and all that.
target: Come along. Disturbing secrets await, and all that.

source: We are fated to happen upon strange abominations, apparently.
target: We are fated to happen upon strange abominations, apparently.

source: We are fated to happen upon strange abominations, apparently.
target: We are fated to happen upon strange abominations, apparently.

source: Never have I seen the like.
target: Never have I seen the like.

source: Might similar creatures dwell beneath the seas of the Source?
target: Might similar creatures dwell beneath the seas of the Source?

source: Do... Do you think there are more of them?
target: Do... Do you think there are more of them?

source: Might similar creatures dwell beneath the seas of the Source?
target: Might similar creatures dwell beneath the seas of the Source?

source: The similarities to Amaurot are undeniable.
target: The similarities to Amaurot are undeniable.

source: This is precisely what we were looking for.
target: This is precisely what we were looking for.

source: What are they doing with that crystal?
target: What are they doing with that crystal?

source: Whatever they're doing, I doubt it's good for us.
target: Whatever they're doing, I doubt it's good for us.

source: In channeling aether through the crystal... Hmm.
target: In channeling aether through the crystal... Hmm.

source: In channeling aether through the crystal... Hmm.
target: In channeling aether through the crystal... Hmm.

source: I think we have passed the point of theory!
target: I think we have passed the point of theory!

source: Looks like the benthos have learned to use this place.
target: Looks like the benthos have learned to use this place.

source: An impressive concept, to be certain.
target: An impressive concept, to be certain.

source: An impressive concept, to be certain.
target: An impressive concept, to be certain.

source: We might learn much, if more such crystals are to be found within.
target: We might learn much, if more such crystals are to be found within.

source: Why, this... This could take a lifetime to study...
target: Why, this... This could take a lifetime to study...

source: Why, this... This could take a lifetime to study...
target: Why, this... This could take a lifetime to study...

source: There may be still more out of sight.
target: There may be still more out of sight.

source: Though I mislike this, we may as well have done with it.
target: Though I mislike this, we may as well have done with it.

source: She plans to fight us herself? How efficient.
target: She plans to fight us herself? How efficient.

source: Yonder queen standeth as more than symbol to her soldiers. Have caution.
target: Yonder queen standeth as more than symbol to her soldiers. Have caution.

source: Though I mislike this, we may as well have done with it.
target: Though I mislike this, we may as well have done with it.

source: If she wants a fight, I'm happy to oblige!
target: If she wants a fight, I'm happy to oblige!

source: For the sake of our world!
target: For the sake of our world!

source: In the name of the Light!
target: In the name of the Light!

source: To the ashes whence you came!
target: To the ashes whence you came!

source: Lend me your strength, my servants!
target: Lend me your strength, my servants!

source: There they are! Resting right out in the open!
target: There they are! Resting right out in the open!

source: Just as our scouts reported. We'll hit them hard and fast!
target: Just as our scouts reported. We'll hit them hard and fast!

source: Like an eagle amongst the hares!
target: Like an eagle amongst the hares!

source: The bastards grow too bold by half...
target: The bastards grow too bold by half...

source: Well? What are you waiting for? Crush them!
target: Well? What are you waiting for? Crush them!

source: What's this I see? The pride of the Empire hard-pressed by Resistance rabble?
target: What's this I see? The pride of the Empire hard-pressed by Resistance rabble?

source: Bah, this brutish squabble has gone on long enough.
target: Bah, this brutish squabble has gone on long enough.

source: If you are so eager to feel the flames of war, then I shall be happy to oblige!
target: If you are so eager to feel the flames of war, then I shall be happy to oblige!

source: Hmph, you are more stalwart than I gave you credit for.
target: Hmph, you are more stalwart than I gave you credit for.

source: A poor showing from my own troops, but nevertheless...they served well enough to keep you distracted.
target: A poor showing from my own troops, but nevertheless...they served well enough to keep you distracted.

source: We will meet again, I think. In fact, I shall make certain of it.
target: We will meet again, I think. In fact, I shall make certain of it.

source: A few more staves and we'd have had them... Retreat!
target: A few more staves and we'd have had them... Retreat!

source: Let the cowards flee. We need to lick our own wounds.
target: Let the cowards flee. We need to lick our own wounds.

source: Even so, I'll count this one a victory!
target: Even so, I'll count this one a victory!

source: We wouldn't have held out much longer.
target: We wouldn't have held out much longer.

source: Let's just be glad we survived...
target: Let's just be glad we survived...

source: Hmph. The briefest lick of fire, and they burn to cinders.
target: Hmph. The briefest lick of fire, and they burn to cinders.

source: Why, this “Resistance” may as well be a stack of kindling!
target: Why, this “Resistance” may as well be a stack of kindling!

source: Withdraw at your leisure, men. The enemy is beaten.
target: Withdraw at your leisure, men. The enemy is beaten.

source: Right, pack it up, lads! We return the victors this day!
target: Right, pack it up, lads! We return the victors this day!

source: The imperials have us outmatched... Fall back!
target: The imperials have us outmatched... Fall back!

source: Weapons at the ready! We fight our way free!
target: Weapons at the ready! We fight our way free!

source: <sigh> Once again I find our soldiers succumbing to an inferior force.
target: <sigh> Once again I find our soldiers succumbing to an inferior force.

source: ...Ah, but of course. I must stand before the vaunted “hero of the Resistance.”
target: ...Ah, but of course. I must stand before the vaunted “hero of the Resistance.”

source:
Fear not, Albeleo.
I, Sartauvoir quo Soranus, will reduce this nuisance to ash.
target:
Fear not, Albeleo.
I, Sartauvoir quo Soranus, will reduce this nuisance to ash.

source: Hah! Though I grow old and grey, ever does the thrill of battle stoke the embers of my soul!
target: Hah! Though I grow old and grey, ever does the thrill of battle stoke the embers of my soul!

source: Yes... The inferno builds to an all-consuming finale! Embrace the spectacle or perish!
target: Yes... The inferno builds to an all-consuming finale! Embrace the spectacle or perish!

source: Glorious! Simply glorious! You see how one must heed the words of one's elders?
target: Glorious! Simply glorious! You see how one must heed the words of one's elders?

source: ...Even as a soldier must heed the commands of his general. I leave you now, but know that this contest will have its conclusion!
target: ...Even as a soldier must heed the commands of his general. I leave you now, but know that this contest will have its conclusion!

source: A pity. I had hoped for a more worthy contest.
target: A pity. I had hoped for a more worthy contest.

source: Still, a soldier must fight as his general commands. We have not the luxury of choosing our opponents...
target: Still, a soldier must fight as his general commands. We have not the luxury of choosing our opponents...

source: My kingdom for a proper bridge.
target: My kingdom for a proper bridge.

source: Odds on not having to fight that giant thing...?
target: Odds on not having to fight that giant thing...?

source: Considering that's one of the androids that attacked us, low.
target: Considering that's one of the androids that attacked us, low.

source: Did you see that blast radius!?
target: Did you see that blast radius!?

source: Look at all of this technology!
target: Look at all of this technology!

source: Now this definitely seems like a trap.
target: Now this definitely seems like a trap.

source: Is it just me...or does this seem...different?
target: Is it just me...or does this seem...different?

source: If you could clear the path...?
target: If you could clear the path...?

source: Am I dead? I don't feel dead.
target: Am I dead? I don't feel dead.

source:
My thanks, you saved our skins out there.
We're headed home, lads─quick march!
target:
My thanks, you saved our skins out there.
We're headed home, lads─quick march!

source: Haha! Found them! Their scouting days are well and truly over!
target: Haha! Found them! Their scouting days are well and truly over!

source: Blaz! Velibor! It's our time to shine!
target: Blaz! Velibor! It's our time to shine!
Ничто не спасётся от моего клинка.

source: Come, Ghun Gun! Our friends need help!
target: Скорее, Гхун Гун! Нашим друзьям нужна помощь!

source: I haven't the faintest what's going on, but you'd best keep moving!
target: Понятия не имею, какого тут происходит, но лучше вам поторопиться!

source: Just when I think there's a commotion...
Lucky we chanced to be testing some Talos!
Well, it's back to the workshop with this lot...
Why do they glow like that? Weird, I tell you!
target: Почему они так светятся? Странно как.

source: These are the ones we should play with, right?
target: С этими мы должны поиграть, да?

source: We Nu Mou are not wont to fight, but we know when we must!
target: Мы, ну моу, не любим биться, но знаем, когда это необходимо!

source: Whatever's going on, you've got my hammer!
target: Что бы это ни было, мой молот с вами!

source: Just another job for a bounty hunter.
I've had far worse than this lot.
Not sin eaters by the look of them.
Whatever they are, they're not to be trifled with.
target: Чем бы они ни были, противники это опасные.

source: Keep it steady, eh, catboy? Don't want no arrow in my arse by accident.
target: Поаккуратнее, котяра! Меньше всего мне нужна стрела в заднице.

source: Wha─!? Do you take me for a craven!?
target: Что?! Ты за кого меня принимаешь?!

source: Ugh, I would <var 1A 02 /var>kill<var 1A 01 /var> for a drink right now...
When this is over, I'll buy you as many as you want!
target: Когда всё закончиться, я тебе целую цистерну куплю!

source: Oho, does that offer extend to me as well?
Save the talk for the tavern! We're not out of the woods yet!
target: Болтать будете в таверне! Мы тут ещё не закончили!

source: Ack, no bloody end in sight...
Press on! We'll hold them here!
Empty metal shells. Barely worth my time.
target: Железяки какие-то. Не стоит моего времени.

source: I find little satisfaction in such feeble prey.
My blade is blunted, withdrawal the only available course of action.
target: Мой клинок затупился, сейчас надо уходить, выбора нет!

source: It's no good, boys. We'd best call it a day.
You won't escape me this time!
target: You won't escape me this time!

source: No! I won't let you have him!
target: No! I won't let you have him!

source: I'll do everything in my power to keep him safe!
target: I'll do everything in my power to keep him safe!

source: There is plenty more where that came from!
target: There is plenty more where that came from!

source: This fight's as good as won!
target: This fight's as good as won!

source: Go back to whatever hole you crawled out from!
target: Go back to whatever hole you crawled out from!

source: You shan't be so lucky a second time!
target: You shan't be so lucky a second time!

source: Will you burn, or will you melt?
target: Will you burn, or will you melt?

source:
I have enjoyed our time together,
but all things must come to an end.
target:
I have enjoyed our time together,
but all things must come to an end.

source:
Though it galls me to use such underhanded tactics,
for you, poison will suffice.
target:
Though it galls me to use such underhanded tactics,
for you, poison will suffice.

source: The light of my flame grows dim...
target: The light of my flame grows dim...

source: As if we don't have enough to contend with...
target: As if we don't have enough to contend with...

source: Well, it made for a change of pace, if nothing else!
target: Well, it made for a change of pace, if nothing else!

source: Might want to watch your step!
target: Might want to watch your step!

source: Today, we take back our homeland!
target: Today, we take back our homeland!

source: You can't keep a good Bozjan down!
target: You can't keep a good Bozjan down!

source: You imperials'll have to try harder than that!
target: You imperials'll have to try harder than that!

source: This isn't getting us anywhere. Retreat!
target: This isn't getting us anywhere. Retreat!

source: No choice left but to withdraw!
target: No choice left but to withdraw!

source: They've gotten the better of us!
target: They've gotten the better of us!

source: Am I no better than a novice?
target: Am I no better than a novice?

source: Even with this blade, I have been found wanting.
target: Even with this blade, I have been found wanting.

source: Looks like I've gotten carried away.
target: Looks like I've gotten carried away.

source: No! I'll not die in a place like this!
target: No! I'll not die in a place like this!

source:
I've still got some fight left in me...
Not much, though.
target:
I've still got some fight left in me...
Not much, though.

source: You'll have to fight the good fight without me...
target: You'll have to fight the good fight without me...

source: Ha! Fat lot of good those fancy weapons did you!
target: Ha! Fat lot of good those fancy weapons did you!

source:
For the glory of...uh...
How does it go, again?
target:
For the glory of...uh...
How does it go, again?

source: Anyway, I'll kill you to death!
target: Anyway, I'll kill you to death!

source: Time to spill some Bozjan blood!
target: Time to spill some Bozjan blood!

source: Stay still and let me kill you!
target: Stay still and let me kill you!

source: You're no match for the mighty Daguza!
target: You're no match for the mighty Daguza!

source: Bwahaha! Is that the best you can muster?
target: Bwahaha! Is that the best you can muster?

source: Battlefield or no, this is our land and we must defend it!
target: Battlefield or no, this is our land and we must defend it!

source: They're more resilient than they look. Fall back!
target: They're more resilient than they look. Fall back!

source: It seems I've lost the upper hand...
target: It seems I've lost the upper hand...

source: All my hate...I bring to bear!
target: All my hate...I bring to bear!

source: My, my. What a pathetic display!
target: My, my. What a pathetic display!

source: I'll leave these sorry wretches to you. Have fun!
target: I'll leave these sorry wretches to you. Have fun!

source: I, in the meantime, shall be spending time with my newest pet.
target: I, in the meantime, shall be spending time with my newest pet.

source: I...I've never seen anything like this before!
target: I...I've never seen anything like this before!

source: Nevertheless, they'll fall like all the rest!
target: Nevertheless, they'll fall like all the rest!

source: It looks like we've cowed them for now.
target: It looks like we've cowed them for now.

source: The injured have made their escape, and I suggest we do likewise.
target: The injured have made their escape, and I suggest we do likewise.

source: How I have waited for this moment!
target: How I have waited for this moment!

source: The castrum is all but ours!
target: The castrum is all but ours!

source: We shall lead the way to victory!
target: We shall lead the way to victory!

source: I knew we could do it!
target: I knew we could do it!

source: Surrender now and no one gets hurt!
target: Surrender now and no one gets hurt!

source: See what your villainy has wrought!
target: See what your villainy has wrought!

source: Stand aside! I have no interest in the likes of you!
target: Stand aside! I have no interest in the likes of you!

source: Our work is far from over.
target: Our work is far from over.

source: I've had training dummies that put up more of a fight!
target: I've had training dummies that put up more of a fight!

source: Just another notch on my hilt!
target: Just another notch on my hilt!

source: This is easier than I thought!
target: This is easier than I thought!

source:
Blaz, Velibor!
We've got them on the run!
target:
Blaz, Velibor!
We've got them on the run!

source: You think you can beat us on our own turf!?
target: You think you can beat us on our own turf!?

source: By fang and claw shall they be rent!
target: By fang and claw shall they be rent!

source: May my foe be trampled underfoot!
target: May my foe be trampled underfoot!

source: My hubris has become my undoing...
target: My hubris has become my undoing...

source: I want that one's head on a pike!
target: I want that one's head on a pike!

source:
I don't like the look of that.
I get the feeling it's not the usual imperial magitek...
target:
I don't like the look of that.
I get the feeling it's not the usual imperial magitek...

source: Keep your wits about you, everyone!
target: Keep your wits about you, everyone!

source: Imperials! How did they get so close!?
target: Imperials! How did they get so close!?

source: Let that be a lesson to you!
target: Let that be a lesson to you!

source:
So they would weave their magicks in service of the Empire?
Conscripts or no, they must be dealt with.
target:
So they would weave their magicks in service of the Empire?
Conscripts or no, they must be dealt with.

source: If we're to earn our freedom, we can't let the Bozjans get the better of us!
target: If we're to earn our freedom, we can't let the Bozjans get the better of us!

source:
Remember, we're only here for reconnaissance.
If things take a turn for the worse, you are to retreat immediately.
target:
Remember, we're only here for reconnaissance.
If things take a turn for the worse, you are to retreat immediately.

source: Those still bearing injuries must fall back.
target: Those still bearing injuries must fall back.

source: You're in no fit state to continue. Fall back, I say!
target: You're in no fit state to continue. Fall back, I say!

source:
How can we hope to build Gabranth's new nation...
if this is all we're capable of?
target:
How can we hope to build Gabranth's new nation...
if this is all we're capable of?

source: We can't withstand this attack any longer!
target: We can't withstand this attack any longer!

source: You never stood a chance against Gunnhildr's Blades!
target: You never stood a chance against Gunnhildr's Blades!

source:
How can they counteract my magicks so easily?
I must retreat, find another way!
target:
How can they counteract my magicks so easily?
I must retreat, find another way!

source:
Why will you Bozjans not listen to reason?
Place your faith in Gabranth, as we have!
target:
Why will you Bozjans not listen to reason?
Place your faith in Gabranth, as we have!

source: Resistance is futile! Haha, get it? Because they're the... Never mind.
target: Resistance is futile! Haha, get it? Because they're the... Never mind.

source: Know the depths of your folly!
target: Know the depths of your folly!

source: You'll give up for good if you've got any sense!
target: You'll give up for good if you've got any sense!

source: When you arrive in the seven hells, tell 'em the IVth Legion sent you!
target: When you arrive in the seven hells, tell 'em the IVth Legion sent you!

source:
Another fine victory!
Let's head back and celebrate.
target:
Another fine victory!
Let's head back and celebrate.

source: How could we lose to this filth?
target: How could we lose to this filth?

source: Better to run than to die!
target: Better to run than to die!

source:
Sufficient armaments remaining.
Continuing with attack.
target:
Sufficient armaments remaining.
Continuing with attack.

source:
Target within line of sight.
Opening fire.
target:
Target within line of sight.
Opening fire.

source: Before my blade, you are nothing.
target: Before my blade, you are nothing.

source: You've never seen a blade like <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: You've never seen a blade like <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: My beasts will be the death of you!
target: My beasts will be the death of you!

source: I've no time to deal with you vermin!
target: I've no time to deal with you vermin!

source: We'll beat some sense into you!
target: We'll beat some sense into you!

source: Don't blame me if you end up dead!
target: Don't blame me if you end up dead!

source:
The IVth Legion don't take no prisoners!
Well, except when we do...
target:
The IVth Legion don't take no prisoners!
Well, except when we do...

source: You'll run if you know what's good for you!
target: You'll run if you know what's good for you!

source: Better to flee while you still can!
target: Better to flee while you still can!

source: Can't you see? Our ideals are the same!
target: Can't you see? Our ideals are the same!

source: If you won't listen to reason, you leave me with no choice!
target: If you won't listen to reason, you leave me with no choice!

source: Strike hard and swift, as the eagle!
target: Strike hard and swift, as the eagle!

source: By Gunnhildr's Blades, we shall be victorious!
target: By Gunnhildr's Blades, we shall be victorious!

source: This is how we Bozjans do battle!
target: This is how we Bozjans do battle!

source: Freedom for Bozja! Freedom for all!
target: Freedom for Bozja! Freedom for all!

source: Stick with me! I'll keep you from harm.
target: Stick with me! I'll keep you from harm.

source: Your life is mine for the taking!
target: Your life is mine for the taking!

source: Fear not. Your death will be swift!
target: Fear not. Your death will be swift!

source: Let's take it one imperial at a time.
target: Let's take it one imperial at a time.

source: Today is a good day to die! For you, that is!
target: Today is a good day to die! For you, that is!

source: Enough of these lackeys! I want their leader!
target: Enough of these lackeys! I want their leader!

source: Take a good look, imperials. You'll only get to see this once!
target: Take a good look, imperials. You'll only get to see this once!

source: Much as it galls me, we've no choice but to retreat!
target: Much as it galls me, we've no choice but to retreat!

source: Just when I thought things couldn't get any worse!
target: Just when I thought things couldn't get any worse!

source:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
ENTERING SAFE MODE...
SYSTEMS OFFLINE...
target:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
ENTERING SAFE MODE...
SYSTEMS OFFLINE...

source:
I should have spent more time on its restoration.
No matter. The data I have gleaned will prove most useful.
target:
I should have spent more time on its restoration.
No matter. The data I have gleaned will prove most useful.

source:
I just heard a voice!
And not a particularly pleasant one...
target:
I just heard a voice!
And not a particularly pleasant one...

source:
Even in its incomplete state, it was extremely effective.
I look forward to unearthing more of its kind in the clockwork city...
target:
Even in its incomplete state, it was extremely effective.
I look forward to unearthing more of its kind in the clockwork city...

source: I take full responsibility for this abject failure!
target: I take full responsibility for this abject failure!

source: Show me what you can do!
target: Show me what you can do!

source: Our tale will not end here!
target: Our tale will not end here!

source: Remember, these are not unthinking machines, they are soldiers, which makes them all the more dangerous.
target: Remember, these are not unthinking machines, they are soldiers, which makes them all the more dangerous.

source: This is as far as you go!
target: This is as far as you go!

source:
Significant damage sustained.
Adjusting battle parameters.
target:
Significant damage sustained.
Adjusting battle parameters.

source:
All of you, fall back!
We'll have to rethink our strategy.
target:
All of you, fall back!
We'll have to rethink our strategy.

source: We've come too far to lose it all now!
target: Мы слишком далеко зашли, чтобы сдаться!

source: Damn! We must find a way past his defense!
target: Чёрт! Нужно найти способ обойти его защиту!

source: My arrows don't do a thing!
target: Мои стрелы ему как с гуся вода!

source: And not a moment too soon. The time has come to prove my worth to Lyon!
target: And not a moment too soon. The time has come to prove my worth to Lyon!

source: Many thanks for the materials! With this, the construction can begin in earnest!
target: Many thanks for the materials! With this, the construction can begin in earnest!

source: First things first, we'll need to clear our path of debris before we can get to buildin'.
target: First things first, we'll need to clear our path of debris before we can get to buildin'.

source: For the future of Ishgard, let's give it our all!
target: For the future of Ishgard, let's give it our all!

source: Your efforts on our behalf are most appreciated. We need all the hands we can get!
target: Your efforts on our behalf are most appreciated. We need all the hands we can get!

source: Featherfall's a mess of debris at the moment, and it's our job to do somethin' about that.
target: Featherfall's a mess of debris at the moment, and it's our job to do somethin' about that.

source: Remember, we're not just pushing rocks around. We're forgin' a path to a new day in Ishgard!
target: Remember, we're not just pushing rocks around. We're forgin' a path to a new day in Ishgard!

source: We're all stocked up on materials! Time to commence concerted works!
target: We're all stocked up on materials! Time to commence concerted works!

source: There's still debris in Featherfall that wants for clearin', and that's where you come in.
target: There's still debris in Featherfall that wants for clearin', and that's where you come in.

source: Many thanks! We'd be lost without artisans like you.
target: Many thanks! We'd be lost without artisans like you.

source: To your places, everyone! It's time to get to work!
target: To your places, everyone! It's time to get to work!

source: Today, we're goin' to make the streets of Featherfall positively shine!
target: Today, we're goin' to make the streets of Featherfall positively shine!

source: Any last specks of debris are to be cleared away!
target: Any last specks of debris are to be cleared away!

source: Look alive, everyone! We're movin' on to the next phase of concerted works!
target: Look alive, everyone! We're movin' on to the next phase of concerted works!

source: Grab the supplies you need, and let's pave the way forward in Featherfall!
target: Grab the supplies you need, and let's pave the way forward in Featherfall!

source: These streets will be home to the Firmament's new center of commerce! I don't want to see a single stone out of place!
target: These streets will be home to the Firmament's new center of commerce! I don't want to see a single stone out of place!

source: Startin' from today, we're gonna be puttin' up buildings!
target: Startin' from today, we're gonna be puttin' up buildings!

source: You'll find everythin' you need in the supply piles. Now let's get to work!
target: You'll find everythin' you need in the supply piles. Now let's get to work!

source: One day, this place will house a branch of the Skysteel Manufactory, and a residence hall to boot!
target: One day, this place will house a branch of the Skysteel Manufactory, and a residence hall to boot!

source: Today, we'll be finishin' work on the manufactory branch and residence hall!
target: Today, we'll be finishin' work on the manufactory branch and residence hall!

source: This is what we've been buildin' up towards, so let's give it all we've got!
target: This is what we've been buildin' up towards, so let's give it all we've got!

source: Let's build something that will stand as a monument to our craftsmanship!
target: Let's build something that will stand as a monument to our craftsmanship!

source: Look sharp, all of you! It's time to begin concerted works!
target: Look sharp, all of you! It's time to begin concerted works!

source: House-buildin' is the order of the day, so grab some materials and get to work!
target: House-buildin' is the order of the day, so grab some materials and get to work!

source: No rest until the streets of Featherfall are lined with stately residences!
target: No rest until the streets of Featherfall are lined with stately residences!

source: Thanks to you, we've all the materials we need, and then some! Time to commence concerted works!
target: Thanks to you, we've all the materials we need, and then some! Time to commence concerted works!

source: Today we're puttin' the finishing touches on these houses. You know where to find the supplies you need!
target: Today we're puttin' the finishing touches on these houses. You know where to find the supplies you need!

source: Show us your skill, and build houses any adventurer'd be happy to call home!
target: Show us your skill, and build houses any adventurer'd be happy to call home!

source: It's that time again─time to begin concerted works!
target: It's that time again─time to begin concerted works!

source: Today we'll be workin' on still more houses! You know where to find the supplies you need!
target: Today we'll be workin' on still more houses! You know where to find the supplies you need!

source: This'll be Featherfall's last set of houses, so let's make 'em our finest yet!
target: This'll be Featherfall's last set of houses, so let's make 'em our finest yet!

source: This is it, everyone─the final stage of construction here in Featherfall! No restin' till the job is done!
target: This is it, everyone─the final stage of construction here in Featherfall! No restin' till the job is done!

source: Just a bit more work and these houses will be ready for livin' in. You know what needs to be done!
target: Just a bit more work and these houses will be ready for livin' in. You know what needs to be done!

source: This is the last set of houses. I want to see your best work yet!
target: This is the last set of houses. I want to see your best work yet!

source: In today's concerted works, we'll be cleanin' up the Abacus!
target: In today's concerted works, we'll be cleanin' up the Abacus!

source: That means clearin' away any debris that's blockin' our way!
target: That means clearin' away any debris that's blockin' our way!

source: It's not a pretty job, but just think of the magnificent market that'll be standin' here someday!
target: It's not a pretty job, but just think of the magnificent market that'll be standin' here someday!

source: Time to get to work again! We need all the hands we can get!
target: Time to get to work again! We need all the hands we can get!

source: Today, we're clearin' away the last little bits of debris that still clutter the Abacus!
target: Today, we're clearin' away the last little bits of debris that still clutter the Abacus!

source: The more thorough we are today, the more work we'll save ourselves in the next stage─so no slackin'!
target: The more thorough we are today, the more work we'll save ourselves in the next stage─so no slackin'!

source: Thanks to our artisans, we're fully stocked with supplies. Now let's get to work!
target: Thanks to our artisans, we're fully stocked with supplies. Now let's get to work!

source: It's time to pave the Abacus! Grab yourselves some supplies and get to it!
target: It's time to pave the Abacus! Grab yourselves some supplies and get to it!

source: With all these stairwells, it's not going to be easy─so watch your step!
target: With all these stairwells, it's not going to be easy─so watch your step!

source: This is it, everyone! With just a bit more effort, we'll at long last be finishin' our work on the Abacus!
target: This is it, everyone! With just a bit more effort, we'll at long last be finishin' our work on the Abacus!

source: Help yourself to any materials, and let the pavin' begin!
target: Help yourself to any materials, and let the pavin' begin!

source: Artisans of Ishgard, I want to see everythin' you've got!
target: Artisans of Ishgard, I want to see everythin' you've got!

source: Today's task is fixin' up the residence hall we call the Hoarfrost. All together, now!
target: Today's task is fixin' up the residence hall we call the Hoarfrost. All together, now!

source: You know where to find the supplies, and you know what to do with 'em! Now look alive!
target: You know where to find the supplies, and you know what to do with 'em! Now look alive!

source: The Hoarfrost is no humble little hovel. We're going to need a steady scaffold to do the job!
target: The Hoarfrost is no humble little hovel. We're going to need a steady scaffold to do the job!

source: Today we're goin' to continue work on the scaffold for the Hoarfrost!
target: Today we're goin' to continue work on the scaffold for the Hoarfrost!

source: Take all the materials you need, and let's get to work!
target: Take all the materials you need, and let's get to work!

source: To scale the heights of the Hoarfrost, our scaffold must reach to the sky!
target: To scale the heights of the Hoarfrost, our scaffold must reach to the sky!

source: I promise you're going to be damned proud of yourself when the Hoarfrost stands in full glory!
target: I promise you're going to be damned proud of yourself when the Hoarfrost stands in full glory!

source: Help yourself to all the materials you need, and don't let up until the work is done!
target: Help yourself to all the materials you need, and don't let up until the work is done!

source: Remember, the building you're workin' on just may be your future home!
target: Remember, the building you're workin' on just may be your future home!

source: This marks the culmination of all our efforts! Now let's build a residence that'll be the envy of the realm!
target: This marks the culmination of all our efforts! Now let's build a residence that'll be the envy of the realm!

source: We're this close to finishin' work on the Hoarfrost! This is no time to slack off!
target: We're this close to finishin' work on the Hoarfrost! This is no time to slack off!

source: Hear me, artisans? It's time to put the final touches on your masterwork!
target: Hear me, artisans? It's time to put the final touches on your masterwork!

source: Don't underestimate chocobos! Especially these red ones all the way from Dalmasca!
target: Don't underestimate chocobos! Especially these red ones all the way from Dalmasca!

source: Ha! I'd thought you'd be dead by now! You're stronger than you look!
target: Ha! I'd thought you'd be dead by now! You're stronger than you look!

source: Why not leave the Resistance and join me instead? Pays well and the grub ain't bad either!
target: Why not leave the Resistance and join me instead? Pays well and the grub ain't bad either!

source: You'd try recruiting your enemy in the middle of a battle!? Unbelievable!
target: You'd try recruiting your enemy in the middle of a battle!? Unbelievable!

source: And why not? No use in me recruiting you after you're dead!
target: And why not? No use in me recruiting you after you're dead!

source: Where did that massive chocobo come from!?
target: Where did that massive chocobo come from!?

source: Erk! Better run to fight another day!
target: Erk! Better run to fight another day!

source: It's like the fall of Dalamud all over again! Run for it!
target: It's like the fall of Dalamud all over again! Run for it!

source: To think it would come to this... Withdraw!
target: To think it would come to this... Withdraw!

source: Hmph! Not so tough after all!
target: Hmph! Not so tough after all!

source:
Basic motor function checks complete.
Now for the defensive mechanisms.
target:
Basic motor function checks complete.
Now for the defensive mechanisms.

source: I knew those Bozjan churls would arrive sooner or later.
target: I knew those Bozjan churls would arrive sooner or later.

source:
My creation has performed below expectations.
Your assistance was most welcome, Bozjans. Until next time!
target:
My creation has performed below expectations.
Your assistance was most welcome, Bozjans. Until next time!

source:
They hardly seem worth killing.
Perhaps next time, they will put up more of a fight.
target:
They hardly seem worth killing.
Perhaps next time, they will put up more of a fight.

source:
Nope, bugger this.
Time to run!
target:
Nope, bugger this.
Time to run!

source: The enemy is here, and they've brought their pets!
target: The enemy is here, and they've brought their pets!

source: Let them come. My flames will consume them all!
target: Let them come. My flames will consume them all!

source: My beasts will sup on your flesh!
target: My beasts will sup on your flesh!

source: Without their master, they will fall into disarray!
target: Without their master, they will fall into disarray!

source: And let that be a lesson, you curs!
target: And let that be a lesson, you curs!

source: I doubt they'll offer much sport.
target: I doubt they'll offer much sport.

source: It must be here. Keep looking!
target: It must be here. Keep looking!

source: Watch out for Bozjans. We can't let them interfere!
target: Watch out for Bozjans. We can't let them interfere!

source:
That's our opponent!?
Doesn't look like much of a threat to me!
target:
That's our opponent!?
Doesn't look like much of a threat to me!

source: What did I say? We had them beaten from the outset!
target: What did I say? We had them beaten from the outset!

source: So much for the power of magitek, eh?
target: So much for the power of magitek, eh?

source:
This isn't my idea of a fair fight.
Time to call it a day!
target:
This isn't my idea of a fair fight.
Time to call it a day!

source: Bring me as many parts as you can!
target: Bring me as many parts as you can!

source: Troops, fall back! We'll handle this.
target: Troops, fall back! We'll handle this.

source: You'll have to do better than that, Bozjans!
target: You'll have to do better than that, Bozjans!

source:
That should put them in their place.
All right, everyone. Return to the castrum.
target:
That should put them in their place.
All right, everyone. Return to the castrum.

source: Warrior of Darkness! Thank goodness you're here!
target: Warrior of Darkness! Thank goodness you're here!

source: These phantoms have been appearing out of thin air!
target: These phantoms have been appearing out of thin air!

source:
If there's one thing being a beastmaster has taught me,
it's to watch where you step.
target:
If there's one thing being a beastmaster has taught me,
it's to watch where you step.

source: Let's see how resilient you really are!
target: Let's see how resilient you really are!

source: All right, Bozjans. You've got two options.
target: All right, Bozjans. You've got two options.

source: Die facedown in the dirt, or surrender!
target: Die facedown in the dirt, or surrender!

source: You make this look easy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: You make this look easy, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: I could use someone like you! Why not join me?
target: I could use someone like you! Why not join me?

source: <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> would never throw in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> lot with the likes of you!
target: <var 08 E905 ((She)) ((He)) /var> would never throw in <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> lot with the likes of you!

source: Impressive! That was no mean feat!
target: Impressive! That was no mean feat!

source: I'll even give you the choicest cuts of meat!
target: I'll even give you the choicest cuts of meat!

source: Oof! Seems I was right about you!
target: Oof! Seems I was right about you!

source: I'll win you over, just you see!
target: I'll win you over, just you see!

source: A brute he may be, but he knows talent when he sees it!
target: A brute he may be, but he knows talent when he sees it!

source: We can't afford to be waylaid here any longer. Withdraw!
target: We can't afford to be waylaid here any longer. Withdraw!

source: Ha! We'll let you go for now, but one of these days, you'll fight under my banner!
target: Ha! We'll let you go for now, but one of these days, you'll fight under my banner!

source:
You're too kind!
I'll leave her and the...horse thing...in your care!
target:
You're too kind!
I'll leave her and the...horse thing...in your care!

source:
They have found us, it seems.
I shall do my part to protect the monoceros!
target:
They have found us, it seems.
I shall do my part to protect the monoceros!

source:
There's the unicorn, and the traitor to boot!
We need the beast alive, which is more than can be said for the girl!
target:
There's the unicorn, and the traitor to boot!
We need the beast alive, which is more than can be said for the girl!

source: We'll show you what happens to deserters!
target: We'll show you what happens to deserters!

source: You thought you could get away, did you?
target: You thought you could get away, did you?

source: Oh, what's this? A beautiful specimen, fit for inclusion in my menagerie!
target: Oh, what's this? A beautiful specimen, fit for inclusion in my menagerie!

source: No! You keep your hands off of him, Clarricie!
target: No! You keep your hands off of him, Clarricie!

source: We need it alive, but don't be afraid to smack some sense into it!
target: We need it alive, but don't be afraid to smack some sense into it!

source: You lowly wretch! How dare you!
target: You lowly wretch! How dare you!

source: I'll take this out of your hide!
target: I'll take this out of your hide!

source:
I think that's the last of them.
And yet... No, it must be my mind playing tricks on me.
target:
I think that's the last of them.
And yet... No, it must be my mind playing tricks on me.

source:
Above all, the monoceros is safe.
You have my sincerest thanks.
target:
Above all, the monoceros is safe.
You have my sincerest thanks.

source:
It seems I'm done for...
Run, my dear monoceros! Save yourself!
target:
It seems I'm done for...
Run, my dear monoceros! Save yourself!

source: Let's see how you like this!
target: Let's see how you like this!

source:
I want that unicorn!
Slaughter the rest!
target:
I want that unicorn!
Slaughter the rest!

source: Plenty of meat to go around!
target: Plenty of meat to go around!

source: Is that...? The shark is here! Everyone, to safety!
target: Is that...? The shark is here! Everyone, to safety!

source: Our moment has come! Summon the Bombard!
target: Our moment has come! Summon the Bombard!

source: A raging inferno is at our beck and call!
target: A raging inferno is at our beck and call!

source: That beat any fireworks I've seen!
target: That beat any fireworks I've seen!

source: Don't let up! That monster's not long for this fight!
target: Don't let up! That monster's not long for this fight!

source: A former menace turned savior... This truly has been a day for surprises.
target: A former menace turned savior... This truly has been a day for surprises.

source: I'd be a goner if you hadn't shown up!
target: I'd be a goner if you hadn't shown up!

source: May these brave soldiers finally find freedom...in the hereafter.
target: May these brave soldiers finally find freedom...in the hereafter.

source:
Then we've no choice but to fight.
For Gabranth!
target:
Then we've no choice but to fight.
For Gabranth!

source:
When will they open their eyes?
Our cause is just!
target:
When will they open their eyes?
Our cause is just!

source:
We're the ones fighting in the name of freedom!
You're just dogs serving the Garlean oppressors!
target:
We're the ones fighting in the name of freedom!
You're just dogs serving the Garlean oppressors!

source: How can you betray your people and give your lives for those tyrants!?
target: How can you betray your people and give your lives for those tyrants!?

source:
We serve Gabranth, a man of honor!
He would bring peace and equality for all!
target:
We serve Gabranth, a man of honor!
He would bring peace and equality for all!

source:
Then what of we Bozjans!?
He would have us all killed to the last man!
target:
Then what of we Bozjans!?
He would have us all killed to the last man!

source: You're wrong! He seeks unity, not division!
target: You're wrong! He seeks unity, not division!

source: For Dyunbu...I'd die a thousand deaths...
target: For Dyunbu...I'd die a thousand deaths...

source: No! We were supposed to see this through...together!
target: No! We were supposed to see this through...together!

source: You monsters! I'll never forgive you! Never!
target: You monsters! I'll never forgive you! Never!

source: You're just gonna let them get away?
target: You're just gonna let them get away?

source: They have their reasons to fight, the same as us.
target: They have their reasons to fight, the same as us.

source: Perhaps there's still a chance for us to see eye to eye.
target: Perhaps there's still a chance for us to see eye to eye.

source:
Not bad for a bunch of wand-wavers!
Let's fall back for now!
target:
Not bad for a bunch of wand-wavers!
Let's fall back for now!

source: At this rate, the castrum will be ours before long.
target: At this rate, the castrum will be ours before long.

source: Damned Resistance! This is as far as you go!
target: Damned Resistance! This is as far as you go!

source:
So, they've bolstered their ranks with beasts, have they?
No matter, we'll crush them all the same!
target:
So, they've bolstered their ranks with beasts, have they?
No matter, we'll crush them all the same!

source: Beasts they may be, but they too shall learn to fear Gunnhildr's Blades.
target: Beasts they may be, but they too shall learn to fear Gunnhildr's Blades.

source:
Not you again...
Haven't you already spilled enough blood!?
target:
Not you again...
Haven't you already spilled enough blood!?

source:
Stand back, lass.
You'll only get in the way.
target:
Stand back, lass.
You'll only get in the way.

source:
I'll not take orders from you, churl!
Who are you to deny me my vengeance!?
target:
I'll not take orders from you, churl!
Who are you to deny me my vengeance!?

source: You'll pay for what you've done, for the friends you've slain!
target: You'll pay for what you've done, for the friends you've slain!

source:
Revenge will not bring them back.
It will only lead to more suffering.
target:
Revenge will not bring them back.
It will only lead to more suffering.

source:
What do you know of suffering!?
I'll teach you the meaning of pain!
target:
What do you know of suffering!?
I'll teach you the meaning of pain!

source: It seems we will soon be reunited...
target: It seems we will soon be reunited...

source:
Ungh! The direct approach isn't working!
We need to fall back and think this through!
target:
Ungh! The direct approach isn't working!
We need to fall back and think this through!

source: The desire for revenge is strong indeed...
target: The desire for revenge is strong indeed...

source:
Ah, the Resistance, and not a moment too soon.
Now, you shall face the might of my magitek!
target:
Ah, the Resistance, and not a moment too soon.
Now, you shall face the might of my magitek!

source:
More worthless toys.
My blade will make short work of them.
target:
More worthless toys.
My blade will make short work of them.

source: You may have gained the upper hand, but my flames yet long to feast on your living flesh!
target: You may have gained the upper hand, but my flames yet long to feast on your living flesh!

source: I shall scatter your ash on the wind!
target: I shall scatter your ash on the wind!

source:
Keep your wits about you, lads.
Old he may be, but this one is not to be underestimated.
target:
Keep your wits about you, lads.
Old he may be, but this one is not to be underestimated.

source:
There is only one thing for it.
Fight fire with fire!
target:
There is only one thing for it.
Fight fire with fire!

source: I hope you've saved a few for me!
target: I hope you've saved a few for me!

source: Never fear! These paltry foes shall be dashed against my shield!
target: Never fear! These paltry foes shall be dashed against my shield!

source: My, my. More and more of them are crawling out of the woodwork.
target: My, my. More and more of them are crawling out of the woodwork.

source: Strength in numbers will not spare them from the inferno!
target: Strength in numbers will not spare them from the inferno!

source:
To die a warrior's death...
Better that than be claimed by old age.
target:
To die a warrior's death...
Better that than be claimed by old age.

source: I had judged them to be no better than the rank and file, but I was mistaken.
target: I had judged them to be no better than the rank and file, but I was mistaken.

source: Sartauvoir, Albeleo has ordered that we proceed to the next phase!
target: Sartauvoir, Albeleo has ordered that we proceed to the next phase!

source:
Then our excursion is at an end.
Until we next meet, Bozjans.
target:
Then our excursion is at an end.
Until we next meet, Bozjans.

source: Hmm... I fear we haven't seen the last of them.
target: Hmm... I fear we haven't seen the last of them.

source: Next phase, eh? I don't like the sound of that.
target: Next phase, eh? I don't like the sound of that.

source:
Hah! Do not be fooled, my friends. 'Tis merely cowardice!
And now, the path to the castrum lies before us.
target:
Hah! Do not be fooled, my friends. 'Tis merely cowardice!
And now, the path to the castrum lies before us.

source: My blade... Has it failed me?
target: My blade... Has it failed me?

source: Simpleton! Your steel is no match for all-consuming flame!
target: Simpleton! Your steel is no match for all-consuming flame!

source:
Let's fall back for the time being.
It seems we were ill prepared.
target:
Let's fall back for the time being.
It seems we were ill prepared.

source: Prepare all you like, it will avail you naught.
target: Prepare all you like, it will avail you naught.

source: Were you not hired as a dung-sweeper for my menagerie?
target: Were you not hired as a dung-sweeper for my menagerie?

source: On second thought, I could never employ such an unsightly creature.
target: On second thought, I could never employ such an unsightly creature.

source: Perhaps you can provide my pets with suitable sport.
target: Perhaps you can provide my pets with suitable sport.

source: Blaz, Velibor! Looks like we've got our work cut out for us.
target: Blaz, Velibor! Looks like we've got our work cut out for us.

source: Do not allow your concentration to lapse even for a moment!
target: Do not allow your concentration to lapse even for a moment!

source: Hmph! A moment is all it'll take to finish this.
target: Hmph! A moment is all it'll take to finish this.

source:
Not much of a challenge, are you?
Allow me to put you out of your misery.
target:
Not much of a challenge, are you?
Allow me to put you out of your misery.

source: Ha! I'll show them who's fierce!
target: Ha! I'll show them who's fierce!

source: So far, so good. But it's not over yet!
target: So far, so good. But it's not over yet!

source: You swine! I'll tear you limb from limb!
target: You swine! I'll tear you limb from limb!

source: My beasts will dine on your flesh!
target: My beasts will dine on your flesh!

source: When next we meet, you won't be so lucky!
target: When next we meet, you won't be so lucky!

source: Indeed, though her beasts almost got the better of us.
target: Indeed, though her beasts almost got the better of us.

source: Today is not a good day to die. We withdraw, for now.
target: Today is not a good day to die. We withdraw, for now.

source: This isn't going so well. Let's regroup!
target: This isn't going so well. Let's regroup!

source: If you won't listen to sense, I'll have to beat some into you!
target: If you won't listen to sense, I'll have to beat some into you!

source: Let's see how resilient you really are!
target: Let's see how resilient you really are!

source: They'd seek to establish a supply point in the middle of a battlefield?
target: They'd seek to establish a supply point in the middle of a battlefield?

source:
Not if I have any say in the matter!
Quickly, destroy those crates!
target:
Not if I have any say in the matter!
Quickly, destroy those crates!

source:
The Resistance is here already!?
I knew this was a bad idea...
target:
The Resistance is here already!?
I knew this was a bad idea...

source: Cowards! You would depend on machines to fight your battles!?
target: Cowards! You would depend on machines to fight your battles!?

source:
They have us beaten.
We must regroup!
target:
They have us beaten.
We must regroup!

source: This'll be over before it's even begun!
target: This'll be over before it's even begun!

source: You shall not interfere with our plans!
target: You shall not interfere with our plans!

source: I'd no idea they'd be so...stubborn.
target: I'd no idea they'd be so...stubborn.

source: Hold on, everyone! Help is on the way!
target: Hold on, everyone! Help is on the way!

source: This dance will light a flame in your heart!
target: This dance will light a flame in your heart!

source: We need help or we're done for!
target: We need help or we're done for!

source: I've never seen such a beast before...
target: I've never seen such a beast before...

source: We'd best report this to Bajsaljen!
target: We'd best report this to Bajsaljen!

source: So you're one of Lyon's underlings?
target: So you're one of Lyon's underlings?

source: How dare you speak his name!
target: How dare you speak his name!

source:
Where do you think you're going?
I'll teach you some obediance!
target:
Where do you think you're going?
I'll teach you some obediance!

source: Is this all I am capable of!?
target: Is this all I am capable of!?

source: Hernais! Your sacrifice will not be forgotten!
target: Hernais! Your sacrifice will not be forgotten!

source: So that was Hernais? A worthy foe.
target: So that was Hernais? A worthy foe.

source: It's no use! We're no match for these fiends!
target: It's no use! We're no match for these fiends!

source: I'm sorry sir, but I've no choice but to withdraw!
target: I'm sorry sir, but I've no choice but to withdraw!

source: We'll never see the likes of that Bombard again... Your explosive sacrifice won't soon be forgotten.
target: We'll never see the likes of that Bombard again... Your explosive sacrifice won't soon be forgotten.

source: Lyon! It's time to put the skills you taught me to good use!
target: Lyon! It's time to put the skills you taught me to good use!

source: If I kill just a few more...I can finally go home!
target: If I kill just a few more...I can finally go home!

source:
This is test subject VIII, Dabog.
Armaments primed. Initiating extermination.
target:
This is test subject VIII, Dabog.
Armaments primed. Initiating extermination.

source:
Wh-What am I doing here?
What have I done!?
target:
Wh-What am I doing here?
What have I done!?

source:
This is...test subject VIII, Dabog. Energy levels below minimum.
Combat capabilities severely compromised. Returning to base.
target:
This is...test subject VIII, Dabog. Energy levels below minimum.
Combat capabilities severely compromised. Returning to base.

source:
Enemy targets suppressed.
Returning to base.
target:
Enemy targets suppressed.
Returning to base.

source: Now to test the efficacy of my alterations...
target: Now to test the efficacy of my alterations...

source:
COMBAT PARAMETERS UPDATED.
DESTRUCTIVE CAPABILITIES INCREASED.
target:
COMBAT PARAMETERS UPDATED.
DESTRUCTIVE CAPABILITIES INCREASED.

source:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
INITIATING COMBAT ZONE EXTRACTION SEQUENCE...
target:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
INITIATING COMBAT ZONE EXTRACTION SEQUENCE...

source: I shall have to make further improvements.
target: I shall have to make further improvements.

source:
Members of the Resistance, I must thank you for your part in my experiments.
Until next time, my test subjects.
target:
Members of the Resistance, I must thank you for your part in my experiments.
Until next time, my test subjects.

source: Data gleaned from such underwhelming test subjects is of no use to me.
target: Data gleaned from such underwhelming test subjects is of no use to me.

source:
CLOSE QUARTERS COMBAT DATA LOADED.
INITIATING MASSACRE MODE.
target:
CLOSE QUARTERS COMBAT DATA LOADED.
INITIATING MASSACRE MODE.

source: Now to gauge the resilience of these test subjects.
target: Now to gauge the resilience of these test subjects.

source:
COMBAT PARAMETERS UPDATED.
DESTRUCTIVE CAPABILITIES INCREASED.
target:
COMBAT PARAMETERS UPDATED.
DESTRUCTIVE CAPABILITIES INCREASED.

source:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
INITIATING COMBAT ZONE EXTRACTION SEQUENCE...
target:
SYSTEM DAMAGE: 95%.
INITIATING COMBAT ZONE EXTRACTION SEQUENCE...

source:
With a few more modifications, my warmachina will be unstoppable.
Your assistance in the trial was most appreciated, Bozjans.
target:
With a few more modifications, my warmachina will be unstoppable.
Your assistance in the trial was most appreciated, Bozjans.

source: Such worthless specimens. This has barely scratched the surface of my warmachina's capabilities.
target: Such worthless specimens. This has barely scratched the surface of my warmachina's capabilities.

source: Do <var 1A 02 /var>try<var 1A 01 /var> to stay alive long enough to provide useful data.
target: Do <var 1A 02 /var>try<var 1A 01 /var> to stay alive long enough to provide useful data.

source:
Those beasts aren't from around here.
They must belong to the Empire!
target:
Those beasts aren't from around here.
They must belong to the Empire!

source: Whatever they are, they're in my way!
target: Whatever they are, they're in my way!

source: With a Blade on our side, we can't lose!
target: With a Blade on our side, we can't lose!

source: Such slovenly beasts are no match for me!
target: Such slovenly beasts are no match for me!

source:
So that's the power of Gunnhildr's Blades...
Just like in the legends!
target:
So that's the power of Gunnhildr's Blades...
Just like in the legends!

source:
Ungh... What drives these fiends!?
The day is lost. Retreat!
target:
Ungh... What drives these fiends!?
The day is lost. Retreat!

source: Even with a Blade in our ranks, we still lost?
target: Even with a Blade in our ranks, we still lost?

source:
I see imperials!
Let's give them what for!
target:
I see imperials!
Let's give them what for!

source:
I sense a disturbance of some sort.
We should proceed with caution.
target:
I sense a disturbance of some sort.
We should proceed with caution.

source: What's worse, I don't think these ones are on our side!
target: What's worse, I don't think these ones are on our side!

source: This is the source of the disturbance.
target: This is the source of the disturbance.

source: Ha! I barely even broke a sweat!
target: Ha! I barely even broke a sweat!

source: The imperials were as surprised by those things as we were.
target: The imperials were as surprised by those things as we were.

source:
Discretion is the better part of valor.
Withdraw!
target:
Discretion is the better part of valor.
Withdraw!

source: It's Cassard! And he's brought help from Mord Souq!
target: It's Cassard! And he's brought help from Mord Souq!

source: No small coup to roll that boulder over!
target: No small coup to roll that boulder over!

source: Look! It's our friends from Mord Souq!
target: Look! It's our friends from Mord Souq!

source: It's Cassard! And he's brought help from Mord Souq!
target: It's Cassard! And he's brought help from Mord Souq!

source: No small coup to roll that boulder over!
target: No small coup to roll that boulder over!

source: Our friends have come to our aid!
target: Our friends have come to our aid!

source: Pleased am I to see that more Talos have been restored.
target: Pleased am I to see that more Talos have been restored.

source: A Talos? It could only be Magnus!
target: A Talos? It could only be Magnus!

source: We must go and thank them afterwards!
target: We must go and thank them afterwards!

source: Thaffe and Jeryk are here too!
target: Thaffe and Jeryk are here too!

source: Thaffe and Jeryk are here too!
target: Thaffe and Jeryk are here too!

source: Whoever you are, you're not stopping us!
target: Whoever you are, you're not stopping us!

source: This one's aether shines bright. A foe to be reckoned with.
target: This one's aether shines bright. A foe to be reckoned with.

source: This one's aether shines bright. A foe to be reckoned with.
target: This one's aether shines bright. A foe to be reckoned with.

source: Doubtless no ordinary hero whence he doth hail.
target: Doubtless no ordinary hero whence he doth hail.

source: We would be hard-pressed to find stouter aid.
target: We would be hard-pressed to find stouter aid.

source: That the king themself should attend...
target: That the king themself should attend...

source: That the king themself should attend...
target: That the king themself should attend...

source: A portal. Let us see where it leads.
target: A portal. Let us see where it leads.

source: The Fuath! For once I'm glad to see them!
target: The Fuath! For once I'm glad to see them!

source: Is this just a dream, or are the Fuath really helping us?
target: Is this just a dream, or are the Fuath really helping us?

source: 'Tis a strange time indeed when the Fuath lend their aid unconditionally.
target: 'Tis a strange time indeed when the Fuath lend their aid unconditionally.

source: 'Tis a strange time indeed when the Fuath lend their aid unconditionally.
target: 'Tis a strange time indeed when the Fuath lend their aid unconditionally.

source: Tell me, Urianger... Where <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> you learn that water-walking charm?
target: Tell me, Urianger... Where <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> you learn that water-walking charm?

source: The amaro, too, fight with us!
target: The amaro, too, fight with us!

source: Even the amaro have joined the fray!
target: Even the amaro have joined the fray!

source: All of the fae folk, rallying to us... This doth verge upon a miracle.
target: All of the fae folk, rallying to us... This doth verge upon a miracle.

source: All of the fae folk, rallying to us... This doth verge upon a miracle.
target: All of the fae folk, rallying to us... This doth verge upon a miracle.

source: We owe it to them to see this through!
target: We owe it to them to see this through!

source: We're getting past you one way or another!
target: We're getting past you one way or another!

source: Her aether is dark, but within I see a glimmer of radiance.
target: Her aether is dark, but within I see a glimmer of radiance.

source: Her light... It has a sad tinge to it...
target: Her light... It has a sad tinge to it...

source: Her aether is dark, but within I see a glimmer of radiance.
target: Her aether is dark, but within I see a glimmer of radiance.

source: Another noble soul reduced to a means to an end...
target: Another noble soul reduced to a means to an end...

source: You're a godssend, Feo Ul! Thank everyone for us!
target: You're a godssend, Feo Ul! Thank everyone for us!

source: When the king commands, even the forest must obey...
target: When the king commands, even the forest must obey...

source: Look, a path has opened up!
target: Look, a path has opened up!

source: You have our gratitude, Feo Ul!
target: You have our gratitude, Feo Ul!

source: I see it! The Crystal Tower!
target: I see it! The Crystal Tower!

source: Another stretch and we're home free.
target: Another stretch and we're home free.

source: That such a passage should exist...
target: That such a passage should exist...

source: That such a passage should exist...
target: That such a passage should exist...

source: They're a little rough-hewn, but their hearts are in the right place.
target: They're a little rough-hewn, but their hearts are in the right place.

source: Good gods, who in the world punches like that?
target: Good gods, who in the world punches like that?

source: Let's leave them to it and press on!
target: Let's leave them to it and press on!

source: Please be safe, all of you!
target: Please be safe, all of you!

source: Good gods, who in the world punches like that?
target: Good gods, who in the world punches like that?

source: Actually, Sister, when you're angry... Ahem. Never mind.
target: Actually, Sister, when you're angry... Ahem. Never mind.

source: Have care─his aether is far denser than the rest!
target: Have care─his aether is far denser than the rest!

source: Seriously? This is a <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> person somewhere?
