target: Seriously? This is a <var 1A 02 /var>real<var 1A 01 /var> person somewhere?

source: Have care─his aether is far denser than the rest!
target: Have care─his aether is far denser than the rest!

source: Whatever the brute's got, I'll bear the brunt of it!
target: Whatever the brute's got, I'll bear the brunt of it!

source: What ugly creatures! And their hounds are even worse!
target: What ugly creatures! And their hounds are even worse!

source: This isn't working! We'll have to withdraw!
target: This isn't working! We'll have to withdraw!

source: Cowards! Come back and let our dogs finish the job!
target: Cowards! Come back and let our dogs finish the job!

source: Greetings, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! Can you spare a moment?
target: Greetings, Blade <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! Can you spare a moment?

source: I'd best get going. Thanks for all your help!
target: I'd best get going. Thanks for all your help!

source: Not to worry. There'll be other chances, I'm sure!
target: Not to worry. There'll be other chances, I'm sure!

source: Come to dash yourselves against my magitek, have you?
target: Come to dash yourselves against my magitek, have you?

source:
Your sacrifice is most welcome.
The data I retrieve will be employed to wreak untold destruction on your pathetic friends!
target:
Your sacrifice is most welcome.
The data I retrieve will be employed to wreak untold destruction on your pathetic friends!

source:
Initiate attack formation D.
Now to measure the enemy's resilience to my weaponry.
target:
Initiate attack formation D.
Now to measure the enemy's resilience to my weaponry.

source:
Most unexpected.
I wonder how they will fare against <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>?
target:
Most unexpected.
I wonder how they will fare against <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>?

source:
How intriguing...
Time to conclude the test and dispose of these specimens.
target:
How intriguing...
Time to conclude the test and dispose of these specimens.

source:
Impossible!
Could I have made a miscalculation?
target:
Impossible!
Could I have made a miscalculation?

source: Ha! Is that all you can muster!?
target: Ha! Is that all you can muster!?

source: It seems these Resistance troops are capable of performing above their estimated combat parameters.
target: It seems these Resistance troops are capable of performing above their estimated combat parameters.

source: When next we meet, I shall dispose of you once and for all!
target: When next we meet, I shall dispose of you once and for all!

source: That Lyon fellow is not one to be trifled with...
target: That Lyon fellow is not one to be trifled with...

source: Keep dancing around if you want, but it won't save you.
target: Keep dancing around if you want, but it won't save you.

source: Not thinking of running, are you?
target: Not thinking of running, are you?

source: Welcome to my secret sanctuary! Make yourself at home, for this time of treasures and tribulations will not soon come to an end!
target: Добро пожаловать в моё тайное убежище! Чувствуйте себя как дома, ибо это время сокровища и страданий не скоро закончится!

source: Yes, yes, it is time to begin! Shall we have a trifling glamour to liven up this fortuitous meeting?
target: Yes, yes, it is time to begin! Shall we have a trifling glamour to liven up this fortuitous meeting?

source: Tee hee hee! I'm glad you came to play with me!
target: Tee hee hee! I'm glad you came to play with me!

source:
Edam ev'uoy ssem a hcus.
Swish-swish-aroo!
target:
Edam ev'uoy ssem a hcus.
Swish-swish-aroo!

source:
Enod reven si krow ym.
Swish-swish-aroo!
target:
Enod reven si krow ym.
Swish-swish-aroo!

source:
Redro ni si peews tfiws a.
Swish-swish-aroo!
target:
Redro ni si peews tfiws a.
Swish-swish-aroo!

source: Well, well! It seems I've been called into the fray!
target: Well, well! It seems I've been called into the fray!

source: Bravo, bravo! I see that luck is on your side...for now!
target: Bravo, bravo! I see that luck is on your side...for now!

source: Hmmm... How are we to pass?
target: Hmmm... How are we to pass?

source: I pray your spirit may at last find rest.
target: I pray your spirit may at last find rest.

source: Watch your step. I sense something amiss here...
target: Watch your step. I sense something amiss here...

source: I think we are safe. For the moment, at least.
target: I think we are safe. For the moment, at least.

source: Let us see where this portal leads.
target: Let us see where this portal leads.

source: May they find peace in the aetherial sea.
target: May they find peace in the aetherial sea.

source: These stairs appear to be safe.
target: These stairs appear to be safe.

source: I believe the worst is past. Though there is still no sign of Misija.
target: I believe the worst is past. Though there is still no sign of Misija.

source: In the name of the queen!
target: In the name of the queen!

source: Those who play are already lost.
target: Those who play are already lost.

source: Know the weight of this burden...
target: Know the weight of this burden...

source: Heavy as a feather, yet light as stone.
target: Heavy as a feather, yet light as stone.

source: I am all and I am none... Who am I?
target: I am all and I am none... Who am I?

source: Be still, that your death be clean.
target: Be still, that your death be clean.

source: Come, my blades. Defend your queen!
target: Come, my blades. Defend your queen!

source: In the name of the queen!
target: In the name of the queen!

source: Hmph. An admirable effort, Bajsaljen, I'll give you that.
target: Hmph. An admirable effort, Bajsaljen, I'll give you that.

source: Yield and we may yet show mercy!
target: Yield and we may yet show mercy!

source: My brothers and sisters have suffered enough!
target: My brothers and sisters have suffered enough!

source: What's the matter with you!? Fight harder!
target: Что с тобой?! Дерись как следует!

source: Finish them fast! Swiftly, quickly, fast!
target: Покончите с ними побыстрее! Мгновенно, решительно, быстрее!

source: Release the special unit! Unchain, unleash, release!
target: Освободите особых бойцов! Развяжите, откройте клетку, освободите!

source: We're set with supplies─now it's up to us to put them to good use!
target: We're set with supplies─now it's up to us to put them to good use!

source: Our work begins in the western Risensong Quarter! Let's clear the rubble so the city can rise again!
target: Our work begins in the western Risensong Quarter! Let's clear the rubble so the city can rise again!

source: I know it's been a while for some of you. Remember: safety always comes first!
target: I know it's been a while for some of you. Remember: safety always comes first!

source: All right! It's time to begin concerted works. Everyone together, now!
target: All right! It's time to begin concerted works. Everyone together, now!

source: Our next task is to tidy up the western Risensong Quarter. I want it lookin' spotless!
target: Our next task is to tidy up the western Risensong Quarter. I want it lookin' spotless!

source: Clean up the fine debris and clear a path to the construction sites!
target: Clean up the fine debris and clear a path to the construction sites!

source: We've an ample supply of materials. Let's get the concerted works underway!
target: We've an ample supply of materials. Let's get the concerted works underway!

source: It's time to pave the western Risensong Quarter! Help yourselves to supplies from the piles, and let's get to work!
target: It's time to pave the western Risensong Quarter! Help yourselves to supplies from the piles, and let's get to work!

source: Look at these streets! The task is almost done─don't lose focus till the end!
target: Look at these streets! The task is almost done─don't lose focus till the end!

source: In this round of concerted works, we'll be buildin' residences in the western Risensong Quarter.
target: In this round of concerted works, we'll be buildin' residences in the western Risensong Quarter.

source: You'll find all the materials you need in the supply piles. Now let's get building!
target: You'll find all the materials you need in the supply piles. Now let's get building!

source: I don't want to see a single brick out of place! Can't have a cold draft sneakin' in on a cold winter's night.
target: I don't want to see a single brick out of place! Can't have a cold draft sneakin' in on a cold winter's night.

source: For this round of concerted works, we'll be buildin' still more residences.
target: For this round of concerted works, we'll be buildin' still more residences.

source: Time to put the finishin' touches on these houses! All the materials you need are in the supply piles─let's keep it moving!
target: Time to put the finishin' touches on these houses! All the materials you need are in the supply piles─let's keep it moving!

source: Let's give them houses befittin' a district of class and culture!
target: Let's give them houses befittin' a district of class and culture!

source: Supplies, check! All right, everyone─let's get the concerted works off the ground!
target: Supplies, check! All right, everyone─let's get the concerted works off the ground!

source: We've got more houses what need buildin'! Help yourself to the supplies, and let's show them what we can do!
target: We've got more houses what need buildin'! Help yourself to the supplies, and let's show them what we can do!

source: As they say, home is where the heart is. Let's give our residents abodes they'll be happy to return to on a cold Ishgardian night!
target: As they say, home is where the heart is. Let's give our residents abodes they'll be happy to return to on a cold Ishgardian night!

source: All as one, now, everyone! Commence the concerted works!
target: All as one, now, everyone! Commence the concerted works!

source: These houses are lookin' more livable by the moment! Grab the last batch of supplies and let's finish the job!
target: These houses are lookin' more livable by the moment! Grab the last batch of supplies and let's finish the job!

source: This is your time to shine, artisans! Don't slack off until the job is done!
target: This is your time to shine, artisans! Don't slack off until the job is done!

source: Ready, skybuilders? It's time to show what you're made of!
target: Ready, skybuilders? It's time to show what you're made of!

source: More houses is the order of the day! Now grab some supplies an' start buildin'!
target: More houses is the order of the day! Now grab some supplies an' start buildin'!

source: This residence quarter's goin' to be in high demand. Let's build houses people will be proud to call home!
target: This residence quarter's goin' to be in high demand. Let's build houses people will be proud to call home!

source: The materials have been assembled, so let's get the concerted works underway!
target: The materials have been assembled, so let's get the concerted works underway!

source: Just a bit more work, and these houses will be fit for livin'. Keep it up, skybuilders!
target: Just a bit more work, and these houses will be fit for livin'. Keep it up, skybuilders!

source: Once these houses go up, our work in the western Risensong Quarter will be complete! This is no time to slacken off!
target: Once these houses go up, our work in the western Risensong Quarter will be complete! This is no time to slacken off!

source: For today's round of concerted efforts, we'll be gettin' to work on Bright Ballad's Passage.
target: For today's round of concerted efforts, we'll be gettin' to work on Bright Ballad's Passage.

source: Help yourself to the materials you need, and let's get to buildin'!
target: Help yourself to the materials you need, and let's get to buildin'!

source: Let's put up a portal worthy of bein' the gateway between the Firmament and the Pillars!
target: Let's put up a portal worthy of bein' the gateway between the Firmament and the Pillars!

source: It's that time again─time for the next round of concerted works! Let's polish up Bright Ballad's Passage to a fine sheen!
target: It's that time again─time for the next round of concerted works! Let's polish up Bright Ballad's Passage to a fine sheen!

source: You know where to find the supplies, so let's get to it!
target: You know where to find the supplies, so let's get to it!

source: With another major portal of entry, the Firmament's sure to be livelier than ever!
target: With another major portal of entry, the Firmament's sure to be livelier than ever!

source: We commence concerted works in the eastern Risensong Quarter! Let's see those legs and arms moving!
target: We commence concerted works in the eastern Risensong Quarter! Let's see those legs and arms moving!

source: First order of the day is clearin' out all this debris! Let's get to smashin'!
target: First order of the day is clearin' out all this debris! Let's get to smashin'!

source: Combine your efforts an' we'll have this place fit for buildin' in no time!
target: Combine your efforts an' we'll have this place fit for buildin' in no time!

source: That'll do! It's time to proceed to the next round of concerted works!
target: That'll do! It's time to proceed to the next round of concerted works!

source: Our next task is to clean up any leftover specks of fine debris.
target: Our next task is to clean up any leftover specks of fine debris.

source: I want this place lookin' spotless!
target: I want this place lookin' spotless!

source: Good work, skybuilders! We move to the next phase of concerted works!
target: Good work, skybuilders! We move to the next phase of concerted works!

source: Next we'll be paving the main thoroughfare of this part of the district. Help yourself to the supplies and let's get to work!
target: Next we'll be paving the main thoroughfare of this part of the district. Help yourself to the supplies and let's get to work!

source: A house's only as good as its foundation! I don't want to see a single stone out of place!
target: A house's only as good as its foundation! I don't want to see a single stone out of place!

source: It's time to raise the walls for a new block of residences. I want to see you working in perfect concert!
target: It's time to raise the walls for a new block of residences. I want to see you working in perfect concert!

source: Now grab yourself some materials from the supply piles, and let's get buildin'!
target: Now grab yourself some materials from the supply piles, and let's get buildin'!

source: This is where you put your skills to work! Let's build residences that will keep the residents of Risensong warm on the coldest of nights!
target: This is where you put your skills to work! Let's build residences that will keep the residents of Risensong warm on the coldest of nights!

source: Our collectors worked hard to bring us these materials, so let's do our damndest to make sure they don't go to waste!
target: Our collectors worked hard to bring us these materials, so let's do our damndest to make sure they don't go to waste!

source: The completion of our task is almost nigh! This is no time to ease up!
target: The completion of our task is almost nigh! This is no time to ease up!

source: It's time to show Ishgard─nay, the entire realm─your pride and skill as crafters!
target: It's time to show Ishgard─nay, the entire realm─your pride and skill as crafters!

source: We've a full inventory of supplies! Time to commence concerted works!
target: We've a full inventory of supplies! Time to commence concerted works!

source: Next, we've more residences to build! Help yourself to the supplies you need and commence construction!
target: Next, we've more residences to build! Help yourself to the supplies you need and commence construction!

source: This will be the last block of residences to grace the Firmament! I want to see your most masterful work yet!
target: This will be the last block of residences to grace the Firmament! I want to see your most masterful work yet!

source: The end is in sight, skybuilders! With the completion of this task, our works in the eastern Risensong Quarter will be complete!
target: The end is in sight, skybuilders! With the completion of this task, our works in the eastern Risensong Quarter will be complete!

source: These residences are still just a shell of what they need to be! We've no shortage of supplies, so let's start buildin'!
target: These residences are still just a shell of what they need to be! We've no shortage of supplies, so let's start buildin'!

source: It's up to us to raise houses that any Ishgardian would be proud to live in!
target: It's up to us to raise houses that any Ishgardian would be proud to live in!

source: All right, everyone! It's time to begin work on Snowsoak Springs, a bathhouse where all Ishgardians can wash their worries away!
target: All right, everyone! It's time to begin work on Snowsoak Springs, a bathhouse where all Ishgardians can wash their worries away!

source: What are you waitin' for? You see the supplies, so let's get to workin'!
target: What are you waitin' for? You see the supplies, so let's get to workin'!

source: Just think: a soothin' soak awaits you, too─but not until you're done with your task!
target: Just think: a soothin' soak awaits you, too─but not until you're done with your task!

source: And we're set to go. Let the concerted works begin!
target: And we're set to go. Let the concerted works begin!

source: Those supplies aren't going to carry themselves. Let's get to work!
target: Those supplies aren't going to carry themselves. Let's get to work!

source: Works on Snowsoak Springs have entered the final phase! Ahh, I can just feel the soothin' waters washin' over me!
target: Works on Snowsoak Springs have entered the final phase! Ahh, I can just feel the soothin' waters washin' over me!

source: We've done it, skybuilders! The restoration effort is all but complete! All that remains is to raise a monument to our efforts!
target: We've done it, skybuilders! The restoration effort is all but complete! All that remains is to raise a monument to our efforts!

source: See those piles of supplies? I reckon you know what to do with 'em!
target: See those piles of supplies? I reckon you know what to do with 'em!

source: Huzzah! Huzzah! The Firmament has risen to its full glory! You've done Ishgard proud, skybuilders─this is a day that will be sung of for ages to come!
target: Huzzah! Huzzah! The Firmament has risen to its full glory! You've done Ishgard proud, skybuilders─this is a day that will be sung of for ages to come!

source: Despair shall subsume those who disturb our rest!
target: Despair shall subsume those who disturb our rest!

source: Yes, let the dark consume you!
target: Yes, let the dark consume you!

source: There is no leaving this place, mortals!
target: There is no leaving this place, mortals!

source: Wayward souls of old, I bid you rise!
target: Wayward souls of old, I bid you rise!

source: There is no leaving this place, mortals!
target: There is no leaving this place, mortals!

source: Rise, my brothers, rise! Let us add these wayward souls to our number!
target: Rise, my brothers, rise! Let us add these wayward souls to our number!

source: Succumb to the paralyzing power of fear!
target: Succumb to the paralyzing power of fear!

source: Nowhere to run! Nowhere to hide!
target: Nowhere to run! Nowhere to hide!

source: Prepare to witness an ancient Far Eastern ritual!
target: Prepare to witness an ancient Far Eastern ritual!

source: Do not be shy now. The more the merrier!
target: Do not be shy now. The more the merrier!

source: It is time for a fight most ferocious: one between man and beast!
target: It is time for a fight most ferocious: one between man and beast!

source: Now, watch as my apprentice summons the fearsome Byakko from the folding screen!
target: Now, watch as my apprentice summons the fearsome Byakko from the folding screen!

source: Do not fear! We have a noble warrior at hand ready to slay the foul feline.
target: Do not fear! We have a noble warrior at hand ready to slay the foul feline.

source: I can scarce believe my eyes!
target: I can scarce believe my eyes!

source: Byakko possesses a bulky frame, but he is more agile than most men!
target: Byakko possesses a bulky frame, but he is more agile than most men!

source: Byakko is more than capable of bewitching any foes that let their guard down.
target: Byakko is more than capable of bewitching any foes that let their guard down.

source: Byakko is on his last legs! The noble warrior's victory is imminent!
target: Byakko is on his last legs! The noble warrior's victory is imminent!

source: The beast is slain and with that the land has been successfully purified.
target: The beast is slain and with that the land has been successfully purified.

source: This marks the end of our ritual. We do hope you found it to your liking.
target: This marks the end of our ritual. We do hope you found it to your liking.

source: Look, the tiger's returned to the folding screen!
target: Look, the tiger's returned to the folding screen!

source: Oh dear. It would appear our noble warrior has failed! Byakko has fled to fight another day.
target: Oh dear. It would appear our noble warrior has failed! Byakko has fled to fight another day.

source: Do not fret. That Byakko was merely an illusion. It cannot sustain its form indefinitely.
target: Do not fret. That Byakko was merely an illusion. It cannot sustain its form indefinitely.

source: A fiercer feline I have never seen.
target: A fiercer feline I have never seen.

source: Are tigers not usually a bit more agile?
target: Are tigers not usually a bit more agile?

source: Are we certain that's not a real tiger?
target: Are we certain that's not a real tiger?

source:
<var 60 0234 /var>An Open tournament is currently in session!
Head to Card Square to sign up and put your Triple Triad talents to the test!
target:
<var 60 0234 /var>An Open tournament is currently in session!
Head to Card Square to sign up and put your Triple Triad talents to the test!

source: An imitation of...the shikigami of the pyre!
target: An imitation of...the shikigami of the pyre!

source: An imitation of...the shikigami of the undertow!
target: An imitation of...the shikigami of the undertow!

source: I will erase you from my stage!
target: I will erase you from my stage!

source: This shall be a whirlwind tour!
target: This shall be a whirlwind tour!

source: I never thought I would see this place again.
target: I never thought I would see this place again.

source: Right, let's create the mother of all porxies!
target: Right, let's create the mother of all porxies!

source: I never thought I would see this place again.
target: I never thought I would see this place again.

source: We will be counting on your local knowledge.
target: We will be counting on your local knowledge.

source: The facility itself still seems to be in good shape.
target: The facility itself still seems to be in good shape.

source: What creatures have since taken up residence, I wonder...
target: What creatures have since taken up residence, I wonder...

source: So we clear out any pests we encounter, yes?
target: So we clear out any pests we encounter, yes?

source: What creatures have since taken up residence, I wonder...
target: What creatures have since taken up residence, I wonder...

source: Whatever they are, we'll make short work of them.
target: Whatever they are, we'll make short work of them.

source: Looks just about as friendly as the rest.
target: Looks just about as friendly as the rest.

source: Time to finish tidying up the area.
target: Time to finish tidying up the area.

source: So that's the keeper of the clay.
target: So that's the keeper of the clay.

source: Is that supposed to be a golem?
target: Is that supposed to be a golem?

source: Aye. This is what happens when you neglect to tidy up.
target: Aye. This is what happens when you neglect to tidy up.

source: One ingredient struck off the list.
target: One ingredient struck off the list.

source: This is fine clay, perfect for our porxie!
target: This is fine clay, perfect for our porxie!

source: If I didn't know better, I would say you were having fun.
target: If I didn't know better, I would say you were having fun.

source: So back here again and on to the next task.
target: So back here again and on to the next task.

source: A workshop this vast, it certainly makes sense to have portals.
target: A workshop this vast, it certainly makes sense to have portals.

source: That's right─water to work the clay.
target: That's right─water to work the clay.

source: A well-kept area. No doubt thanks to the familiars.
target: A well-kept area. No doubt thanks to the familiars.

source: How often did I come here to fetch water for Master Matoya's tea...
target: How often did I come here to fetch water for Master Matoya's tea...

source: That gushing sound... There must be a water vein.
target: That gushing sound... There must be a water vein.

source: That gushing sound... There must be a water vein.
target: That gushing sound... There must be a water vein.

source: Correct, and believe me when I say it's icy cold. Watch your step.
target: Correct, and believe me when I say it's icy cold. Watch your step.

source: What in the world is that thing?
target: What in the world is that thing?

source: Some manner of sprite? Or another familiar?
target: Some manner of sprite? Or another familiar?

source: That familiar was made with stormwater─and it plays rough. Have care.
target: That familiar was made with stormwater─and it plays rough. Have care.

source: As with all things, one cannot judge a familiar by its appearance.
target: As with all things, one cannot judge a familiar by its appearance.

source: Nothing is so bothersome as a familiar made by an untrained hand.
target: Nothing is so bothersome as a familiar made by an untrained hand.

source: The water was freezing, but at least it washed the mud away.
target: The water was freezing, but at least it washed the mud away.

source: Ahhh, to have closure after all these years...
target: Ahhh, to have closure after all these years...

source: Wait... Was it <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who created that familiar!?
target: Wait... Was it <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> who created that familiar!?

source: Master Matoya will be getting impatient─assuming she hasn't fallen asleep.
target: Master Matoya will be getting impatient─assuming she hasn't fallen asleep.

source: Ugh, I'm freezing in my sodden clothes...
target: Ugh, I'm freezing in my sodden clothes...

source: Ugh, I'm freezing in my sodden clothes...
target: Ugh, I'm freezing in my sodden clothes...

source: Worry not, you will be warm again soon. <var 1A 02 /var>Very<var 1A 01 /var> warm.
target: Worry not, you will be warm again soon. <var 1A 02 /var>Very<var 1A 01 /var> warm.

source: Good heavens, is the magma <var 1A 02 /var>rainbow-colored<var 1A 01 /var>? Spectacular!
target: Good heavens, is the magma <var 1A 02 /var>rainbow-colored<var 1A 01 /var>? Spectacular!

source: Ungh, the aether here is so vivid, I can scarcely see...
target: Ungh, the aether here is so vivid, I can scarcely see...

source: These colors... I take it the magma is infused with the elements.
target: These colors... I take it the magma is infused with the elements.

source: Good heavens, is the magma <var 1A 02 /var>rainbow-colored<var 1A 01 /var>? Spectacular!
target: Good heavens, is the magma <var 1A 02 /var>rainbow-colored<var 1A 01 /var>? Spectacular!

source: The product of dissolved crystals, lest you wonder.
target: The product of dissolved crystals, lest you wonder.

source: And now the kiln should be lit!
target: And now the kiln should be lit!

source: Whew, I shall be glad to leave this stifling place behind.
target: Whew, I shall be glad to leave this stifling place behind.

source: Such an aether-rich heat source will be perfect for porxie-making.
target: Such an aether-rich heat source will be perfect for porxie-making.

source: And now the kiln should be lit!
target: And now the kiln should be lit!

source: Aye, let us return to Master Matoya.
target: Aye, let us return to Master Matoya.

source: So for the finishing touches, we employ...brute force?
target: So for the finishing touches, we employ...brute force?

source: A pugnacious specimen...just like its creator.
target: A pugnacious specimen...just like its creator.

source: Garb aside, I suspect the creature will be anything but regal.
target: Garb aside, I suspect the creature will be anything but regal.

source: They can come from anywhere. Stay alert.
target: Они могут появится в любой момент. Берегитесь.

source: Ahhh! My head! The pain, the pain!
Indeed. Without your magicks, we would be done for.
target: Без твоей магии нам пришлось бы туго.

source: Everyone back! I will shield Alisaie!
Don't get distracted. Focus on the mission.
target: Don't get distracted. Focus on the mission.

source: We should be able to move it using this panel.
target: We should be able to move it using this panel.

source: I'm not picking up any more hostiles.
target: I'm not picking up any more hostiles.

source: Still not enjoying the creepy voice, thanks!
target: Still not enjoying the creepy voice, thanks!

source: Well, you know what to do!
target: Well, you know what to do!

source: There's no choice. We do it.
target: There's no choice. We do it.

source: Gather as many eggs as you can!
target: Gather as many eggs as you can!

source: Fools you were to come here!
target: Fools you were to come here!

source: Now you face the raging storm, netherlings!
target: Now you face the raging storm, netherlings!

source: You cannot hope to defeat us!
target: You cannot hope to defeat us!

source: Hold still! These ones will heal friendly fighting ones!
target: Hold still! These ones will heal friendly fighting ones!

source: This is as far as you go!
target: This is as far as you go!

source: You'll have to do better than that!
target: You'll have to do better than that!

source: Have faith and victory shall be ours.
target: Have faith and victory shall be ours.

source: I do not like the look of that...
target: I do not like the look of that...

source: Well, let us see how its defenses fare against this!
target: Well, let us see how its defenses fare against this!

source:
By the gods...
Is <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> the Allagan relic!?
target:
By the gods...
Is <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> the Allagan relic!?

source: Come, my children. There is work to be done!
target: Come, my children. There is work to be done!

source: Their flames will sear the flesh from your bones!
target: Their flames will sear the flesh from your bones!

source: Rise from the ashes, and lay waste to our enemies!
target: Rise from the ashes, and lay waste to our enemies!

source: The flames will consume you all!
target: The flames will consume you all!

source: Time is mine to command. Mine to control!
target: Time is mine to command. Mine to control!

source: Is there no end to them!?
target: Is there no end to them!?

source: Sun, sea, and sandy beaches─there's no place like the Isle of Endless Summer!
target: Sun, sea, and sandy beaches─there's no place like the Isle of Endless Summer!

source: Hey! Take it easy, will you?
target: Hey! Take it easy, will you?

source: Did they just wash up on shore?
target: Did they just wash up on shore?

source: Is it just me, or is there a chill in the air?
target: Is it just me, or is there a chill in the air?

source: A chill? It's downright freezing! Brrrrrr...
target: A chill? It's downright freezing! Brrrrrr...

source: Let's get out of here before we freeze to death!
target: Let's get out of here before we freeze to death!

source:
Adjusting tactic protocols...
Enhancing right arm.
target:
Adjusting tactic protocols...
Enhancing right arm.

source:
Adjusting tactic protocols...
Enhancing left arm.
target:
Adjusting tactic protocols...
Enhancing left arm.

source: No way forward, no way back!
target: No way forward, no way back!

source:
You would grant me succor?
Are you not our enemy?
target:
You would grant me succor?
Are you not our enemy?

source:
Thank you, overdweller!
Let me show you the way!
target:
Thank you, overdweller!
Let me show you the way!

source: May you finally be at peace.
target: May you finally be at peace.

source: The combined might of both dragon and dragoon...
target: The combined might of both dragon and dragoon...

source:
Lord Aymeric!
Let me take care of this!
target:
Lord Aymeric!
Let me take care of this!

source:
We shall see the wounded to safety.
You are needed elsewhere!
target:
We shall see the wounded to safety.
You are needed elsewhere!

source: That should give us a moment's rest.
target: That should give us a moment's rest.

source:
Help is on the way.
Please, hold on a little longer...
target:
Help is on the way.
Please, hold on a little longer...

source:
Stand firm!
We cannot afford to lose!
target:
Stand firm!
We cannot afford to lose!

source:
There is nowhere left to run, Yamatsumi!
Give yourself into our custody!
target:
There is nowhere left to run, Yamatsumi!
Give yourself into our custody!

source: We sympathize with your plight, but we will not allow you to subject Bozja to your depravations!
target: We sympathize with your plight, but we will not allow you to subject Bozja to your depravations!

source:
Spare me your pity!
We are foes─I accept naught from you but pain and blood!
target:
Spare me your pity!
We are foes─I accept naught from you but pain and blood!

source: Pride of our line, greatest of the shikigami, I summon thee forth!
target: Pride of our line, greatest of the shikigami, I summon thee forth!

source:
Slay them, yoki!
Smear their offal upon the rocks!
target:
Slay them, yoki!
Smear their offal upon the rocks!

source:
Bah, you try my patience!
Protect me, shikigami! I command it!
target:
Bah, you try my patience!
Protect me, shikigami! I command it!

source: Is this where our line ends?
target: Is this where our line ends?

source:
It cannot be!
Yoki is broken!?
target:
It cannot be!
Yoki is broken!?

source: The greatest shikigami we have ever commanded... Fallen.
target: The greatest shikigami we have ever commanded... Fallen.

source: Come, Yamatsumi! We shall have another chance at revenge!
target: Come, Yamatsumi! We shall have another chance at revenge!

source:
Your quiver of tricks is empty, Yamatsumi.
Now surrender!
target:
Your quiver of tricks is empty, Yamatsumi.
Now surrender!

source:
Surrender?
The Urabe will return, stronger than before!
target:
Surrender?
The Urabe will return, stronger than before!

source: Hehe... The relic bends to my will. As is to be expected from one with my talents.
target: Hehe... The relic bends to my will. As is to be expected from one with my talents.

source: I am master of man and artifact alike, and finally the stage for my masterpiece is set! Haha!
target: I am master of man and artifact alike, and finally the stage for my masterpiece is set! Haha!

source: Where are the advance forces? I see no sign of them.
target: Where are the advance forces? I see no sign of them.

source: What was that, Kosyu? These are the selfsame fiends Lady Fran reported sighting in Dalmasca? It can't be!
target: What was that, Kosyu? These are the selfsame fiends Lady Fran reported sighting in Dalmasca? It can't be!

source: Now do you see!? My art is beyond challenge!
target: Now do you see!? My art is beyond challenge!

source: We will yet prevail, Master Oboro!
target: We will yet prevail, Master Oboro!

source: Your task is to make stuffed toys using the materials laid out on the Mattock, kupo.
target: Your task is to make stuffed toys using the materials laid out on the Mattock, kupo.

source: Once you've finished sewing together a toy, take it to a wain at the central plaza.
target: Once you've finished sewing together a toy, take it to a wain at the central plaza.

source: Make lots of stuffed toys and deliver them all, kupo!
target: Make lots of stuffed toys and deliver them all, kupo!

source: We hope you enjoyed that veritable parade of oversized stuffed toys. The next fête is “Shear-a-Yak,” and it will be held at Bright Ballad's Passage!
target: We hope you enjoyed that veritable parade of oversized stuffed toys. The next fête is “Shear-a-Yak,” and it will be held at Bright Ballad's Passage!

source: Though you'll be shearing a yak in this fête, instead of shears, you'll be using an enhanced version of the aetheromatic auger: the aetheromatic clipper!
target: Though you'll be shearing a yak in this fête, instead of shears, you'll be using an enhanced version of the aetheromatic auger: the aetheromatic clipper!

source: Tuned to operate with normal concentrations of aether, it shoots blasts of magicked wind that effortlessly removes fleece from their owners!
target: Tuned to operate with normal concentrations of aether, it shoots blasts of magicked wind that effortlessly removes fleece from their owners!

source: So get firing at the yak, and bring the fleece it sheds to me, three sacks full at a time!
target: So get firing at the yak, and bring the fleece it sheds to me, three sacks full at a time!

source: That's all for “Shear-a-Yak.” Now, please take yourselves to the Abacus for the next fête: “Toy Hunter”!
target: That's all for “Shear-a-Yak.” Now, please take yourselves to the Abacus for the next fête: “Toy Hunter”!

source: My swinelings have hidden a lucky toy in one of three present boxes.
target: My swinelings have hidden a lucky toy in one of three present boxes.

source: You must open the right box to find the toy, and then bring it to me.
target: You must open the right box to find the toy, and then bring it to me.

source: Great hunting, everyone. Now, please make your way to the central plaza on the Mattock!
target: Great hunting, everyone. Now, please make your way to the central plaza on the Mattock!

source: I bid you welcome to the final fête: “Presents of Mind”!
target: I bid you welcome to the final fête: “Presents of Mind”!

source: In this fête, you must deliver presents to various folk on the Mattock according to the mascots' instructions.
target: In this fête, you must deliver presents to various folk on the Mattock according to the mascots' instructions.

source: Upon delivering two presents, the mascot issuing the instructions will change, so be sure to pay attention. Let the gifting begin!
target: Upon delivering two presents, the mascot issuing the instructions will change, so be sure to pay attention. Let the gifting begin!

source: It's farewell for now, but we look forward to seeing you again! Till next time!
target: It's farewell for now, but we look forward to seeing you again! Till next time!

source: Nothing up my sleeves─save my muscular arms─and presto! We have materials!
target: Nothing up my sleeves─save my muscular arms─and presto! We have materials!

source: Just a moment while we prepare.
target: Just a moment while we prepare.

source: Hm, perhaps I need a speech quirk like “kupo” as well...
target: Hm, perhaps I need a speech quirk like “kupo” as well...

source: Wind direction─check. Wind speed─check. Everything is in order!
target: Wind direction─check. Wind speed─check. Everything is in order!

source: Thank you for your patience! The fête will now begin!
target: Thank you for your patience! The fête will now begin!

source: Heh heh, our wooly friend looks like a new yak!
target: Heh heh, our wooly friend looks like a new yak!

source: Now it's time for me and my swinelings to get to work!
target: Now it's time for me and my swinelings to get to work!

source: My massive muscles will make short work of the tidying up.
target: My massive muscles will make short work of the tidying up.

source: It's time to hide the toy.
target: It's time to hide the toy.

source: Speech quirks are for the weak...kupo.
target: Speech quirks are for the weak...kupo.

source: This is it, everyone─the final fête.
target: This is it, everyone─the final fête.

source: We mascots are all taking part this time.
target: We mascots are all taking part this time.

source: Have fun with us till the end!
target: Have fun with us till the end!

source: The final fête is upon us. Are you ready, my dear mascots?
target: The final fête is upon us. Are you ready, my dear mascots?

source: Let us finish on a high note!
target: Let us finish on a high note!

source: We hope you had as much fun as we did!
target: We hope you had as much fun as we did!

source: Looks like this goes all the way up.
target: Looks like this goes all the way up.

source: Hear ye, hear ye! Fêtes are about to commence!
target: Hear ye, hear ye! Fêtes are about to commence!

source: Greetings, friends, and thank you for joining in the Skyrise Celebration!
target: Greetings, friends, and thank you for joining in the Skyrise Celebration!

source: Today, we will be hosting a variety of fêtes─the first of which serves as an introduction to our friendly team of mascots.
target: Today, we will be hosting a variety of fêtes─the first of which serves as an introduction to our friendly team of mascots.

source: Mighty Moogle, at your service, kupo. Made of sterner stuff though I am, I'm in charge of the fête “Made of Softer Stuff”!
target: Mighty Moogle, at your service, kupo. Made of sterner stuff though I am, I'm in charge of the fête “Made of Softer Stuff”!

source: Chirpy Chocobo is my name, and “Shear-a-Yak” is my game. Under my fluffy wing, you will shear as you've never shorn before!
target: Chirpy Chocobo is my name, and “Shear-a-Yak” is my game. Under my fluffy wing, you will shear as you've never shorn before!

source: And last but definitely not least, I am Perky Piggy. My swinelings and I look forward to making a “Toy Hunter” out of you!
target: And last but definitely not least, I am Perky Piggy. My swinelings and I look forward to making a “Toy Hunter” out of you!

source: Remember these mascots well, for they will be your guides throughout the revelry. On which note, let us dive into the fête!
target: Remember these mascots well, for they will be your guides throughout the revelry. On which note, let us dive into the fête!

source: The mascots will take turns striking their favorite poses, and we ask that you show your celebratory spirit by posing in kind.
target: The mascots will take turns striking their favorite poses, and we ask that you show your celebratory spirit by posing in kind.

source: Here is a pose that maximizes your muscular appeal.
target: Here is a pose that maximizes your muscular appeal.

source: Do the <var 1A 02 /var>mighty maximizer<var 1A 01 /var>, and show the fine specimen that you are, kupo!
target: Do the <var 1A 02 /var>mighty maximizer<var 1A 01 /var>, and show the fine specimen that you are, kupo!

source: Before using the aetheromatic clipper, it is important to point and acknowledge.
target: Before using the aetheromatic clipper, it is important to point and acknowledge.

source: To that end, we do the <var 1A 02 /var>chirpy checker<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: To that end, we do the <var 1A 02 /var>chirpy checker<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: When searching for treasure, one must keep one's eyes peeled.
target: When searching for treasure, one must keep one's eyes peeled.

source: To help you practice, I bid you do the <var 1A 02 /var>perky peeler<var 1A 01 /var> with me!
target: To help you practice, I bid you do the <var 1A 02 /var>perky peeler<var 1A 01 /var> with me!

source: Hereon, the order will be random.
target: Hereon, the order will be random.

source: Before using the aetheromatic clipper, point and acknowledge with the <var 1A 02 /var>chirpy checker<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Before using the aetheromatic clipper, point and acknowledge with the <var 1A 02 /var>chirpy checker<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: When searching for treasure, keep your eyes peeled with the <var 1A 02 /var>perky peeler<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: When searching for treasure, keep your eyes peeled with the <var 1A 02 /var>perky peeler<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: Show the fine specimen that you are with the <var 1A 02 /var>mighty maximizer<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo!
target: Show the fine specimen that you are with the <var 1A 02 /var>mighty maximizer<var 1A 01 /var>, kupo!

source: I trust you are now acquainted with our friendly mascots. With that, let us move right along to the next fête.
target: I trust you are now acquainted with our friendly mascots. With that, let us move right along to the next fête.

source: Mighty Moogle, whose big muscles are equaled only by his big heart, awaits you on the Mattock for “Made of Softer Stuff”!
target: Mighty Moogle, whose big muscles are equaled only by his big heart, awaits you on the Mattock for “Made of Softer Stuff”!

source: I am Pagaga, beastmaster of the proud line of Vochstein!
target: I am Pagaga, beastmaster of the proud line of Vochstein!

source: Are there any out there with stones enough to face me and my pets!?
target: Are there any out there with stones enough to face me and my pets!?

source: ...You lot? Ahahaha! I was expecting something a little sterner, but very well! Let's see how you fare!
target: ...You lot? Ahahaha! I was expecting something a little sterner, but very well! Let's see how you fare!

source: Come, Berda! Obda! I've found you some playmates!
target: Come, Berda! Obda! I've found you some playmates!

source: Away, Obda! I won't have you dying on me!
target: Away, Obda! I won't have you dying on me!

source: To think that my prized beasts could be bested...
target: To think that my prized beasts could be bested...

source: Grrr... We'll get you next time! Mark my words!
target: Grrr... We'll get you next time! Mark my words!

source: Hmph, this the best the Resistance's got? Lyon's fallen far to struggle against your ilk.
target: Hmph, this the best the Resistance's got? Lyon's fallen far to struggle against your ilk.

source: What? These monsters were once your allies!?
target: What? These monsters were once your allies!?

source: They were once, but they are far past saving. He says killing them would be a mercy. I'm of the same mind, Kosyu─let's end this, and quickly.
target: They were once, but they are far past saving. He says killing them would be a mercy. I'm of the same mind, Kosyu─let's end this, and quickly.

source: Impudent rebels. You are hardly worthy to lay eyes upon my masterwork. Grovel for the chance I've afforded you!
target: Impudent rebels. You are hardly worthy to lay eyes upon my masterwork. Grovel for the chance I've afforded you!

source: Now, my puppets, dance and leave the world agog with your grace!
target: Now, my puppets, dance and leave the world agog with your grace!

source: O, earth beneath me, heed my call! Rise up and crush these Resistance vermin into so much dust!
target: O, earth beneath me, heed my call! Rise up and crush these Resistance vermin into so much dust!

source: It is time to show what you can do, my minion. Go forth and crush the Resistance underfoot!
target: It is time to show what you can do, my minion. Go forth and crush the Resistance underfoot!

source: Hmph, we'll shatter it like the ice it is!
target: Hmph, we'll shatter it like the ice it is!

source: We need waste no more time on this rabble.
target: We need waste no more time on this rabble.

source: Let us save our strength for the next mission.
target: Let us save our strength for the next mission.

source: Owww, that hurts! Seriously, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart!
target: Owww, that hurts! Seriously, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you're a <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> after my own heart!

source: <pant> Bugger me, where did my strength go...?
target: <pant> Bugger me, where did my strength go...?

source: Fight harder, you lot! Fight harder!
target: Fight harder, you lot! Fight harder!

source: Resistance scum. Finally, you show yourselves...
target: Resistance scum. Finally, you show yourselves...

source: Come, my new and improved Dabog! Show these fools the power of Delta Gabriel Kai!
target: Come, my new and improved Dabog! Show these fools the power of Delta Gabriel Kai!

source: It is Dabog inside that golden machina? Gods have mercy...
target: It is Dabog inside that golden machina? Gods have mercy...

source: This is hyperpilot Dabog. Target confirmed. Commencing combat operations...
target: This is hyperpilot Dabog. Target confirmed. Commencing combat operations...

source: This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hull damage...confirmed. Firepower...below acceptable parameters.
target: This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hull damage...confirmed. Firepower...below acceptable parameters.

source: Deploying long-range assault nodes... Initiating omnidirectional attack...
target: Deploying long-range assault nodes... Initiating omnidirectional attack...

source: This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hull integrity...compromised. Proceeding with combat operations...
target: This is hyperpilot Dabog. Hull integrity...compromised. Proceeding with combat operations...

source: You would do well not to underestimate us!
target: You would do well not to underestimate us!

source: Such firepower! Retreat, I say... Retreat!
target: Such firepower! Retreat, I say... Retreat!

source: From the savior's own hands... Such an honor this is!
target: From the savior's own hands... Such an honor this is!

source: <gasp> These are the latest tools! However did you know?
target: <gasp> These are the latest tools! However did you know?

source:
What might this be?
...Oho, new masonry tools!
target:
What might this be?
...Oho, new masonry tools!

source: Thank you! I will treasure this!
target: Thank you! I will treasure this!

source: Ooh, birch syrup, and quality stuff to boot!
target: Ooh, birch syrup, and quality stuff to boot!

source: Heh heh, I shall enjoy this with my tea!
target: Heh heh, I shall enjoy this with my tea!

source: But this is so much! Are you certain?
target: But this is so much! Are you certain?

source: <gasp> I've always wanted a toy gaelicat!
target: <gasp> I've always wanted a toy gaelicat!

source: Thank you! Hehe, I like festivals!
target: Thank you! Hehe, I like festivals!

source: I do not see any primals...
target: I do not see any primals...

source: We were fortunate on this occasion...
target: We were fortunate on this occasion...

source: Oh my. So many lambs to lead to the slaughter.
target: Oh my. So many lambs to lead to the slaughter.

source: Centurion Gilbrisbert, storied among the IVth Legion, at your service. Do you know why they call me the puppetmaster?
target: Centurion Gilbrisbert, storied among the IVth Legion, at your service. Do you know why they call me the puppetmaster?

source: Ah, but it is not for the puppets to know wherefore the hand pulls their strings. They are only to move at its command.
target: Ah, but it is not for the puppets to know wherefore the hand pulls their strings. They are only to move at its command.

source: You'd be a fool to fight us. 'Tis plain you're outnumbered!
target: You'd be a fool to fight us. 'Tis plain you're outnumbered!

source: Lay down your arms, and we can end this without bloodshed!
target: Lay down your arms, and we can end this without bloodshed!

source: What is he blathering on about?
target: What is he blathering on about?

source: I wield but a fragment of a relic wrested from the earth of Dalmasca. Even so, thanks to my ingenious experimentation, I believe you can agree that to behold its power is quite life altering!
target: I wield but a fragment of a relic wrested from the earth of Dalmasca. Even so, thanks to my ingenious experimentation, I believe you can agree that to behold its power is quite life altering!

source: We have what we came for! Well done, all of you!
target: We have what we came for! Well done, all of you!

source: We've dealt the IVth a great blow!
target: We've dealt the IVth a great blow!

source: This ceruleum will keep us for a long while!
target: This ceruleum will keep us for a long while!

source: Take as much ceruleum as possible!
target: Take as much ceruleum as possible!

source: This is where we make our stand!
target: This is where we make our stand!

source: It's going to explode! Run for your lives!
target: It's going to explode! Run for your lives!

source: What's this? A real challenge? Very well, there is no threat that more puppets cannot answer.
target: What's this? A real challenge? Very well, there is no threat that more puppets cannot answer.

source: Allow the aether to flow through your veins, and offer up your very bodies to the safety of your master!
target: Allow the aether to flow through your veins, and offer up your very bodies to the safety of your master!

source: Excellent idea, Kosyu! We must focus on the surrounding fiends before aught else!
target: Excellent idea, Kosyu! We must focus on the surrounding fiends before aught else!

source: Oh, my beautiful puppets. You are lovely even in your demise.
target: Oh, my beautiful puppets. You are lovely even in your demise.

source: But this is not <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> end. I have such grand designs yet in store... Hehehe! Hah hah haha!
target: But this is not <var 1A 02 /var>my<var 1A 01 /var> end. I have such grand designs yet in store... Hehehe! Hah hah haha!

source: We may have staved off their assault, but the head of the snake yet lives. The puppetmaster, he called himself...
target: We may have staved off their assault, but the head of the snake yet lives. The puppetmaster, he called himself...

source: He says we must kill him next time, or the blood of his victims will be on our hands. I do not disagree.
target: He says we must kill him next time, or the blood of his victims will be on our hands. I do not disagree.

source: Heehee! What a fabulous performance! The Resistance is crushed under the unyielding boots of my puppets!
target: Heehee! What a fabulous performance! The Resistance is crushed under the unyielding boots of my puppets!

source: However, there is yet more my talents can achieve. The world waits with bated breath for my magnum opus, and I must not disappoint!
target: However, there is yet more my talents can achieve. The world waits with bated breath for my magnum opus, and I must not disappoint!

source: Ugh... We didn't stand a chance. Where did that puppetmaster come from?
target: Ugh... We didn't stand a chance. Where did that puppetmaster come from?

source: He says we must kill him next time, or the blood of his victims will be on our hands. I do not disagree.
target: He says we must kill him next time, or the blood of his victims will be on our hands. I do not disagree.

source: The fiends come, but fear not! Thracie stands with you!
target: The fiends come, but fear not! Thracie stands with you!

source: Just look at that! So pretty they are, and so frosty─icy, freezy, frosty!
target: Just look at that! So pretty they are, and so frosty─icy, freezy, frosty!

source: On my honor as an adventurer, I will quell this icy menace!
target: On my honor as an adventurer, I will quell this icy menace!

source: You beasts won't stop us from celebrating the season!
target: You beasts won't stop us from celebrating the season!

source: Don't hurt yourself out there, Brother!
target: Don't hurt yourself out there, Brother!

source: Knock those Bombards out of the sky!
target: Knock those Bombards out of the sky!

source: Well, if it isn't Llofii! So kind of you to come all this way to take part in my research...
target: Well, if it isn't Llofii! So kind of you to come all this way to take part in my research...

source: Fabineau! Plotting another sick experiment, I see. Well, it ends today!
target: Fabineau! Plotting another sick experiment, I see. Well, it ends today!

source: Test subject secured. Let the experiment begin...
target: Test subject secured. Let the experiment begin...

source: We will begin with the summoning ritual. Of course, this will require a suitable sacrifice...
target: We will begin with the summoning ritual. Of course, this will require a suitable sacrifice...

source: In serving my research, their deaths will serve a greater purpose than their pathetic lives ever could!
target: In serving my research, their deaths will serve a greater purpose than their pathetic lives ever could!

source: How many innocent creatures must die to serve your crazed thirst for forbidden knowledge!?
target: How many innocent creatures must die to serve your crazed thirst for forbidden knowledge!?

source: Such a noble beast... Look how it fears not death... Now, shall we begin?
target: Such a noble beast... Look how it fears not death... Now, shall we begin?

source: Aether charge confirmed...precisely according to my hypothesis. Yes, these results should bear fruit...
target: Aether charge confirmed...precisely according to my hypothesis. Yes, these results should bear fruit...

source: Have you no respect for life whatsoever!?
target: Have you no respect for life whatsoever!?

source: If you disapprove, why not stop me with your own magic? Of course, that, too, is born from sacrifice...
target: If you disapprove, why not stop me with your own magic? Of course, that, too, is born from sacrifice...

source: This cannot be! My magicks...are all powerful! My research...must go on...!
target: This cannot be! My magicks...are all powerful! My research...must go on...!

source: At long last... Fabineau will conduct his cruel experiments no more.
target: At long last... Fabineau will conduct his cruel experiments no more.

source: And yet...no doubt many innocent creatures remain trapped in his research facility.
target: And yet...no doubt many innocent creatures remain trapped in his research facility.

source: I must not rest until all are saved from a horrific fate...
target: I must not rest until all are saved from a horrific fate...

source: Turn tail and run back to your precious Resistance... And tell them Fabineau has made another breakthrough!
target: Turn tail and run back to your precious Resistance... And tell them Fabineau has made another breakthrough!

source: It's no use... Fabineau's magicks are too powerful...
target: It's no use... Fabineau's magicks are too powerful...

source: I am Pagaga, queen of beasts! Show yourself, Resistance worms!
target: I am Pagaga, queen of beasts! Show yourself, Resistance worms!

source: “The girl...she seems different than before,” you say? We had best be wary, then...
target: “The girl...she seems different than before,” you say? We had best be wary, then...

source: At any rate, it would seem we've been issued a challenge. It wouldn't do for us to turn tail now.
target: At any rate, it would seem we've been issued a challenge. It wouldn't do for us to turn tail now.

source: Well, if it isn't the spear girl and the mustachioed muscle-head. This time, you'll pay for dishonoring Father!
target: Well, if it isn't the spear girl and the mustachioed muscle-head. This time, you'll pay for dishonoring Father!

source: On the Vochstein name...I swear I will not fall!
target: On the Vochstein name...I swear I will not fall!

source: The “Beast King”? Hah! I'll show Lyon who truly deserves to wear the crown!
target: The “Beast King”? Hah! I'll show Lyon who truly deserves to wear the crown!

source: The Vochsteins are the true rulers of beastkind─now and forever!
target: The Vochsteins are the true rulers of beastkind─now and forever!

source: Berda, Obda! I told you to stay put! Your wounds are not yet healed...
target: Berda, Obda! I told you to stay put! Your wounds are not yet healed...

source: Berda, how sweet you are! Obda, let us fight as one to the end!
target: Berda, how sweet you are! Obda, let us fight as one to the end!

source: They're tougher than they look. No wonder Lyon felt he'd met his match...
target: They're tougher than they look. No wonder Lyon felt he'd met his match...

source: But this Vochstein will not bend so easily!
target: But this Vochstein will not bend so easily!

source: Next time! Next time, I swear─Pagaga will <var 1A 02 /var>end you<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: Next time! Next time, I swear─Pagaga will <var 1A 02 /var>end you<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: She's a persistent one, isn't she...?
target: She's a persistent one, isn't she...?

source: “Big words, but those wounds will keep her from the front lines for some time,” you say? We can only hope so...
target: “Big words, but those wounds will keep her from the front lines for some time,” you say? We can only hope so...

source: Friend or foe, I've no desire to see a girl throw her life away for foolish pride.
target: Friend or foe, I've no desire to see a girl throw her life away for foolish pride.

source: Behold! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is what it means to rule beastkind! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the power of the Vochsteins!
target: Behold! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is what it means to rule beastkind! <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the power of the Vochsteins!

source: Gahaha! I can see Lyon's face. The self-styled Beast King is but a weanling compared to the power of Pagaga!
target: Gahaha! I can see Lyon's face. The self-styled Beast King is but a weanling compared to the power of Pagaga!

source: Our foe is too stubborn today. Let us retreat and regroup while we have the chance...
target: Our foe is too stubborn today. Let us retreat and regroup while we have the chance...

source: Ba Go's heart bursts with excitement!
target: Ba Go's heart bursts with excitement!

source: Go boom for Ba Go, my beauties!
target: Go boom for Ba Go, my beauties!

source: Did you see me out there, Sister?
target: Did you see me out there, Sister?

source: Ba Go's icy pretties! How beautifully you go boom...
target: Ba Go's icy pretties! How beautifully you go boom...

source: Oh, Brother, you were amazing out there!
target: Oh, Brother, you were amazing out there!

source: Ba Go is no match for your beautiful booms...
target: Ba Go is no match for your beautiful booms...

source: Brother! Come back to us! Brother!
target: Brother! Come back to us! Brother!

source: Are we all going to freeze to death?
target: Are we all going to freeze to death?

source: Today, victory shall be ours! For Bozja!
target: Today, victory shall be ours! For Bozja!

source: The Blades shall be our banner!
target: The Blades shall be our banner!

source: Bozjans are more than just warriors. Our strength is your strength!
target: Bozjans are more than just warriors. Our strength is your strength!

source: I shall not fall, so that my allies may see the morrow!
target: I shall not fall, so that my allies may see the morrow!

source: Allow me to be your shield! Stay close!
target: Allow me to be your shield! Stay close!

source: Masterful ninjutsu takes on many forms!
target: Masterful ninjutsu takes on many forms!

source: This is how we fight in Nagxia!
target: This is how we fight in Nagxia!

source: The twin facets of mana are at my beck and call!
target: The twin facets of mana are at my beck and call!

source: I shall forge a path of my own making!
target: I shall forge a path of my own making!

source: We shall wrest freedom from the clutches of tyrants!
target: We shall wrest freedom from the clutches of tyrants!

source: Our oppressors shall pay for their sins!
target: Our oppressors shall pay for their sins!

source: Today we pave the way to freedom!
target: Today we pave the way to freedom!

source: Now you know what we're made of!
target: Now you know what we're made of!

source: The imperial army will crumble before us!
target: The imperial army will crumble before us!

source: The full might of the Empire is helpless before us!
target: The full might of the Empire is helpless before us!

source: Gaaah! We can go on no longer!
target: Gaaah! We can go on no longer!

source: The shame of defeat is bitter indeed...
target: The shame of defeat is bitter indeed...

source: Ugh... Where did we go wrong?
target: Ugh... Where did we go wrong?

source: Is this...where I meet my end?
target: Is this...where I meet my end?

source: No... Victory was all but guaranteed...
target: No... Victory was all but guaranteed...

source: I was foolish to think I was ready...
target: I was foolish to think I was ready...

source: Try not to lose any fingers!
target: Try not to lose any fingers!

source: Now is the moment to strike.
target: Now is the moment to strike.

source: This bodes ill... We must retreat!
target: This bodes ill... We must retreat!

source: Is this where we meet our fate?
target: Is this where we meet our fate?

source: Heh heh heh... You seem to be hard-pressed, my dear Yamatsumi.
target: Heh heh heh... You seem to be hard-pressed, my dear Yamatsumi.

source: Your escape has been cut off. You're trapped.
target: Your escape has been cut off. You're trapped.

source: But worry not, for your salvation has arrived. Speak your heart's most earnest wish to the relic I bear, and the path to it shall open.
target: But worry not, for your salvation has arrived. Speak your heart's most earnest wish to the relic I bear, and the path to it shall open.

source: Please, Dabog! Come back with us!
target: Please, Dabog! Come back with us!

source: <bzzzt> Fools. The thing that stands before you is not Dabog.
target: <bzzzt> Fools. The thing that stands before you is not Dabog.

source: I...I have only one wish: to see the onmyoji revived under the flag of a new nation!
target: I...I have only one wish: to see the onmyoji revived under the flag of a new nation!

source: Huh? There's a voice...a voice coming from the stone. I can... I─ Ungaaah! GWAAAH!!!
target: Huh? There's a voice...a voice coming from the stone. I can... I─ Ungaaah! GWAAAH!!!

source: No, it is an organic component─one designed to extract the most out of our weaponry!
target: No, it is an organic component─one designed to extract the most out of our weaponry!

source: Hahaha! Haaahaha! Your wish is the relic's command!
target: Hahaha! Haaahaha! Your wish is the relic's command!

source: You live now under my flag, puppets to obey my every command! You shall be revived, oh yes, and more majestically than you have ever dreamed!
target: You live now under my flag, puppets to obey my every command! You shall be revived, oh yes, and more majestically than you have ever dreamed!

source: He's using Yamatsumi as fodder for his summoning!
target: He's using Yamatsumi as fodder for his summoning!

source: One evil deed after another, he says. This man seems partial to them.
target: One evil deed after another, he says. This man seems partial to them.

source: For Lord Noah... To birth his nation...
target: For Lord Noah... To birth his nation...

source: Hahaha. A defeat, perhaps, but a fruitful one. I have seen the measure of the relic's strength, and I am not left wanting.
target: Hahaha. A defeat, perhaps, but a fruitful one. I have seen the measure of the relic's strength, and I am not left wanting.

source: Wh-Who are these men!? Why do they all look like Dabog!?
target: Wh-Who are these men!? Why do they all look like Dabog!?

source: If Yamatsumi can make such a puissant puppet, what power would the master himself produce?
target: If Yamatsumi can make such a puissant puppet, what power would the master himself produce?

source: He has pity for Yamatsumi. I see why... They were given their wish, albeit a warped and twisted version of it.
target: He has pity for Yamatsumi. I see why... They were given their wish, albeit a warped and twisted version of it.

source: A cruel fate, even for one so misguided. Such terrifying power should not be in the hands of one so depraved.
target: A cruel fate, even for one so misguided. Such terrifying power should not be in the hands of one so depraved.

source: We must take every measure to stop him. Muster every last onze of our strength.
target: We must take every measure to stop him. Muster every last onze of our strength.

source: Mwahaha! The relic is splendid, absolutely splendid!
target: Mwahaha! The relic is splendid, absolutely splendid!

source: We're outmatched! We must retreat and regroup!
target: We're outmatched! We must retreat and regroup!

source: Yes, Kosyu. Now is the time for patience. We can fight another day.
target: Yes, Kosyu. Now is the time for patience. We can fight another day.

source: I fight in the name of the Vochsteins! My head would make a worthy prize─not that any of you cowards could take it!
target: I fight in the name of the Vochsteins! My head would make a worthy prize─not that any of you cowards could take it!

source: We are under attack! Repeat: we are under attack! Requesting air support!
target: We are under attack! Repeat: we are under attack! Requesting air support!

source:
Isn't it obvious? We have succeeded in mass-producing them.
Go forth, my enhanced soldiers! Go forth and destroy the enemy!
target:
Isn't it obvious? We have succeeded in mass-producing them.
Go forth, my enhanced soldiers! Go forth and destroy the enemy!

source: Damn it, they're too strong! Fall back! Fall back!
target: Damn it, they're too strong! Fall back! Fall back!

source: The Resistance is withdrawing! Repeat: the Resistance is withdrawing! Much obliged for the air support!
target: The Resistance is withdrawing! Repeat: the Resistance is withdrawing! Much obliged for the air support!

source: Whatever it is, I've never seen one so big!
target: Whatever it is, I've never seen one so big!

source: Oho, we meet again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Still fighting up a storm, I hear. You really ought to join us. I'd see to it you want for nothing.
target: Oho, we meet again, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Still fighting up a storm, I hear. You really ought to join us. I'd see to it you want for nothing.

source: But I know a lost cause when I see one, and you can make a man beg only so many times.
target: But I know a lost cause when I see one, and you can make a man beg only so many times.

source: Not good... It pains to say this, but we must retreat!
target: Not good... It pains to say this, but we must retreat!

source: Finally given up on trying to woo our friend, has he?
target: Finally given up on trying to woo our friend, has he?

source: So, with that out of the way, let's get right to business... You're all chocobo fodder!
target: So, with that out of the way, let's get right to business... You're all chocobo fodder!

source: Gahahaha, there's nothing like a good rampage!
target: Gahahaha, there's nothing like a good rampage!

source: No hard feelings, eh? At the end of the day, I just need the coin to feed my own.
target: No hard feelings, eh? At the end of the day, I just need the coin to feed my own.

source: Such touching concern for his underlings...
target: Such touching concern for his underlings...

source: Godsdammit... Sorry, but I can't afford to die here. Someone needs to put meat and mead on the table, see?
target: Godsdammit... Sorry, but I can't afford to die here. Someone needs to put meat and mead on the table, see?

source: We'll settle this another time, I promise! So long!
target: We'll settle this another time, I promise! So long!

source: Gahahaha! Victory belongs to the strong, and we're the strongest of all!
target: Gahahaha! Victory belongs to the strong, and we're the strongest of all!

source: If you have a change of heart, just let me know, eh? We can never have too many strong people like you!
target: If you have a change of heart, just let me know, eh? We can never have too many strong people like you!

source: Excellent. Let us return to the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>.
target: Excellent. Let us return to the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: Back to the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>. Our next mission awaits!
target: Back to the <var 1A 02 /var>Dalriada<var 1A 01 /var>. Our next mission awaits!

source: Hah hah! You may think to find comfort in numbers, but they shall all be my puppets!
target: Hah hah! You may think to find comfort in numbers, but they shall all be my puppets!

source: You there! You appear to be Far Easterners, but you're not one of us. Identify yourselves!
target: You there! You appear to be Far Easterners, but you're not one of us. Identify yourselves!

source: We are the Onmyoji Brotherhood, and fate has ordained that we serve Lord Noah. In his name we shall strike you down.
target: We are the Onmyoji Brotherhood, and fate has ordained that we serve Lord Noah. In his name we shall strike you down.

source: Hmph, I bloody knew it... To arms! To arms!
target: Hmph, I bloody knew it... To arms! To arms!

source: Our comrades need help! Look alive!
target: Our comrades need help! Look alive!

source:
Reinforcements so soon? Very well, allow us to return the favor.
O shikigami! I bid you smite my foes!
target:
Reinforcements so soon? Very well, allow us to return the favor.
O shikigami! I bid you smite my foes!

source: Wh-What is that abomination? Have care!
target: Wh-What is that abomination? Have care!

source: Ugh... It seems I underestimated them...
target: Ugh... It seems I underestimated them...

source: That my shikigami should be defeated...
target: That my shikigami should be defeated...

source: And here come the roosters! Keep your distance, or you'll soon wish you had!
target: And here come the roosters! Keep your distance, or you'll soon wish you had!

source: Hmph, you may have won the day, but this isn't over. Far from it.
target: Hmph, you may have won the day, but this isn't over. Far from it.

source: The enemy is fled! Well fought, brothers!
target: The enemy is fled! Well fought, brothers!

source: Know the power of the Onmyoji Brotherhood!
target: Know the power of the Onmyoji Brotherhood!

source: Their sorcery is more formidable than I had reckoned... Retreat! Retreat!
target: Their sorcery is more formidable than I had reckoned... Retreat! Retreat!

source: How could we lose to the likes of them!?
target: How could we lose to the likes of them!?

source: Remember this victory well, my brothers. For it is the moment we began carving our place in Lord Noah's new nation!
target: Remember this victory well, my brothers. For it is the moment we began carving our place in Lord Noah's new nation!

source: The relic takes hold of your body, and I take a hold of your mind. Ere long, the strings have you bound.
target: The relic takes hold of your body, and I take a hold of your mind. Ere long, the strings have you bound.

source: Now dance for me, puppets. Dance, and bring more to my merry troupe!
target: Now dance for me, puppets. Dance, and bring more to my merry troupe!

source: My...my body...! It's burning... It's buuurning!
target: My...my body...! It's burning... It's buuurning!

source: <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the uncouth rabble our glorious legion has struggled so long to eliminate...? How disheartening.
target: <var 1A 02 /var>This<var 1A 01 /var> is the uncouth rabble our glorious legion has struggled so long to eliminate...? How disheartening.

source: No matter. I am here now, and I shall sweep this field clean of Resistance filth!
target: No matter. I am here now, and I shall sweep this field clean of Resistance filth!

source:
Fabineau!? How did─?
Why are you in Bozja?
target:
Fabineau!? How did─?
Why are you in Bozja?

source:
Llofii, my dear! The reports had you pinned as a deserter.
Have you come forth to surrender to me, then? To beg my forgiveness?
target:
Llofii, my dear! The reports had you pinned as a deserter.
Have you come forth to surrender to me, then? To beg my forgiveness?

source: Never! I will never again align myself with you and your cruel experiments!
target: Never! I will never again align myself with you and your cruel experiments!

source: It falls to me to cleanse the stain of your betrayal!
target: It falls to me to cleanse the stain of your betrayal!

source: You will suffer for the suffering you've inflicted!
target: You will suffer for the suffering you've inflicted!

source:
Ah, but where are my manners?
You really should meet your successor.
target:
Ah, but where are my manners?
You really should meet your successor.

source: I'm sure the two of you will get along splendidly─after all, you do have so much in common!
target: I'm sure the two of you will get along splendidly─after all, you do have so much in common!

source: Allow me to introduce a fellow traitor: Lovro, of Gunnhildr's Blades!
target: Allow me to introduce a fellow traitor: Lovro, of Gunnhildr's Blades!

source:
In the name of the queen...
All dissidents must perish!
target:
In the name of the queen...
All dissidents must perish!

source:
No...
This man has been tempered...
target:
No...
This man has been tempered...

source:
My poor, addled Llofii.
Our final farewell is at hand.
target:
My poor, addled Llofii.
Our final farewell is at hand.

source:
My queen...
I return to your side...
target:
My queen...
I return to your side...

source:
Fabineau was not content to meddle with the monoceros, it seems.
He has expanded into other foul spheres of experimentation...
target:
Fabineau was not content to meddle with the monoceros, it seems.
He has expanded into other foul spheres of experimentation...

source: I care not what it costs me─I must put an end to his evil!
target: I care not what it costs me─I must put an end to his evil!

source:
My queen!
I bring you victory!
target:
My queen!
I bring you victory!

source:
That is true power.
Remember well this defeat.
target:
That is true power.
Remember well this defeat.

source: I am her shield. I am her sword. The queen's blade is all that I am or wish to be!
target: I am her shield. I am her sword. The queen's blade is all that I am or wish to be!

source: Lovro! I had not wanted to believe the reports, but now I see that they spoke true...
target: Lovro! I had not wanted to believe the reports, but now I see that they spoke true...

source: Though it pains me to stand against you, my duty is clear!
target: Though it pains me to stand against you, my duty is clear!

source:
It is fitting somehow...
The techniques that you once taught me shall be the very same I wield to effect your capture!
target:
It is fitting somehow...
The techniques that you once taught me shall be the very same I wield to effect your capture!

source: Mine own red magicks, used against me by an enemy of the queen!
target: Mine own red magicks, used against me by an enemy of the queen!

source:
Yet I wonder...have you mastered <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> my secrets?
Dare you unleash the fires of the Crimson Scourge!?
target:
Yet I wonder...have you mastered <var 1A 02 /var>all<var 1A 01 /var> my secrets?
Dare you unleash the fires of the Crimson Scourge!?

source:
No... I've felt this surge of mana before...
Back! Everyone back!
target:
No... I've felt this surge of mana before...
Back! Everyone back!

source:
Gods above!
The tempering has only enhanced his powers...
target:
Gods above!
The tempering has only enhanced his powers...

source:
I cannot fall here.
My queen yet has need of me...
target:
I cannot fall here.
My queen yet has need of me...

source:
For a kindness, at least his body yet remains uncorrupted.
We can still... There is still time.
target:
For a kindness, at least his body yet remains uncorrupted.
We can still... There is still time.

source:
Fear not, my mentor.
We will save you from this darkness...
target:
