Fear not, my mentor.
We will save you from this darkness...

source:
Fall back! His magicks are too strong!
We must regroup and reconsider our strategy!
target:
Fall back! His magicks are too strong!
We must regroup and reconsider our strategy!

source:
My queen! This victory I seize in your name!
Your Majesty's loyal servant returns...
target:
My queen! This victory I seize in your name!
Your Majesty's loyal servant returns...

source:
Mark you the weapon he wields?
That man is Lovro─one of Gunnhildr's Blades!
target:
Mark you the weapon he wields?
That man is Lovro─one of Gunnhildr's Blades!

source: You dare face me again, foul pretender to the red mantle!?
target: You dare face me again, foul pretender to the red mantle!?

source: Aye, and this time, I will not fail.
target: Aye, and this time, I will not fail.

source: I will honor you, my mentor...by subduing you in battle!
target: I will honor you, my mentor...by subduing you in battle!

source:
Foe to my queen.
Prepare to meet your end!
target:
Foe to my queen.
Prepare to meet your end!

source:
Ugh! ...You truly are a master of the art!
Yet I will prove myself the stronger!
target:
Ugh! ...You truly are a master of the art!
Yet I will prove myself the stronger!

source:
I tire of this contest!
If you seek my best, then you shall have it!
target:
I tire of this contest!
If you seek my best, then you shall have it!

source: And I will weather the storm just as you taught me...with heart and steel!
target: And I will weather the storm just as you taught me...with heart and steel!

source: My vital flame feeds the Crimson Scourge!
target: My vital flame feeds the Crimson Scourge!

source: My aether... How feeble grows its fire...
target: My aether... How feeble grows its fire...

source: Quickly, bind him while he is still weak!
target: Quickly, bind him while he is still weak!

source:
<pant> <pant> <pant>
It is done, Master Lovro. The healing can begin!
target:
<pant> <pant> <pant>
It is done, Master Lovro. The healing can begin!

source: I have...no more aether to give...and yet he still stands!
target: I have...no more aether to give...and yet he still stands!

source:
Victory, my queen!
I return to you triumphant!
target:
Victory, my queen!
I return to you triumphant!

source: If you wish to participate in these light-hearted games, please gather at Bright Ballad's Passage.
target: If you wish to participate in these light-hearted games, please gather at Bright Ballad's Passage.

source: Artisans of all persuasions can join in the fun and win fabulous prizes!
target: Artisans of all persuasions can join in the fun and win fabulous prizes!

source: We eagerly look forward to your participation!
target: We eagerly look forward to your participation!

source: This is the final call for fêtes! If you wish to participate, please hasten to Bright Ballad's Passage.
target: This is the final call for fêtes! If you wish to participate, please hasten to Bright Ballad's Passage.

source: Come, friends, pray do not dally!
target: Come, friends, pray do not dally!

source: Follow our mascots to the Mattock, where the fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will be held.
target: Follow our mascots to the Mattock, where the fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will be held.

source: The fun and excitement have only just begun!
target: The fun and excitement have only just begun!

source: In charge of this fête is Chirpy Chocobo, who loves all things fluffy and downy.
target: In charge of this fête is Chirpy Chocobo, who loves all things fluffy and downy.

source: Our mascots are making their way to the venue as we speak.
target: Our mascots are making their way to the venue as we speak.

source: If you wish to participate─and surely you do─please follow them to Bright Ballad's Passage!
target: If you wish to participate─and surely you do─please follow them to Bright Ballad's Passage!

source: Quickly, now. As the saying goes, “Good things come to those who <var 1A 02 /var>don't<var 1A 01 /var> wait”!
target: Quickly, now. As the saying goes, “Good things come to those who <var 1A 02 /var>don't<var 1A 01 /var> wait”!

source: This time, Perky Piggy and his lovable litter of swinelings will be in charge of the proceedings.
target: This time, Perky Piggy and his lovable litter of swinelings will be in charge of the proceedings.

source: Including the soon-to-commence “Toy Hunter,” but two fêtes remain.
target: Including the soon-to-commence “Toy Hunter,” but two fêtes remain.

source: There, the fifth and final fête awaits: “Presents of Mind.”
target: There, the fifth and final fête awaits: “Presents of Mind.”

source: This being the rousing conclusion, we hope to see every one of you there with bells on!
target: This being the rousing conclusion, we hope to see every one of you there with bells on!

source: And that concludes all the fêtes. On behalf of all the residents of the Firmament, we thank you for joining us in the revelry.
target: And that concludes all the fêtes. On behalf of all the residents of the Firmament, we thank you for joining us in the revelry.

source: The Skyrise Celebration is our way of honoring our esteemed builders while welcoming folk from near and far to our new home.
target: The Skyrise Celebration is our way of honoring our esteemed builders while welcoming folk from near and far to our new home.

source: We hope that we have been able to give back some of the joy we have received, and wish you much and more happiness!
target: We hope that we have been able to give back some of the joy we have received, and wish you much and more happiness!

source: Who would be wandering a battlefield alone...?
target: Who would be wandering a battlefield alone...?

source: You appear to be Bozjan, sir, but how came you to this place?
target: You appear to be Bozjan, sir, but how came you to this place?

source:
...Dabog? It is you, is it not?
There were reports of your capture two years ago!
target:
...Dabog? It is you, is it not?
There were reports of your capture two years ago!

source:
This is hyperpilot Dabog.
Hostile forces confirmed. Initiating combat.
target:
This is hyperpilot Dabog.
Hostile forces confirmed. Initiating combat.

source:
I recognize that warmachina!
...And now we know who the pilot was.
target:
I recognize that warmachina!
...And now we know who the pilot was.

source:
Dabog is not in his right mind, but he leaves us little choice.
Defend yourselves!
target:
Dabog is not in his right mind, but he leaves us little choice.
Defend yourselves!

source:
Fight their control, Dabog!
This is not who you are!
target:
Fight their control, Dabog!
This is not who you are!

source:
Energy levels dropping. Initiating subroutines.
Launching alternative attack patterns.
target:
Energy levels dropping. Initiating subroutines.
Launching alternative attack patterns.

source:
Dabog!
Gods, that machina is a menace!
target:
Dabog!
Gods, that machina is a menace!

source:
This is hyperpilot Dabog.
Hull integrity compromised. Retreating to base.
target:
This is hyperpilot Dabog.
Hull integrity compromised. Retreating to base.

source: Dabog, wait! Let us help you!
target: Dabog, wait! Let us help you!

source: Is tempering not abhorrent enough!? Must they seek out new ways to twist and control men's hearts!?
target: Is tempering not abhorrent enough!? Must they seek out new ways to twist and control men's hearts!?

source: It lies beyond all reason, sir...
target: It lies beyond all reason, sir...

source: Then we must work doubly hard not to lose our own. We stay the course, and hope it also leads to his salvation...
target: Then we must work doubly hard not to lose our own. We stay the course, and hope it also leads to his salvation...

source:
This is hyperpilot Dabog.
Hostiles routed. Returning to base.
target:
This is hyperpilot Dabog.
Hostiles routed. Returning to base.

source: So this is where those Resistance rats were hiding...
target: So this is where those Resistance rats were hiding...

source: If they relay this information to their superiors, we're done for! Kill them all!
target: If they relay this information to their superiors, we're done for! Kill them all!

source: I, too, am a blade of Gunnhildr...and I will do my master proud!
target: I, too, am a blade of Gunnhildr...and I will do my master proud!

source: We're under attack! Request aerial support at once!
target: We're under attack! Request aerial support at once!

source: Fire at will! Reduce them to ashes!
target: Fire at will! Reduce them to ashes!

source: M-Master...did you see that!? Your student has done you proud!
target: M-Master...did you see that!? Your student has done you proud!

source: So you are one of Gunnhildr's Blades, yes? Thank you for kindly volunteering this information.
target: So you are one of Gunnhildr's Blades, yes? Thank you for kindly volunteering this information.

source: Hah! Spying from the comfort of magitek armor, I see. Next time, we cross blades on the battlefield!
target: Hah! Spying from the comfort of magitek armor, I see. Next time, we cross blades on the battlefield!

source: Our attacks barely scathe them. Oh, Master, whatever shall I do!?
target: Our attacks barely scathe them. Oh, Master, whatever shall I do!?

source: R-Right... We must live to fight another day. Retreat! Retreat, I say!
target: R-Right... We must live to fight another day. Retreat! Retreat, I say!

source: Allow us to even the odds!
target: Allow us to even the odds!

source: You couldn't have picked a better moment!
target: You couldn't have picked a better moment!

source: Thank you, my friends! Let us put an end to the Empire's villainy!
target: Thank you, my friends! Let us put an end to the Empire's villainy!

source: We will send him to Gangos!
target: We will send him to Gangos!

source: The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” is currently underway on the Mattock.
target: The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” is currently underway on the Mattock.

source: Don't miss this chance to craft adorably large stuffed toys!
target: Don't miss this chance to craft adorably large stuffed toys!

source: Hurry, friends! Time is almost up!
target: Hurry, friends! Time is almost up!

source: The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will soon conclude.
target: The fête “Made of Softer Stuff” will soon conclude.

source: If you still have a toy, please hurry and deliver it to the wain!
target: If you still have a toy, please hurry and deliver it to the wain!

source: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
target: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.

source:
Be on your guard.
I will speak with this lost lamb.
target:
Be on your guard.
I will speak with this lost lamb.

source: The fête “Shear-a-Yak” is currently being held at Bright Ballad's Passage. Join us in the fun and reap─or should I say, <var 1A 02 /var>shear<var 1A 01 /var>─the rewards!
target: The fête “Shear-a-Yak” is currently being held at Bright Ballad's Passage. Join us in the fun and reap─or should I say, <var 1A 02 /var>shear<var 1A 01 /var>─the rewards!

source: I trust your clippers are firing well─our mascots are meticulous with their maintenance!
target: I trust your clippers are firing well─our mascots are meticulous with their maintenance!

source: Lest you worry for your safety, I assure you our wooly friend has been rendered docile with a feast of his favorite fodder.
target: Lest you worry for your safety, I assure you our wooly friend has been rendered docile with a feast of his favorite fodder.

source: If you still have fleece, please hurry and deliver it to Chirpy Chocobo!
target: If you still have fleece, please hurry and deliver it to Chirpy Chocobo!

source: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
target: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.

source: The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. Seek and you will find, participate and you will receive─prizes, that is!
target: The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. Seek and you will find, participate and you will receive─prizes, that is!

source: The rules are simple: open the right present box to find the lucky toy, and see it to Perky Piggy's hands.
target: The rules are simple: open the right present box to find the lucky toy, and see it to Perky Piggy's hands.

source: The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. It isn't too late to participate and receive prizes!
target: The fête “Toy Hunter” is underway on the Abacus. It isn't too late to participate and receive prizes!

source: If you find yourself turned into a cute little piggy, fret not. The magick swiftly wears off.
target: If you find yourself turned into a cute little piggy, fret not. The magick swiftly wears off.

source: The hunt is drawing to a close. How many lucky toys have you found thus far?
target: The hunt is drawing to a close. How many lucky toys have you found thus far?

source: The fête “Toy Hunter” will soon conclude.
target: The fête “Toy Hunter” will soon conclude.

source: Loath though I am to disappoint, you can't take the lucky toys home with you. Please deliver them to Perky Piggy.
target: Loath though I am to disappoint, you can't take the lucky toys home with you. Please deliver them to Perky Piggy.

source: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.
target: To assist us in distributing rewards, please remain in your artisan's attire until you have received yours.

source: The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.
target: The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.

source: Take the presents the mascots have prepared, and see them delivered to the right people!
target: Take the presents the mascots have prepared, and see them delivered to the right people!

source: The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.
target: The fête “Presents of Mind” is currently taking place on the Mattock.

source: Such delight writ upon the faces of the recipients! Come, let's keep up the gift giving!
target: Such delight writ upon the faces of the recipients! Come, let's keep up the gift giving!

source: Hurry, friends! Not long now until the gift giving must come to an end!
target: Hurry, friends! Not long now until the gift giving must come to an end!

source: The fête “Presents of Mind” will soon conclude.
target: The fête “Presents of Mind” will soon conclude.

source: Time is almost up, friends. Please deliver your last presents.
target: Time is almost up, friends. Please deliver your last presents.

source: As today's excitement draws to a close, may we say what wonderful participants you have all been!
target: As today's excitement draws to a close, may we say what wonderful participants you have all been!

source: If none of them are Dabog, what have you done with him!?
target: If none of them are Dabog, what have you done with him!?

source: Ah yes, subject VIII. He was a truly exceptional prototype.
target: Ah yes, subject VIII. He was a truly exceptional prototype.

source: Alas, his flesh eventually succumbed to the rigors of testing. Controlling such complex machinery takes a heavy toll, you see.
target: Alas, his flesh eventually succumbed to the rigors of testing. Controlling such complex machinery takes a heavy toll, you see.

source: Fortunately, we were able to overcome this problem by means of the VIIth's data extraction technique.
target: Fortunately, we were able to overcome this problem by means of the VIIth's data extraction technique.

source: From his combat expertise to his memories, we transferred everything into these enhanced soldiers.
target: From his combat expertise to his memories, we transferred everything into these enhanced soldiers.

source: What!? You heartless fiend! Does your depravity know no bounds!?
target: What!? You heartless fiend! Does your depravity know no bounds!?

source: You will pay for this! We will avenge Dabog!
target: You will pay for this! We will avenge Dabog!

source: Impossible... That my enhanced unit should be wiped out...
target: Impossible... That my enhanced unit should be wiped out...

source: So be it. I had intended to conduct more tests, but you leave me no choice. Savor your victory while you still can!
target: So be it. I had intended to conduct more tests, but you leave me no choice. Savor your victory while you still can!

source: It sounds as though he hasn't shown all of his hand yet...
target: It sounds as though he hasn't shown all of his hand yet...

source: Well, whatever it is he has coming, we'll be ready to fight!
target: Well, whatever it is he has coming, we'll be ready to fight!

source: Indeed. We will fight, and we will triumph─for Dabog and everyone we have lost.
target: Indeed. We will fight, and we will triumph─for Dabog and everyone we have lost.

source: Come, my friends. Let us return to the encampment and prepare for the next battle.
target: Come, my friends. Let us return to the encampment and prepare for the next battle.

source: Ugh, we cannot contend with such firepower... Fall back! Fall back!
target: Ugh, we cannot contend with such firepower... Fall back! Fall back!

source: We must retreat while we can!
target: We must retreat while we can!

source: Urabe-no-Yamatsumi, you thief! Marsak told us where to find you!
target: Urabe-no-Yamatsumi, you thief! Marsak told us where to find you!

source: What madness has possessed you to abscond with Doma's treasure? To lick the boots of the Empire!?
target: What madness has possessed you to abscond with Doma's treasure? To lick the boots of the Empire!?

source: Thieves? Do you forget your roots, shinobi of Doma? You deserve no explanation, but for the motherland we share, you shall have it.
target: Thieves? Do you forget your roots, shinobi of Doma? You deserve no explanation, but for the motherland we share, you shall have it.

source: The priests endured untold suffering under Yotsuyu's iron rule, her ire toward our traditions often turning to wrath.
target: The priests endured untold suffering under Yotsuyu's iron rule, her ire toward our traditions often turning to wrath.

source: Only by Legatus Noah's grace did we survive those dark times. Delivering this treasure to him is the least we can do to repay his clandestine efforts to aid us.
target: Only by Legatus Noah's grace did we survive those dark times. Delivering this treasure to him is the least we can do to repay his clandestine efforts to aid us.

source: And in repaying your debt you would stifle the Bozjans? Think about the full reach of your actions!
target: And in repaying your debt you would stifle the Bozjans? Think about the full reach of your actions!

source: Gah... The spirit is willing...but the flesh is bruised and battered...
target: Gah... The spirit is willing...but the flesh is bruised and battered...

source: It is not too late for you, Yamatsumi! We can still return to Doma together! We can return home together!
target: It is not too late for you, Yamatsumi! We can still return to Doma together! We can return home together!

source: I swore my life to Legatus Noah! Behold the depth of my loyalty!
target: I swore my life to Legatus Noah! Behold the depth of my loyalty!

source: We cannot win this battle! Tsubame!
target: We cannot win this battle! Tsubame!

source: Remember this defeat well, shinobi. As brothers and sisters of Doma, we showed mercy this time. We will not do so again.
target: Remember this defeat well, shinobi. As brothers and sisters of Doma, we showed mercy this time. We will not do so again.

source: You are...much changed. What have those fiends done to you!?
target: You are...much changed. What have those fiends done to you!?

source: Witness the strength of the IVth Legion!
target: Witness the strength of the IVth Legion!

source: Victory and glory are ours! Inform command!
target: Victory and glory are ours! Inform command!

source: I am Pagaga of House Vochstein, queen of all beastkind! Cower before me!
target: I am Pagaga of House Vochstein, queen of all beastkind! Cower before me!

source: “The Vochsteins are renowned in the West for their beast-taming prowess,” you say? You know this girl?
target: “The Vochsteins are renowned in the West for their beast-taming prowess,” you say? You know this girl?

source: Ahahaha! Father's exploits are sung of far and wide! Should you wish to flee, now is your chance!
target: Ahahaha! Father's exploits are sung of far and wide! Should you wish to flee, now is your chance!

source: The girl has skill befitting one of Lyon's students, I'll give her that.
target: The girl has skill befitting one of Lyon's students, I'll give her that.

source: “The Vochsteins have long been Lyon's rivals for the title of Beast King,” you say? I say, old friend, where do you learn these things?
target: “The Vochsteins have long been Lyon's rivals for the title of Beast King,” you say? I say, old friend, where do you learn these things?

source: <var 1A 02 /var>Rivals<var 1A 01 /var>, you say!? Hah! That weanling Lyon is not fit to wear Father's skivvies!
target: <var 1A 02 /var>Rivals<var 1A 01 /var>, you say!? Hah! That weanling Lyon is not fit to wear Father's skivvies!

source: You sully the name of House Vochstein...and you shall pay for this dishonor with your lives!
target: You sully the name of House Vochstein...and you shall pay for this dishonor with your lives!

source: No... What have you done to my beauties!?
target: No... What have you done to my beauties!?

source: Pagaga will remember this day. The next time we meet, my beauties will drink of your blood!
target: Pagaga will remember this day. The next time we meet, my beauties will drink of your blood!

source: Lyon has quite the reputation, but it seems he's not the only one with these skills...
target: Lyon has quite the reputation, but it seems he's not the only one with these skills...

source: Indeed. We had best return, restock, and report our findings.
target: Indeed. We had best return, restock, and report our findings.

source: Curses! These damn beasts are too strong for us! Fall back! We'll take our chances another day!
target: Curses! These damn beasts are too strong for us! Fall back! We'll take our chances another day!

source: Gahaha! This is the strength of House Vochstein, rulers of all beastkind!
target: Gahaha! This is the strength of House Vochstein, rulers of all beastkind!

source: Who needs that greybeard Lyon!? Pagaga and her beauties will smite the Resistance single-handedly!
target: Who needs that greybeard Lyon!? Pagaga and her beauties will smite the Resistance single-handedly!

source:
Hull integrity at 60%. Firepower insufficient.
Requesting helldiver reinforcements.
target:
Hull integrity at 60%. Firepower insufficient.
Requesting helldiver reinforcements.

source:
Sir, we have movement.
Magitek armor inbound!
target:
Sir, we have movement.
Magitek armor inbound!

source: We must be ready for every eventuality!
target: We must be ready for every eventuality!

source: We must have faith in Arenvald and Fordola!
target: We must have faith in Arenvald and Fordola!

source: The seat of the Amalj'aa's power doth lie beyond this valley...
target: The seat of the Amalj'aa's power doth lie beyond this valley...

source: We must be ready for every eventuality!
target: We must be ready for every eventuality!

source: We must have faith in Arenvald and Fordola!
target: We must have faith in Arenvald and Fordola!

source: The kobolds have proven to be staunch allies indeed!
target: The kobolds have proven to be staunch allies indeed!

source: The kobolds have proven to be staunch allies indeed!
target: The kobolds have proven to be staunch allies indeed!

source: I think this answers the question of how they summoned Bahamut...
target: I think this answers the question of how they summoned Bahamut...

source: It's fast, but not fast enough!
target: It's fast, but not fast enough!

source: I think this answers the question of how they summoned Bahamut...
target: I think this answers the question of how they summoned Bahamut...

source: In death, may you find the peace you were denied in life...
target: In death, may you find the peace you were denied in life...

source: The Amalj'aa need all the help they can get. Come on!
target: The Amalj'aa need all the help they can get. Come on!

source: In death, may you find the peace you were denied in life...
target: In death, may you find the peace you were denied in life...

source: We must proceed with caution if we wish to slip through the enemy's front line.
target: We must proceed with caution if we wish to slip through the enemy's front line.

source: With Estinien and Tiamat on our side, we have nothing to fear!
target: With Estinien and Tiamat on our side, we have nothing to fear!

source: Estinien! Leave these foes to us!
target: Estinien! Leave these foes to us!

source: Let us follow Tiamat and Ser Estinien's lead!
target: Let us follow Tiamat and Ser Estinien's lead!

source: Estinien! Leave these foes to us!
target: Estinien! Leave these foes to us!

source: One could not ask for more dependable allies!
target: One could not ask for more dependable allies!

source: The armies of the Alliance have entered the fray.
target: The armies of the Alliance have entered the fray.

source: Let's lend the Ishgardians our support!
target: Let's lend the Ishgardians our support!

source: Our presence is yet required in the city.
target: Our presence is yet required in the city.

source: The armies of the Alliance have entered the fray.
target: The armies of the Alliance have entered the fray.

source:
There is no time to lose.
To the valley!
target:
There is no time to lose.
To the valley!

source: Together, we will force the enemy back!
target: Together, we will force the enemy back!

source: It seems Estinien is good for something after all.
target: It seems Estinien is good for something after all.

source: It seems Estinien is good for something after all.
target: It seems Estinien is good for something after all.

source:
As you should well know!
Or have you been ignoring my tales of his exploits?
target:
As you should well know!
Or have you been ignoring my tales of his exploits?

source: Another of the Empire's magitek monstrosities, it would seem.
target: Another of the Empire's magitek monstrosities, it would seem.

source: That unsightly contraption is in need of dismantling.
target: That unsightly contraption is in need of dismantling.

source:
Absurdly large and ugly as sin?
There's no mistaking that “classic” Garlean design...
target:
Absurdly large and ugly as sin?
There's no mistaking that “classic” Garlean design...

source:
A mobile fortress...
So, 'tis more than a mere rumor.
target:
A mobile fortress...
So, 'tis more than a mere rumor.

source:
A mobile fortress...
So, 'tis more than a mere rumor.
target:
A mobile fortress...
So, 'tis more than a mere rumor.

source: The Telophoroi are not leaving anything to chance...
target: The Telophoroi are not leaving anything to chance...

source: My goodness... I do hope there aren't any more of those!
target: My goodness... I do hope there aren't any more of those!

source:
The Amalj'aa could teach
me a thing or two about pyromancy.
target:
The Amalj'aa could teach
me a thing or two about pyromancy.

source: I dread to think how we'd have fared without the Amalj'aa!
target: I dread to think how we'd have fared without the Amalj'aa!

source: The enemy's assault on the city hath been thwarted.
target: The enemy's assault on the city hath been thwarted.

source: The enemy's assault on the city hath been thwarted.
target: The enemy's assault on the city hath been thwarted.

source: I never dreamed I would have the chance to ride a dragon!
target: I never dreamed I would have the chance to ride a dragon!

source: Surely, teleportation magick presenteth a safer alternative...
target: Surely, teleportation magick presenteth a safer alternative...

source: Surely, teleportation magick presenteth a safer alternative...
target: Surely, teleportation magick presenteth a safer alternative...

source:
It's perfectly safe!
At least, I think it is...
target:
It's perfectly safe!
At least, I think it is...

source: We all made it here in one piece, I take it?
target: We all made it here in one piece, I take it?

source: Twelve forfend I should make such a perilous journey again...
target: Twelve forfend I should make such a perilous journey again...

source: Twelve forfend I should make such a perilous journey again...
target: Twelve forfend I should make such a perilous journey again...

source: If you thought <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> was nerve-racking, the worst is yet to come...
target: If you thought <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> was nerve-racking, the worst is yet to come...

source:
The air is thick with aether...
We are close.
target:
The air is thick with aether...
We are close.

source: This is not Bahamut, just a poor imitation!
target: This is not Bahamut, just a poor imitation!

source: This is not Bahamut, just a poor imitation!
target: This is not Bahamut, just a poor imitation!

source: Imitation or no, we would be fools to underestimate it!
target: Imitation or no, we would be fools to underestimate it!

source:
Isn't he precious!?
I brushed his coat just for the occasion!
target:
Isn't he precious!?
I brushed his coat just for the occasion!

source: Time for your daily exercise, my pet.
target: Time for your daily exercise, my pet.

source: Did I not hire you to provide enrichment for my newest acquisition?
target: Did I not hire you to provide enrichment for my newest acquisition?

source: He does so love to <var 1A 02 /var>stomp<var 1A 01 /var>, you see. There's nothing he enjoys more than the sound of shattering bone...
target: He does so love to <var 1A 02 /var>stomp<var 1A 01 /var>, you see. There's nothing he enjoys more than the sound of shattering bone...

source:
Save your grisly threats─our courage will not be so easily shaken.
Form up! We take this oversized beast down!
target:
Save your grisly threats─our courage will not be so easily shaken.
Form up! We take this oversized beast down!

source:
You've had your fun, Lyuba!
No more playing now!
target:
You've had your fun, Lyuba!
No more playing now!

source: Why...? Why am I here...down in the dirt?
target: Why...? Why am I here...down in the dirt?

source: I will see you all ground into meat slop!
target: I will see you all ground into meat slop!

source: Your minced remains will fill the feeding troughs of my menagerie!
target: Your minced remains will fill the feeding troughs of my menagerie!

source:
Do not give chase! You only risk being ambushed.
See to the wounded, and keep watch for approaching enemies.
target:
Do not give chase! You only risk being ambushed.
See to the wounded, and keep watch for approaching enemies.

source:
I must say, this Clarricie is proving to be a problem.
Where does she keep finding all these fantastic beasts?
target:
I must say, this Clarricie is proving to be a problem.
Where does she keep finding all these fantastic beasts?

source:
A mystery for another day, perhaps.
Come, let us make our way back to camp...
target:
A mystery for another day, perhaps.
Come, let us make our way back to camp...

source:
You useless, spineless worms.
Lyuba must have more exercise than that!
target:
You useless, spineless worms.
Lyuba must have more exercise than that!

source:
We cannot risk any more casualties.
Gather the wounded and quit the field!
target:
We cannot risk any more casualties.
Gather the wounded and quit the field!

source: Test subjects confirmed dead. Commencing aether extraction...
target: Test subjects confirmed dead. Commencing aether extraction...

source: Resistance fighters? What's going on here!?
target: Resistance fighters? What's going on here!?

source:
He's calling in fire support, but this is no time to withdraw!
We stand our ground!
target:
He's calling in fire support, but this is no time to withdraw!
We stand our ground!

source: Let's take a moment to assess the situation.
target: Let's take a moment to assess the situation.

source:
Everyone ready?
Then let's not dally any longer!
target:
Everyone ready?
Then let's not dally any longer!

source: Not your average dragon, by the looks of it...
target: Not your average dragon, by the looks of it...

source: So much for the Telophoroi's fancy new toy.
target: So much for the Telophoroi's fancy new toy.

source: So much for the Telophoroi's fancy new toy.
target: So much for the Telophoroi's fancy new toy.

source: This will save us a long trek.
target: This will save us a long trek.

source: Unnngh...my head... I have to get home... My family, they need me...
target: Unnngh...my head... I have to get home... My family, they need me...

source: Unnngh... Wh-Who are you? Stay away! Stay away from me!
target: Unnngh... Wh-Who are you? Stay away! Stay away from me!

source: Be calm, my friend. We are here to help you.
target: Be calm, my friend. We are here to help you.

source: <bzzzt> Excellent, they have taken the bait. Commence armament test.
target: <bzzzt> Excellent, they have taken the bait. Commence armament test.

source: What was that voice? An enemy transmission!?
target: What was that voice? An enemy transmission!?

source:
This...this is hyperpilot Dabog.
Order acknowledged. Deploying long-range assault nodes.
target:
This...this is hyperpilot Dabog.
Order acknowledged. Deploying long-range assault nodes.

source: Keep calm! We came here to save Dabog, and we will stay the course!
target: Keep calm! We came here to save Dabog, and we will stay the course!

source: Please, Dabog! Come to your senses! We are not your enemy!
target: Please, Dabog! Come to your senses! We are not your enemy!

source:
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Energy levels below minimum.
Combat capabilities severely compromised. Returning to base.
target:
This is hyperpilot Dabog. Energy levels below minimum.
Combat capabilities severely compromised. Returning to base.

source: Yet again we have failed our friend, and he remains at the enemy's mercy...
target: Yet again we have failed our friend, and he remains at the enemy's mercy...

source: There is nothing left to be done here. Let us return to the encampment.
target: There is nothing left to be done here. Let us return to the encampment.

source:
No... Defeat is an insult to my queen!
I will hold back nothing. NOTHING!
target:
No... Defeat is an insult to my queen!
I will hold back nothing. NOTHING!

source: The Onmyoji Brotherhood answers to none but Lord Noah! We will see his dream realized!
target: The Onmyoji Brotherhood answers to none but Lord Noah! We will see his dream realized!

source: Master Oboro, we cannot follow. We must rally more troops.
target: Master Oboro, we cannot follow. We must rally more troops.

source: You're right, of course. Let's return home.
target: You're right, of course. Let's return home.

source: Now this is a fine collection of eggs!
target: Now this is a fine collection of eggs!

source: Pray assist us again if you've time to spare during the festival!
target: Pray assist us again if you've time to spare during the festival!

source:
These “roosters” are demons in feathered form!
I fear we've no choice but to abandon our efforts...
target:
These “roosters” are demons in feathered form!
I fear we've no choice but to abandon our efforts...

source: It's too late...too late for us all...
We must share the brunt of the blow!
target: We must share the brunt of the blow!

source:
This is where our ways do part.
We shall survey the halls below.
target:
This is where our ways do part.
We shall survey the halls below.

source:
Scanning for targets...
Scanning for targets...

You're one of us, right?
We need your help!
target:
Ты один из нас, да?
Нам нужна твоя помощь!

source: We'll make it out of this─together!
We have to get back to the shelter!
That wall─our attacks cannot penetrate it!
target: That wall─our attacks cannot penetrate it!

source: Not to worry─unlike you, I'm not a baby.
target: Not to worry─unlike you, I'm not a baby.

source: It's about bloody time, ye bastards!
target: It's about bloody time, ye bastards!

source: Gahaha! I'm starting to enjoy this!
Your lot brought the pestilence! You!
target: Your lot brought the pestilence! You!

source: Purify them with fire, I say!
target: Purify them with fire, I say!

source: How did it come to this?
target: How did it come to this?

source: It means to kill us all!
target: It means to kill us all!

source: If I can reach the terminal...
target: If I can reach the terminal...

source: I did it! I killed them all!
target: I did it! I killed them all!

source: Finally, I'm free! I...I think. I hope...
target: Finally, I'm free! I...I think. I hope...

source: Is this the end for usss?
target: Is this the end for usss?

source: What in blazes is wrong with these doors!?
target: Да что не так со всеми этими дверьми?!

source: I'm never getting out of here, am I?
target: Я отсюда никогда не выберусь, это конец!

source: You've led us in circles again, you fat-tailed idiot!
target: Это ты нас сюда завёл, прохвост!

source: Oh yeah? Well...your mother smells like cabbage!
target: Че-е-его? Тогда... твоя мама воняет капустой!

source: Keep calm and watch your step!
Ha! They'll have to do better than that!
target: Ха! В такой ситуации им придётся постараться.

source: Let's put on a good show, eh?
target: Let's put on a good show, eh?

source: The carriages are in safe hands!
target: The carriages are in safe hands!

source: To victory─come hells or high water!
target: To victory─come hells or high water!

source: The Duke of Destruction has descended!
target: The Duke of Destruction has descended!

source: I've been itchin' for a good scrap!
target: I've been itchin' for a good scrap!

source: All must bow before the Sun!
target: All must bow before the Sun!

source: Think you can kill <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!?I would like to see you try!
target: Think you can kill <var 1A 02 /var>me<var 1A 01 /var>!?I would like to see you try!

source: We will grow strong through conquest!
target: We will grow strong through conquest!

source: There is no future without our star!
target: There is no future without our star!

source: Those not with us are against us!
target: Those not with us are against us!

source: Unidentified presence detected... Eliminate unknown life-forms!
target: Unidentified presence detected... Eliminate unknown life-forms!

source: Failure is not an acceptable pathway. Commencing annihilation.
target: Failure is not an acceptable pathway. Commencing annihilation.

source: Nothing can halt our forward march!
target: Nothing can halt our forward march!

source: Crush the enemy! Turn them to scrap!
target: Crush the enemy! Turn them to scrap!

source: War with other stars ensures advancement!
target: War with other stars ensures advancement!

source: We must revitalize our star to secure stability!
target: We must revitalize our star to secure stability!

source: Eukrasian Diagnosis, if you'd be so kind!
target: Eukrasian Diagnosis, if you'd be so kind!

source: Fiends ahead! Please watch my back!
target: Fiends ahead! Please watch my back!

source: Oh, how I have waited for this moment.
target: Oh, how I have waited for this moment.

source: Oh no! It thinks <var 1A 02 /var>we're<var 1A 01 /var> the intruders!
target: Oh no! It thinks <var 1A 02 /var>we're<var 1A 01 /var> the intruders!

source: I say we get out of here!
target: I say we get out of here!

source: The security system is out of control!
target: The security system is out of control!

source: Your pitiful threat does not compute!
target: Your pitiful threat does not compute!

source: Why, you worthless piece of scrap...!
target: Why, you worthless piece of scrap...!

source: You're a scourge upon our star!
target: You're a scourge upon our star!

source: My friends! We fight as one!
target: My friends! We fight as one!

source: The weave of a shinobi's power!
target: The weave of a shinobi's power!

source: Does he even know friend from foe?
target: Does he even know friend from foe?

source: If we <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> fight, can we get on with it?
target: If we <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> fight, can we get on with it?

source: Slow of wit yet heavy of hand...
target: Slow of wit yet heavy of hand...

source: Can we not just walk past it?
target: Can we not just walk past it?

source:
This is an abomination.
A perversion of people's faith!
target:
This is an abomination.
A perversion of people's faith!

source: Whatever this being is, we can't let it stand in our way!
target: Whatever this being is, we can't let it stand in our way!

source: We can't very well stay here, can we?
target: We can't very well stay here, can we?

source: It's like being in the belly of a beast...
target: It's like being in the belly of a beast...

source: What is it made of, I wonder?
target: What is it made of, I wonder?

source: How are we to rescue everyone?
target: How are we to rescue everyone?

source: This place sets my teeth on edge.
target: This place sets my teeth on edge.

source: Best not to think on it for now.
target: Best not to think on it for now.

source: They've been awfully busy taking prisoners...
target: They've been awfully busy taking prisoners...

source: We must find the heart of this tower...and shut it down.
target: We must find the heart of this tower...and shut it down.

source: I wonder how Y'shtola and the others fare.
target: I wonder how Y'shtola and the others fare.

source: What manner of creature are these things?
target: What manner of creature are these things?

source:
Just like in the picture...
We're facing the Magus Sisters!
target:
Just like in the picture...
We're facing the Magus Sisters!

source: A mockery of the Thavnairian gods!
target: A mockery of the Thavnairian gods!

source:
She bars our path.
That's all we need to know.
target:
She bars our path.
That's all we need to know.

source: So it's to be lance against lance, is it?
target: So it's to be lance against lance, is it?

source: The same sisters the fisher lad told us about, yes?
target: The same sisters the fisher lad told us about, yes?

source: Just a pale imitation of divinity, in the end.
target: Just a pale imitation of divinity, in the end.

source: What else can this tower throw at us?
target: What else can this tower throw at us?

source: Someone needed more training with the spear...
target: Someone needed more training with the spear...

source: Protective of the tower, aren't they?
target: Protective of the tower, aren't they?

source: Compelled by Telophoroi magicks, I imagine.
target: Compelled by Telophoroi magicks, I imagine.

source: I believe we've reached the summit.
target: I believe we've reached the summit.

source: The aether here is thick as syrup...
target: The aether here is thick as syrup...

source:
The talisman...
I feel it trembling.
target:
The talisman...
I feel it trembling.

source: Aye, the talisman trembles to resist it.
target: Aye, the talisman trembles to resist it.

source: Ugh, we're so close, and now this!
target: Ugh, we're so close, and now this!

source: Stay focused! Now is not the time for mistakes!
target: Stay focused! Now is not the time for mistakes!

source: The third and final sister, I hope?
target: The third and final sister, I hope?

source: I suppose we should have expected a third sister...
target: I suppose we should have expected a third sister...

source: Cast down this false goddess and let us be done with it!
target: Cast down this false goddess and let us be done with it!

source: Would have been quicker to fight all three at once...
target: Would have been quicker to fight all three at once...

source: Please don't tempt fate like that.
target: Please don't tempt fate like that.

source:
Wonderful.
I do so love guessing games.
target:
Wonderful.
I do so love guessing games.

source: The pixies subjected me to far worse...
target: The pixies subjected me to far worse...

source: My eyes are not so easily deceived.
target: My eyes are not so easily deceived.

source: It seems he is determined to protect Meteion.
target: It seems he is determined to protect Meteion.

source: Aye. A right bother this is going to be...
target: Aye. A right bother this is going to be...

source: Let us make our way through the Frozen Sphere.
target: Let us make our way through the Frozen Sphere.

source: Ugh, of course there's a cold zone, and of course we're going through it...
target: Ugh, of course there's a cold zone, and of course we're going through it...

source: Would that we didn't have to put down the creations...
target: Would that we didn't have to put down the creations...

source: Oh dear, this fellow seems disinclined to let us pass...
target: Oh dear, this fellow seems disinclined to let us pass...

source: Then we have no choice but to force our way.
target: Then we have no choice but to force our way.

source: May you find peace in the aetherial sea...
target: May you find peace in the aetherial sea...

source: I'm afraid we can't do that.
target: I'm afraid we can't do that.

source: Warn us all you like. We're coming regardless.
target: Warn us all you like. We're coming regardless.

source: At least he has the courtesy to warn us.
target: At least he has the courtesy to warn us.

source: He may have his flaws, but you can't fault his managerial prowess.
target: He may have his flaws, but you can't fault his managerial prowess.

source: Seriously? You want to discuss his candidacy <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: Seriously? You want to discuss his candidacy <var 1A 02 /var>now<var 1A 01 /var>?

source: Goodness me... What manner of thinking is behind this?
target: Goodness me... What manner of thinking is behind this?

source: There truly is no accounting for taste...
target: There truly is no accounting for taste...

source: A pass for constitution, but a fail for intelligence.
target: A pass for constitution, but a fail for intelligence.

source: If its concept is submitted, I will be certain to reject it.
target: If its concept is submitted, I will be certain to reject it.

source: We're close. I can hear it in his voice.
target: We're close. I can hear it in his voice.

source: We're taking Meteion! Whether you like it or not!
target: We're taking Meteion! Whether you like it or not!

source: He's not going to give up, is he?
target: He's not going to give up, is he?

source: Stubbornness can be a virtue, but this is a little excessive.
target: Stubbornness can be a virtue, but this is a little excessive.

source: To protect Meteion, he would go so far as to transform...
target: To protect Meteion, he would go so far as to transform...

source: So far as to make himself a villain...
target: So far as to make himself a villain...

source: But 'neath the light of the stars, all is laid bare!
target: But 'neath the light of the stars, all is laid bare!

source: Nice try, but your aether is still showing.
target: Nice try, but your aether is still showing.

source: Is it seriously trying to hide? From <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: Is it seriously trying to hide? From <var 1A 02 /var>us<var 1A 01 /var>?

source: That the power of ice could be used this way...
target: That the power of ice could be used this way...

source: Alas, it's no use on us.
target: Alas, it's no use on us.

source: Vanished again... But again, it's left footprints.
target: Vanished again... But again, it's left footprints.

source: If we smash everything, we're bound to hit something!
target: If we smash everything, we're bound to hit something!

source: Gah! Where the hells are you!?
target: Gah! Where the hells are you!?

source: It's hidden itself better than before, I'll give it that.
target: It's hidden itself better than before, I'll give it that.

source: But it's still not good enough.
target: But it's still not good enough.

source: If thou wouldst repeat thy trick...
target: If thou wouldst repeat thy trick...

source: Then thou wilt not object were I to do likewise.
target: Then thou wilt not object were I to do likewise.

source: Behold the puissance of Sharlayan astrology!
target: Behold the puissance of Sharlayan astrology!

source: You really must learn to cover your tracks.
target: You really must learn to cover your tracks.

source: A little shy, are we? Fine by me. I can wait.
target: A little shy, are we? Fine by me. I can wait.

source: Well, well, it's trying to confuse us.
target: Well, well, it's trying to confuse us.

source: But we won't be so easily confounded.
target: But we won't be so easily confounded.

source: I've had enough of this mummer's farce.
target: I've had enough of this mummer's farce.

source: I must say, this is a promising concept.
target: I must say, this is a promising concept.

source: If this is the test we must overcome, so be it.
target: If this is the test we must overcome, so be it.

source: Such a high concentration of aether!
target: Such a high concentration of aether!

source: Whatever this is, we've but one choice.
target: Whatever this is, we've but one choice.

source: The suffering we've witnessed only strengthens our resolve!
target: The suffering we've witnessed only strengthens our resolve!

source: Hers is the power to sunder worlds...
target: Hers is the power to sunder worlds...

source: Oof... I'll feel that one tomorrow.
target: Oof... I'll feel that one tomorrow.

source: I've got plenty of fight left in me!
target: I've got plenty of fight left in me!

source: This was never like to be easy!
target: This was never like to be easy!

source: She's got more tricks up her sleeve than G'raha!
target: She's got more tricks up her sleeve than G'raha!

source: Well, pardon me for not measuring up to the God of Light!
target: Well, pardon me for not measuring up to the God of Light!

source: The Telophoroi's reign ends this day!
target: The Telophoroi's reign ends this day!

source: I shall bring up the rear.
target: I shall bring up the rear.

source: Prisoners! Let's get them out of there!
target: Prisoners! Let's get them out of there!

source: Let us entrust them to our comrades.
target: Let us entrust them to our comrades.

source: Here to be tempered, no doubt!
target: Here to be tempered, no doubt!

source:
A hypertuned soldier, perhaps?
As for the other chap, who knows?
target:
A hypertuned soldier, perhaps?
As for the other chap, who knows?

source: An engineer and his creation, I presume.
target: An engineer and his creation, I presume.

source: A face only a mother could love...
target: A face only a mother could love...

source: He doth not appear to have been tempered.
target: He doth not appear to have been tempered.

source: Is this the best they can muster?
target: Is this the best they can muster?

source: I feel the air rushing upwards...
target: I feel the air rushing upwards...

source: So far, so good. Let's continue.
target: So far, so good. Let's continue.

source: Even on the inside, this place has changed completely.
target: Even on the inside, this place has changed completely.

source: Just think what it took to build this ghastly place...
target: Just think what it took to build this ghastly place...

source: The perfect route...if one <var 1A 02 /var>enjoys<var 1A 01 /var> being ambushed...
target: The perfect route...if one <var 1A 02 /var>enjoys<var 1A 01 /var> being ambushed...

source: There must be a way to reach the upper levels...
target: There must be a way to reach the upper levels...

source: I know that feeling... The same as the Tower of Zot.
target: I know that feeling... The same as the Tower of Zot.

source: Magitek... No, wait... That's something far worse.
target: Magitek... No, wait... That's something far worse.

source: I sense living aether... That is no mere machine.
target: I sense living aether... That is no mere machine.

source: Even the Allagans would balk at such devilry.
target: Even the Allagans would balk at such devilry.

source: Indeed. The aether of a living being.
target: Indeed. The aether of a living being.

source: A fitting end for one so depraved.
target: A fitting end for one so depraved.

source: Let us not dwell on this grim episode. Onward.
target: Let us not dwell on this grim episode. Onward.

source: I sense great evil...all around us.
target: I sense great evil...all around us.

source: We're heading in the right direction.
target: We're heading in the right direction.

source: I must say, I'm not a fan of the décor.
target: I must say, I'm not a fan of the décor.

source: And the aether here is positively vile.
target: And the aether here is positively vile.

source: A primal...summoned by the Garleans themselves.
target: A primal...summoned by the Garleans themselves.

source: As I suspected, each tower contained a piece of his corpse!
target: As I suspected, each tower contained a piece of his corpse!

source: The cause of so much misery...
target: The cause of so much misery...

source: This fiend shall plague the world no longer!
target: This fiend shall plague the world no longer!

source: Steady now. We can't afford any mistakes.
I can barely look at it...
target: I can barely look at it...

source: Every fiber of my being is in revulsion...
target: Every fiber of my being is in revulsion...

source: All the horrors of Allag cannot compare...
target: All the horrors of Allag cannot compare...

source: No more games. This ends here.
target: No more games. This ends here.

source: Indeed. Let us expunge this blight once and for all!
target: Indeed. Let us expunge this blight once and for all!

source: What is happening to their aether!?
target: What is happening to their aether!?

source: I can't imagine what he must be going through...
target: I can't imagine what he must be going through...

source: All we can offer is a swift death.
target: All we can offer is a swift death.

source: There should be a village just ahead.
target: There should be a village just ahead.

source: You do your part, and we shall do ours!
target: You do your part, and we shall do ours!

source: If any yet live, we must save them!
target: If any yet live, we must save them!

source: I can only pray some made it out alive...
target: I can only pray some made it out alive...

source: Each beast more terrible than the last...
target: Each beast more terrible than the last...

source: That fiend was once one of us...
target: That fiend was once one of us...

source: No choice but to go through it.
target: No choice but to go through it.

source: Whoever they were, their suffering ends here.
target: Whoever they were, their suffering ends here.

source: All too reminiscent of the sin eaters...
target: All too reminiscent of the sin eaters...

source: The air above is thick with fiends!
target: The air above is thick with fiends!

source: Let Vrtra worry about the skies!
target: Let Vrtra worry about the skies!

source: Aye. The beast of Amaurot...or something worse still.
target: Aye. The beast of Amaurot...or something worse still.

source: I could learn a thing or two from Her!
target: I could learn a thing or two from Her!

source: Art thou with us still, Papalymo?
target: Art thou with us still, Papalymo?

source: A soul's abiding care for companions held dear...
target: A soul's abiding care for companions held dear...

source: Try as you might to conceal it, you've always worried overmuch.
target: Try as you might to conceal it, you've always worried overmuch.

source: Don't fret about Lyse, either─she's just fine.
target: Don't fret about Lyse, either─she's just fine.

source: And here I thought we'd moved past this.
target: And here I thought we'd moved past this.

source: Her resentment is bigger than she was...
target: Her resentment is bigger than she was...

source: Stained by the blood of our comrades...
target: Stained by the blood of our comrades...

source: To think this is what remains of a life...
target: To think this is what remains of a life...

source: 'Tis the very depravity she showed at the Waking Sands.
target: 'Tis the very depravity she showed at the Waking Sands.

source: May you be cleansed by the tide.
target: May you be cleansed by the tide.

source: Cling to any feeling so long and it's bound to turn dark...
target: Cling to any feeling so long and it's bound to turn dark...

source: Release thy passions. For thine own sake.
target: Release thy passions. For thine own sake.

source: Thou ever grantest me the strength to move forward...
target: Thou ever grantest me the strength to move forward...

source: She'll always be here for you.
target: She'll always be here for you.

source: A true knight, to thus aid a hero.
target: A true knight, to thus aid a hero.

source: The people of Ishgard won't forget you.
target: The people of Ishgard won't forget you.

source: Still holding to his principles in a way, I suppose.
target: Still holding to his principles in a way, I suppose.

source: Gaius no longer wishes this of you, Praefectus!
target: Gaius no longer wishes this of you, Praefectus!

source: Clinging to his orders even beyond death?
target: Clinging to his orders even beyond death?

source: Maybe another sound thumping will convince him to let go.
target: Maybe another sound thumping will convince him to let go.

source: Return now to the star, that thy loyalty might serve better ends...
target: Return now to the star, that thy loyalty might serve better ends...

source: That was but a shade. I'm sure the true Rhitahtyn has moved on.
target: That was but a shade. I'm sure the true Rhitahtyn has moved on.

source: I knew we would meet here.
target: I knew we would meet here.

source: Our thanks, Minfilia, for being our guide.
target: Our thanks, Minfilia, for being our guide.

source: I've always wanted to thank you. For saving our star.
target: I've always wanted to thank you. For saving our star.

source: We might have expected this, in retrospect.
target: We might have expected this, in retrospect.

source: That mask... That of Allag's greatest mind.
target: That mask... That of Allag's greatest mind.

source: It will take more than a bit of theater to frighten me.
target: It will take more than a bit of theater to frighten me.

source: Is this truly what Meteion and her sisters saw?
target: Is this truly what Meteion and her sisters saw?

source: A most grievous malady hath stricken this star.
target: A most grievous malady hath stricken this star.

source: Aye, a most horrid calamity hath made a corpse of the star.
target: Aye, a most horrid calamity hath made a corpse of the star.

source: Were all the stars she visited like this, I wonder?
target: Were all the stars she visited like this, I wonder?

source: To be fueled by hatred is no way to live.
target: To be fueled by hatred is no way to live.

source: They turned on each other, just like that?
target: They turned on each other, just like that?

source: To live only meant spreading this plague to others.
target: To live only meant spreading this plague to others.

source: I'm not sure how much more I can stand to see.
target: I'm not sure how much more I can stand to see.

source: 'Twould seem this beast drinketh deep of pestilence...
target: 'Twould seem this beast drinketh deep of pestilence...

source: It's as if the affliction warps their very bones.
target: It's as if the affliction warps their very bones.

source: Perhaps death would have been kinder...
target: Perhaps death would have been kinder...

source: Would that this were not merely a memory.
target: Would that this were not merely a memory.

source: I think I've had my fill of this nightmare.
target: I think I've had my fill of this nightmare.

source: That any star should suffer such a fate...
target: That any star should suffer such a fate...

source: Telling that Meteion recalls their suffering in such detail.
target: Telling that Meteion recalls their suffering in such detail.

source: I know. We can but pray it found peace in the hereafter.
target: I know. We can but pray it found peace in the hereafter.

source: Has she thrown us into the middle of a war!?
target: Has she thrown us into the middle of a war!?

source: This star was sundered by war, then?
target: This star was sundered by war, then?

source: Yet they saw not what they had wrought ere it consumed them...
target: Yet they saw not what they had wrought ere it consumed them...

source: A fate I pray never comes to pass on Etheirys.
target: A fate I pray never comes to pass on Etheirys.

source: Does she truly believe this is the fate of all peoples?
target: Does she truly believe this is the fate of all peoples?

source: Surely, there were those who sought to end the bloodshed?
target: Surely, there were those who sought to end the bloodshed?

source: Not everyone would have abandoned hope. I know it...
target: Not everyone would have abandoned hope. I know it...

source: Whatever freedom they found, I'm sure it was short-lived.
target: Whatever freedom they found, I'm sure it was short-lived.

source: Or mayhap it was not freedom at all.
target: Or mayhap it was not freedom at all.

source: We've come too far to back down now.
target: We've come too far to back down now.

source: Was <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> meant to bring an end to the war?
target: Was <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> meant to bring an end to the war?

source: They could have accomplished so much good with their knowledge...
target: They could have accomplished so much good with their knowledge...

source: I can see why you chose to lock the Crystal Tower.
target: I can see why you chose to lock the Crystal Tower.

source: That brings back memories I'd much rather forget.
target: That brings back memories I'd much rather forget.

source: Come on, we have to keep going!
target: Come on, we have to keep going!

source: Peace through exterminating its creators... “Peacekeeper,” indeed.
target: Peace through exterminating its creators... “Peacekeeper,” indeed.

source: This is not at all what technology was meant for!
target: This is not at all what technology was meant for!

source: This could have been us, had we been unable to stop the war...
target: This could have been us, had we been unable to stop the war...

source: “Freedom through technology.” If not for that, we wouldn't be here.
target: “Freedom through technology.” If not for that, we wouldn't be here.

source: Their end came not for want, but for the lack of it...
target: Their end came not for want, but for the lack of it...

source: How could anyone despair in a world such as this?
target: How could anyone despair in a world such as this?

source: This place feels strangely devoid of life...
target: This place feels strangely devoid of life...

source: Looks can deceive. This place is beautiful...but cold.
target: Looks can deceive. This place is beautiful...but cold.

source: O-Oh my! They appear to be coming this way!
target: O-Oh my! They appear to be coming this way!

source: You shall not take the wind from our wings!
target: You shall not take the wind from our wings!

source: The summoning must needs be completed!
target: The summoning must needs be completed!

source: The parts I seek... So near, yet so far!
target: The parts I seek... So near, yet so far!

source: We hunted high and low for these provisions.
target: We hunted high and low for these provisions.

source: The provisions are safe! Thank you!
target: The provisions are safe! Thank you!

source: Significant damage to imperial capital detected. Initiating automated combat protocol.
target: Significant damage to imperial capital detected. Initiating automated combat protocol.

source: ...How!? How did it come to this!?
target: ...How!? How did it come to this!?

source: Is my time not yet come?
target: Is my time not yet come?

source: Please, Ra-la, come back! I long for release!
target: Please, Ra-la, come back! I long for release!

source: Has my time come at last?
target: Has my time come at last?

source: Please, I beg of you─end my suffering.
target: Please, I beg of you─end my suffering.

source: Mwahaha... Oh, how I long for that sticky sensation!
target: Mwahaha... Oh, how I long for that sticky sensation!

source: Oh, I must needs get more of that marvelous goo...
target: Oh, I must needs get more of that marvelous goo...

source: Behold the genius of my design!
target: Behold the genius of my design!

source: A keyward is to be obeyed!
target: A keyward is to be obeyed!

source: I have been granted power untold!
target: I have been granted power untold!

source:
They must be around here some─
There!
target:
They must be around here some─
There!

source: Oh my, there are quite a lot of them...
target: Oh my, there are quite a lot of them...

source:
...Er, a little help?
These seedlings must be exterminated!
target:
...Er, a little help?
These seedlings must be exterminated!

source: That takes care of that particular mess!
target: That takes care of that particular mess!

source: I don't suppose you're free to clean up another...?
target: I don't suppose you're free to clean up another...?

source:
Bother.
I was hoping we could contain the situation...
target:
Bother.
I was hoping we could contain the situation...

source: We'll never get her back to the cave without incident.
target: We'll never get her back to the cave without incident.

source: I'm afraid this specimen requires termination. If you please...?
target: I'm afraid this specimen requires termination. If you please...?

source: We've had reports of a situation evolving in the Central Circuit!
target: We've had reports of a situation evolving in the Central Circuit!

source: The specimen is no longer a threat. Excellent work!
target: The specimen is no longer a threat. Excellent work!

source: What? What now!? I thought we had things under control!
target: What? What now!? I thought we had things under control!

source: This is not going to look good on my review...
target: This is not going to look good on my review...

source: The reactor remains intact, thank the Scholar.
target: The reactor remains intact, thank the Scholar.

source: They seem drawn by the aetheric energy...
target: They seem drawn by the aetheric energy...

source:
This experiment is over!
Shatter those crystal beasts!
target:
This experiment is over!
Shatter those crystal beasts!

source: But I should like to check on the other reactors.
target: But I should like to check on the other reactors.

source: Anyone willing to assist, come with me!
target: Anyone willing to assist, come with me!

source:
What a disaster...
I'll have to file a report.
target:
What a disaster...
I'll have to file a report.

source: My friends will be thrilled and relieved in equal measure!
target: My friends will be thrilled and relieved in equal measure!

source: I'll accept anything you can find!
target: I'll accept anything you can find!

source: Hooray! Now, to return home and bathe in gooey bliss!
target: Hooray! Now, to return home and bathe in gooey bliss!

source: Mwahaha! That sticky slime must be mine!
target: Mwahaha! That sticky slime must be mine!

source: Come one, come all! Step right up and punch me in the face!
target: Come one, come all! Step right up and punch me in the face!

source: Perpetrate violence to win fabulous prizes!
target: Perpetrate violence to win fabulous prizes!

source: Do not be shy! You cannot kill that which has no life!
target: Do not be shy! You cannot kill that which has no life!

source: Yes, yes! More blood and oil!
target: Yes, yes! More blood and oil!

source: Harder! <var 1A 02 /var>Harder<var 1A 01 /var>! You want your prize, don't you?
target: Harder! <var 1A 02 /var>Harder<var 1A 01 /var>! You want your prize, don't you?

source: Test your strength for a chance at wondrous prizes!
target: Test your strength for a chance at wondrous prizes!

source: Sate your thirst for blood and reap rich rewards!
target: Sate your thirst for blood and reap rich rewards!

source: I will hold nothing back, so give it your all!
target: I will hold nothing back, so give it your all!

source: You must ask yourself: are you feeling lucky?
target: You must ask yourself: are you feeling lucky?

source: Show me your rage, your rancor!
target: Show me your rage, your rancor!

source: You'll win no prizes at this rate!
target: You'll win no prizes at this rate!

source: Folly or fortune? Which will it be?
target: Folly or fortune? Which will it be?

source: Come to play, have you? Then let's begin!
target: Come to play, have you? Then let's begin!

source:
By my words find riches or ruin.
The choice is yours.
target:
By my words find riches or ruin.
The choice is yours.

source:
What stumbles and flails?
The burned man.
target:
What stumbles and flails?
The burned man.

source:
What comes unto me?
The trapped.
target:
What comes unto me?
The trapped.

source:
What flees my reach?
The doomed man.
target:
What flees my reach?
The doomed man.

source:
What stands alone?
The dead oak.
target:
What stands alone?
The dead oak.

source:
What stand together?
Walls turned to ash.
target:
What stand together?
Walls turned to ash.

source: Yes... This is what I longed to feel once more...
target: Yes... This is what I longed to feel once more...

source: Long ago, I fought for honor...for glory...
target: Long ago, I fought for honor...for glory...

source: Tiny warrior... I sense in thee a kindred spirit.
target: Tiny warrior... I sense in thee a kindred spirit.

source: Thou hath reawoken me to the thrill of battle!
target: Thou hath reawoken me to the thrill of battle!

source: The aetheric ice! It's powered some kind of...evolution.
target: The aetheric ice! It's powered some kind of...evolution.

source:
We have to break them.
Break them now!
target:
We have to break them.
Break them now!

source: Yes, the creatures appear thoroughly pulverized.
target: Yes, the creatures appear thoroughly pulverized.

source: And the reactor seems none the worse for wear. Thank you!
target: And the reactor seems none the worse for wear. Thank you!

source:
Professor Gilly!
It was a near thing...
target:
Professor Gilly!
It was a near thing...

source: We shall have to rethink our experiment protocol from the ground up.
target: We shall have to rethink our experiment protocol from the ground up.

source: Understood! I'll start drafting improvements at once!
target: Understood! I'll start drafting improvements at once!

source: They've grown too powerful. We withdraw for now...
target: They've grown too powerful. We withdraw for now...

source: Naught remaineth for me but to sink into oblivion...
target: Naught remaineth for me but to sink into oblivion...

source: Many thanks, friend. If I'd gone myself, I'd have ended up as some gaja's supper.
target: Many thanks, friend. If I'd gone myself, I'd have ended up as some gaja's supper.

source: If I'm going to risk my life for this job, I want double the coin. Back to town it is, then!
target: If I'm going to risk my life for this job, I want double the coin. Back to town it is, then!

source: BEHIND EVERY SMILE...IS DEATH AND ANNIHILATION!
target: BEHIND EVERY SMILE...IS DEATH AND ANNIHILATION!

source: So glorious as to inspire a new song, methinks.
target: So glorious as to inspire a new song, methinks.

source: I thank thee for thine aid, little one.
target: I thank thee for thine aid, little one.

source: Yet to triumph with ease bringeth no glory.
target: Yet to triumph with ease bringeth no glory.

source: How now? Wilt thou rise to my challenge?
target: How now? Wilt thou rise to my challenge?

source: I'vE no nEed fOr an iMperFect ForM...
target: I'vE no nEed fOr an iMperFect ForM...

source: Oh, what a lovely scent! Thank you ever so much!
target: Oh, what a lovely scent! Thank you ever so much!

source: What a wondrous perfume I will be able to fashion now!
target: What a wondrous perfume I will be able to fashion now!

source: 'Tis a shame, but I'll simply have to acquire my blossoms through other means.
target: 'Tis a shame, but I'll simply have to acquire my blossoms through other means.

source: Bah! Winged monstrosities! Begone from this place!
target: Bah! Winged monstrosities! Begone from this place!

source: Oh, no! I've gone and dropped all my blossoms!
target: Oh, no! I've gone and dropped all my blossoms!

source: Oh dear, oh dear! Whatever shall I do!?
target: Oh dear, oh dear! Whatever shall I do!?

source: It seems they've been drawn here by the flowers' most alluring aroma.
target: It seems they've been drawn here by the flowers' most alluring aroma.

source: Oh, thank you! Now, to pick up all these blossoms...
target: Oh, thank you! Now, to pick up all these blossoms...

source: And...yes, this flower is safe as well!
target: And...yes, this flower is safe as well!

source: I have them all! Now to return and whip up the realm's most lovely perfume!
target: I have them all! Now to return and whip up the realm's most lovely perfume!

source: Oh, woe is me! Must I truly start all over again...?
target: Oh, woe is me! Must I truly start all over again...?

source: How shall I ever face Overseer Sokles again?
target: How shall I ever face Overseer Sokles again?

source: I've only t-to fall to my knees. Beg for forgiveness!
target: I've only t-to fall to my knees. Beg for forgiveness!

source: Oh, thank you─I am saved, truly! I shall bring these to Overseer Sokles at once.
target: Oh, thank you─I am saved, truly! I shall bring these to Overseer Sokles at once.

source: Should you happen upon any of those documents, do bring them to me.
target: Should you happen upon any of those documents, do bring them to me.

source: Please, oh please, let this way lead out!
target: Please, oh please, let this way lead out!

source: I just want to go home!
target: I just want to go home!

source: This hallway again!? Ugh, I need to get out of here!
target: This hallway again!? Ugh, I need to get out of here!

source: Does an exit even exist here?
target: Does an exit even exist here?

source: Confound it, where did everyone go...?
target: Confound it, where did everyone go...?

source: Please don't eat me! I'm all skin and bones!
target: Please don't eat me! I'm all skin and bones!

source: O merciful Mrga, deliver us from evil!
target: O merciful Mrga, deliver us from evil!

source: Oh, praise be to the Mrga for sending you to me!
target: Oh, praise be to the Mrga for sending you to me!

source: I'm on a pilgrimage to seek salvation from the gods.
target: I'm on a pilgrimage to seek salvation from the gods.

source: But I became separated from my companions.
target: But I became separated from my companions.

source: I will try and catch up to them now.
target: I will try and catch up to them now.

source: Thank you, and may the Mrga bless and keep you!
target: Thank you, and may the Mrga bless and keep you!

source: So much for the pilgrimage... Best flee while I can!
target: So much for the pilgrimage... Best flee while I can!

source: Uwaaah! Did you see the way that gaja looked at me!? It wants me for supper!
target: Uwaaah! Did you see the way that gaja looked at me!? It wants me for supper!

source: The beaches are overrun with those damn valras of late...
target: The beaches are overrun with those damn valras of late...

source: How am I supposed to go fishing with these blasted creatures about!? Am I doomed to starve to death?
target: How am I supposed to go fishing with these blasted creatures about!? Am I doomed to starve to death?

source: Oh, thank you for dispatching those monsters! Finally I can fish again!
target: Oh, thank you for dispatching those monsters! Finally I can fish again!

source: I suppose I'll put away my fishing pole and hope for better luck tomorrow...
target: I suppose I'll put away my fishing pole and hope for better luck tomorrow...

source: Empty-handed again... The buyers at the market will be oh so disappointed in me...
target: Empty-handed again... The buyers at the market will be oh so disappointed in me...

source: We did it! They were no match for us!
target: We did it! They were no match for us!

source: Eheheh... This data is precisely what I needed!
target: Eheheh... This data is precisely what I needed!

source: Come─quickly! There's much work to be done!
target: Come─quickly! There's much work to be done!

source: We have to get everyone to safety!
target: We have to get everyone to safety!

source: Oh, you there! Familiar! Yes, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. Come here and give me a hand with something, won't you?
target: Oh, you there! Familiar! Yes, <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>. Come here and give me a hand with something, won't you?

source: I'm looking for one who might do a bit of sparring against some creations to help spark my creativity. Are there truly none available for such a task?
target: I'm looking for one who might do a bit of sparring against some creations to help spark my creativity. Are there truly none available for such a task?

source: I just need someone─anyone, really─to engage my aigokeros in combat. I must see how it performs when faced with an attacker.
target: I just need someone─anyone, really─to engage my aigokeros in combat. I must see how it performs when faced with an attacker.

source: Very well done, familiar, and thank you. I can sense great thoughts about to form... Any moment now...
target: Very well done, familiar, and thank you. I can sense great thoughts about to form... Any moment now...

source: Well, this isn't helping my creativity at all. Time to try a new tack.
target: Well, this isn't helping my creativity at all. Time to try a new tack.

source: It's as if I lack imagination enough to create anything at all.
target: It's as if I lack imagination enough to create anything at all.

source: Hmmm, this gives me much to consider.
target: Hmmm, this gives me much to consider.

source: No! I shall not fall before this beast!
target: No! I shall not fall before this beast!

source: There you all are! ...Hm? What's the matter?
target: There you all are! ...Hm? What's the matter?

source: The sacred site is just yonder, but there are too many fiends...
target: The sacred site is just yonder, but there are too many fiends...

source: O benevolent Mrga, open the way for us!
target: O benevolent Mrga, open the way for us!

source: This must be a trial... Yes, our faith is being tested.
target: This must be a trial... Yes, our faith is being tested.

source: Saved yet again! You have our gratitude!
target: Saved yet again! You have our gratitude!

source: Come, let us pray. O mighty Mrga...!
target: Come, let us pray. O mighty Mrga...!

source: There... This leaves just the sea shrine, I believe.
target: There... This leaves just the sea shrine, I believe.

source: Indeed. The end is in sight, my friends.
target: Indeed. The end is in sight, my friends.

source: Let us stay focused to the last.
target: Let us stay focused to the last.

source: No... We've come too far to fall short like this...
target: No... We've come too far to fall short like this...

source: This data will help me truly complete my masterpiece.
target: This data will help me truly complete my masterpiece.

source: Oh, dear... What are you scheming now!?
target: Oh, dear... What are you scheming now!?

source: Don't hold back now: give these robots your all! Eheheh...
