target: Don't hold back now: give these robots your all! Eheheh...

source: If you'll excuse me, it's time to retreat...eheheh!
target: If you'll excuse me, it's time to retreat...eheheh!

source: Go on─send these rowdy robots to the scrap heap!
target: Go on─send these rowdy robots to the scrap heap!

source: Nothing ignites the imagination quite like a row. To that end, I shall pit you against an altogether different creature this time.
target: Nothing ignites the imagination quite like a row. To that end, I shall pit you against an altogether different creature this time.

source: In fact, this is a variety I've only just recently registered with the bureau. Now then, show me what you can do!
target: In fact, this is a variety I've only just recently registered with the bureau. Now then, show me what you can do!

source: Oh, I am flooded with inspiration. Visions of extraordinary concepts come upon me, the likes of which you would not believe!
target: Oh, I am flooded with inspiration. Visions of extraordinary concepts come upon me, the likes of which you would not believe!

source: Thank you, familiar. Your assistance proved most invaluable. How I look forward to the day I can share my new works with you!
target: Thank you, familiar. Your assistance proved most invaluable. How I look forward to the day I can share my new works with you!

source: I must put this to paper before I forget all that I have conjured.
target: I must put this to paper before I forget all that I have conjured.

source: Is this truly the limits of my imagination? Is there no method for me to improve upon my methods?
target: Is this truly the limits of my imagination? Is there no method for me to improve upon my methods?

source: Alack, I am in desperate need of some inspiration.
target: Alack, I am in desperate need of some inspiration.

source: INITIATING EXTERMINATION MODE. WEAKLINGS MUST PERISH!
target: INITIATING EXTERMINATION MODE. WEAKLINGS MUST PERISH!

source: And, er, if anyone can help me shut it down, that'd be swell!
target: And, er, if anyone can help me shut it down, that'd be swell!

source: Eheheh! Could someone lend me a hand?
target: Eheheh! Could someone lend me a hand?

source: Whew! That was far too close...
target: Whew! That was far too close...

source: Eheheh! This has provided me with invaluable data.
target: Eheheh! This has provided me with invaluable data.

source: My next order of business is cranking the output up to 300%!
target: My next order of business is cranking the output up to 300%!

source: Wh-What? That robot nearly killed you and <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> your takeaway!?
target: Wh-What? That robot nearly killed you and <var 1A 02 /var>that's<var 1A 01 /var> your takeaway!?

source: If you'll excuse me, it's time to retreat...eheheh!
target: If you'll excuse me, it's time to retreat...eheheh!

source: Don't be shy─turn my masterpiece into scrap metal!
target: Don't be shy─turn my masterpiece into scrap metal!

source: EXTERMINATION MODE ACTIVATED. WEAKLINGS MUST PERISH!
target: EXTERMINATION MODE ACTIVATED. WEAKLINGS MUST PERISH!

source: Looks like we're safe for the time being.
target: Looks like we're safe for the time being.

source: Many thanks for your timely assistance!
target: Many thanks for your timely assistance!

source: Aye. The methods I'd researched prior to my defection...
target: Aye. The methods I'd researched prior to my defection...

source: Then it's true... So, where to next?
target: Then it's true... So, where to next?

source: Let's search the facility at which I was stationed.
target: Let's search the facility at which I was stationed.

source: We may be able to glean vital information there.
target: We may be able to glean vital information there.

source: Very well. I'll follow your lead.
target: Very well. I'll follow your lead.

source:
No fiends here...
But what might this be?
target:
No fiends here...
But what might this be?

source: Prepare to be awed by my masterpiece! But not too awed, mind you. You'll need your wits about you for this fight, I should think.
target: Prepare to be awed by my masterpiece! But not too awed, mind you. You'll need your wits about you for this fight, I should think.

source: Long have I observed the creatures of this world, how they kill and maim, and at last, my studies bear fruit. Behold the product of my research!
target: Long have I observed the creatures of this world, how they kill and maim, and at last, my studies bear fruit. Behold the product of my research!

source: O-Oh... This is not <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> how I envisioned my concept. It was a great deal different on paper... At any rate─ Attack!
target: O-Oh... This is not <var 1A 02 /var>quite<var 1A 01 /var> how I envisioned my concept. It was a great deal different on paper... At any rate─ Attack!

source: In my profession, that is what we call an abject failure. Perhaps I let my fancy carry me too far in the design phase... I will have to try, try again!
target: In my profession, that is what we call an abject failure. Perhaps I let my fancy carry me too far in the design phase... I will have to try, try again!

source: Well, this is all wrong. All wrong, indeed! How in goodness gracious did I come up with...<var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>?
target: Well, this is all wrong. All wrong, indeed! How in goodness gracious did I come up with...<var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>?

source: No, no, no. This is bad, so very bad...
target: No, no, no. This is bad, so very bad...

source: Wh-What is it? H-How did it end up like that?
target: Wh-What is it? H-How did it end up like that?

source: Where could I have gone so horribly wrong?
target: Where could I have gone so horribly wrong?

source: We won't let you get away this time!
target: We won't let you get away this time!

source: This is it─the last stop on our pilgrimage. Come, let us pray!
target: This is it─the last stop on our pilgrimage. Come, let us pray!

source: Whew... As much devotion as we've shown, the Mrga have surely heard us.
target: Whew... As much devotion as we've shown, the Mrga have surely heard us.

source: To think that mortals could be so strong...
target: To think that mortals could be so strong...

source: Could this be what the scriptures mean about being one's own light?
target: Could this be what the scriptures mean about being one's own light?

source: Relying not upon gods, but yourself to guide you...
target: Relying not upon gods, but yourself to guide you...

source: Yes... Yes, that's it. What's important is our own will and determination.
target: Yes... Yes, that's it. What's important is our own will and determination.

source: So in the face of hardship, we should look not to the divine, but the strength within...
target: So in the face of hardship, we should look not to the divine, but the strength within...

source: Precisely. If we are agreed, then let us walk this path together!
target: Precisely. If we are agreed, then let us walk this path together!

source: It's been a pleasure, my friends. Till next time, may all continue to strive for enlightenment!
target: It's been a pleasure, my friends. Till next time, may all continue to strive for enlightenment!

source: My wee little nanka has returned to the sea! Oh, it brings a tear to the eye! Thank you, my friends!
target: My wee little nanka has returned to the sea! Oh, it brings a tear to the eye! Thank you, my friends!

source: Oh, dear...this isn't good. Come, my little one─we'd best head home.
target: Oh, dear...this isn't good. Come, my little one─we'd best head home.

source: Don't worry, we'll get out of this.
target: Don't worry, we'll get out of this.

source: Bhujamga... Why did it have to be bhujamga?
target: Bhujamga... Why did it have to be bhujamga?

source: Manusya have mercy, it's the man-eaters!
target: Manusya have mercy, it's the man-eaters!

source: They could attack at any moment... What are we going to do!?
target: They could attack at any moment... What are we going to do!?

source: Now we can rest easy! Thank you!
target: Now we can rest easy! Thank you!

source: Thank you for ridding me of those langurs! Now I can gather the herbs without fear.
target: Thank you for ridding me of those langurs! Now I can gather the herbs without fear.

source: Oh dear... Perhaps I should look for the herbs elsewhere...
target: Oh dear... Perhaps I should look for the herbs elsewhere...

source: Calm yourself. Focus, and picture it clearly in your mind's eye... Hellacious horns, rippling thew, a fearsome eye!
target: Calm yourself. Focus, and picture it clearly in your mind's eye... Hellacious horns, rippling thew, a fearsome eye!

source: Behold, my greatest concept yet: the kyklops! Now, draw your weapon and succumb to a strength beyond measure!
target: Behold, my greatest concept yet: the kyklops! Now, draw your weapon and succumb to a strength beyond measure!

source: Why...you defeated it! Goodness me, what an incredible familiar you are.
target: Why...you defeated it! Goodness me, what an incredible familiar you are.

source: But rest assured, I have witnessed all most carefully, and see clearly what must be done to fix my creation. I shall return to Anamnesis Anyder and perform the final touches.
target: But rest assured, I have witnessed all most carefully, and see clearly what must be done to fix my creation. I shall return to Anamnesis Anyder and perform the final touches.

source: A very enlightening show that was, I must say.
target: A very enlightening show that was, I must say.

source: I cannot rightly believe it. My creation─ It's won! Then perhaps this truly is the latest <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> greatest creature.
target: I cannot rightly believe it. My creation─ It's won! Then perhaps this truly is the latest <var 1A 02 /var>and<var 1A 01 /var> greatest creature.

source: Though there is still much yet to be fine-tuned.
target: Though there is still much yet to be fine-tuned.

source: I believe in you, kyklops! You can do this.
target: I believe in you, kyklops! You can do this.

source:
Oh no, the crates...
OH NO, THE SPIDERS!
target:
Oh no, the crates...
OH NO, THE SPIDERS!

source:
Do I have one in my hair!?
Please, someone help!
target:
Do I have one in my hair!?
Please, someone help!

source:
The nightmare is over...
Thank you!
target:
The nightmare is over...
Thank you!

source: M-Maybe we can round them up with lizards...or scorpions!
target: M-Maybe we can round them up with lizards...or scorpions!

source: I thought those plants looked unfamiliar...
target: I thought those plants looked unfamiliar...

source: Hm. No more botanical studies today.
target: Hm. No more botanical studies today.

source: I've never seen anything like this!
target: I've never seen anything like this!

source: And I'd rather my superiors not see it at all, if you catch my drift...
target: And I'd rather my superiors not see it at all, if you catch my drift...

source: Thank you! I'll just...sweep these chunks away.
target: Thank you! I'll just...sweep these chunks away.

source: <sigh> I'd better start writing the incident report...
target: <sigh> I'd better start writing the incident report...

source: The laboratory calls! I shall be sure to make mention of you in my paper's footnotes!
target: The laboratory calls! I shall be sure to make mention of you in my paper's footnotes!

source: So much time for such a paltry number of samples... No, I must return to my desk and rethink this entire research proposal!
target: So much time for such a paltry number of samples... No, I must return to my desk and rethink this entire research proposal!

source: Thanks to you, the truth is no longer out there! The bulk of it is back in my hands, and that's where I intend to keep it!
target: Thanks to you, the truth is no longer out there! The bulk of it is back in my hands, and that's where I intend to keep it!

source: This is it. This is the end. Once word gets out that I lost these documents, the contract violation fines alone will be the death of me...
target: This is it. This is the end. Once word gets out that I lost these documents, the contract violation fines alone will be the death of me...

source: Let's make sure the next specimen is <var 1A 02 /var>flora<var 1A 01 /var>...
target: Let's make sure the next specimen is <var 1A 02 /var>flora<var 1A 01 /var>...

source: Transmission: Timely assistance requested. Stand by for details.
target: Transmission: Timely assistance requested. Stand by for details.

source: Unit designation: N-6205. Unit status: Attempting communications upgrade.
target: Unit designation: N-6205. Unit status: Attempting communications upgrade.

source: Unit directive: Establish contact with lost siege unit Chi and retrieve memory data.
target: Unit directive: Establish contact with lost siege unit Chi and retrieve memory data.

source: Transmission: This unit requests the collection of scrap from other units and surrounding area for use in current mission.
target: Transmission: This unit requests the collection of scrap from other units and surrounding area for use in current mission.

source: Transmission: Sufficient materials obtained. Unit status: Commencing communications upgrade...
target: Transmission: Sufficient materials obtained. Unit status: Commencing communications upgrade...

source: ...Upgrade complete. This unit requests you stand by in case further assistance is required.
target: ...Upgrade complete. This unit requests you stand by in case further assistance is required.

source: Transmission: Insufficient materials obtained. Aborting current mission.
target: Transmission: Insufficient materials obtained. Aborting current mission.

source: Nooo! My precious merinos! All that luxurious wool...wasted!
target: Nooo! My precious merinos! All that luxurious wool...wasted!

source: You did it! You fought them off! Now my little merinos can safely return to chewing grass and growing wool!
target: You did it! You fought them off! Now my little merinos can safely return to chewing grass and growing wool!

source: That's it, my little one! You can do this!
target: That's it, my little one! You can do this!

source: Th-These have been illegally modified... We must stop them!
target: Th-These have been illegally modified... We must stop them!

source: Transmission: Emergency assistance requested. Stand by for details.
target: Transmission: Emergency assistance requested. Stand by for details.

source: Unit designation: N-6205. Unit status: Attempting to establish communications with siege unit Chi.
target: Unit designation: N-6205. Unit status: Attempting to establish communications with siege unit Chi.

source: Unit directive: Establish contact with lost siege unit Chi and retrieve memory data.
target: Unit directive: Establish contact with lost siege unit Chi and retrieve memory data.

source: Transmission: This unit is vulnerable while operating transceiver. Timely apprehension of hostiles requested.
target: Transmission: This unit is vulnerable while operating transceiver. Timely apprehension of hostiles requested.

source: Unit status: Communications established with siege unit Chi...
target: Unit status: Communications established with siege unit Chi...

source: Transmission of current coordinates complete. Now awaiting siege unit's arrival. Stand by.
target: Transmission of current coordinates complete. Now awaiting siege unit's arrival. Stand by.

source: Activity detected on radar... Hostility confirmed.
target: Activity detected on radar... Hostility confirmed.

source: This unit requests protection during transmission.
target: This unit requests protection during transmission.

source: Unit designation: N-6205. Unit status: Anticipating imminent arrival of siege unit Chi.
target: Unit designation: N-6205. Unit status: Anticipating imminent arrival of siege unit Chi.

source: Unit directive: Establish contact with lost siege unit Chi and retrieve memory data. Retrieval assistance requested.
target: Unit directive: Establish contact with lost siege unit Chi and retrieve memory data. Retrieval assistance requested.

source: ...Update: This unit neglected to mention that said data is vital to our continued existence.
target: ...Update: This unit neglected to mention that said data is vital to our continued existence.

source: Reviewing siege protocol... Ah. Unit Chi's standing orders are to eliminate all unknown life-forms throughout the stars.
target: Reviewing siege protocol... Ah. Unit Chi's standing orders are to eliminate all unknown life-forms throughout the stars.

source: Analysis indicates that this would be unfortunate. Requesting combat support.
target: Analysis indicates that this would be unfortunate. Requesting combat support.

source: Uploading memory of defeat... This unit has never felt so alive.
target: Uploading memory of defeat... This unit has never felt so alive.

source: Transmission: Chi systems confirmed non-operational. Downloading memory...
target: Transmission: Chi systems confirmed non-operational. Downloading memory...

source: This data will be invaluable to our civilization. Gratitude output exceeding maximum levels...
target: This data will be invaluable to our civilization. Gratitude output exceeding maximum levels...

source: We must gather the necessary components as swiftly as possible.
target: We must gather the necessary components as swiftly as possible.

source: Oh gods, there's no stopping it now... Ebrelnaux!
target: Oh gods, there's no stopping it now... Ebrelnaux!

source: The Sun does not heed the barking of feral dogs!
target: The Sun does not heed the barking of feral dogs!

source: The farther we go, the worse this place gets...
target: The farther we go, the worse this place gets...

source: Indeed. We'd best be prepared for any eventuality.
target: Indeed. We'd best be prepared for any eventuality.

source: Were you able to find anything of note, Keltlona?
target: Were you able to find anything of note, Keltlona?

source: No such luck. It all looks like junk to me.
target: No such luck. It all looks like junk to me.

source: Alas, my search proved equally unproductive.
target: Alas, my search proved equally unproductive.

source: However, there's another location that is worth a try.
target: However, there's another location that is worth a try.

source: We are now close to the munitions factory.
target: We are now close to the munitions factory.

source: That is where the automation process must've been carried out on older units.
target: That is where the automation process must've been carried out on older units.

source: And there is our welcoming party, right on cue.
target: And there is our welcoming party, right on cue.

source: It appears that was the last of the smaller units.
target: It appears that was the last of the smaller units.

source: But they were no more than sub-units, or underlings, one might say.
target: But they were no more than sub-units, or underlings, one might say.

source: The commanding unit should be nearby!
target: The commanding unit should be nearby!

source: Correct. I believe it contains the components I require.
target: Correct. I believe it contains the components I require.

source: Excellent! You've succeeded in deactivating it!
target: Excellent! You've succeeded in deactivating it!

source: Once I've retrieved the necessary parts, I'll make my way back to camp.
target: Once I've retrieved the necessary parts, I'll make my way back to camp.

source: Soon, Garlemald will be free of automated magitek, and the people may reclaim their city.
target: Soon, Garlemald will be free of automated magitek, and the people may reclaim their city.

source: A far more stubborn foe than anticipated. Let us retreat for the time being.
target: A far more stubborn foe than anticipated. Let us retreat for the time being.

source: As this unit's directive has been fulfilled, this mission is complete.
target: As this unit's directive has been fulfilled, this mission is complete.

source: Retrieved memory data will be analyzed for the further optimization of our protocols.
target: Retrieved memory data will be analyzed for the further optimization of our protocols.

source: Sentimentality levels increasing... This unit bids farewell to you and its fallen comrade.
target: Sentimentality levels increasing... This unit bids farewell to you and its fallen comrade.

source: Apathy is no excuse to give up on living.
target: Apathy is no excuse to give up on living.

source: They lost their passion for <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>? Even life itself?
target: They lost their passion for <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>? Even life itself?

source: That apathy could usurp their will to live is horrifying to say the least.
target: That apathy could usurp their will to live is horrifying to say the least.

source: I pray such a future never comes to pass on Etheirys.
target: I pray such a future never comes to pass on Etheirys.

source: And so the world died without so much as a whimper.
target: And so the world died without so much as a whimper.

source: Was this what brought about their end?
target: Was this what brought about their end?

source: Our world will never succumb to such a fate.
target: Our world will never succumb to such a fate.

source: Let us show Meteion what it means to have hope.
target: Let us show Meteion what it means to have hope.

source: Was this meant to discourage us? Hmph.
target: Was this meant to discourage us? Hmph.

source: They may have given up, but it's no reason for us to lose hope.
target: They may have given up, but it's no reason for us to lose hope.

source: Show them what we're made of!
target: Show them what we're made of!

source: Another experiment gone wrong... How am I not surprised!?
target: Another experiment gone wrong... How am I not surprised!?

source: Now then, the herbs should grow here...
target: Now then, the herbs should grow here...

source: Don't let them spit on the sheep!
target: Don't let them spit on the sheep!

source: This is like finding a needle in a haystack...
target: This is like finding a needle in a haystack...

source: I don't see anything even close to what Ebrelnaux described.
target: I don't see anything even close to what Ebrelnaux described.

source: There must be some hint as to the inner working of these automated weapons...
target: There must be some hint as to the inner working of these automated weapons...

source: It's no good. We'll have to abandon the search!
target: It's no good. We'll have to abandon the search!

source: We'll never get past them at this rate.
target: We'll never get past them at this rate.

source: Agreed. Let's regroup and think of another approach.
target: Agreed. Let's regroup and think of another approach.

source: But whatever will I do about those langurs...?
target: But whatever will I do about those langurs...?

source: Gah... My limbs refuse to move!
target: Gah... My limbs refuse to move!

source: ...And cleanse the corruption from our home!
target: ...And cleanse the corruption from our home!

source: By the grace of the elementals!
target: By the grace of the elementals!

source: We've got to weather the storm!
target: We've got to weather the storm!

source: Much obliged! Now let's give those pesky blighters what for!
target: Much obliged! Now let's give those pesky blighters what for!

source: How many malfunctions will it take for you to learn your lesson!?
target: How many malfunctions will it take for you to learn your lesson!?

source: I've never seen anything like this!
target: I've never seen anything like this!

source: And I'd rather my superiors not see it at all, if you catch my drift...
target: And I'd rather my superiors not see it at all, if you catch my drift...

source: Uwaaah! Did you see the way that gaja looked at me!? It wants me for supper!
target: Uwaaah! Did you see the way that gaja looked at me!? It wants me for supper!

source: The beaches are overrun with those damn valras of late...
target: The beaches are overrun with those damn valras of late...

source: How am I supposed to go fishing with these blasted creatures about!? Am I doomed to starve to death?
target: How am I supposed to go fishing with these blasted creatures about!? Am I doomed to starve to death?

source: Don't worry, we'll get out of this.
target: Don't worry, we'll get out of this.

source: Bhujamga... Why did it have to be bhujamga?
target: Bhujamga... Why did it have to be bhujamga?

source: Manusya have mercy, it's the man-eaters!
target: Manusya have mercy, it's the man-eaters!

source: They could attack at any moment... What are we going to do!?
target: They could attack at any moment... What are we going to do!?

source: I thought those plants looked unfamiliar...
target: I thought those plants looked unfamiliar...

source:
Do I have one in my hair!?
Please, someone help!
target:
Do I have one in my hair!?
Please, someone help!

source: For the honor of House Fortemps!
target: For the honor of House Fortemps!

source: They'll win, I know they will!
target: They'll win, I know they will!

source: By the light of the Crystal!
target: By the light of the Crystal!

source: I shall not kneel before your fury!
target: I shall not kneel before your fury!

source: Ugh... I cannot fight much longer...
We have to get away from here!
Make it stop! Make it stop!
Your compliance is not a factor.
target: Your compliance is not a factor.

source: We've come too far to fall short here!
target: We've come too far to fall short here!

source: A shower of amber to lay low my foes!
target: A shower of amber to lay low my foes!

source: Rend? Nay, this shall more than suffice.
target: Rend? Nay, this shall more than suffice.

source: Would someone hurry up and heal me!?
target: Would someone hurry up and heal me!?

source: I do have an image to uphold.
target: I do have an image to uphold.

source: Slow. A sound choice, but slow.
target: Slow. A sound choice, but slow.

source: By my true name, I shall consign all.
target: By my true name, I shall consign all.

source: On my seat's honor, I shall protect all.
target: On my seat's honor, I shall protect all.

source: Well, back to it, I suppose.
target: Well, back to it, I suppose.

source: What do you think of this?
target: What do you think of this?

source: Now, now, it's rude to interrupt.
target: Now, now, it's rude to interrupt.

source: Who? Me!? You can't be serious...
target: Who? Me!? You can't be serious...

source: Is there nothing we can do!?
target: Is there nothing we can do!?

source: I can't believe what I'm seeing...
target: I can't believe what I'm seeing...

source: If this is what we must do...
target: If this is what we must do...

source: I yield... Have mercy, I beg you...
target: I yield... Have mercy, I beg you...

source: Thordan!? Seven hells, he cannot mean to─!
target: Thordan!? Seven hells, he cannot mean to─!

source: Hmph, your compassion will be the end of you...
target: Hmph, your compassion will be the end of you...

source: Will there never be peace between man and dragon...?
target: Will there never be peace between man and dragon...?

source: I would ask one last favor of you, Warrior of Light...
target: I would ask one last favor of you, Warrior of Light...

source: Now, while I have the beast subdued!
target: Now, while I have the beast subdued!

source: We must see Estinien to safety!
target: We must see Estinien to safety!

source: Vile dragons! My reign begins with your end!
target: Vile dragons! My reign begins with your end!

source: In the name of King Thordan...
target: In the name of King Thordan...

source: Go now! Before it's too late!
target: Go now! Before it's too late!

source:
They may be shades,
but their blades are
just as deadly!
target:
They may be shades,
but their blades are
just as deadly!

source: Don't be fools! Get away from here!
So this is the power of the Builder...
target: So this is the power of the Builder...

source: I'm sorry I cannot aid you in battle.
target: I'm sorry I cannot aid you in battle.

source: It seems Rhalgr awaits us above.
target: It seems Rhalgr awaits us above.

source: Yet more servants of the gods!?
target: Yet more servants of the gods!?

source: Is it me or has Meteion grown a shade darker?
target: Is it me or has Meteion grown a shade darker?

source: How many worlds have stained her soul with despair?
target: How many worlds have stained her soul with despair?

source: Meteion hath taken a blackened hue. To reflect her heart, mayhap?
target: Meteion hath taken a blackened hue. To reflect her heart, mayhap?

source: Apathy...? Hmph, madness is what it was.
target: Apathy...? Hmph, madness is what it was.

source: You'll not dissuade us with these bleak visions of the past.
target: You'll not dissuade us with these bleak visions of the past.

source: Let us give the lie to her promise of ruin.
target: Let us give the lie to her promise of ruin.

source: We can't afford to slow down!
target: We can't afford to slow down!

source: Could that be...a Flood of Light!?
target: Could that be...a Flood of Light!?

source: The world's fate doth rest on our shoulders...
target: The world's fate doth rest on our shoulders...

source: What frightful presence doth assault my senses?
target: What frightful presence doth assault my senses?

source: May thine end be without pain...
target: May thine end be without pain...

source: That nail could be trouble. Come, help me destroy it!
target: That nail could be trouble. Come, help me destroy it!

source: Doesn't it feel like we're being watched?
target: Doesn't it feel like we're being watched?

source: I don't... I don't want to die...
target: I don't... I don't want to die...

source: Guard my person, if you would!
target: Guard my person, if you would!

source: Not so hasty, if you please!
target: Not so hasty, if you please!

source: Grrr, I am more than enough for your ilk!
target: Grrr, I am more than enough for your ilk!

source: That's as far as you go!
target: That's as far as you go!

source: I will not fall to mortals!
target: I will not fall to mortals!

source: Flee, or be feed for the fish.
target: Flee, or be feed for the fish.

source: Damn it! How do those little legs carry them so fast!?
target: Damn it! How do those little legs carry them so fast!?

source: If we don't do something, they're all going to get away!
target: If we don't do something, they're all going to get away!

source: Catch the rabbits, and the chickens will calm down for sure!
target: Catch the rabbits, and the chickens will calm down for sure!

source: The chickens hold the bunnies at bay! Now's our chance!
target: The chickens hold the bunnies at bay! Now's our chance!

source: Good gods! Never underestimate an angry chicken!
target: Good gods! Never underestimate an angry chicken!

source: Look how calm the chickens are! They must be exhausted after all that.
target: Look how calm the chickens are! They must be exhausted after all that.

source: There are still some stragglers. Let not a single bunny escape!
target: There are still some stragglers. Let not a single bunny escape!

source: All right, my pretties. Back to the coop we go.
target: All right, my pretties. Back to the coop we go.

source: How are we supposed to catch these things?
target: How are we supposed to catch these things?

source: Just try to stay with them as best you can!
target: Just try to stay with them as best you can!

source: We'll tear you to pieces, kupo!
target: We'll tear you to pieces, kupo!

source: All will tremble before my might!
target: All will tremble before my might!

source: Help is on the way, kupo!
target: Help is on the way, kupo!

source: Hearken to the song of my people!
target: Hearken to the song of my people!

source: Y-You're in for it now, kupo!
target: Y-You're in for it now, kupo!

source: Bear witness to the power of kupo!
target: Bear witness to the power of kupo!

source: Hahaha! I've quite warmed to you!
target: Hahaha! I've quite warmed to you!

source: Damn it, looks like the core is gone...
target: Damn it, looks like the core is gone...

source: This armor won't be taking another step.
target: This armor won't be taking another step.

source: The rest is up to you, my friend. Take care!
target: The rest is up to you, my friend. Take care!

source: Flee, damn you! Don't throw your lives away!
target: Flee, damn you! Don't throw your lives away!
Столь могучая Тьма тебе нипочём?! Не может быть!

source: Hmph. Yours was always a vain struggle.
target: Hmph. Yours was always a vain struggle.

source: Nald, I leave them to you.
target: Nald, I leave them to you.

source: Is this the limit of mankind?
target: Is this the limit of mankind?

source: I will show you to the Underworld.
target: I will show you to the Underworld.

source: Behold. The lanterns ignite in the glyph's presence.
target: Behold. The lanterns ignite in the glyph's presence.

source: And thus we take our first step into the unknown.
target: And thus we take our first step into the unknown.

source: This isle is where we find the vault's entrance?
target: This isle is where we find the vault's entrance?

source: Time to learn just how authentic our map truly is...
target: Time to learn just how authentic our map truly is...

source: The glyph works its magic once more...
target: The glyph works its magic once more...

source: A bridge out of thin air...or cleverly hidden!
target: A bridge out of thin air...or cleverly hidden!

source: 'Tis a rare breed of jellyfish─one with a sting, I imagine.
target: 'Tis a rare breed of jellyfish─one with a sting, I imagine.

source: My, what dense aether this creature has.
target: My, what dense aether this creature has.

source: This gelatinous eyesore bars our path.
target: This gelatinous eyesore bars our path.

source: 'Tis a rare breed of jellyfish─one with a sting, I imagine.
target: 'Tis a rare breed of jellyfish─one with a sting, I imagine.

source: Might that device be our sought-after “entrance”?
target: Might that device be our sought-after “entrance”?

source:
Shall we move on?
That looks to be a teleporter.
target:
Shall we move on?
That looks to be a teleporter.

source:
If only it had been a squid.
Imagine all the dried rations...
target:
If only it had been a squid.
Imagine all the dried rations...

source:
I'd rather not.
Oh look, is that a teleporter?
target:
I'd rather not.
Oh look, is that a teleporter?

source:
This must be the satrap's vault.
Such fascinating design...
target:
This must be the satrap's vault.
Such fascinating design...

source:
Look!
We're deep under the Bounty!
target:
Look!
We're deep under the Bounty!

source:
The ocean floor...
The map was no fake after all.
target:
The ocean floor...
The map was no fake after all.

source: Then our map was no fake after all.
target: Then our map was no fake after all.

source: I must needs memorize these defenses...
target: I must needs memorize these defenses...

source: Judging by these defenses, we must be nearing the treasure!
target: Judging by these defenses, we must be nearing the treasure!

source: We appear to have angered the vault guardians.
target: We appear to have angered the vault guardians.

source: You are really quite serious about this consulting role of yours.
target: You are really quite serious about this consulting role of yours.

source: Hm. The key guardians appear mechanical in nature.
target: Hm. The key guardians appear mechanical in nature.

source: It will take more than this to halt our expedition.
target: It will take more than this to halt our expedition.

source:
A formidable-looking foe.
Be on your guard!
target:
A formidable-looking foe.
Be on your guard!

source: Please remember to heal whilst you take notes!
target: Please remember to heal whilst you take notes!

source:
Attack routines, behavioral patterns...
There is much to report.
target:
Attack routines, behavioral patterns...
There is much to report.

source: Another obstacle overcome! Now on to the next!
target: Another obstacle overcome! Now on to the next!

source: I only hope the Loporrits do not “misinterpret” the data.
target: I only hope the Loporrits do not “misinterpret” the data.

source: Mountains of gold to dazzle the eye. Noted.
target: Mountains of gold to dazzle the eye. Noted.

source: I assume we've reached the vault's inner chambers, then?
target: I assume we've reached the vault's inner chambers, then?

source: Aye...this should more than cover the price of the map.
target: Aye...this should more than cover the price of the map.

source: How much <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> you pay for it, anyway?
target: How much <var 1A 02 /var>did<var 1A 01 /var> you pay for it, anyway?

source:
Secret doors, hidden paths.
More elements to consider.
target:
Secret doors, hidden paths.
More elements to consider.

source: There are yet more rooms beyond!?
target: There are yet more rooms beyond!?

source: What other riches might this one vault hold?
target: What other riches might this one vault hold?

source: Ere long, you shall be a veritable vault expert!
target: Ere long, you shall be a veritable vault expert!

source:
My head...
Is everyone all right?
target:
My head...
Is everyone all right?

source:
Those silks...
Fashioned by alchemy, I suspect.
target:
Those silks...
Fashioned by alchemy, I suspect.

source: Keep your wits, and it's not so bad...
target: Keep your wits, and it's not so bad...

source:
Again!?
Grrr, this is getting old!
target:
Again!?
Grrr, this is getting old!

source: Ulp... I think I might be sick...
target: Ulp... I think I might be sick...

source: The enchanted fabric saps our very strength.
target: The enchanted fabric saps our very strength.

source:
Why can I not jump free?
Too much rich food of late...
target:
Why can I not jump free?
Too much rich food of late...

source: He means to resurrect them again!
The least I expected from the one who defeated Zenos.
target: От победител<var 08 E905 ((ьницы)) ((я)) /var> Зеноса меньшего и не ждали.

source: She can turn voidsent into crystal...
target: Она может превращать демонов в кристаллы...

source: Go forth and smite my foes!
Isn't there a soul worth a damn in this castle!?
target: Есть в этом замке хоть кто-нибудь не бесполезный?!
Нет... Я не... Я не проиграю!

source: Your Light shall burn no more!
target: Your Light shall burn no more!

source: Your Light shall burn no more!
target: Your Light shall burn no more!

source: Time to put this technique to use!
target: Time to put this technique to use!

source: This ought to do the trick!
target: This ought to do the trick!

source: A technique I honed on my adventures!
target: A technique I honed on my adventures!

source: The mind is the only limit!
target: The mind is the only limit!

source: I'll get up as often as it takes!
target: I'll get up as often as it takes!

source: Flames of judgment, blaze and burn!
target: Flames of judgment, blaze and burn!

source: Time to use my trump card!
target: Time to use my trump card!

source:
Make yourselves useful
or you'll be food too!
target:
Make yourselves useful
or you'll be food too!

source:
Such a sumptuous feast...
Mistress will be pleased!
target:
Such a sumptuous feast...
Mistress will be pleased!

source: Their aether will make me strong!
target: Their aether will make me strong!

source: I shall show you something special!
target: I shall show you something special!

source: For the honor of House Fortemps!
target: For the honor of House Fortemps!

source: In Halone's name, I strike thee!
target: In Halone's name, I strike thee!

source: I will not waste this second chance.
target: I will not waste this second chance.

source: That was a close call, ribbit!
target: That was a close call, ribbit!

source: I'll cut you down to size!
target: I'll cut you down to size!

source: I hope you like it scorching!
target: I hope you like it scorching!

source: Trust yourself, and trust your spear!
target: Trust yourself, and trust your spear!

source: My all, I bring to bear!
target: My all, I bring to bear!

source: I can dish it out too if needs be!
target: I can dish it out too if needs be!

source: Healing winds, bring succor to all!
target: Healing winds, bring succor to all!

source: There's still fight left in you!
target: There's still fight left in you!

source:
What a stench...
I shall have to burn these clothes.
target:
What a stench...
I shall have to burn these clothes.

source:
Careful!
That big one looks nasty!
target:
Careful!
That big one looks nasty!

source: Is there no end to this foul menagerie!?
target: Is there no end to this foul menagerie!?

source: Best give that a wide berth...
target: Best give that a wide berth...

source: 'Tis all in such a sorry state of disrepair.
target: 'Tis all in such a sorry state of disrepair.

source: Did those rolling boulders just sprout legs!?
target: Did those rolling boulders just sprout legs!?

source: After you. I've an aversion to needles.
target: After you. I've an aversion to needles.

source: Is this a lair or a holding pen?
target: Is this a lair or a holding pen?

source: Who knows what we shall find!
target: Who knows what we shall find!

source: Have we reached a dead end?
target: Have we reached a dead end?

source: We must be deep in the heart of the aqueducts...
target: We must be deep in the heart of the aqueducts...

source:
Not that way.
The debris is impassable.
target:
Not that way.
The debris is impassable.

source:
What did I do!?
Did we trip the defenses!?
target:
What did I do!?
Did we trip the defenses!?

source: The sentinels still guard their post...
target: The sentinels still guard their post...

source:
Aaah!
W-Was that not the right answer!?
target:
Aaah!
W-Was that not the right answer!?

source: This boulder is wedged in tightly...yes?
target: This boulder is wedged in tightly...yes?

source: We must be deep in the heart of the aqueducts...
target: We must be deep in the heart of the aqueducts...

source:
Not that way.
The debris is impassable.
target:
Not that way.
The debris is impassable.

source:
Snakes!?
Why must it be snakes...?
target:
Snakes!?
Why must it be snakes...?

source: Well, right or wrong, the door lies open!
target: Well, right or wrong, the door lies open!

source:
Quite an expansive abode.
Shall we try upstairs?
target:
Quite an expansive abode.
Shall we try upstairs?

source:
This has the look of
a stage or arena...
target:
This has the look of
a stage or arena...

source:
This has the look of
a stage or arena...
target:
This has the look of
a stage or arena...

source: Let us take a peek, shall we?
target: Let us take a peek, shall we?

source: Now to see what it was guarding...
target: Now to see what it was guarding...

source: I find myself drawn to this one...
target: I find myself drawn to this one...

source: We can walk through this pipe, I think.
target: We can walk through this pipe, I think.

source: They'll not let us pass without a fight...
target: They'll not let us pass without a fight...

source: Our respite was short-lived, I see.
target: Our respite was short-lived, I see.

source: The fruit must have drawn them here...
target: The fruit must have drawn them here...

source: Why would Mother's familiar be here...?
target: Why would Mother's familiar be here...?

source:
Still more?
Every ilm of this place is infested!
target:
Still more?
Every ilm of this place is infested!

source: By my strength be healed, Brother!
target: By my strength be healed, Brother!

source: I bid you dance with the flowers!
target: I bid you dance with the flowers!

source: Take your ease among the trees.
target: Take your ease among the trees.

source: O spears innumerable, rain down upon mine enemy!
target: O spears innumerable, rain down upon mine enemy!

source: O spears innumerable, leave naught unpierced!
target: O spears innumerable, leave naught unpierced!

source: Rest easy, Sister. You have done enough.
target: Rest easy, Sister. You have done enough.

source: Entrust your fate to mine now, Brother!
target: Entrust your fate to mine now, Brother!

source: It certainly kept us on our toes!
target: It certainly kept us on our toes!

source: I'm not losing to you again!
target: I'm not losing to you again!

source: Behold the power of the dragoon!
If he would taste my lance again, so be it.
Back, ere we burn to ashes!
target: Назад, пока мы не сгорели дотла!

source: Our foe is formidable. Have care.
We will not yield quite so easily!
Let us end this here and now!
Now the battle begins in earnest.
We've come too far to lose now!
target: Мы слишком далеко зашли, чтобы сдаться!

source: Where has he run off to...? Best we keep on our guard.
target: Where has he run off to...? Best we keep on our guard.

source: Surely, he's no match for us.
target: Surely, he's no match for us.

source: So, their leader was a Sahagin? An easy victory, then.
target: So, their leader was a Sahagin? An easy victory, then.

source: There's something unsettling about this place...
target: There's something unsettling about this place...

source: I have a bad feeling about this.
target: I have a bad feeling about this.

source: We've nothing to be afraid of...right?
target: We've nothing to be afraid of...right?

source: We would do well not to disturb the dead.
target: We would do well not to disturb the dead.

source: I'll not let you fall. Just focus on the voidsent.
target: I'll not let you fall. Just focus on the voidsent.

source: No matter our foe, so long as we fight as one, we will prevail.
target: No matter our foe, so long as we fight as one, we will prevail.

source: That a body could be so defiled... It's unforgivable!
target: That a body could be so defiled... It's unforgivable!

source: It's so cool and damp. You would never guess this mine is in Thanalan.
target: It's so cool and damp. You would never guess this mine is in Thanalan.

source: I can't be the only one worried about the mine collapsing...right?
target: I can't be the only one worried about the mine collapsing...right?

source: Do you suppose there are any deposits left untapped?
target: Do you suppose there are any deposits left untapped?

source: The air is so still. Are we certain there's anyone in here?
target: The air is so still. Are we certain there's anyone in here?

source: A fearsome foe, to be sure, but I don't think it's their leader.
target: A fearsome foe, to be sure, but I don't think it's their leader.

source: Looks like we'll need more firesand.
target: Looks like we'll need more firesand.

source: Hm, no firesand. Perhaps there's more in the other room.
target: Hm, no firesand. Perhaps there's more in the other room.

source: By the Twelve, what is that!?
target: By the Twelve, what is that!?

source: At last, their leader shows himself!
target: At last, their leader shows himself!

source: We will not yield to the flames!
target: We will not yield to the flames!

source: We've not trained for this, but we're ready. I know it!
target: We've not trained for this, but we're ready. I know it!

source: Pay no heed to the flames─I will tend to your wounds.
target: Pay no heed to the flames─I will tend to your wounds.

source: I like not the looks of that nail. Quickly, we must destroy it!
target: I like not the looks of that nail. Quickly, we must destroy it!

source: I sense a terrible power in that nail.
target: I sense a terrible power in that nail.

source: Something feels wrong about this place...
target: Something feels wrong about this place...

source: Another dark and dreary dungeon... Wonderful.
target: Another dark and dreary dungeon... Wonderful.

source: Gods, would you look at the size of this place.
target: Gods, would you look at the size of this place.

source: An ill wind blows through here. Let us hurry and be about our business.
target: An ill wind blows through here. Let us hurry and be about our business.

source: Fear not─I will deal with its poison.
target: Fear not─I will deal with its poison.

source: I would hate to get lost in here.
target: I would hate to get lost in here.

source: Dark forces are at work here.
target: Dark forces are at work here.

source: Perhaps there's something useful in that room.
target: Perhaps there's something useful in that room.

source: Do you suppose there's anything useful in that room?
target: Do you suppose there's anything useful in that room?

source: Let's not waste any time with this one.
target: Let's not waste any time with this one.

source: Their voidsent master has to be here somewhere.
target: Their voidsent master has to be here somewhere.

source: I think we can use this flow of magic to return to the manor entrance.
target: I think we can use this flow of magic to return to the manor entrance.

source: So the lady of the manor reveals herself at last.
target: So the lady of the manor reveals herself at last.

source: Let us put this wayward soul to rest.
target: Let us put this wayward soul to rest.

source: We must hurry and save the goblins.
target: We must hurry and save the goblins.

source: Let's get going. We have to help them!
target: Let's get going. We have to help them!

source: Is there really a goblin settlement out here?
target: Is there really a goblin settlement out here?

source: Nothing appears out of the ordinary. And yet...
target: Nothing appears out of the ordinary. And yet...

source: I pray we're not too late.
target: I pray we're not too late.

source: With all these beasts lurking about, I hope the goblins are all right.
target: With all these beasts lurking about, I hope the goblins are all right.

source: I was expecting Brayflox to be more...helpful.
target: I was expecting Brayflox to be more...helpful.

source: Well, at least now the way forward is open.
target: Well, at least now the way forward is open.

source: The dragon! It won't escape this time!
target: The dragon! It won't escape this time!

source: Time to bring low the mountain.
target: Time to bring low the mountain.

source: The Lord of Crags... He's much more foreboding in person.
target: The Lord of Crags... He's much more foreboding in person.

source: Don't let him unnerve you. Remember your training!
target: Don't let him unnerve you. Remember your training!

source: You'll not want for succor. I promise you that.
target: You'll not want for succor. I promise you that.

source: The heart is destroyed, but I fear we've only just begun.
target: The heart is destroyed, but I fear we've only just begun.

source: It will take more than a few dragons to stop us.
target: It will take more than a few dragons to stop us.

source: They really have made a ruin of this place.
target: They really have made a ruin of this place.

source: Stay vigilant. These dragons are said to be formidable.
target: Stay vigilant. These dragons are said to be formidable.

source: Seven hells. I pray we don't face another of those beasts.
target: Seven hells. I pray we don't face another of those beasts.

source: I was certain we were done for after that.
target: I was certain we were done for after that.

source: That's the wyvern that's been spouting fire all about the place.
target: That's the wyvern that's been spouting fire all about the place.

source: So it was this dragon who set the halls ablaze.
target: So it was this dragon who set the halls ablaze.

source: Hopefully we've no more fires to worry about.
target: Hopefully we've no more fires to worry about.

source: We'll need to be careful with this one.
target: We'll need to be careful with this one.

source: What is this chill in the air?
target: What is this chill in the air?

source: Try not to get swept up in her gales!
target: Try not to get swept up in her gales!

source: Fierce winds befitting the Lady of the Vortex.
target: Fierce winds befitting the Lady of the Vortex.

source: Together, we can weather this storm!
target: Together, we can weather this storm!

source: We can afford no missteps against the Garleans.
target: We can afford no missteps against the Garleans.

source: I fear my nerves may get the best of me.
target: I fear my nerves may get the best of me.

source: We must watch out not only for soldiers, but magitek as well.
target: We must watch out not only for soldiers, but magitek as well.

source: You'll not fall on my watch. Not here.
target: You'll not fall on my watch. Not here.

source: They will need more than magitek to stop us.
target: They will need more than magitek to stop us.

source: More soldiers. As if the magitek armor wasn't enough.
target: More soldiers. As if the magitek armor wasn't enough.

source: I'll see to your wounds. Just focus on the tribunus!
target: I'll see to your wounds. Just focus on the tribunus!

source: Now to find the Ultima Weapon, and shut it down.
target: Теперь нужно найти Ультима и отключить его.

source: We need but stick to the plan, and all will be well.
target: We need but stick to the plan, and all will be well.

source: Our training has prepared us for this moment.
target: Our training has prepared us for this moment.

source: I'll not let my nerves get the better of me.
target: I'll not let my nerves get the better of me.

source: You're in good hands, my friends.
target: You're in good hands, my friends.

source: This magitek armor should do the job.
target: This magitek armor should do the job.

source: His hammer seems cumbersome, to say the least.
target: His hammer seems cumbersome, to say the least.

source: We've worked too hard to fail here!
target: We've worked too hard to fail here!

source: This battle demands nothing less than our all!
target: This battle demands nothing less than our all!

source: This is the day we've been training for.
target: This is the day we've been training for.

source: I will tend to your wounds. Now, go─finish this!
target: I will tend to your wounds. Now, go─finish this!

source: I can feel my strength returning!
target: I can feel my strength returning!

source: We too can ride the wind!
target: Мы не только на земле способны сражаться!

source: We fight to protect our home! To protect Ishgard!
target: Мы сражаемся за свой дом! За Ишгард!

source: Let's finish this quickly, shall we?
I will see this through to the end. Upon my lance, I swear it!
target: Я тебя прикончу. Клянусь своим копьём!

source: We must bring our all to bear!
Halone, I beg you─grant us strength!
We must hold on! We must!
The barrier cannot suffer such an attack...
Take heart, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. We will prevail!
Let us show them the strength of Ishgard's finest!
target: Покажем им силу лучших воинов Ишгарда!

source: Come what may, we must hold on!
target: Что бы ни случилось, мы должны держаться!

source: Uphold the past. Forge the future.
target: Uphold the past. Forge the future.

source: Brothers and sisters of the sea!
target: Brothers and sisters of the sea!

source: May you find favor with the elementals.
target: May you find favor with the elementals.

source: Here I stand─a god amongst men.
target: Here I stand─a god amongst men.

source: Pray return to the Waking Sands.
target: Pray return to the Waking Sands.

source: I...I'm back in control of myself.
target: I...I'm back in control of myself.

source:
And the leader...
Of the Primogs...
Mogken!♪
target:
And the leader...
Of the Primogs...
Mogken!♪

source: Please allow us to join the rebel army!
target: Please allow us to join the rebel army!

source: You will make a fine partner!
target: You will make a fine partner!

source: I am a pig! Oink, oink!
target: I am a pig! Oink, oink!

source: Care to attempt a more dextrous deflection?
target: Care to attempt a more dextrous deflection?

source: I have ascended to the sublime!
target: I have ascended to the sublime!

source: I'm kind of busy right nyao.
target: I'm kind of busy right nyao.

source: Let's see how tough you are.
target: Let's see how tough you are.

source: 'Tis better to bend with the wind than stand tall and be broken.
target: 'Tis better to bend with the wind than stand tall and be broken.

source: Taste the power of the coeurl!
target: Taste the power of the coeurl!

source: Meaty meats, a treat to eat!
target: Meaty meats, a treat to eat!

source: <fwishhh> I could do this for seven centuries.
target: <fwishhh> I could do this for seven centuries.

source:
Finally, it is in my grasp!
The power to control all creation!
target:
Finally, it is in my grasp!
The power to control all creation!

source: Do you have a new story for Khloe?
target: Do you have a new story for Khloe?

source:
We are Susano, and in
revelry do we rejoice!
target:
We are Susano, and in
revelry do we rejoice!

source: Accept my love. Worship my light!
target: Accept my love. Worship my light!

source: Rejoice in the glory of combat!
target: Rejoice in the glory of combat!

source: Our wares are known far and wide.
target: Our wares are known far and wide.

source: On my honor as a Beoulve!
target: On my honor as a Beoulve!

source: Nothing fits so well as a scorpion harrrness.
target: Nothing fits so well as a scorpion harrrness.

source: Bask in my resplendence, yes, yes!
target: Bask in my resplendence, yes, yes!

source: It's the will of the gods!
target: It's the will of the gods!

source: Bwahahaha! Come to me! Come to your death!
target: Bwahahaha! Come to me! Come to your death!

source: My vermilion cloak is the bestaru!
target: My vermilion cloak is the bestaru!

source: In darkness blooms the spider lily!
target: In darkness blooms the spider lily!

source: Zhloe thanks you from the very bottom of her heart!
target: Zhloe thanks you from the very bottom of her heart!

source: A finer cotehardie you'd be hard-pressed to find.
target: A finer cotehardie you'd be hard-pressed to find.

source: I am freed from the chainsss...
target: I am freed from the chainsss...

source: What is that I smell wafting from yonder teahouse?
target: What is that I smell wafting from yonder teahouse?

source: This is unacceptable! Unacceptable, I tell you!
target: This is unacceptable! Unacceptable, I tell you!

source: I am not wont to run from my troubles.
target: I am not wont to run from my troubles.

source: When all falls down around you, rise up.
target: When all falls down around you, rise up.

source: You of all people should understand!
target: You of all people should understand!

source: Let me show you how wrong you are!
target: Let me show you how wrong you are!

source: That was an awfully fast recovery.
target: That was an awfully fast recovery.

source: If it bleeds, we can kill it!
target: If it bleeds, we can kill it!

source: In the name of Queen Gunnhildr!
target: In the name of Queen Gunnhildr!

source: Dawn may banish even the darkest night...
target: Dawn may banish even the darkest night...

source: Take heart and protect them well.
target: Take heart and protect them well.

source: I should be the one to sigh.
target: I should be the one to sigh.

source: Pardon me, I'm on a break.
target: Pardon me, I'm on a break.

source: There'd be no walking away from a blast like that.
target: Под такую струю лучше не попадаться.

source: Is it too much for mortals, I wonder...
target: Is it too much for mortals, I wonder...

source: O ring of ice, have mercy upon them!
target: O ring of ice, have mercy upon them!

source: Know that I have no love for fighting.
target: Know that I have no love for fighting.

source: No one lays a hand on the <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: No one lays a hand on the <var 1A 02 /var>Misery<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: The ship's fixed! Thanks for dealing with them fiends!
target: The ship's fixed! Thanks for dealing with them fiends!

source: We're not dying here! Not today!
target: Мы тут не умрём! Не сегодня!

source: We must find Papalymo and regroup!
target: Мы должны найти Папалимо и сгруппироваться!

source: Of course it could never be so easy.
target: Конечно. Это не могло быть так просто.
Вряд ли нам дадут отступить в город...

source: Do not let them breach the second ward.
We have to protect the last ward!
See to the rear guard! Quickly!
Go and cover the rear. We can handle this!
target: Прикройте нас с тыла. Мы разберёмся с этим!

source: Thank you, Scions. We will not fail!
We're no good to the Holy See dead.
target: Ишгарду мы мёртвыми ни к чему.

source: Pull back the artillery! Their champion advances!
Careful, or you might slip and fall.
target: Careful, or you might slip and fall.

source: This is no time for sightseeing, my friend.
target: This is no time for sightseeing, my friend.

source: Did the heretics make camp here?
target: Did the heretics make camp here?

source: If they did, they have long since fled.
target: If they did, they have long since fled.

source: Surely, the beast is no match for my fire.
target: Surely, the beast is no match for my fire.

source: Thal's bloody balls, all that ice...
target: Thal's bloody balls, all that ice...

source: I feared I'd slip and break my neck.
target: I feared I'd slip and break my neck.

source: Did that goobbue just jump out of a snowball?
target: Did that goobbue just jump out of a snowball?

source: Where did it even come from?
target: Where did it even come from?

source: Why must the heretics reside in such bitter climes?
target: Why must the heretics reside in such bitter climes?

source: Chin up, friend. Try to think of this as field training... <var 1A 02 /var>Extreme<var 1A 01 /var> field training.
target: Chin up, friend. Try to think of this as field training... <var 1A 02 /var>Extreme<var 1A 01 /var> field training.

source: Hacking through all that fur won't be easy.
target: Hacking through all that fur won't be easy.

source: If anyone can pierce that thick hide, it's you.
target: If anyone can pierce that thick hide, it's you.

source: A snowball fight is not what I was expecting...
target: A snowball fight is not what I was expecting...

source: I'll have to remember not to underestimate yetis in future.
target: I'll have to remember not to underestimate yetis in future.

source: We must stop the archbishop before it's too late!
target: We must stop the archbishop before it's too late!

source: Aye. But nevertheless, we were victorious.
target: Aye. But nevertheless, we were victorious.

source: Perhaps there's a secret passage here somewhere.
target: Perhaps there's a secret passage here somewhere.

source: Surely, there's a passage through somewhere.
target: Surely, there's a passage through somewhere.

source: We need but fight our way through, then?
target: We need but fight our way through, then?

source: We must be careful. I sense a foul aether in the air.
target: We must be careful. I sense a foul aether in the air.

source: Would you look at the size of that wolf!
target: Would you look at the size of that wolf!

source: The legendary hoarhound... This is not a foe to be trifled with.
target: The legendary hoarhound... This is not a foe to be trifled with.

source: Hmmm. This scaffolding seems sturdy enough.
target: Hmmm. This scaffolding seems sturdy enough.

source: Curious how the crystal has grown around the debris.
target: Curious how the crystal has grown around the debris.

source: Let's hope there's a clear path up to the top of the wreckage.
target: Let's hope there's a clear path up to the top of the wreckage.

source: What will we find in here, I wonder?
target: What will we find in here, I wonder?

source: Is that...a bird? It only has one leg.
target: Is that...a bird? It only has one leg.

source: Something tells me there are more nearby...
target: Something tells me there are more nearby...

source: I fear we've more than its one leg to worry about.
target: I fear we've more than its one leg to worry about.

source: For a moment there, I thought they might blow us from the hull.
target: For a moment there, I thought they might blow us from the hull.

source: I dare not ask how they learned to use explosives like that.
target: I dare not ask how they learned to use explosives like that.

source: Imperials. I had hoped we could avoid them, alas.
target: Imperials. I had hoped we could avoid them, alas.

source: Look there. I think that inductor is powering the barrier.
target: Look there. I think that inductor is powering the barrier.

source: I like not the looks of that inductor. Best we get rid of it.
target: I like not the looks of that inductor. Best we get rid of it.

source: Well, I certainly wasn't expecting a gunship.
target: Well, I certainly wasn't expecting a gunship.

source: I'm beginning to grow tired of being struck from the sky...
target: I'm beginning to grow tired of being struck from the sky...

source: Come what may, you'll not want for succor.
target: Come what may, you'll not want for succor.

source: I thought it would prove more of a challenge than that.
target: I thought it would prove more of a challenge than that.

source: I pray that was the last of the imperials.
target: I pray that was the last of the imperials.

source: Did I burn it down too quickly for your liking?
target: Did I burn it down too quickly for your liking?

source: Hold on, everyone. We're nearly there.
target: Hold on, everyone. We're nearly there.

source: Are we almost there? I fear my legs may give out soon.
target: Are we almost there? I fear my legs may give out soon.

source: Sounds to me like you need a tougher training regimen.
target: Sounds to me like you need a tougher training regimen.

source: Even should our enemy be a great wyrm, we mustn't falter!
target: Even should our enemy be a great wyrm, we mustn't falter!

source: That we should do battle with a great wyrm...
target: That we should do battle with a great wyrm...

source: Let us show him the strength of mortal will!
target: Let us show him the strength of mortal will!

source: I feel I've seen this plant's like before, but where...?
target: I feel I've seen this plant's like before, but where...?

source: Here to delay us, no doubt.
target: Here to delay us, no doubt.

source: Focus on cutting down the plants. I'll provide support.
target: Focus on cutting down the plants. I'll provide support.

source: There's no time. We must force our way through them!
target: There's no time. We must force our way through them!

source: I didn't come all this way to cut down overgrown weeds...
target: I didn't come all this way to cut down overgrown weeds...

source: Nevertheless, I would see if your lance is suited to the task.
target: Nevertheless, I would see if your lance is suited to the task.

source: They would turn the Vault itself against us?
target: They would turn the Vault itself against us?

source: We've still a long way to go.
target: We've still a long way to go.

source: Still no sign of the archbishop.
target: Still no sign of the archbishop.

source: Stop! We did not come here to do battle.
target: Stop! We did not come here to do battle.

source: Forgive me, but we have to defend ourselves.
target: Forgive me, but we have to defend ourselves.

source: Must we always resort to violence?
target: Must we always resort to violence?

source: We must slay or be slain. Make your choice.
target: We must slay or be slain. Make your choice.

source: Its scales are like unto armor.
target: Its scales are like unto armor.

source: A thick hide will not spare it from my lance.
target: A thick hide will not spare it from my lance.

source: I'd expect nothing less from the Vault's defenses.
target: I'd expect nothing less from the Vault's defenses.

source: Hmph, it was a worthy adversary.
target: Hmph, it was a worthy adversary.

source: We are not here for you to enjoy sport, dragoon.
target: We are not here for you to enjoy sport, dragoon.

source: A knight of the Heavens' Ward!?
target: A knight of the Heavens' Ward!?

source: Please, I beg you─let us pass!
target: Please, I beg you─let us pass!

source: Your words fall on deaf ears.
target: Your words fall on deaf ears.

source: If you would flee, now is the time.
target: If you would flee, now is the time.

source: And abandon our mission? Don't be absurd.
target: And abandon our mission? Don't be absurd.

source: I like not the sound of that thunder.
target: I like not the sound of that thunder.

source: These lightning strikes... Are they the work of dragons?
target: These lightning strikes... Are they the work of dragons?

source: Never mind that. We have to hurry.
target: Never mind that. We have to hurry.

source: Your lightning won't save you now.
target: Your lightning won't save you now.

source: By the gods, we did it!
target: By the gods, we did it!

source: This is no time to celebrate─we must keep moving.
target: This is no time to celebrate─we must keep moving.

source: Even so, we must remain calm.
target: Even so, we must remain calm.

source: They'll not defeat us through sheer numbers.
target: They'll not defeat us through sheer numbers.

source: Aye, let us show them the futility of brute force!
target: Aye, let us show them the futility of brute force!

source: This one appears stronger than the others, but it matters little.
target: This one appears stronger than the others, but it matters little.

source: This one appears stronger than the others, but it matters little.
target: This one appears stronger than the others, but it matters little.

source: I leave the vanguard to you.
target: I leave the vanguard to you.

source: Nidhogg is close. I sense him.
target: Nidhogg is close. I sense him.

source: We must rout them quickly, ere they overwhelm us.
target: We must rout them quickly, ere they overwhelm us.

source: How did he transform into that monstrosity?
target: How did he transform into that monstrosity?

source: I fear we have little time to ruminate. Come, my friends!
target: I fear we have little time to ruminate. Come, my friends!

source: Ser Grinnaux. I should have known you would be here.
target: Ser Grinnaux. I should have known you would be here.

source: You bested him once before. Together, we shall do so again.
target: You bested him once before. Together, we shall do so again.

source: His title as a knight of the Heavens' Ward is well earned.
target: His title as a knight of the Heavens' Ward is well earned.

source: You fought well, my friend, but our mission is far from over.
target: You fought well, my friend, but our mission is far from over.

source: He means to escape by airship?
target: He means to escape by airship?

source: Do not be disheartened, my friends. We must give it our all!
target: Do not be disheartened, my friends. We must give it our all!

source: I shall carve a path forward!
target: I shall carve a path forward!

source: I am of the first brood!
target: I am of the first brood!

source: Let me to do my part.
target: Let me to do my part.

source: We shall see whose rage is the greater!
target: We shall see whose rage is the greater!

source: Quite literally a twisted place, the void.
target: Quite literally a twisted place, the void.

source: Stay focused. Voidsent could be anywhere.
target: Stay focused. Voidsent could be anywhere.

source: Those ones appear to be sentries.
target: Those ones appear to be sentries.

source: Guarding the dungeon, I shouldn't doubt.
target: Guarding the dungeon, I shouldn't doubt.

source: Is she the mistress of the castle!?
target: Is she the mistress of the castle!?

source: Whoever she is, we'll tend to her like the rest.
target: Whoever she is, we'll tend to her like the rest.

source: Well fought, my friends. Let us press on.
target: Well fought, my friends. Let us press on.

source: As grand a castle as any I've seen.
target: As grand a castle as any I've seen.

source: If the mistress is here, we must repay her earlier kindness.
target: If the mistress is here, we must repay her earlier kindness.

source: The woman in the painting─do you suppose...?
target: The woman in the painting─do you suppose...?

source: Aye, I suspect it's the mistress in bygone days.
target: Aye, I suspect it's the mistress in bygone days.

source: I sense potent magicks from her. Have care.
target: I sense potent magicks from her. Have care.

source: Hmph, she's quick on her feet if nothing else.
target: Hmph, she's quick on her feet if nothing else.

source: She may still be a threat. After her.
target: She may still be a threat. After her.

source: Do voidsent appreciate flowers too, I wonder...
target: Do voidsent appreciate flowers too, I wonder...

source: I sense something sinister in the air...
target: I sense something sinister in the air...

source: It seems he wants to devour us too.
target: It seems he wants to devour us too.

source: That must be the castle proper. Not too shabby.

target: Only one other divinity would abide in the Heaven of Ice...

source:
Where is I...?
Who am this place...?
target:
Where is I...?
Who am this place...?

Ziggy biggie pretties time!
Ziggy Ziggy hey!
target:

Ziggy super beam time!

target:
Ziggy super beam time!

target: These eggs belong to these ones now!

target: Uwaaah, slimy ones are too slimy!

target: Этот <var 1A 02 /var>устал<var 1A 01 /var>! Эти отправляются домой... но землеходы ещё поплатятся!

target: Э-это было великолепно! Никогда в жизни так не веселился! Уф-ф...

target: Я доставлю эти яйца в Гриданию. Встретимся там!

target: This one is tired of pilfering pranks─too easy!

target: Tee hee! These eggs are so shiny and nice!

target: I underestimated our foe. Retreat, tonberry! Retreat!

Serves walking ones right!

target:

Victory for these ones!

target: ErRoR. uNaBlE tO dIfFeReNtIaTe FrIeNd FrOm FoE.

RePlEnIsHiNg AeThErIc StOrEs...
PrEpArInG fOr CoMbAt...
target:
RePlEnIsHiNg AeThErIc StOrEs...
PrEpArInG fOr CoMbAt...

source:
Nooo! Nooo!
This egg belongs to this one!
target:
Nooo! Nooo!
This egg belongs to this one!

Waaaaaah! <sob>
This one wants mother one!
target:
Waaaaaah! <sob>
This one wants mother one!

target: Walking ones will never have these eggs!

target: Hee hee! Try to take them, clumsy one!

target: This will teach meddling ones not to meddle!

target: Кажется, яиц уже набралось в самый раз! Хм-хм... Вернёмся в город, или вы собрали ещё?

source: You need to be quicker than that!
target: You need to be quicker than that!

source: Ah, <var 1A 02 /var>visitors<var 1A 01 /var>! How refreshing! I am the caretaker of this facility, and it is my pleasure to receive you─albeit in an incorporeal form.
target: Ah, <var 1A 02 /var>visitors<var 1A 01 /var>! How refreshing! I am the caretaker of this facility, and it is my pleasure to receive you─albeit in an incorporeal form.

source: You are extraordinary familiars indeed to have endured the trials thus far. This calls for a reward. I do hope you'll like it.
target: You are extraordinary familiars indeed to have endured the trials thus far. This calls for a reward. I do hope you'll like it.

source:
My, what curious
familiars you are!
target:
My, what curious
familiars you are!

target: Let's play a game! Defeat me, and I'll give you a reward!

target: What's wrong? You're running out of time!

target: You'd better hurry or I'll get away!

It's as if I'm not even here...
I've had enough, I'm leaving!
target:
It's as if I'm not even here...
I've had enough, I'm leaving!

target: That's the spirit! But can you keep it up?

target: You'll need to do better if you want your prize!

Oh, what a shame!
Better luck next time!
target:
Oh, what a shame!
Better luck next time!

target: Even warmachina seem to love me.

target: And I was just getting started...

target: In the name of the Fury!

target: As long as I can hold a shield!

source:
You must do better
than that against me!
target:
You must do better
than that against me!

target: Even at a glance, I see many interesting tomes.

target: 'Tis a pity they had to be abandoned.

target: Is that supposed to be a grimoire!?

target: Yes, but not the kind you want to read, ribbit.

target: Is that a treatise on the New World I spy?

target: Ah yes, I've read that one. I can recommend it.

target: The entrance to the forbidden section is just ahead, ribbit.

target: Which makes this fellow here the gatekeeper.

target: I wouldn't have guessed it weak to fire.

target: On account of being bound to a tome, I would assume.

target: An arcane entity that can summon familiars!

target: The guardians of the forbidden section are a class apart.

target: Forbidden tomes can certainly assume many forms...

target: Master Matoya's tome is at the far end, ribbit.

target: Did you ever doubt it? Come, let's finish this.

target: Falling rocks to add to the danger...

target: Falling rocks to add to the danger...

source: We can't lower our guard even in battle.
target: We can't lower our guard even in battle.

source: Is that a balloon on his back!?
target: Is that a balloon on his back!?

source: Is that a balloon on his back!?
target: Is that a balloon on his back!?

source: Be on guard for attacks from above!
target: Be on guard for attacks from above!

source: His tactics were unique to say the least...
target: His tactics were unique to say the least...

source: His tactics were unique to say the least...
target: His tactics were unique to say the least...

source: Their mastery of the wind isn't to be scoffed at.
target: Their mastery of the wind isn't to be scoffed at.

source: An impressive feat, I must allow.
target: An impressive feat, I must allow.

source: How did they acquire the technology?
target: How did they acquire the technology?

source: Does she mean to rouse the wind with that fan!?
target: Does she mean to rouse the wind with that fan!?

source: Does she mean to rouse the wind with that fan!?
target: Does she mean to rouse the wind with that fan!?

source: The knights of our camp have just the defense!
target: The knights of our camp have just the defense!

source: I daresay she was one of the Galeborne.
target: I daresay she was one of the Galeborne.

source: <pant> Her attacks were a veritable storm...
target: <pant> Her attacks were a veritable storm...

target: I daresay she was one of the Galeborne.

target: A pity my arrows can't pierce them...

source: We're well and truly in the sky now.
target: We're well and truly in the sky now.

target: We're well and truly in the sky now.

target: I can't be back on solid ground soon enough...

target: Let us prove our worth, my friends!

target: Aye, beyond a shadow of doubt!

target: By the Twelve, it's Chieftain Moglin!

target: That he should be part of the trial...

target: I didn't expect to face the moogles...

target: I pray they aren't too badly hurt.

target: <pant> The air is rather thin this high up...

target: It isn't a race, so let us pace ourselves.

target: The wyrm depicted on yonder crest...

target: Neither Hraesvelgr nor Nidhogg. It could only be Ratatoskr.

target: A winged horse...and an enormous one at that!

target: That creature was truly fearsome in motion...

target: Thankfully we managed to rein it in.

target: Good heavens, what a majestic place...

target: I daresay we are come to Ratatoskr's sanctuary.

target: We will win you over, Hraesvelgr. Mark my words.

target: Aye, this is one battle we can't afford to lose!

target: The wall seems to go on forever...

target: Seems there's fewer of them this way.

target: That's no armor I've seen before...

target: That's no armor I've seen before...

target: Right, the outer reaches are just ahead.

source: We must stay on our toes.
target: We must stay on our toes.

target: Right, the outer reaches are just ahead.

source: Is that the switch for the platform?
target: Is that the switch for the platform?

target: Is that the switch for the platform?

target: Ugh, if I never see another magitek weapon...
