target: Worry not, I'll tend your wounds!

target: I could've done without the swarm of little ones.

target: You can't fool us with those uniforms!

source: If they're here, then that means...
target: If they're here, then that means...

target: The Griffin finally shows his face!

source: We won't let you cause any more harm!
target: We won't let you cause any more harm!

target: The Griffin finally shows his face!

target: Your scheming ends here, you bastard!

target: By the Twelve, it's literally upside down!

target: The aether is so dense as to be blinding.

target: Good gods, what an enormous poroggo!

target: They must provide excellent board here.

target: I pray I never hear that song again...

target: I imagine they were drawn to the crystals.

target: That was tougher than I expected...

target: Even the candles burn upside down...

target: Have care─I sense tremendous power from them!

target: These old limbs are limbered up!

target: Just about everything is lit up in here.

target: This place just keeps getting weirder...

target: If it isn't an imperial legatus!

target: At least he knows when to quit.

target: It seems he wasn't here for us.

target: What the hells is that sphere?

target: I don't like the looks of those tanks...

target: What do you suppose are in those tanks?

target: What a strange-looking...I'm going to go with “thing.”

target: Whatever that thing is, it isn't what it seems!

target: Never fought anything like that before.

target: Certainly an efficient way to test creations...

target: Wonder where this will take us.

target: How vast could this facility possibly be?

target: I swear, every time you ride a lift...

target: I swear, every time you ride a lift...

target: Oh, that enormous sphere just screams “evil.”

target: What could that illuminated place be?

target: What could that illuminated place be?

source: The beating heart of aetherochemistry, perhaps...
target: The beating heart of aetherochemistry, perhaps...

source: Here is where the path ends, it seems.
target: Here is where the path ends, it seems.

source: Looks like this is as deep as it goes.
target: Looks like this is as deep as it goes.

source: Looks like this is as deep as it goes.
target: Looks like this is as deep as it goes.

source: We won't let you do as you please!
target: We won't let you do as you please!

source: We'll teach you to underestimate us!
target: We'll teach you to underestimate us!

source: It seems we were right to ride atop the snowcraft.
target: It seems we were right to ride atop the snowcraft.

source: The wildlife here is certainly bold.
target: The wildlife here is certainly bold.

source: It seems we were right to ride atop the snowcraft.
target: It seems we were right to ride atop the snowcraft.

source: Indeed. Let us hold nothing back.
target: Indeed. Let us hold nothing back.

source: White as far as the eye can see...
target: White as far as the eye can see...

source: I imagine the view from here must be breathtaking.
target: I imagine the view from here must be breathtaking.

source: You can see the Tower of Babil from here!
target: You can see the Tower of Babil from here!

target: You can see the Tower of Babil from here!

source: And it's no less imposing, even from this great distance.
target: And it's no less imposing, even from this great distance.

source: If this beast would bar our path...
target: If this beast would bar our path...

source: Is this beast native to the mountain?
target: Is this beast native to the mountain?

source: A veritable giant among the wildlife here to be sure.
target: A veritable giant among the wildlife here to be sure.

source: If this beast would bar our path...
target: If this beast would bar our path...

source: There is something to be said for the fortitude of nature.
target: There is something to be said for the fortitude of nature.

source: How vast is this cavern, I wonder?
target: How vast is this cavern, I wonder?

source: Is it just me, or is the wind blowing warm air?
target: Is it just me, or is the wind blowing warm air?

source: This is no time for gawping. Watch your step.
target: This is no time for gawping. Watch your step.

source: The presence of voidsent permeates this place...
target: The presence of voidsent permeates this place...

source: The reaper village. Or what remains of it...
target: The reaper village. Or what remains of it...

source: Is this the village Jullus told us about?
target: Is this the village Jullus told us about?

source: The presence of voidsent permeates this place...
target: The presence of voidsent permeates this place...

source: I would expect no less from the birthplace of the reaper's art.
target: I would expect no less from the birthplace of the reaper's art.

source: Despite their menacing demeanor, they're quite charming.
target: Despite their menacing demeanor, they're quite charming.

source: What possessed them to create such automata?
target: What possessed them to create such automata?

source: And equipped for combat training. How delightful...
target: And equipped for combat training. How delightful...

source: That doll was not unlike a voidsent...
target: That doll was not unlike a voidsent...

source: At the very least, it made for good sport.
target: At the very least, it made for good sport.

source: That doll was not unlike a voidsent...
target: That doll was not unlike a voidsent...

source: We can muse about that later. Let's get going.
target: We can muse about that later. Let's get going.

source: Azdaja! I sense she is close!
target: Azdaja! I sense she is close!

source: So the gate really was here.
target: So the gate really was here.

source: This one's not at all like the others.
target: This one's not at all like the others.

source: An archfiend... So this is Golbez's doing.
target: An archfiend... So this is Golbez's doing.

source: It looks a lot like the Kojin.
target: It looks a lot like the Kojin.

source: No doubt it is here to guard the gate.
target: No doubt it is here to guard the gate.

source: To be appointed as an archfiend, I should certainly think so.
target: To be appointed as an archfiend, I should certainly think so.

source: It will take more than that to stop us.
target: It will take more than that to stop us.

source: Were I to chart our course...
target: Were I to chart our course...

source: The portal, if you would, good sir.
target: The portal, if you would, good sir.

source: Seal of shadow, reveal thy path!
target: Seal of shadow, reveal thy path!

source: Excellent! Let us be about it.
target: Excellent! Let us be about it.

source: There is no end to these beasts!
target: There is no end to these beasts!

source: 'Tis little wonder the mount was sealed.
target: 'Tis little wonder the mount was sealed.

source: Oh dear. They've raided the place!
target: Oh dear. They've raided the place!

source: Gods, they're everywhere! Have at them!
target: Gods, they're everywhere! Have at them!

source: Oho! The wicked presence is no more.
target: Oho! The wicked presence is no more.

source: All this for a dead end...? How odd.
target: All this for a dead end...? How odd.

source: You mean to take to the roof!?
target: You mean to take to the roof!?

source: I see the mononoke share your sensibilities!
target: I see the mononoke share your sensibilities!

source: Let us head back inside, quickly!
target: Let us head back inside, quickly!

source: That battle must have blown out the lights.
target: That battle must have blown out the lights.

source: Another flight of stairs! Shall we?
target: Another flight of stairs! Shall we?

source: I shall leave the martial matters to you!
target: I shall leave the martial matters to you!

source: I spy a structure in the distance...
target: I spy a structure in the distance...

source: So many horrors, so little time!
target: So many horrors, so little time!

source: Why, I feared that would be the end of me!
target: Why, I feared that would be the end of me!

source: This temple is the pinnacle of picturesque.
target: This temple is the pinnacle of picturesque.

source: More of them? <sigh> After you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: More of them? <sigh> After you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: Nooo! Spare me, I beg of you!
target: Nooo! Spare me, I beg of you!

source: That way! Oh yes, that way!
target: That way! Oh yes, that way!

source: Would that we had a bit more light.
target: Would that we had a bit more light.

source: “Be careful what you wish for,” and all that...
target: “Be careful what you wish for,” and all that...

source: I see naught else of note here.
target: I see naught else of note here.

source: Might I suggest you take this elsewhere!?
target: Might I suggest you take this elsewhere!?

source: I would prefer <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> to join the fray, thank you!
target: I would prefer <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> to join the fray, thank you!

source: No time to tarry! We've a ways to go.
target: No time to tarry! We've a ways to go.

source: I believe this is where you come in!
target: I believe this is where you come in!

source: What lies at the end of the path, I wonder...?
target: What lies at the end of the path, I wonder...?

source: There's a veritable menagerie on this mountain!
target: There's a veritable menagerie on this mountain!

source: And just like that, the scenery is ruined!
target: And just like that, the scenery is ruined!

source: You would think they'd have given up by now...
target: You would think they'd have given up by now...

source: Hmm... Where to go from here?
target: Hmm... Where to go from here?

source:
Pray go on ahead...
I need a moment.
target:
Pray go on ahead...
I need a moment.

source: ...This is precisely why a life of adventure is not for me.
target: ...This is precisely why a life of adventure is not for me.

source: 'Tis as though it's answering! How very polite.
target: 'Tis as though it's answering! How very polite.

source: The result of a landslide, perhaps?
target: The result of a landslide, perhaps?

source: A shinobi? And out in the open, at that...
target: A shinobi? And out in the open, at that...

source: What is that lodged in the statue?
target: What is that lodged in the statue?

source: That pillar of light... Is it a geyser?
target: That pillar of light... Is it a geyser?

source: The isle proper is within sight.
target: The isle proper is within sight.

source: That building certainly looks the part.
target: That building certainly looks the part.

source: A Sharlayan facility, and no mistake.
target: A Sharlayan facility, and no mistake.

source: It seems we will not pass here without a struggle.
target: It seems we will not pass here without a struggle.

source: Lyngbakr, dread beast of the seas.
target: Lyngbakr, dread beast of the seas.

source: It cometh as no surprise that the vegetation here is eminently lush.
target: It cometh as no surprise that the vegetation here is eminently lush.

source: A convenient mode of transport, that.
target: A convenient mode of transport, that.

source: Such lines are installed throughout the isle, I believe.
target: Such lines are installed throughout the isle, I believe.

target: The isle hath effected a curious change upon yonder golems.

source: There's such a thing as too much aether.
target: There's such a thing as too much aether.

target: Is that bear from the ice field?

target: That aether should crystallize upon its very body...

source: Doesn't look like the type to welcome houseguests.
target: Doesn't look like the type to welcome houseguests.

source: Drawn hither by the profusion of aether, I daresay.
target: Drawn hither by the profusion of aether, I daresay.

source: No small amount of lightning it harbored.
target: No small amount of lightning it harbored.

source: Just another beast in the end.
target: Just another beast in the end.

source: Such an overwhelming concentration of aether!
target: Such an overwhelming concentration of aether!

source: We are come close enough to see even the finer movements of aether.
target: We are come close enough to see even the finer movements of aether.

source: I suppose we aim for that massive geyser?
target: I suppose we aim for that massive geyser?

source: Though not for want of trying, I suspect.
target: Though not for want of trying, I suspect.

source: That was rather too high for comfort, I must confess...
target: That was rather too high for comfort, I must confess...

source: There'll be nothing left of you but a smoking crater!
target: There'll be nothing left of you but a smoking crater!

source: Look upon a samurai of Doma!
target: Look upon a samurai of Doma!

source: By the blessing of the land!
target: By the blessing of the land!

source: Ugh... Weak as a spent steed...
target: Ugh... Weak as a spent steed...

source: Grass that is trampled grows back stronger!
target: Grass that is trampled grows back stronger!

source: The weave of a shinobi's power!
target: The weave of a shinobi's power!

source: I hope you like it rough.
target: I hope you like it rough.

source: Feel the might of the Kraken!
target: Feel the might of the Kraken!

source: Nothing's going to stop us from getting to the Far East!
target: Nothing's going to stop us from getting to the Far East!

source: I'll not suffer troublemakers aboard my ship.
target: I'll not suffer troublemakers aboard my ship.

source: Nothing's going to stop us from getting to the Far East!
target: Nothing's going to stop us from getting to the Far East!

source: I shudder to imagine what awaits here...
target: I shudder to imagine what awaits here...

source: If we can punch them, we can deal with them!
target: If we can punch them, we can deal with them!

source: Far from it. Whatever brought us here wouldn't fall so easily.
target: Far from it. Whatever brought us here wouldn't fall so easily.

source: S-So long as my spells work...
target: S-So long as my spells work...

source: It appears to have been adrift for a while.
target: It appears to have been adrift for a while.

source: And so it shouldn't. Ghosts are but men trapped in purgatory.
target: And so it shouldn't. Ghosts are but men trapped in purgatory.

source: It appears this was a prison isle.
target: It appears this was a prison isle.

source: I daresay we will soon meet our host.
target: I daresay we will soon meet our host.

source: I daresay we will soon meet our host.
target: I daresay we will soon meet our host.

source: So this is the source of the legend.
target: So this is the source of the legend.

source: Is that the ghost of a siren!?
target: Is that the ghost of a siren!?

source: Is that the ghost of a siren!?
target: Is that the ghost of a siren!?

source: And the source of the legend, 'twould seem.
target: And the source of the legend, 'twould seem.

source: So this is the hero's path... Let's prove ourselves worthy!
target: So this is the hero's path... Let's prove ourselves worthy!

source: This day, we shall be warriors born anew!
target: This day, we shall be warriors born anew!

source: Nice of them to afford us the chance to limber up.
target: Nice of them to afford us the chance to limber up.

source: There is no telling what awaits. Let us remain vigilant.
target: There is no telling what awaits. Let us remain vigilant.

source: It appears these beasts are our next test.
target: It appears these beasts are our next test.

source: No mistaking who the leader is.
target: No mistaking who the leader is.

source: That fellow knew how to charge...
target: That fellow knew how to charge...

source: Aye, a warrior in its own right.
target: Aye, a warrior in its own right.

source: That such a place should exist in the Steppe!
target: That such a place should exist in the Steppe!

source: You truly get the sense that this is sacred ground.
target: You truly get the sense that this is sacred ground.

source: Indeed! Gives me chills just to be here!
target: Indeed! Gives me chills just to be here!

source: The stone is alive! What sorcery is this!?
target: The stone is alive! What sorcery is this!?

source: Are those seals or hammers in its hands?
target: Are those seals or hammers in its hands?

source: Whew, such a scramble that was...
target: Whew, such a scramble that was...

source: Is it over...? My head's spinning something fierce.
target: Is it over...? My head's spinning something fierce.

source: It seems that was a test of judgment in the heat of battle.
target: It seems that was a test of judgment in the heat of battle.

source: After that dip, I'm glad for the warmth of the torches.
target: After that dip, I'm glad for the warmth of the torches.

source: A cavern now... This is turning out to be quite a tour.
target: A cavern now... This is turning out to be quite a tour.

source: A cavernous space behind a portentous gate... This ought to be good!
target: A cavernous space behind a portentous gate... This ought to be good!

source: I daresay we are come to the yol's nest!
target: I daresay we are come to the yol's nest!

source: 'Twould seem we've reached the path's end.
target: 'Twould seem we've reached the path's end.

source: This is it, my friends─the final test!
target: This is it, my friends─the final test!

source: All who bar our way shall taste my steel!
target: All who bar our way shall taste my steel!

source: I am Gosetsu, samurai of Doma─
target: I am Gosetsu, samurai of Doma─

source: Now is not the time to be announcing yourself!
target: Now is not the time to be announcing yourself!

source: Metal toys will not stop us!
target: Metal toys will not stop us!

source: Metal toys will not stop us!
target: Metal toys will not stop us!

source: My blade will make short work of this!
target: My blade will make short work of this!

source: This appears to be the guardian of the gate!
target: This appears to be the guardian of the gate!

source: This appears to be the guardian of the gate!
target: This appears to be the guardian of the gate!

source: Is that your idea of an ambush?
target: Is that your idea of an ambush?

source: Is that your idea of an ambush?
target: Is that your idea of an ambush?

source: Ugh, I'm too old for this...
target: Ugh, I'm too old for this...

source: Another machina to reduce to scrap metal!
target: Another machina to reduce to scrap metal!

source: Unusual or no, it will fall all the same!
target: Unusual or no, it will fall all the same!

source: I pray Lord Hien is safe...
target: I pray Lord Hien is safe...

source: Pretenders! I will not suffer this mockery of ninjutsu!
target: Pretenders! I will not suffer this mockery of ninjutsu!

source: Naught but pretenders! Our techniques are beyond their ilk!
target: Naught but pretenders! Our techniques are beyond their ilk!

source: They deploy machina even inside the castle!
target: They deploy machina even inside the castle!

source: That such a barbaric weapon should defile our beautiful castle...
target: That such a barbaric weapon should defile our beautiful castle...

source: It will not do so for much longer!
target: It will not do so for much longer!

source: This aura... 'Tis as if he were a beast.
target: This aura... 'Tis as if he were a beast.

source: This aura... 'Tis as if he were a beast.
target: This aura... 'Tis as if he were a beast.

source: And one with nothing to lose.
target: And one with nothing to lose.

source: Aye! The more enemies we can draw, the better!
target: Aye! The more enemies we can draw, the better!

source: Best destroy them here and now!
target: Best destroy them here and now!

source: This appears to be a testing facility.
target: This appears to be a testing facility.

source: Well then, let's put this thing through its paces!
target: Well then, let's put this thing through its paces!

source: A notable mention for its acceleration, however.
target: A notable mention for its acceleration, however.

source: That they should so enhance men...
target: That they should so enhance men...

source: We must shut the pods down!
target: We must shut the pods down!

source: A third eye... That man is Garlean!
target: A third eye... That man is Garlean!

source: A Garlean who can use magic...
target: A Garlean who can use magic...

source: It seems they seek to augment their people's weakness.
target: It seems they seek to augment their people's weakness.

source: By the way it's set apart, I'd wager it's important.
target: By the way it's set apart, I'd wager it's important.

source: They certainly do not want us here.
target: They certainly do not want us here.

source: And that only makes it more inviting!
target: And that only makes it more inviting!

source: What is that thing? A machina or a beast?
target: What is that thing? A machina or a beast?

source: Whatever it is, it's dangerous! Have care!
target: Whatever it is, it's dangerous! Have care!

source: We strike hard and fast like a raging bull!
target: We strike hard and fast like a raging bull!

source: Sounds good to me! To the Royal Palace!
target: Sounds good to me! To the Royal Palace!

source: They've got some firepower, the Maelstrom!
target: They've got some firepower, the Maelstrom!

source: Commander Rhiki has cleared the way for us!
target: Commander Rhiki has cleared the way for us!

source: The front gate's well defended as you'd expect.
target: The front gate's well defended as you'd expect.

source: New or old, Tizona will carve a path through it.
target: New or old, Tizona will carve a path through it.

source: The way to the palace is clear!
target: The way to the palace is clear!

source: No problems so far. I hope it's the same for the others.
target: No problems so far. I hope it's the same for the others.

source: No problems so far. I hope it's the same for the others.
target: No problems so far. I hope it's the same for the others.

source: We can but have faith and do our part. Come, the palace awaits!
target: We can but have faith and do our part. Come, the palace awaits!

source: Look! The others have made it in as well!
target: Look! The others have made it in as well!

source: This is the moment of truth. Don't get complacent!
target: This is the moment of truth. Don't get complacent!

source: Well, I'll be! We might even have the upper hand!
target: Well, I'll be! We might even have the upper hand!

source: This is the moment of truth. Don't get complacent!
target: This is the moment of truth. Don't get complacent!

source: Keep moving or you'll be an easy target!
target: Keep moving or you'll be an easy target!

source: What in the world is that floating chair?
target: What in the world is that floating chair?

source: I mislike the look of this... Have care!
target: I mislike the look of this... Have care!

source: To so gaze down on myself... A chilling experience...
target: To so gaze down on myself... A chilling experience...

source: To so gaze down on myself... A chilling experience...
target: To so gaze down on myself... A chilling experience...

source: Never imagined I'd miss my body so much...
target: Never imagined I'd miss my body so much...

source: As if a little barrier like this can stop us!
target: As if a little barrier like this can stop us!

source: A few spells from a distance won't stop us!
target: A few spells from a distance won't stop us!

source: The throne room is just ahead. And inside...
target: The throne room is just ahead. And inside...

source: Not surprising─the throne room is just ahead.
target: Not surprising─the throne room is just ahead.

source: Zenos! This time we settle this!
target: Zenos! This time we settle this!

source: We have you at last, Zenos!
target: We have you at last, Zenos!

source: If it were up to me...
target: If it were up to me...

source: I don't think my fishing hook will be of use here!
target: I don't think my fishing hook will be of use here!

source: I'd rather not do that again...
target: I'd rather not do that again...

source: Get too close and you'll be in for a shock!
target: Get too close and you'll be in for a shock!

source: Do you think some monsters prefer rainy days over sunny days?
target: Do you think some monsters prefer rainy days over sunny days?

source: Those claws will cut us in two!
target: Those claws will cut us in two!

source: A crab that big could feed a whole village...
target: A crab that big could feed a whole village...

source: I was a bit worried there...but that's behind us now.
target: I was a bit worried there...but that's behind us now.

source: It's always worse when they fly...
target: It's always worse when they fly...

source: You just going to stand there!? Cold-blooded bastards!
target: You just going to stand there!? Cold-blooded bastards!

source: Maybe he shouldn't have set that beast upon us...
target: Maybe he shouldn't have set that beast upon us...

source: Not even a word of thanks.
target: Not even a word of thanks.

source: Fish are close, I know it!
target: Fish are close, I know it!

source: To the patient go the fish!
target: To the patient go the fish!

source: Oh, what's this? Such a strong bite!
target: Oh, what's this? Such a strong bite!

source: To the patient go the fish!
target: To the patient go the fish!

source: Oh, what's this? Such a strong bite!
target: Oh, what's this? Such a strong bite!

source: It's weak, but a bite is a bite!
target: It's weak, but a bite is a bite!

source: Oh my! This one's quite strong!
target: Oh my! This one's quite strong!

source: Someone's a fighter! But I won't let you get away!
target: Someone's a fighter! But I won't let you get away!

source: Those things sent a chill down my spine.
target: Those things sent a chill down my spine.

source: A toad that big could swallow us whole!
target: A toad that big could swallow us whole!

source: I'm glad we didn't end up as its dinner...
target: I'm glad we didn't end up as its dinner...

source: I was afraid you'd be eaten alive!
target: I was afraid you'd be eaten alive!

source: Ugh... The hairs on my skin are standing on end.
target: Ugh... The hairs on my skin are standing on end.

source: What other surprises does this island have in store?
target: What other surprises does this island have in store?

source: What a majestic bird...but that beak looks sharp as a sword!
target: What a majestic bird...but that beak looks sharp as a sword!

source: I've never seen a bat so large!
target: I've never seen a bat so large!

source: The bats in Thavnair are not nearly as big...or ferocious.
target: The bats in Thavnair are not nearly as big...or ferocious.

source: Uwah! How did you─ Leave me alone!
target: Uwah! How did you─ Leave me alone!

source: Finally, statues that stay where they are.
target: Finally, statues that stay where they are.

source: May thoughts of Nidhana give me courage!
target: May thoughts of Nidhana give me courage!

source: May thoughts of Nidhana give me courage!
target: May thoughts of Nidhana give me courage!

source: <heavy breathing> I think that shaved a few summers off my life.
target: <heavy breathing> I think that shaved a few summers off my life.

source: Oh ho! I've hooked something big!
target: Oh ho! I've hooked something big!

source: I've had my fill of wild animals already...
target: I've had my fill of wild animals already...

source: I didn't know coconuts could grow to such sizes.
target: I didn't know coconuts could grow to such sizes.

source: Look, an asvattha! Just as horrifying here as they are in Thavnair.
target: Look, an asvattha! Just as horrifying here as they are in Thavnair.

source: No, even more horrifying...the asvattha here smell much worse.
target: No, even more horrifying...the asvattha here smell much worse.

source: Let's see. Any fishing spots to be found?
target: Let's see. Any fishing spots to be found?

source: My legs don't want to move forward, but I must.
target: My legs don't want to move forward, but I must.

source: We've walked into a lizard den!
target: We've walked into a lizard den!

source: We can go further in from here.
target: We can go further in from here.

source: Why did she get so angry? Was it something I said?
target: Why did she get so angry? Was it something I said?

source: This is no way to treat visitors!
target: This is no way to treat visitors!

source: Where did that faerie fly off to?
target: Where did that faerie fly off to?

source: Look at the size of that thing!
target: Look at the size of that thing!

source: There has to be a path somewhere...
target: There has to be a path somewhere...

source: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, boars! A lot of them!
target: <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, boars! A lot of them!

source: How deep does this path go?
target: How deep does this path go?

source: Treasure chests? In a place like this?
target: Treasure chests? In a place like this?

source: We can't go any further. We'll have to find another way.
target: We can't go any further. We'll have to find another way.

source: That was too close for comfort... Grab the treasure so we can get out of here.
target: That was too close for comfort... Grab the treasure so we can get out of here.

source: Th-These aren't treasure chests! What do we do!?
target: Th-These aren't treasure chests! What do we do!?

source: This doesn't look good... I'll leave it to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: This doesn't look good... I'll leave it to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: This doesn't look good... I'll leave it to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: This doesn't look good... I'll leave it to you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

source: The mist is so thick I can barely see my own trunk...
target: The mist is so thick I can barely see my own trunk...

source: The mist is so thick I can barely see my own trunk...
target: The mist is so thick I can barely see my own trunk...

source: A bite, and a strong one at that! I wonder what it is...
target: A bite, and a strong one at that! I wonder what it is...

source: Oh!? This might be the big one!
target: Oh!? This might be the big one!

source: They want the bait, but not enough to bite down hard...
target: They want the bait, but not enough to bite down hard...

source: Oh, this is it! Sisters give me strength!
target: Oh, this is it! Sisters give me strength!

source: I'll leave the fighting to you.
target: I'll leave the fighting to you.

source: What has happened to this island?
target: What has happened to this island?

source: There. It should be safe to cross now.
target: There. It should be safe to cross now.

source: Throw everything you have at it!
target: Throw everything you have at it!

source: What manner of beast could it be?
target: What manner of beast could it be?

source: How large do you suppose it is?
target: How large do you suppose it is?

source: Even so, we should speak with the researchers first.
target: Even so, we should speak with the researchers first.

source: Such marks would be too common in any case.
target: Such marks would be too common in any case.

source: So many strange plants you have here.
target: So many strange plants you have here.

source: You said the beast is close?
target: You said the beast is close?

source: Struck down defending its territory, most like.
target: Struck down defending its territory, most like.

source: We mustn't let any more creatures come to harm.
target: We mustn't let any more creatures come to harm.

source: I see no tracks that match those claw marks...
target: I see no tracks that match those claw marks...

source: There has to be a clue here somewhere...
target: There has to be a clue here somewhere...

source: Focus. We've no time for picking flowers.
target: Focus. We've no time for picking flowers.

source: A Roegadyn? I thought this island was deserted?
target: A Roegadyn? I thought this island was deserted?

source: I need...I need a moment to catch my breath.
target: I need...I need a moment to catch my breath.

source: A rare catch awaits. I can feel it!
target: A rare catch awaits. I can feel it!

source: Have you ever beheld such grace as mine!?
target: Have you ever beheld such grace as mine!?

source: Phew...I'm going through a lot of bullets.
target: Phew...I'm going through a lot of bullets.

source: You'll never guess what I've got in store...
target: You'll never guess what I've got in store...

source: Hehehe! Who made that sound? Rude!
target: Hehehe! Who made that sound? Rude!

source: Just step on a cushion! Pretty please?
target: Just step on a cushion! Pretty please?

source: This scenery reminds me of home...
target: This scenery reminds me of home...

source: Gaaah! I'm not afraid, I'm not afraid...
target: Gaaah! I'm not afraid, I'm not afraid...

source: This looks like a great spot to cast my rod.
target: This looks like a great spot to cast my rod.

source: Hmm... Not a single fish I haven't seen before.
target: Hmm... Not a single fish I haven't seen before.

source: What was in the chests, I wonder?
target: What was in the chests, I wonder?

source: See how an expert fisher does it!
target: See how an expert fisher does it!

source: Good to see you found a way in too, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target: Good to see you found a way in too, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: Right, then! Let's go and get our treasure!
target: Right, then! Let's go and get our treasure!

source: What is that? Some kind of horse?
target: What is that? Some kind of horse?

source: It's the Kelpie! I've heard legends of it!
target: It's the Kelpie! I've heard legends of it!

source: I'm drenched from head to toe...
target: I'm drenched from head to toe...

source: No more than you'd expect on an adventure, eh?
target: No more than you'd expect on an adventure, eh?

source: And I have a feeling it's crawling with “worshipers”...
target: And I have a feeling it's crawling with “worshipers”...

source: I daresay this was a place of worship.
target: I daresay this was a place of worship.

source: Does that mean we've already reached the treasure!?
target: Does that mean we've already reached the treasure!?

source: If that's the treasure, then consider me disappointed.
target: If that's the treasure, then consider me disappointed.

source: Fortunately for you, it's another guardian. Be on your guard!
target: Fortunately for you, it's another guardian. Be on your guard!

source: Indeed. Its magicks were not to be underestimated.
target: Indeed. Its magicks were not to be underestimated.

source: Relics of the mad king's reign.
target: Relics of the mad king's reign.

source: That was a person? Seven hells...
target: That was a person? Seven hells...

source: So the dark rumors of this place were true...
target: So the dark rumors of this place were true...

source: It seems that fellow won't let us have the treasure without a fight.
target: It seems that fellow won't let us have the treasure without a fight.

source: Wouldn't be much of an adventure if it didn't end on a climax, eh?
target: Wouldn't be much of an adventure if it didn't end on a climax, eh?

source: From here we must proceed on foot.
target: From here we must proceed on foot.

source: I believe so. Let us continue on foot.
target: I believe so. Let us continue on foot.

source: The sand above gives way. Have care.
target: The sand above gives way. Have care.

source: A scorpion clad in crystal. How curious.
target: A scorpion clad in crystal. How curious.

source: I daresay we're in that creature's home.
target: I daresay we're in that creature's home.

source: What did it have to feed upon here?
target: What did it have to feed upon here?

source: Amazing that life could adapt to such a harsh environment.
target: Amazing that life could adapt to such a harsh environment.

source: One cannot underestimate the will to survive.
target: One cannot underestimate the will to survive.

source: Quite an abrupt change in surrounds...
target: Quite an abrupt change in surrounds...

source: Aye. The aether here is unmistakable.
target: Aye. The aether here is unmistakable.

source: It seems we've trespassed upon their lair.
target: It seems we've trespassed upon their lair.

source: Never a dull moment in this cavern!
target: Never a dull moment in this cavern!

source: Native fauna or Allagan machina, we'll clear them all out!
target: Native fauna or Allagan machina, we'll clear them all out!

source: Both machina and facility are still operational.
target: Both machina and facility are still operational.

source: Not for much longer, they won't be!
target: Not for much longer, they won't be!

source: Those blades could do some serious damage.
target: Those blades could do some serious damage.

source: As much as I would like to examine this place, we should press on.
target: As much as I would like to examine this place, we should press on.

source: Indeed. Perhaps there will be time later.
target: Indeed. Perhaps there will be time later.

source: 'Tis easy to see why they say this place was “bled dry.”
target: 'Tis easy to see why they say this place was “bled dry.”

source: No matter the odds, life always finds a way...
target: No matter the odds, life always finds a way...

source: The sand here is as pale as those enormous bones.
target: The sand here is as pale as those enormous bones.

source: I'm glad we don't have to face it alive.
target: I'm glad we don't have to face it alive.

source: Are sandworms descended from this creature, I wonder.
target: Are sandworms descended from this creature, I wonder.

source: That a sandworm could have grown to such proportions...
target: That a sandworm could have grown to such proportions...

source: A dragon as white as these wastes... How very fitting.
target: A dragon as white as these wastes... How very fitting.

source: That dragon formed from the mist!
target: That dragon formed from the mist!

source: Another of Allag's pitiable slaves, I'd wager.
target: Another of Allag's pitiable slaves, I'd wager.

source: This is the moment of truth, my friends! Hold nothing back!
target: This is the moment of truth, my friends! Hold nothing back!

source: They must do better than that to catch us off guard!
target: They must do better than that to catch us off guard!

source: Golden armor... Safe to assume it's dangerous.
target: Golden armor... Safe to assume it's dangerous.

source: Special, are you? Well, you're about to lose your luster!
target: Special, are you? Well, you're about to lose your luster!

source: That was some truly savage swordplay.
target: That was some truly savage swordplay.

source: How fierce must the fighting have been here...
target: How fierce must the fighting have been here...

source: Our friends need us! With me!
target: Our friends need us! With me!

source: An unusual foe...but we will find a way through it!
target: An unusual foe...but we will find a way through it!

source: Whatever it is, we can't afford to be stopped here!
target: Whatever it is, we can't afford to be stopped here!

source: Such bizarre machina the Garleans are wont to make...
target: Such bizarre machina the Garleans are wont to make...

source: That one was like a fire-breathing mole, I thought.
target: That one was like a fire-breathing mole, I thought.

source: How heartening to have the Alliance's finest at our side!
target: How heartening to have the Alliance's finest at our side!

source: Aye, there is naught we need fear!
target: Aye, there is naught we need fear!

source: To ward off such a powerful attack...
target: To ward off such a powerful attack...

source: No less than I'd expect of the Elder Seedseer!
target: No less than I'd expect of the Elder Seedseer!

source: A sturdier barrier I have seldom seen!
target: A sturdier barrier I have seldom seen!

source: Leave it to Lyse to pierce warmachina armor with her fist!
target: Leave it to Lyse to pierce warmachina armor with her fist!

source: So, their commanders deign to appear at last!
target: So, their commanders deign to appear at last!

source: Heartless bastards! I'll have my revenge!
target: Heartless bastards! I'll have my revenge!

source: Shame I won't get to watch you die here!
target: Shame I won't get to watch you die here!

source: Does every beast on this island want to kill us?
target: Does every beast on this island want to kill us?

source: I admit...that was scary, but exciting.
target: I admit...that was scary, but exciting.

source: Lord Golbez! Hope is not lost, then!
target: Lord Golbez! Hope is not lost, then!

source:
I shall deliver the
world its salvation!
target:
I shall deliver the
world its salvation!

source: We will deal with this fiend!
target: We will deal with this fiend!

source: We must hurry to the castle!
target: We must hurry to the castle!

source: I shudder to think what other horrors yet await us.
target: I shudder to think what other horrors yet await us.

source: I leave the rest to you.
target: I leave the rest to you.

source: Ye gods, what magick is this!?
target: Ye gods, what magick is this!?

source: Don't take your eyes off them!
target: Don't take your eyes off them!

source: This can't be good... Stay on guard!
target: This can't be good... Stay on guard!

source: You'll not find me an easy target!
target: You'll not find me an easy target!

source: So they mean to play their trump card!
target: So they mean to play their trump card!

source: Throw everything you've got at them!
target: Throw everything you've got at them!

source: We must finish this before they can!
target: We must finish this before they can!

source: Oh, you ruined it! I'd packed the chests full of goodies, too!
target: Oh, you ruined it! I'd packed the chests full of goodies, too!

source: You aren't going to jump...are you?
target: You aren't going to jump...are you?

source: I can do this! I can!
target: I can do this! I can!

source: Every twist and turn brings us face-to-face with a new threat...
target: Every twist and turn brings us face-to-face with a new threat...

source: Do you think she's telling the truth, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target: Do you think she's telling the truth, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?

source: The slightest touch should be enough to clear it...
target: The slightest touch should be enough to clear it...

source: The wind made it brittle for us. Now we can pass through!
target: The wind made it brittle for us. Now we can pass through!

source: Let us reconvene at the castle garden.
target: Let us reconvene at the castle garden.

source: Let's hope the divinities of Aloalo guide us true.
target: Let's hope the divinities of Aloalo guide us true.

source: Nothing for it but to keep going!
target: Nothing for it but to keep going!

source: We made it through the mist!
target: We made it through the mist!

source: Didn't expect that. Well, no point in sticking around!
target: Didn't expect that. Well, no point in sticking around!

source: I almost fainted... Where are we?
target: I almost fainted... Where are we?

source: Everywhere we go, beasts are waiting for us!
target: Everywhere we go, beasts are waiting for us!

source: Hehe. Now this could be interesting.
target: Hehe. Now this could be interesting.

source: I won't say no to treasure, but what I'm really here for is the fish!
target: I won't say no to treasure, but what I'm really here for is the fish!

source: So there are voidsent after all. Have care.
target: So there are voidsent after all. Have care.

source: This place is not at all as I remember it...
target: This place is not at all as I remember it...

source: I can sense its presence deep within... Zeromus is here.
target: I can sense its presence deep within... Zeromus is here.

source: Let's move on, before they have time to regroup.
target: Let's move on, before they have time to regroup.

source: Is this all Golbez can muster to bar our path?
target: Is this all Golbez can muster to bar our path?

source: I didn't expect such a beast to yet remain.
target: I didn't expect such a beast to yet remain.

source: Even so, it pales before the archfiends.
target: Even so, it pales before the archfiends.

source: The vanishing scepters were quite the nuisance.
target: The vanishing scepters were quite the nuisance.

source: As if cheap parlor tricks would suffice to stop us.
target: As if cheap parlor tricks would suffice to stop us.

source: Vanished, you say? I thought they were merely bluffing.
target: Vanished, you say? I thought they were merely bluffing.

source: This memoria crystal is... No, it can't be...
target: This memoria crystal is... No, it can't be...

source: Did that man just call you...Golbez?
target: Did that man just call you...Golbez?

source: I've met this man somewhere before...
target: I've met this man somewhere before...

source: This man seems to think you're Golbez.
target: This man seems to think you're Golbez.

source: 'Twould seem we've become part of the memory.
target: 'Twould seem we've become part of the memory.

source: Whoever this man is, he seems convinced you're Golbez.
target: Whoever this man is, he seems convinced you're Golbez.

source: They were too late to save their home, then...
target: They were too late to save their home, then...

source: So this is the kingdom of Baron.
target: So this is the kingdom of Baron.

source: Even if this is only a memory, it is no less easy to bear and watch.
target: Even if this is only a memory, it is no less easy to bear and watch.

source: If we're to escape, it seems we've no choice but to fight.
target: If we're to escape, it seems we've no choice but to fight.

source: So this is an antlion of the Thirteenth.
target: So this is an antlion of the Thirteenth.

source: Is there no end to this memory?
target: Is there no end to this memory?

source: For a mercy, its movements were easy to read.
target: For a mercy, its movements were easy to read.

source: I'm sure this was a beautiful castle once...
target: I'm sure this was a beautiful castle once...

source: Such tragedy was commonplace during the Contramemoria...
target: Such tragedy was commonplace during the Contramemoria...

source: Who could be behind all this?
target: Who could be behind all this?

source: Such carnage. Such cruelty. This is...
target: Such carnage. Such cruelty. This is...

source: We must find a way across.
target: We must find a way across.

source: That he should place such faith in Golbez...
target: That he should place such faith in Golbez...

source: Let us leave the other side to him.
target: Let us leave the other side to him.

source: In any case, it would be rude of us not to respond in kind.
target: In any case, it would be rude of us not to respond in kind.

source: They've all but brought the Final Days upon themselves.
target: They've all but brought the Final Days upon themselves.

source: He gave himself to the Dark to stop Golbez...
target: He gave himself to the Dark to stop Golbez...

source: It seems we've no choice but to fight...
target: It seems we've no choice but to fight...

source: And yet it falls to us to keep him─or rather, you─from harm.
target: And yet it falls to us to keep him─or rather, you─from harm.

source: Drown them and be done with it!
target: Drown them and be done with it!

source: I can't take any more of his pestering.
target: I can't take any more of his pestering.

source: How could something so large move so quickly!?
target: How could something so large move so quickly!?

source: I try to only speak kindly of others, but they test me...
target: I try to only speak kindly of others, but they test me...

source: I try to only speak kindly of others, but they test me...
target: I try to only speak kindly of others, but they test me...
